src_text: Ukulawulwa Kwehlekelele Ngemva Kweenkhukhula.
tgt_text: Ndangulo ya tshiwo nga murahu ha miḓalo.

src_text: IKhabinethi ililele beyaduduza boke abantu ababhujelweko eenkhukhuleni zamhlapha ezisahlele iindawo ezimbadlwana zelizwe, khulukhulu KwaZulu-Natala.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo swikisa maipfi ndiliso kha vhathu vhoṱhe vhe vha ṱutshelwa nga  vhafunwa vhavho kha miḓalo ye ya vhanga tshinyalelo khulwane ine ya kha ḓi tou bva vha hone zwenezwino kha zwipiḓa zwo fhambanaho zwa shango ḽashu, nga maanḓa ngei KwaZulu-Natal..     Zwa ḓivhadzwa ha Tshiimo tsha Tshiwo tsha Lushaka na maga thuso ya ṱhaḓulo kha zwa ikonomi na matshilisano zwe zwa itwa nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa, zwo livhiswa kha vhona uri hu khou vha na maga khwaṱhaho nahone tshimbidzwaho zwavhuḓi vhukati ha masia oṱhe muvhuso hu tshi shumiswa  Senthara ya Ndangulo ya Tshiwo ya Lushaka.

Masheleni linganaho R1 biḽioni a ṋetshedzwa nga muvhuso khou shumiswa kha tikedza ndingedzo dza mvusuluso na ṱhaḓulo vhuedzedza tshumelo dza mutheo khathihi na ṋetshedza thuso ya zwa vhuthu nga vha ṋea zwiḽiwa, maḓi, vhudzulo, tshumelo dza vhuthathazwitzhili na zwiambaro..     Mushumo wa dovha fhaṱa hafhu nga huswa fhethu ho tshinyadzwaho nga miḓalo kati, ngeno vhathu vha shango ḽashu vha tshi khou farana vha vha ṅanda nthihi kha vhuḓiimiseli havho ha thusa avho vho tshinyalelwaho nga mahaya na thundu dzavho.

src_text: Ukumenyezelwa kobuJamo beHlekelele eliZweniloke kunye namagadango wokusiza ukwethula abantu umthwalo kezehlalakuhle nezomnotho, njengoba kumemezele uMengameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa mhlapha, bekunqophe ukuletha ihlelo elihle lokulamulela abantu kizo zoke iingaba zikarhulumende, ngeZiko lokuLawula iHlekelele eliZweniloke.
tgt_text: Mafhungo maswa nga ha Vhulwadze ha Khoronavairasi (COVID-19).

Khabinethe yo dzhiela nṱha khathihi na vhilaedzwa nga engedzea ha zwenezwino  ha tshivhalo tsha zwiwo zwa kavhiwa nga vairasi ya COVID-19 kha zwiṅwe zwipiḓa zwa  shango nahone khou  ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhoṱhe uri vha dzhie maga tsireledzo itela ḓitsireledza kha vairasi iyi re khombo ngaurali, nga maanḓa nga tshifhinga tsha vhuriha.

src_text: Imali eyibhiliyoni yamarandi ekhutjhwe ngurhulumende isetjenziselwa ukusekela imizamo yokusiza nokulungisa, ukubuyisa izenzelwa ekuphilwa ngazo, ukunikela ngesizo leendingo zesitjhaba ezinjengokugoma, amanzi, iindawo  zokuhlala, ihlelo lehlanzeko yomphakathi kunye nezembatho.
tgt_text: Vairasi iyi khou bvela phanḓa na vha khombo tshifhinga tshoṱhe nahone muhaelo ndi wone une swika zwino wa vha tshone tshiṱhavhane tsha vhuhali tsha ḓitsireledza.

Khabinethe khou takadzwa nga fhungo ḽa uri vhunzhi ha vhathu vha khou bvela phanḓa na nanga muhaelo sa tshone tshipileli tshavho tsha thoma kha COVID-19 nga murahu ha musi mbalombalo dza zwenezwino dzo sumbedza uri ro swika kha ḽiga ḽa nṱhesa ḽa fhirisa phesenthe dza 50 dza vhaaluwa vho haelwaho kha mavunḓu maṱanu.

src_text: Selithomile ihlelo lokuvuselela iindawo ezithintekileko njengoba abantu belizwe lekhethu babumbana bancamele ukusiza labo abagirikelwe ziinkumba bebonakalelwa yipahla.

tgt_text: Khabinethe khou ita khuwelelo kha avho vhane vha athu haelwa uri vha ite ngauralo itela uri vha kone ḓitsireledza khathihi na tsireledza vhafunwa vhavho.

src_text: Zamva Nje Ngesifo Sengogwana i-Corona (i-COVID-19).
tgt_text: Ri tea dovha hafhu ra bvela phanḓa na tevhedza milayo yoṱhe ya thivhela dwadze ḽa COVID-19, hu tshi katelwa na zwa ambara maski une wa thivhedza mulomo na ningo ṱamba zwanḓa nga maḓi na tshisibe kana shumisa sanithaiza ya zwanḓa re na aḽikhohoḽi linganaho 70%, khathihi na sia tshikhala tshi linganaho mithara muthihi vhukati hau na muṅwe muthu..     Magavhelo Ṱhaḓulo ya Thambulo  kha Vhadzulapo (SRD) .

src_text: IKhabinethi iyelele beyitshwenyekile ngokwanda kwabantu abangenwe yi-COVID-19 kezinye iingcenye zelizweli, yabe yakhwezelela boke abantu ukuthi batjheje, bazivikele kilengogwana engumabhubhisa, khulukhulu ebusika nje.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou ṱuṱuwedza vhadzulapo vha wanaho Magavhelo masheleni linganaho R350 SRD uri vha dovhe vha ite khumbelo hafhu nga huswa nga murahu ha musi ho thoma shumiswa milayo miswa langaho zwa itwa ha khumbelo idzi khathihi na zwa vha muthu tewaho nga wana magavhelo aya.
Khumbelo dzi nga itwa kha webusaithi ya Zhendedzi ḽa Thuso ya zwa Masheleni kha Vhadzulao ḽa Afrika Tshipembe (SASSA) ine ya vha https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.

src_text: Ingogwana le solo isese yingozi ebantwini, begodu ukujova solo kusese kuphela kwesikhali esinamandla ukuzidlula zoke sokuzivikela.
tgt_text: Sisiṱeme ya ita khumbelo yo vula nga ḽa 23 Lambamai 2022 nahone khumbelo  dzenedzo dzi itwa nga nḓila yo fhelelaho ya didzhithaḽa hu tshi itelwa uri hu kone  wanala phindulo nga ṱavhanya..     Magavhelo ṱhaḓulo tshikwama tsha ndeme tsha thuso ya zwa masheleni kha miṱa shayaho ye ya vha tshi ḓo vha kha nyimele konḓaho vhukuma nga mulandu wa vhushai na shayea ha mishumo.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokozile ukubona ukuthi bayanda abantu abakhetha ukuhlaba njengendlela yokuthoma nenamandla khulu yokuzivikela esifeni se-COVID-19, ngemva kobana iimbalobalo zitjengise ukuthi sesiwadlulile ama-50% wabantu abakhulu esele bahlabile eemfundeni ezihlanu.
tgt_text: Muvhuso wo ḓiimisela ṋetshedza thuso ya zwa matshilisano kha avho vha sa koni ḓiitela uri na vhone vha kone swikela ṱhoḓea dzavho dza mutheo.
Tsireledzo na Vhutsireledzi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombela boke labo abangakahlabi ukuthi basize bayokuhlaba kobanyana bazokuvikeleka, bavikele nabathandiweko babo.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou bvela phanḓa na sasaladza zwa vhulawa ha vhafumakadzi nga nḓila ya tshiṱuhu nahone khou dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza vhukando ho dzhiwaho nga ṱavhanya nga vhaofisiri vha zwa mulayo ha fara vhahumbulelwa malugana na lufu lwa Mufumakadzi Vho Hillary Gardee (28), vha fhaḽa Kamagugu kha ḽa Mpumalanga.

src_text: Soke kufuze bona sihlale sithobela imilayelo yokukhandela ukungenwa yi-COVID-19; sembathe imaski evala umlomo nepumulo, sihlale sihlamba izandla zethu ngamanzi nesibha, namkha sihlikihle izandla zethu ngesihlanzekisi esine-alkhoholi ema-70%, sibe sihlale maqalanga kabanye abantu, ubuncani bakhona siqalangane ngemitha.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou dovha hafhu ya sasaladza mabulayo vhathu vha rathi ngei Khayelitsha, hune ha vha fhaḽa Cape Town.

Mabulayo aya tshiṱuhu ngaurali tou vha tshihumbudzi tsha uri hu kha ḓi vha na zwinzhi zwine ra kha ḓi tea ita sa vhadzulapo itela fhelisa zwiito zwa dzikhakhathi khathihi na khakhathi dzo ḓitikaho nga mbeu hu tshi katelwa na mabulayo vhathu vha tshifumakadzi (GBVF)..     Khabinethe khou ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhoṱhe fhano shangoni uri vha shumisane na muvhuso kha lwa na zwiito zwa vhugevhenga na GBVF.

src_text: Isibonelelo SezeHlalakuhle sokuBonelela ebuJameni bamaTlhuwo (i-SRD) .
tgt_text: Nga tshumisano, ri nga ita uri zwitshavha zwashu khathihi na magondo ashu vhe tsireledzeaho kha vhathu vhoṱhe, hu tshi katelwa vhaaluwa, vhafumakadzi na vhana..     Ikonomi.

src_text: 1 IKhabinethi ikhuthaza izakhamuzi ezirhola isibonelelo esiyi-R350 ukuthi zifake iimbawo zazo zesibonelelo ngobutjha, njengoba sekunemibandela emitjha elawula iimbawo zokuthola lesisibonelelo nje.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza vulwa lwa tshiofisi ha ḽimaga ḽa foroma zwidina ḽa Corobrik Kwastina ngei Driefontein kha vunḓu ḽa Gauteng nga Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa nga Ḽavhuraru, ḽa 4 Shundunthule.

Ḽimaga iḽi ḽa maimo nṱha ḽi vhumba tshipiḓa tsha vhubindudzi ha masheleni linganaho R800 miḽioni, zwine hezwi zwa khou tshimbila khathihi na maṅwe masheleni linganaho R200 miḽioni ane khou lavhelelwa ḓo engedza mishumo ya khonkhirithi ya vha ha Corobrik ngei KwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: 2     Iimbawo zingafakwa kubunzinzolwazi be-Ejensi yeeMbonelelo zeSondlo noMhlalaphasi kaRhulumende yeSewula Afrika (i-SASSA): https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.
tgt_text: Corobrik ndi ḽiṅwe ḽa mabindu fhano hayani a fhindula khuwelelo ya Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa ye vha ita kha mabindu fhano Afrika Tshipembe na dzitshaka uri bindudze kha ikonomi ya ḽino shango.

src_text: Ihlelo lokufaka iimbawo livulwe ngomhla wama-23 kuSihlabantangana wee-2022, kanti-ke lisebenza budijithali ngokupheleleko kobanyana lizokukhamba msinyana.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya dzhiela nṱha zwa uri ikonomi ya gesemaḓi ine ya khou  aluwa yo wana thikhedzo khulwane nga rwelwa ṱari ha tshiendedzi tsha ṱhiraka shumisaho gesemaḓi nga vha ha Anglo American.
Tshiendedzi itshi tsha ṱhiraka, tshe tsha shandukiswa bva kha tsha shumisa diziḽi ya kha tsha gesemaḓi, nahone tshi shumisa na beṱiri dza lithium-ion, tshi tou vha tshone tsha thoma ḽifhasini ḽoṱhe.

src_text: 3     Isibonelelwesi sezehlalakuhle esithula abantu umthwalo weendleko siligadango eliqakathekileko emakhaya anganabuyo, abekangadosa emhlweni ngomtlhago wobuchaka nangokungasebenzi.
tgt_text: Ikonomi ya gesemaḓi yo ṱaluswa sa tshithu tsha ndeme kha ikonomi sa tshikafhadzi mupo wa shango ḽashu khathihi na kha ṱuṱuwedza nyaluwo ya ikonomi na sika mishumo..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafu ya ṱanganedza vhuṅwe vhubindudzi kha ikonomi yashu bva kha khamphani ya zwiḽiwa ya Ireland ine ya ḓivhiwa sa The Kerry Group ye ya vula ḽimaga ḽiswa ḽi ḓuraho masheleni swikaho R650-miḽioni ngei Hammarsdale, KwaZulu-Natal ḽiṋe ḽa ḓo bveledza zwiḽiwa zwine zwa nga shumiswa lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu kha dzhango ḽa Afrika.

src_text: Urhulumende uzibophelele ukusiza abantu abasengozini ekulu yokucaphazeka kobanyana bazokukghona ukutjheja iindingo zabo zokuphila.
tgt_text: Heḽi ndi ḽimaga ḽo khetheaho ngauri ḽi na zwishumiswa zwinzhi zwo khwaṱhaho zwine zwa katela na zwishumiswa zwi shumisaho fulufulu ḽiṱuku, vhubveledzi ha fulufulu ḽi bvaho kha masana ḓuvha itela fhungudza shumiswa ha muḓagasi bvaho kha netiweke ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi ya henefho fhethu kuvhanganywa ha mufhiso wo no shumaho kuvhanganywa ha maḓi nga nḓila yavhuḓi shumisa hafhu na phungudzo.

Ḽimaga ḽa The Kerry Group ḽo vha hone fhano Afrika Tshipembe bva nga ṅwaha wa 2011, nahone vhubindudzi vhuṅwe na vhuṅwe vhuswa vhune ḽa vhu ita ndi tshiga tsha uri Afrika Tshipembe ḽi kha ḓi vha fhethu havhuḓi ha ita zwa vhubindudzi.

src_text: Ukuphepha Nokuvikeleka.
tgt_text: Hovhu vhubindudzi vhu khou vha hone nga murahu ha rwelwa ṱari zwa magwa ha tshiendedzi tsha luṱanḓala tsha Isuzu D-Max ngei Gqeberha kha ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha ṅwedzi wo fhelaho.

src_text: IKhabinethi solo ikhalima ngamagama abukhali izenzo zokubulawa ngesihluku kwabantu abasikazi, nje-ke ikuthokozele nokubotjhwa msinyana kwabasolwa ngecala lokubulawa kwakaMma.
tgt_text: Lushaka luswa lwa D-Max lu khwaṱhisedza vhuḓiimiseli ha vha ha Isuzu kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe nahone ndi iṅwe ya mvelaphanḓa ye ya swikelwa nga fhasi ha Mbekanyamushumo ya Mveledziso ya Vhubveledzi ha Mimoḓoro (APDP).

src_text: u-Hillary Gardee (obekaneminyaka ema-28) obekahlala Kamagugu, eMpumalanga.
tgt_text: APDP ndi tshikimu tsha magavhelo vhubveledzi kha nḓowetshumo ya mimoḓoro tsho livhiswaho kha ṱuṱuwedza vhubveledzi nga vhunzhi kha nḓowetshumo ya zwa mimoḓoro yo tiwaho ṱuṱuwedza nyengedzedzo ya ndeme kha tshipiḓa tsha nḓowetshumo ya zwa mimoḓoro  zwine hezwi zwa  fhedza nga sika mishumo kha nḓowetshumo ya zwa vhubveledzi ha mimoḓoro nga angaredza.

src_text: Ukudlula lapho, iKhabinethi ikuhlabile nokubulawa kwabantu abasithandathu eKhayelitsha, e-Cape Town.
tgt_text: Masheleni swikaho R2,8 biḽioni ḓo bveledzwa kha zwa vhubveledzi ha zwibveledzwa zwa fhano hayani nga tshifhinga tshenetsho tsha musi APDP tshi kha ḓi vha hone.

src_text: Lezizenzo zokubulalela butjhwileni zisikhumbuzo sokuthi kusese kunengi ekusamele sikwenze simphakathi ukuqeda inturhu eqothele bobulili obuthileko nomukghwa wokubulawa kwabantu abasikazi (i-GBVF).
tgt_text: Vhubindudzi uvhu vhu ḓo sika mishumo ya vhukuma fhiraho 1 000 kha ḽimaga ḽeneḽo ya dovha hafhu ya thola vhathu vha linganaho 24 000 henefho nga thungo tsini na ḽimaga, zwine hezwi zwa ḓo vha shela mulenzhe zwihulwane kha bveledza zwitshavha henefho kha dzingu ḽeneḽo..     Indaba ya zwa Migodi.

Indaba ya Bindudza kha Migodi ya Afrika ya ṅwaha wa 2022 ye ya farelwa fhaḽa  Cape Town International Convention Centre bva nga ḽa 9 swika nga ḽa 12 Shundunthule 2022, ndi tshiṅwe tsha tshikhala tshihulwane tsha nyambedzano na tshumisano vhukati ha vhashumisani vhoṱhe vha kwameaho zwa kha nḓowetshumo ya migodi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhuthaza boke abantu elizweni lekhethweli ukuthi basebenzisane ngokusizana norhulumende ukulwisana ne-GBVF.
tgt_text: Thero ya vhuṱambo yo vha tshi ri: “Tshanduko kha zwa Migodi ya Afrika bindudza kha Tshanduko ya Fulufulu, ESG, na Dziikonomi”.

src_text: Ngokusebenzisana singaqinisekisa ukuthi umphakathi neentrada zekhethu ziphephile ebantwini boke, abadala nabancani, abatjha nabentwana.
tgt_text: Khabinethe na fulufhelo ḽa uri iyi Indaba ya zwa Migodi ḓo thusa kha ṱana bveledzisa Afrika Tshipembe sa fhethu ho teaho ita zwa vhubindudzi.
Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ṱanganedza vhubindudzi kha shango ḽashu nahone ḽo ḓiimisela bveledza nyimele dzavhuḓi hu tshi itelwa nyaluwo katelaho vhoṱhe khathihi na tshanduko ya ikonomi.

src_text: Umnotho.
tgt_text: Vhushaka ha dzingu na ha dzitshaka.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukuvulwa kwefemu epheka iintina i-Kwastina,  engaphasi kwe-Corobrik, ese-Driefontein e-Gauteng.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza nyambedzano dza zwenezwino dza vhukati ha Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa na Phresidennde Vho Joe Biden vha shango ḽa Amerika, Phresidennde Vho Emmanuel Macron vha ḽa Fura khathihi na Phresidennde Vho Hakainde Hichilema vha ḽa Zambia kha miṱangano yavho yo fhambanaho.

src_text: Ifemu le ivulwe nguMengameli u-Ramaphosa ngeLesithathu womhla we-04 kuMrhayili wee-.
tgt_text: Hedzi nyambedzano dzo ita uri Phresidennde vha kone khwaṱhisa vhushaka ha mashango mavhili khathihi na tshumisano vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na maṅwe mashango vhashumisani nga ha mafhungo ndeme dzitshaka na dzingu, hu tshi katelwa na wana thandululo ya mulalo kha nndwa ya fhaḽa Ukraine     Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: Ifemu le engeyezinga eliphezulu lokupheka iintina, iyingcenye yamasiso we-R800 weengidi akhambisana nenye i-R200 yeengidi enqophe ukukhulisa umsebenzi wekhonkhreyidi wakwa-Corobrik KwaZulu-Natala.
tgt_text: Vouthu dza Mugaganyagwama.

src_text: I-Corobrik ingenye yamabhizinisi ambadlwana weSewula Afrikapha aphendule isibawo sikaMengameli Ramaphosa  sokukhombela amabhizinisi weSewula Afrika newamazwe ngamazwe ukuthi asisise emnothweni welizwe leSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou ita khuwelelo kha vhadzulapo vhoṱhe ya uri vha thetshelese Vouthu dza Mugaganyagwama nga mihasho ya muvhuso ya lushaka na Ofisi ya Phresidennde itela uri vha kone hwesa muvhuso vhuḓifhinduleli..     Nga tshifhinga tsha Vouthu dza Mugaganyagwama, mihasho yoṱhe ṋetshedza zwidodombedzwa nga vhuḓalo zwa puḽane na zwipikwa zwayo zwa ṅwaha.

Hedzi Vouthu dza Mugaganyagwama ndi dzine dza lingedza vhona uri masheleni muvhuso khou shumiswa zwavhuḓi itela swikela ṱhoḓea dza vhadzulapo..     Dzi dovha hafhu dza ṋea tshikhala tsho teaho kha Dziminisṱa uri vha kone dodombedza nga vhuḓalo mushumo wa muvhuso, hu tshi katela na mvelaphanḓa yo swikelwaho khathihi na khaedu dzine dza vha hone..     Puḽane ya ṋetshedzwa ha Gese ya Peṱiroḽiamu yo Luḓifhadzwaho (LPG).

src_text: IKhabinethi itjheje ukuthi umnotho we-hayidrojini osakhasako unikelwe amandla ngokwethulwa kwelori ekhamba ngerhasi ye-hayidrojini yi-Anglo American.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Puḽane ya ṋetshedzwa ha LPG  ye ya anḓadzwa itela vhukwamani na tshitshavha nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhafamuhwe 2022 uri thome shumiswa.

src_text: Ilori le – etjhugululwe ekukhambeni ngedizeli yakhanjiswa nge-hydrogen, esebenzisa amabhethri we-lithium-ion, ingeyokuthoma yalomhlobo ephasini.
tgt_text: Puḽane iyi ndi ine ya khou lingedza alusa nḓowetshumo iyi ya LPG kha shango.

src_text: Umnotho we-hayidrojini ubekiswe njengeqalontanzi lamaqhinga emnothweni welizwe lekhethu onganarhasi esilaphazako, nokuzakuphakamisa ukuhluma komnotho nokuvula imisebenzi.
tgt_text: LPG ḓo shela mulenzhe zwihulwane kha vha hone ha zwiko zwo fhambanaho zwa fulufulu..     Puḽane iyi, vhukati ha maṅwe maga u lugisa zwithu ḓo langa mitengo kha nḓowetshumo yoṱhe khathihi na tikedza vhubveledzi ha maboḓelo LPG kha shango ḓo dovha hafhu ya gudisa vhadzulapo nga ha mbuelo dza shumisa LPG sa luṅwe lushaka lwa fulufulu ḓo wanala nga murahu ha musi yo no anḓadzwa nga Muhasho wa Zwiko zwa Minerala na Fulufulu kha www.dmr.gov.za.
Muhanga wa Maano Lushaka nga ha Mafulo U tsivhudza Vhathu nga ha Pfanelo dza  Vhuholefhali hu tshi itelwa Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele nokhunye ukusisa emnothweni wekhethu yikhamphani ekhiqiza ukugoma ye-Ireland, i-Kerry Group, yona evule ifemu etja ye-R650 yeengidi e-Hammersdale, KwaZulu-Natala, enqophe ukwenzela ikhonthinenti ye-Afrika ukugoma okubambelelako.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muhanga wa Maano Lushaka nga ha Mafulo U tsivhudza Vhathu nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhuholefhali hu tshi itelwa Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali.

src_text: Ifemu le ihlukile kezinye ngoba yona inezinto ezimbadlwana ezizakwenza bona ukugoma kuhlale kukhona; hlangana nazo kubalwa neensetjenziswa ezingasebenzisi iimbaseli ngobunengi,  nezisebenza ngomtjhiso welanga ukuphehla igezi, okuzakusi ukuphungula ukusetjenziswa kwegezi enengi kile ephehlwa ziimphehligezi njenganje, nezikghona ukubamba zilonde umtjhiso ebewungalahlwa, nokulondeka kwamanzi, nokusetjenziswa kwamanzi ngobutjha kunye nokuphunguleka kwamanzi asetjenziswako.
tgt_text: Muhanga uyu ndi une wa khou lingedza eletshedza sekhithara dzoṱhe ya muvhuso na ya phuraivethe kha vhona uri pfanelo dza vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali dzi khou tsireledzwa, sa zwe zwa sumbedziswa kha Mulayotewa wa Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe wa.

src_text: I-Kerry Group solo yafika lapha eSewula Afrika ngomnyaka wee-2011, kanti-ke ukungezelela kwayo amasiso wayo lapha ekhethu kusitjengiso sokuthi iSewula Afrika solo ililizwe elenyulelwa ukusisa kilo.

tgt_text: Muhanga uyu dovha hafhu wa ṋetshedza tshishumiswa tshine tsha ḓo thusa kha fheliswa ha zwikonḓisi zwa khethululo kha zwa dzhia tsheo, nga maanḓa idzo dzine dza elana na vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali dovha hafhu wa eletshedza vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali uri vha ḓivhe nga ha pfanelo dzavho sa zwe dza tsireledzwa nga Mulayotewa.

src_text: Lamasiso-ke alandela ukwethulwa kweveni  Isuzu D-Max efemini yeGqeberha, esePumalanga Kapa, ngenyanga ephelileko.
tgt_text: Muhanga uyu dovha hafhu wa ṋetshedza vhupfumbudzi, mivhigo kha nyanḓadzamafhungo khathihi na tsivhudza vhathu tshitshavhani nga ha pfanelo dza vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali dovha wa ita uri Nḓivhadzamulayotibe ya nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali thome shuma.

src_text: Leveni yomhlobo we-D-Max izaliselela ukuzibophelela kwekampani yakwa-Isuzu eSewula Afrika begodu ingelinye ihlangothi  lepumelelo lehlelo lokukhandwa kweenkoloyi i-Automotive Production Development Programme (i-APDP).
tgt_text: Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽone ndi ḽiṅwe ḽa mashango sainaho idzi Thendelano dza Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UN) dza nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali khathihi na Maitele UN kha Thendelanomviswa ya Afrika ya nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhuthu na Pfanelo dza Vhathu dza nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali (Maitele Pfanelo dza Vhuholefhali Afrika).

src_text: I-APDP ilihlelo lehlohlomezelo lokukhanda iinkoloyi elinqophe ukwandisa umthamo weenkoloyi ezikhandwa ebubulweni leenkoloyi elithileko, ngaleyindlela kukhuthazeke ubuhle namandla womsebenzi emafemini weenkoloyi, ngaleyindlela kwande nemisebenzi ezakuvuleka emafemini weenkoloyi namanye akhambisana nawo.
tgt_text: Muhanga uyu wo vha hone nga murahu ha vhukwamani na vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho, hu tshi katelwa na vha Khoro ya Mveledziso ya Ikonomi na Mafhungo zwa Vhashumi ya Lushaka.

src_text: Kulinganiswa ukuthi kuzakwenziwa imali engange-R. 8 yamabhiliyoni ngokukhandwa kweenkoloyi ngalelihlelo le-APDP ekhethwapha.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa Ndaulo ya Mavu na Vhuṋe ha Mavu kha Vhupo ha Nnyi na nnyi.

src_text: Ifemu le-ke izokuvula imisebenzi engaphezulu kwekulungwana eplantini yayo lapho yakhiwe khona, bese kuba nabanye abantu abazii-24 000 ezabaqatjha ngezinye iindlela ezingasibunqopha, ngaleyindlela-ke kuvuleke amathuba wokuphakamisa umphakathi walendawo.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza farwa ha Muṱangano wa Ndaulo ya Mavu na Vhuṋe ha Mavu kha Vhupo Nnyi na nnyi nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 27 na Mugivhela, wa ḽa 28 Shundunthule 2022 kha ḽa Gauteng.
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muvhigo wa Tsheo dza nga ha Ndaulo ya Mavu na Vhuṋe ha Mavu kha Vhupo ha Mavu Nnyi na nnyi nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhafamuhwe.

src_text: Umbuthano WezeeMayini.
tgt_text: Yo ṋea ndaela ya uri hu dovhe hu vhe na vhuṅwe vhukwamani hafhu na vhaṅwe vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho.

src_text: UmButhano wokuCocisana ngeeNdaba zokuSisa eeMayini womNyaka wee-2022 ebewubanjelwe e-Cape Town International Convention Centre ukusukela ngomhla we-09  ukuya kumhla we-12 kuMrhayili, bewungomunye weenkundla ezikulu khulu  zokubonisana nokusizana hlangana kwabo boke ababelani ebubulweni leemayini.
tgt_text: Muṱangano uyu ḓo vha wone maṱhakheni  mushumo we wa itwa ṅwaha wo fhiraho, we wa ita khumbelo ya mahumbulwa bva kha vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho vho fhambanaho     Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.

src_text: Ummongondaba walombuthano bewuthi: “Ukutjhuguluka Kokumayina E-Afrika: Ukuzibekela Ehlelweni Lokudlulela Komunye Umhlobo Weembaseli, i-ESG kunye nemiNotho.”                .
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi wa Vhuṱanu wa nga ha fhelisa zwa tholwa ha Vhana.

src_text: IKhabinethi inesiqiniseko sokuthi Umbuthano Wezeemayini (i-Mining Indaba) uzakusiza ukutjengisa nokukhuphula igama leSewula Afrika njengelizwe elilungele ukusiswa kilo.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ndi ḽone ḽine ha ḓo farelwa Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi ya Vhuṱanu wa nga ha fhelisa zwa tholwa ha Vhana fhaḽa Durban International Convention Centre kha ḽa KwaZulu-Natal bva nga Swondaha, ya ḽa 15 swika Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 20 Shundunthule.
Ndi lwa tou thoma musi Dzangano ḽa zwa Vhashumi ḽa Dzitshaka (ILO) ḽi tshi farela muṱangano uyu fhano kha ḽa Afrika.

src_text: ISewula Afrika iyawathokozela amasiso angena elizweni lekhethu begodu izibophelele ngokwenza ubujamo bezinto bube buhle buvumele ukuhluma okuqalelela umuntu woke nokuhleleka ngobutjha komnotho.
tgt_text: Vharangaphanḓa vha mashango, dziminisṱa vha swikaho 120, vhuimeli ha masia mararu ha mashango ane vha miraḓo ya ILO swikaho 187, mazhendedzi UN, zwiimiswa zwa pfunzo, madzangano vhadzulapo, madzangano ane sa vhe muvhuso, nyanḓadzamafhungo khathihi na vhadzulapo vha khou lavhelelwa vha hone kha muṱangano uyu.
Vhuṱambo uvhu vhu ḓo dovha hafhu ha ṋea  Afrika Tshipembe tshikhala tsha bvisela khagala Mulayotewa wa shango sa izwi tshi tsireledza pfanelo dza vhana.

src_text: Ubudlelwano Bamazwe ngamazwe Neberijini.
tgt_text: Shango ḽi ḓo dovha hafhu ḽa davhidzana na mashango fhambanaho ane no vha phanḓa fhirisa riṋe kha fhelisa zwa tholwa ha vhana hu itela uri ri kone vha na zwine ra nga guda bva kha mashango ayo.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuye yathokozela nemikhulumiswano yamhlapha hlangana kwakaMengameli u-Ramaphosa newe-United States u-Joe Biden, we-France u-Emmanuel Macron, newe-Zambia u-Hakainde Hichilema, ngokwahlukahluka.
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya Ḽiedza ḽa Mveledziso ya Tshiṱiriki (DDM).
Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha ḓo fara Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya DDM ngei Mpumalanga nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 20 Shundunthule 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “A hu na ane tea sala murahu”.

src_text: Imikhulumiswano le inikele uMengameli ithuba lokuqinisa ubudlelwano beSewula Afrika namazwe esebenzisana nawo ngeendaba eziqakathekileko zerijini nezamazwe ngamazwe, hlangana nazo ekubalwa nendlela yokulamula ipi ye-Ukraine ngokuthula     Iinqunto ZeKhabinethi .
tgt_text: Sa tshikhala tsha ndeme tsha shela mulenzhe ha vhadzulapo, Imbizo iyi ṋea tshikhala Phresidennde tsha amba na vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho nga fhambana havho vho tou livhana navho, nga maanḓa zwitshavha zwa mahayani, khathihi na thetshelesa thaidzo dzavho na khaedu dzine vha vha nadzo itela uri dzi kone tandululwa.

src_text: Amavowudi Ngesabelo Seemali.
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya DDM yo livhiswa kha vula zwikhukhulisi zwa nḓisedzo ya tshumelo yo ṱanganelaho khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza zwa shela mulenzhe ha vhadzulapo ya nga DDM.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibawa zoke izakhamuzi ukuthi zilandele amaVowudi ngeSabelo seeMali seminyango karhulumende ngokwahlukahluka nese-Ofisi likaMengameli kobanyana zizokwazi ukulindela ukuzwa ngemisebenzi urhulumende ekufuze ayenze.
tgt_text: MaAfrika Tshipembe vha nga tevhela na shela mulenzhe kha nyambedzano dza kha nyanḓadzamafhungo dza matshilisano nga fhasi ha hashtag #PresidentialImbizo.
Ṅwedzi wa Afrika.

src_text: Ngesikhathi samaVowudi ngeSabelo seeMali, yoke iminyango inikela imininingwana ngokunaba kwayo yamahlelo wayo namaqalontanzi womnyaka woke.
tgt_text: Vhuṱambo ha tshihumbudzo tsha ṅwaha nga ṅwaha ha Ṅwedzi wa Afrika na Ḓuvha ḽa Afrika nga Ḽavhuraru, ḽa 25 Shundunthule vhu khou pembelelwa nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Ṅwaha wa Pfushi khwaṱhisedza zwa konḓelela kha zwa pfushi na nḓisedzo ya zwiḽiwa na kha dzhango ḽa Afrika”..     Sa tshipiḓa tsha bono ḽa tshifhinga tshilapfu ḽe ḽa sumbedziswa kha Adzhenda ya 2063 (ine ya vha pulane ya mveledziso ya Afrika hu tshi itelwa swikela mveledziso ya ikonomi na matshilisano ine ya nga vha ya tshifhinga tshilapfu nahone katelaho vhathu vhoṱhe lwa miṅwaha fhiraho 50), thero iyi sedzesa kha vhukoni ha vhathu vha Afrika, nga maanḓa ho sedzeswa kha vhafumakadzi, vhatukana na vhasidzana khathihi na vhana.

src_text: AmaVowudi ngeSabelo seeMali anqophe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi iimali zomphakathi/zombuso zisetjenziswa ngendlela efaneleko ukugcina iindingo zomphakathi.
tgt_text: Hezwi ndi zwa ndeme kha mveledziso sa zwi zwi tshi livhisa kha khwinifhadzea ha matshilo vhathu, mbuelo dza nṱha na miholo yo khwinifhadzeaho ya mashango.

Tsha ndeme khulu nahone tshi vhonalesaho kha mabembela aya Ṅwedzi wa Afrika, ndi Vhege ya Vhudavhidzani ya Afrika, ine ya ḓo farelwa fhaḽa Constitutional Hill kha ḽa Johannesburg bva nga ḽa 23 swika ḽa 27 Shundunthule.

src_text: Godu anikela naboNgqongqotjhe ithuba elihle lokuhlathulula umsebenzi karhulumende ukuya phambili, ekubalwa hlangana nawo nepumelelo esele yenziwe kunye neentjhijilo ezikhona.

tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa Afrika ndi tshikhala tsha ṱuṱuwedza vhuthihi ha Afrika khathihi na ṱhanganelo ya dzingu yo khwaṱhaho hu tshi katelwa na kumedzela hafhu Afrika kha vhuyo vhu fanaho.

src_text: IQhinga Lokusatjalaliswa kweRhasi Yepetroli Eyenziwe Itlelezi (i-LPG).
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou humbudza muthu muṅwe na muṅwe uri madzangalelo ashu lushaka ṱumana tshoṱhe na vhudziki ha Afrika, vhuthihi na mvelaphanḓa     Milaedza.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumile ukuthi lingathoma ukusetjenziswa iqhinga le-LPG, elamenyezelwa ukuthi kubonisanwe ngalo nomphakathi ngoNtaka wee-.
tgt_text: Ndiliso     Khabinethe yo livhisa maipfi ndiliso kha vha muṱa na dzikhonani dza: Mufumakadzi Vho Phindile Xaba (53), vhe vha shuma tshifhinga tshilapfu kha nḓowetshumo ya zwa nyanḓadzamafhungo fhano Afrika Tshipembe na kha mashango seli.

src_text: Ihlelweli linqophe ukukhulisa ibubulo le-LPG elizweni lekhethweli.
tgt_text: Vho shuma vha sa neti vha tshi itela khwinifhadza shango ḽashu.

src_text: I-LPG izakwenza litho likhulu ekuvuleni amathuba wokutholakala kwemihlobohlobo yemithombo yeembaseli.
tgt_text: Muambasada Vho Silumko Sokupa (74), vhe vha shuma kha Zhendedzi ḽa Vhutsireledzi ha Muvhuso kha maimo fhambanaho nga tshifhinga tshilapfu tsha musi vha tshi khou shuma kha Tshumelo ya Muvhuso.Phrofesa Vho Francis Wilson (83), raikonomi ḓivheaho na mutumbuli wa Yunithi ya Ṱhoḓisiso dza Mveledziso na zwa Vhashumi ya Tshipembe ha Afrika  tholwa tholwa hoṱhe hu fhira nga fhasi ha khwaṱhisedzo ya ndalukano na ṱanzwiwa dzina ho teaho.
Dokotela Vho Kesavan Naidoo sa Tshanḓa tsha Mulangi Muhulwane (DDG): Mveledziso ya Tshiimiswa kha Muhasho wa Tshumisano ya Mavhusele (DCoG).

src_text: Leliqhinga lizakulawula nentengo yeembaseli libe lisekele nomsebenzi wokukhiqizwa kwamasilinda we-LPG elizweni lekhethweli, hlangana nokhunye.
tgt_text: Vho Siphosihle Emmanuel Hlomuka sa DDG: Thikhedzo ya Muvhuso Wapo na Ndangulo ya Thusedzo kha DCoG..     Vho Risimati Patrick Mathye sa DDG: Ndangulo ya zwa Maḓi Tshumelo dza Vhuthathazwitzhili kha Muhasho wa Maḓi na Vhuthathazwitzhili (DWS)..     Vho Collin Xolani Zwane sa DDG: Milayo, Vhutevhedza Milayo na Vhukombetshedzi kha DWS.

src_text: Lizakubuye lifundise nomphakathi ngobuhle bokusebenzisa i-LPG njengomunye umhlobo wesibaseli.
tgt_text: Vho Melanchton Makobe sa DDG: Khwaṱhisedzo ya Mavhusele na Mashumele  SOC kha Muhasho wa Mabindu Muvhuso     Khabinethe yo tendelana na Dziminisṱa nga ha tholwa hu tevhelaho:.
Vho Bhekuyise Mathews Khenisa sa Muofisiri Muhulwane wa Khorondangi (CEO) wa Zhendedzi ḽa Mveledziso ya zwa Dzinnḓu (HDA).

src_text: Lizakutholakala ngemva kokukhutjhwa mNyango wezeemBaseli nezeNjiwa ku- www.dmr.gov.za.
tgt_text: Mufumakadzi Vho Joy Keledi Masemola sa Muofisiri Muhulwane wa  zwa Masheleni  kha HDA..     Dokotela Vho Cornelius Ruiters sa CEO ya Lepelle Northern Water.

src_text: Imizamo Yokubuyisa Okulahlekileko Nokwakha Ngobutjha Ngemva Kweenkhukhula.
tgt_text: Ndingedzo dza vhuedzedza na dovha fhaṱa hafhu nga huswa nga murahu ha miḓalo .

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuke yabe yathokoza boke abantu neenhlangano ezibe nesandla nelizwi emizameni yokubuyisa okulahlekileko nokwakha ngobutjha ngemva komonakalo otjhiye kulilwa isimayemaye kezinye iindawo zelizwe lekhethweli, khulukhulu KwaZulu-Natala.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo khoḓa na livhuwa vhathu vhoṱhe khathihi na madzangano ane khou ḓidzhenisa kha ndingedzo dza vhuedzedza na fhaṱa hafhu nga huswa nga murahu ha miḓalo ya zwenezwino ye ya vhanga tshinyalelo khulwane kha zwiṅwe zwipiḓa zwa shango, nga maanḓa ngei KwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Ithokoze zoke iinhlangano ezingasizombuso, iinhlangano zekolo, umphakathi, abosomabhizinisi kunye neenhlangano zesizo kabahluphekileko zona eziphakise abantu ukudla, izambatho, ipahla yesithunzi kunye nejinifomu yesikolo emindenini etlhagileko, kobanyana izokukghona ukugcina iindingo zayo ekuphilwa ngazo.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya livhuwa madzangano oṱhe ane si vhe muvhuso, madzangano zwa vhurereli, vhadzulapo, vhoramabindu khathihi na madzangano ṱhaḓulo kha zwiimo zwi sa takadzi a ṋetshedza zwiḽiwa, zwiambaro, mabai, zwishumiswa zwa vhathu vha tshifumakadzi na yunifomo ya tshikolo kha miṱa yo kwameaho uri vha kone swikela ṱhoḓea dzavho dza nga misi.

src_text: IZiko LezokuLawula IHlekelele EliZweniloke solo lisalungelela zoke iingaba zikarhulumende emzamweni walo wokulethela woke amakhaya athintekileko isizo lobuntu.
tgt_text: Senthara ya Ndangulo ya Zwiwo ya Lushaka khou bvela phanḓa na ṱanganya masia oṱhe muvhuso kha ndingedzo dzayo dza ṋetshedza thuso ya ṱhaḓulo ya zwa vhuthu kha miṱa yoṱhe yo kwameaho.

src_text: Bangaphezulu kween-7 000 abantu abasizwa ngeendawo zokufihla ihloko eenyingini ezine ezingezonakalelwe khulu kunezinye KwaZulu-Natala.
tgt_text: Tshumelo dza zwa vhudzulo dzi khou ṋetshedzwa kha vhathu vha fhiraho 7 000 kha zwiṱiriki zwiṋa zwo kwameseaho ngei KwaZulu-Natal..     Mushumo kati wa fhaṱa vhudzulo ha tshifhinganyana hu tshi itelwa miṱa yo kwameaho kha mavu ane vha muvhuso a ḓo wanala fhaḽa kha ḽa KwaZulu-Natal ane vhathu avho vha ḓo pfulutshela khao.
Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza vhuḓiimiseli ha muvhuso kha langa masheleni ṱhaḓulo ya tshiwo itshi tsha miḓalo nga nḓila ya fulufhedzea nahone re khagala.

src_text: Uthomile umsebenzi wokwakhela imindeni ethintekileko izindlu zokuhlala kwesikhatjhana enarheni yombuso ekhonjwe njengendawo ekungafudukiselwa kiyo abantu KwaZulu-Natala.
tgt_text: Muṱolambalelano wa Afrika Tshipembe vha khou ṋetshedza tshumelo dza vhulavhelesi dza ḓadzisa kha idzo dzi re hone nahone uhu kovhelwa hafhu ha masheleni ndi hune ha khou elana na sisṱeme ya muvhuso ya dzudzanya mugaganyagwama.

src_text: IKhabinethi isifakazele isibopho sikarhulumende sokulawula imali ekhutjhelwe ukusiza abantu abonelwe ziinkhukhula ngokuyelela nemkhanyweni.

UmHloliincwadi Zombelele weSewula Afrika ungezelela umsebenzi wokubeka ilihlo kanti-ke ukunikelwa kwamaqalontanzi amatjha wokusetjenziswa kweemali kukhambisana nehlelo likarhulumende lokwabiwa kweemali.
tgt_text: Maswa nga ha Dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19).

Khabinethe khou ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhoṱhe vha fhano Afrika Tshipembe uri vha dzhie maga tsireledzo itela thivhela phaḓalala ha COVID-19 nga murahu ha mbalombalo dza zwenezwino dze dza sumbedza uri ho vha na engedzea vhukuma ha tshivhalo tsha kavhiwa nga malwadze ane vha na vhushaka na khalaṅwaha ya vhuriha fhano shangoni..     Khabinethe yo humbudza vhathu vhoṱhe uri vha bvele phanḓa na ḓitsireledza khathihi na vhaṅwe vhathu nga ṱamba zwanḓa kana zwi sanithaiza misi yoṱhe ambara maski musi nga ngomu ha tshifhaṱo sia tshikhala tsho tsireledzeaho vhukati hau na muṅwe muthu vula mafasiṱere itela uri hu dzhene muya khathihi na haelwa.

src_text: Zamva Nje Ngesifo Sengogwana I-Corona (i-COVID-19).
tgt_text: Muhaelo kha ḓi vha yone philelo ya khwinesa kha dwadze ḽa COVID-19 sa izwi tshi thivhela lwalesa valelwa vhuongeloni kana lufu vha tei thoma vha vha na ḓiresi ya vhudzulo uri vha kone haelwa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhuthaza boke abantu eSewula Afrika ukuthi batjheje bayelele bakhandele ukurhatjheka kwe-COVID-19 njengoba iimbalobalo zamva nje zitjengise ukuphakama kwenani labantu abangenwe ngiyo i-COVID-19 nabaguliswe magulo akhambisana nobusika esingaphakathi kwabobu njenganje elizweni lekhethweli.
tgt_text: Muthu muṅwe na muṅwe nga vha na ḽiṅwalo ḽa vhuṋe kana si na nga haelwa mahala kha vhupo vhuṅwe na vhuṅwe ha muhaelo ha nnyi na nnyi mona na shango ḽoṱhe.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhumbuze woke umuntu ukuthi ahlale azitjhejile atjheje nabanye abantu ngokunande ahlamba namkha ahlikihle izandla ngesihlanzekisi, afake imaski nakangekhaya, aqalangane nabanye abantu ngebanga elifaneleko, kuhlale kuvulwe namafesidiri kobanyana kuzokungena ummoya begodu woke umuntu ahlabe/ajove.
tgt_text: Kha vha fhelise khethululo nga lukanda!.

Khabinethe khou sasaladza tshoṱhe zwiito zwoṱhe zwa khethululo nga lukanda fhano shangoni, hu tshi katelwa na zwiwo zwo vhigwaho fhaḽa Tshikoloni tsha Nṱha tsha Good Hope Seminary na fhaḽa Yunivesithi ya Stellenbosch ngei kha vunḓu ḽa Kapa Vhukovhela.

src_text: Ukuhlaba/ukujova solo kusese sikhali esinamandla ukudlula ezinye zokulwa ne-COVID-19, ngoba phela khona kukhandela ukuthi umuntu angaguli akghokghe, abe ayokulaliswa esibhedlela namkha abe agcine abhubhile.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwiito zwo vhifhaho ngaurali zwi lwa na mikhwa ine ya vha hone kha ndayotewa ye shango ḽashu ḽa dimokirasi ḽa ḓitika khayo ine ya katela tshirunzi tsha vhuthu sa vha na khethululo nga lukanda sa khethulula nga mbeu, vhulamukanyi kha zwa matshilisano, ndinganelo na ṱhonifho.

src_text: Akunasidingo sokuthi ube ne-adresi yalapho uhlala khona nawuyokuhlaba/nayokujova.
Nanyana ngubani, nanyana unomazisi nanyana akanaye, angahlaba/angajova simahla kiwo woke amaziko wokuhlaba/wokujova wombuso elizweni lokeli.
tgt_text: Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa 1996 ndi yone ndededzi yashu musi ro livha kha fhelisa zwiito zwi vhavhaho zwa khethululana na tshayavhulamukanyi zwa tshifhingani tsho fhelaho.

Vhabebi vha khou ṱuṱuwedzwa gudisa vhana vhavho uri vha hanedzane na zwiito zwa khethululo nga lukanda na ṱanganedza zwa fhambana ha vhathu ya nga mvelele dzavho, sa tshipiḓa tsha ndingedzo dzashu dzo khwaṱhaho dza lingedza ṱuṱuwedza zwa fhaṱa lushaka na vhuthihi..     Kha ri shumisane, ri bvisele khagala zwiito zwa khethululo nga lukanda afho hune zwa dzhiiwa sa vhuḓifari ho teaho nahone ri dovhe hafhu ri rumele mulaedza re khagala wa uri zwiito zwa khethululo nga lukanda zwi na vhudzulo kha shango ḽashu ḽa demokirasi.

src_text: Sikhalima Ibandlululo Lobuzwe!
tgt_text: Vhushaka ha Afrika Tshipembe na shango ḽa Dzheremane.

Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Madalo Tshiofisi a tshimbila zwavhuḓi Mutshantseḽara wa Riphabuḽiki ya Muvhuso wa Feḓeraḽa wa shango ḽa Dzheremane, Muhulisei Vho Olaf Scholz, fhano kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 24 Shundunthule.

src_text: IKhabinethi izisola zoke izenzo zebandlululo lobuzwe nelomhlobo elizweni lekhethweli, sekubalwa neziga ezikhe zenzeka e-Goop Hope Seminary High School neYunivesithi ye-Stellenbosch eTjingalanga Kapa.

Lezizenzo ezinyenyisako ziphambana namagugu wethu womthethosisekelo asekele wona lomthethosisekelo, ekubalwa hlangana nawo nesithunzi somuntu, ukungabandlululi ngobuzwe nomhlobo, ukungabandlululi ngobulili, ubulungiswa bomphakathi, ukulinganiseka nehlonipho.
tgt_text: Madalo Tshiofisi Mutshantseḽara Vho Scholz’s vha hone nga murahu ha thambo ya Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa, vhane vha khou ranga phanḓa fulo ḽa muvhuso ḽa fhaṱa vhushaka havhuḓi ha dzingu na ha dzitshaka, hu tshi katelwa na kunga vhubindudzi vhune ha ṱoḓea vhukuma.

Zwiṅwe zwe vharangaphanḓa avha vhavhili vha amba nga hazwo ho vha nḓila dza khwaṱhisa tshumisano kha masia fanaho na fulufulu khathihi na tshanduko ya kilima, mbambadzo na vhubindudzi hu tshi katelwa na maga u lwa na COVID-19 khathihi na ṱhoḓea ya khaelo.

src_text: UmThethosisekelo we-1996 weRiphabhligi yeSewula Afrika uyikomba yethu yendlela esingaruthula ngayo ukuhlukana okungamukelekiko nokutlhogeka komthethobulungiswa weenkhathi ezidlulileko.
tgt_text: Vho dovha hafhu vha sedza na kha zwine zwa khou bvelela kha dzhango ḽa Afrika khathihi na ḽifhasi nga angaredza, hu tshi katelwa na khuḓano ya ngei Ukraine khathihi na masiandaitwa ayo kha ikonomi ya ḽifhasi na wanala ha zwiḽiwa na fulufulu..     Shango ḽa Dzheremane ḽi tou vha fhedzi muvhambadzelani wa vhuvhili muhulwanesa na ḽino ḽashu ḽa Afrika Tshipembe, ḽi dovha hafhu ḽa vha tshiko tsha vhuraru tshihulwanesa tsha vhaendelamashango vha bvaho seli ha malwanzhe, mubindudzi muhulwanesa na mushumisani kha zwa mveledziso..     Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi wa vhuṱanu wa nga ha Fheliswa ha zwiito zwa dzhia Vhana sa Vhashumi.

src_text: Ababelethi bakhuthazwa ukufundisa abantwana ukuthi bakucithe ukubandlululana ngobuzwe namkha ngomhlobo, basingathe ukwahluka kwabantu ngobubona njengengcenye yehlelo lethu elinamandla lokukhwezelela ukwakheka kwesizwe nokulungelelana komphakathi.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa khunyeledzwa zwavhuḓi ha Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi wa Vhuṱanu wa nga ha Fheliswa ha zwiito zwa dzhia Vhana sa Vhashumi we wa farelwa fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Durban nga ḽa 15 swika 20 Shundunthule.
Vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho mona na ḽifhasi vho dzhenela muṱangano uyu we wa fariwa nga tshumisano na Dzangano ḽa Vhashumi ḽa Ḽifhasi.

src_text: Asisebenzisane ukuveza ibandlululo lobuzwe/lomhlobo nanyana kukuphi lapho lithathwa khona njengento ejayelekileko, sithumele umlayezo ozwakala kuhle ukuthi ibandlululo alinandawo elizweni lekhethu lentando yenengi.

tgt_text: Nga murahu ha ambedzana nga ha maitele avhuḓi ane shumiswa nga mashango fhambanaho bvisela khagala vhuṱudzeṱudze vhune ha vha hone khathihi na maga tshihaḓu ane ṱoḓea itela ṱavhanyedzisa zwa fheliswa ha zwiito zwa shumiswa ha vhana na shumiswa nga nḓila ya khombekhombe, ho swika he ha ṱanganedzwa thendelano dze dza ḓivhiwa sa ‘Durban Call to Action’ hu tshi itelwa lwa na samba heḽi ḽa dzhiiwa ha vhana vha tshi itwa vhashumi.

src_text: Ubudlelwano Hlangana KweSewula Afrika NeJarimani .
tgt_text: Zwa dzhiiwa ha vhana vha itwa vhashumi ndi zwiito zwi vhavhaho vhukuma kha tshitshavha nahone zwi vhea vhana kha nyimele dza khombo vhukuma.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokozele ivakatjho lomBuso elibe yipumelelo leTjhansela ye-Federal Riphabhligi yeJarimani, oHloniphekileko u-Olaf Scholz, njengoba bekavakatjhele lapha eSewula Afrika nje ngeLesibili womhla wama-24 kuMrhayili wee-.
tgt_text: Zwi dzhiiwa sa zwiito zwa tambudza nahone zwi khakhisa vhana uri vha si kone wana pfunzo khathihi na zwiṅwe zwikhala zwa aluwa.
Ṅwana muṅwe na muṅwe fhano Afrika Tshipembe na pfanelo dzine ha tei dzhielwa dzone dza tsireledzwa kha zwiito zwa shumiswa nga nḓila ya tambudzwa.

src_text: UTjhansela Scholtz umenywe nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngalelivakatjho lakhe lomBuso, njengoba uMengameli uRamaphosa adosa phambili ijima likarhulumende lokukhwezelela ubudlelwano obuhle esiphandeni nemazweni ngamazwe nje, abe adosele namasiso adingeke khulu nganenwapha.

tgt_text: Pfanelo ya wana pfunzo ya mutheo hone kha Ndayotewa yashu nahone ya nga Mulayo wa Zwikolo zwa Afrika Tshipembe, wa ṅwaha wa 1996 (Mulayo 84 wa 1996), “mubebi muṅwe na muṅwe tea ita uri mugudi muṅwe na muṅwe ane vha nga fhasi ha ndango yawe dzhene tshikolo tou bva kha ḓuvha ḽa thoma ḽa tshikolo kha ṅwaha wonoyo une mugudi  khou fara miṅwaha ya sumbe ngaḽo vhuya swikela ḓuvha ḽa tshikolo ḽa fhedzisela kha ṅwaha wonoyo une mugudi uyo khou fara miṅwaha ya 15 kana gireidi ya vhuṱahe, kana zwenezwo zwine zwa ḓa thoma” ya nga Mulayo wa Vhana, wa ṅwaha wa 2005 (Mulayo 38 wa 2005), “a hu na muthu ane tea shumisa wana ṋetshedza kana thola ṅwana tshi itela mu shumisa sa mushumi”     Tsheo dza Khabinethe ṱanganedza Thendelano dza Dzitshaka dza nga ha Tsireledzwa ha Vhathu vhoṱhe kha zwiito zwa Ngalangadzwa ha vhathu nga Khombekhombe nga vha mazhendedzi zwa mulayo (ICPPED) .

src_text: Abarholi ababilaba bakhulumisene ngeendlela zokukhuphula ukusebenzisana eendabeni ezinjengezeembaseli nezokutjhuguluka kwetlayimethi, zerhwebo nezamasiso, kunye neendlela zokulwa ne-COVID-19 nezokufunakala kwemijovo yalesisifo.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha ICPPED kha Phaḽamennde uri hu sedzwe fhungo ḽa ṱanganedza thendelano dzenedzo nga shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Babuye bathinta nokwenzekako elizwekazini le-Afrika kunye nemazweni ngamazwe, sekubalwa nepi ehlabene e-Ukraine njenganje namacaphazela wayo phezu komnotho nokugoma, naphezu kweembaseli nezokuphepha.
tgt_text: Hedzi ndi thendelano dza Dzangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UN) dzine dza tou vha mbofho ya ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe dzi sedzaho kha zwa kandekanywa ha pfanelo dza vhuthu nga zwiito zwa ngalangadzwa ha vhathu nga nḓila ya khombekhombe nga vha mazhendedzi zwa mulayo.

src_text: IJarimani ayisilizwe lesibili elingelikhulu hlangana namazwe arhwebelana neSewula Afrika kwaphela, kodwana injalo nje ililizwe lesithathu ngobukhulu emazweni waphetjheya eza eSewula Afrika njengeemvakatjhibukeli, nomsisi omkhulu kunye nomsebenzisani wezetuthuko.
tgt_text: Thendelano dzi ṱalutshedza zwa ngalangala nga nḓila ya khombekhombe sa zwithu zwi katelaho thubiwa fariwa hoṋelwa tshiṱokisini hu si na senga kana nḓila iṅwe na iṅwe ine ya nga ita uri avho vhaiti vha zwiito zwenezwo vha hane ṱanganedza kana vha dzumbe fhethuvhupo hune zwipondwa zwenezwo zwa zwiito zwenezwo zwa vha hone..     Musi zwo no tendelwa uri zwi vhe tshipiḓa tsha milayo yashu, Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo lavhelelwa ṋetshedza muvhigo nga murahu ha miṅwaha mivhili kha vha UN sumbedzaho uri ndi zwifhio zwine ḽa khou ita nga ha thendelano dzenedzo..     Muvhigo wa Shango wa vhuṋa wa Afrika Tshipembe wa zwa Tsireledzwa na Ṱuṱuwedzwa ha Pfanelo dza Vhuthu.
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Muvhigo wa Shango wa vhuṋa wa zwa Tsireledzwa na Ṱuṱuwedzwa ha Pfanelo dza Vhuthu kha vha Khoro ya Pfanelo dza Vhuthu ya Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Dzitshaka.

src_text: IKhonfrensi Yesihlanu Ngokuqedwa Kokusetjenziswa Kwabantwana Ephasini.
tgt_text: Tsenguluso ya Ḽifhasi ya nga murahu ha Tshifhinga ya vha ha UN ḓo sengulusa muvhigo ngavhuya ṅwaha uno tou bva tshe ḽa saina Thendelano dza Pfanelo dza Vhuthu dza UN, Afrika Tshipembe ḽo no senguluswa luraru, he tsenguluso ya fhedzisela ya itwa nga ṅwedzi wa Khubvumedzi..     Muvhigo uyu sumbedza zwiswa nga ha themendelo dza 187 dzo ṱanganedzwaho bva kha mushumo wa sengulusa wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukuragwa bekuphele kuhle kweKhonfrensi yePhasi yeHlandla lesiHlanu yokuQedwa kokuSetjenziswa kwabaNtwana ebeyibanjelwe eThekwini ukusukela ngomhla we-15 ukuya kumhla wama-20 kuMrhayili wee-.
tgt_text: Ho dzhiiwa makumedzwa bva kha data dzi fulufhedzeaho, mafhungo bva kha mihasho yo teaho, zwiimiswa zwi tikedzaho demokirasi na ndayotewa ya shango khathihi na madzangano vhadzulapo teaho.

src_text: Ababelani abavela emazweni ngamazwe bebakhona kilekhonfrensi ebeyibanjwe ngokubambisana neHlangano yezabaSebenzi ePhasini (i-ILO).
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo fushea nga mvelaphanḓa yo swikelwaho kha zwa thoma shumiswa ha themendelo khathihi na kha ayo maṅwe masia ane khao mushumo wa kha ḓi bvela phanḓa.
Muvhigo ḓo anḓadzwa kha nnyi na nnyi zwenezwo musi wo no ḓivhadzwa kha vha UN nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhangule.

src_text: Ngemva kokukhulumisana ngeendlela ezihle zokusebenza eziphunyeleliswe mamazwe ahlukahlukileko nangemva kokubona itlhayelo namagadango arhabekileko afunekako ukuqeda umukghwa wokusebenzisa abantwana nokukatelela abantu ukuthi basebenze, bavumelene nge-‘Durban Call to Action’ ukulwa nomukghwa wokusetjenziswa kwabantwana.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele ya Ndangulo ya Maḓi Migodini ya ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Woke umntwana eSewula Afrika unelungelo elingaphikisekiko lokuvikelwa emikghweni yezemisebenzi esihluku nezenzo zezabasebenzi ezidlala ngabantwana.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mbekanyamaitele ya Ndangulo ya Maḓi Migodini ya ṅwaha wa 2022 uri thome shumiswa.

Mbekanyamaitele iyi ṋetshedza nḓila dza tsireledza na vhulunga kushumisele kwa maḓi ita ndinganyelo vhukati ha mishumo ya zwa ikonomi henefho kha migodi na vhuḓifhinduleli ha ṋetshedza nḓila dza kushumisele kwa maḓi lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu fhano shangoni ḽashu..     Zwiṅwe zwa zwine mbekanyamaitele iyi ya ita, ndi bvisela khagala mishumo na vhuḓifhinduleli vhukati ha masia mararu muvhuso nga ha mafhungo kwamaho maḓi migodini.

src_text: Ilungelo lefundo esisekelo livikelekile emThethwenisisekelo kanti-ke ngokomThetho we-1996 weenKolo zeSewula Afrika  (umThetho Nomboro 84 womNyaka we-1996), “Umbelethi ngamunye kufuze enze ukuthi umfundi amjameleko uthoma isikolo ngelanga lokuthoma lesikolo emnyakeni aqeda ngawo iminyaka yokubelethwa elikhomba, abe ayokufika elangeni lokugcina lesikolo lomnyaka umfundi ahlanganisa ngalo iminyaka yobudala eli-15, namkha nakaqeda uGreyidi 9, kuye ngokuthi ngikuphi okuze ntanzi.”            .
tgt_text: Tshanduko dzine dza khou dzinginywa dzi ḓo tandulula khaedu dza ṋetshedza ndaṱiso kha vhatshikafhadzi khathihi na ita uri zwi leluwe shumisa maitele uri mutshikafhadzi tea badela.

src_text: NgokomThetho wabaNtwana wee-2005 (umThetho Nomboro 38 womNyaka wee-2005), “akunamuntu ozakuvunyelwa ukusebenzisa, ukuthola, ukunikela namkha ukuqatjha umntwana kobanyana azokwenza umsebenzi wabantwana.”      IinQunto ZeKhabinethi  .
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele yo bveledzwa hu tshi tevhelwa Mulayo wa Maḓi wa Lushaka, wa 1998 (Mulayo 36 wa 1998).

src_text: Ukuthotjelwa Kwesivumelwano Samazwengamazwe Ngokuvikelwa Kwabo Boke Abantu Abanyamalaliswe Ngekani (i-ICPPED)          .
tgt_text: Muvhigo nga ha Muhanga wa Vhupuḽani vhune ha Dzhiela Nṱha zwa Mbeu, Mugaganyagwama, Vhulavhelesi na Vhusengulusi khathihi na Muvhalelano.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa ePalamende kwe-ICPPED kobanyana iyoyihlola ukuthi iSewula Afrika angeze yasamukela na lesisivumelwano.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wa mvelaphanḓa nga ha thoma shumiswa ha Muhanga wa Vhupuḽani vhune ha Dzhiela Nṱha zwa Mbeu, Vhupuḽani, Mugaganyagwama, Vhulavhelesi na Vhusengulusi khathihi na Muvhalelano.

src_text: Isivumelwanesi sisivumelwano esisibopho seHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko (i-UN) esiqalene nokwephulwa kwamalungelo wobuntu ngokunyamalaliswa kwabantu ngekani.

tgt_text: Khabinethe yo takalela mvelaphanḓa khulwane ye ya itwa nga vhunzhi ha mihasho ya muvhuso kha zwa dzhia muhanga uyu we wa ṱanganedzwa nga ṅwaha wa 2019 hu tshi itelwa uri thome shumiswa wa vho vha tshipiḓa tshayo tsha mashumele.

src_text: Isivumelwanesi sihlathulula ukunyamalaliswa kwabantu ngekani okunjengokuthunjwa, ukubotjhwa, ukuvalelwa ekubotjhweni namkhka nanyana yini okhunye okungenza umephuli wamalungelo abhale ukuveza namkha abe afihle ngabomu ukuveza ukuthi ungazimbi ukuphi.

tgt_text: Vhunzhi ha mihasho swika zwino yo no thoma dzudzanya mbekanyamaitele dzayo dzine dza ḓo thusa kha ranga phanḓa mbekanyamushumo khulwane dzine dzo livhiswa kha vhafumakadzi, vhaswa na vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali.

src_text: Nasele samukelwe saba seencwadini zekhethu zomthetho, iSewula Afrika izakulindeleka ukuthi qobe ngeminyaka emibili ibikele i-UN ukuthi isiphumelelisa njani isivumelwanesi.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ita khuwelelo ya uri hu vhe na vhulavhelesi na vhiga ho khwaṱhaho, nga maanḓa kha miṅwe ya mihasho ine i athu ṋetshedza mivhigo yayo.

src_text: Isivumelwanesi sinikela amagadango wokukhandela ekufuze athathwe mamazwe amalunga ukukhandela ukunyamalaliswa kwabantu ngekani emakhabo.
tgt_text: Fulo ḽa Nyambedzano dza vhukati ha Vhaswa ḽa Vho Nelson Mandela (NMYD).
Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza zwa uri NMYD vho ḓo vha hone ṅwaha muṅwe na muṅwe bva zwino nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Umbiko Wesine Welizwe LeSewula Afrika Wokuvikelwa Nokukhuthazwa Kwamalungelo Wobuntu   .
tgt_text: NMYD ya thoma ḓo vha hone bva nga ḽa 7 swika ḽa 20 Fulwana.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa komBiko wesiNe weliZwe leSewula Afrika wokuVikelwa nokuKhuthazwa kwamaLungelo woBuntu emKhandlwini wamaLungelo woBuntu weHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko.
tgt_text: Hedzi ndi ndingedzo dza Phresidennde dza ṋea vhaswa vha Dzhango ḽino tshikhala tsha ḓidzhenisa kha nyambedzano dza fhaṱa dza nga ha mafhungo ane vha kwama.

src_text: IsiQhema esiNande siBuyekeza imibiko ngaphasi kwe-UN sizakubuyekeza umbiko lo ngekukhambeni komnyaka lo.
Solo yatlikitla isiVumelwano samaLungelo woBuntu ngaphasi kwe-UN, iSewula Afrika seyibuyekezwe amahlandla amathathu, ngebuyekezo lokugcina elenziwe ngoKhukhulamungu wee-.
tgt_text: Hedzi nyambedzano, dzine dza ḓo ḓitika kha ḽizhakanḓila ḽashu ḽi ḓivheaho ḽifhasini Phresidennde washu wa kale Vho Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela, dzi ḓo mbo ḓi thoma na zwenezwo hu tshi itelwa ṱuṱuwedza maitele vhurangaphanḓa vhu re na mikhwa fhano kha dzhango ḽa Afrika..     Dzi ḓo ṋea vhaswa tshikhala tsha kovhana nga ha vhufa ho ḓalaho zwinzhi vhukuma vhune ha sumbedza mvelele dzavho.
Hedzi ndingedzo dzi ḓo dovha hafhu dza khwaṱhisa vhushaka ha muthu nga muthu vhukati ha vhaswa vha ḽino dzhango.

src_text: Umbiko lo uphethe zamva nje ngeemphakamiso ezili-187 ezivunyiweko zehlelo lokubuyekeza lomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Muhasho wa Vhafumakadzi, Vhaswa na Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali ḓo ṋetshedza zwidodombedzwa zwa mbekanyamushumo ya vhuṱambo uvhu ngavhuya.

src_text: Imibono ekusetjenzwe ngayo lapha ngethethwe emabuthelelwenilwazi afakazelweko, nemininingwaneni evela eminyangweni efaneleko, neenHlanganweni zeSahluko seThoba kunye neenhlanganweni zomphakathi ezifaneleko.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa Vhulavhelesi ha Mashumele nga Ṅwaha wa ṅwaha wa 2021/22 kha zwa Maanḓafhadza Vhafumakadzi na Ndinganyelo ya Mbeu, Mveledziso ya Vhaswa khathihi na Ṱhuṱhuwedzo ya Pfanelo dza Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali.
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wa vhulavhelesi ha mashumele wa nga ṅwaha nga ha maanḓafhadzwa ha vhafumakadzi, vhaswa na vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyathokoza ngendima esele yenziwe ekuphunyelelisweni leziimphakamiso kunye naleziindima ezisasetjenzwako.
tgt_text: Muvhigo uyu sala murahu zwithu zwa ndeme kha ṱuṱuwedzwa ha ndinganyelo, maimo kha zwa mishumo khathihi na vhuṋe na shela mulenzhe ha zwigwada izwi kha mishumo ya mihasho na mabindu muvhuso.

src_text: Umbiko lo uzakumenyezelwa emphakathini ungethulwa ku-UN ngoRhoboyi wee-.

tgt_text: Muvhigo uyu wo dzudzanywa ho sedzwa zwa vhupuḽani ha mugaganyagwama une wa dzhiela nṱha zwa mbeu, zwa vhulavhelesi, vhusengulusi na muhanga wa Muvhalelano we wa ṱanganedzwa nga Khabinethe nga ṅwaha wa     Milayotibe.

src_text: Umthethokambiso Wee-2022 Wokulawulwa Kwamanzi Weemayini.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mutakalo na Tsireledzo Migodini.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele umThethokambiso wee-2022 wokuLawulwa kwaManzi weeMayini kobanyana sewungathoma ukusebenza.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa anḓadzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mutakalo na Tsireledzo Migodini hu tshi itelwa uri hu kone vha na vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi.

src_text: Umthethokambiso lo uphethe iindlela zokuvikela nokulonda amanzi.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu ndi une wa khou lavhelelwa khwinisa mutakalo na tsireledzo ya vhashumi vha migodini, hu tshi katelwa na vhupo honoho vhune zwa migodi zwa khou bveledzwa khaho.

src_text: Ulinganisa imisebenzi yeemayini namandla onikelwe wona wokusebenzisa amanzi ngendlela ebambelelako elizweni leSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu khou khwinisa Mulayo wa Mutakalo na Tsireledzo ya Migodini, wa 1996 (Mulayo 29 wa 1996) une wa vha hone zwazwino.

src_text: Hlangana namanye amagadango wokulungisa, umthethokambiso lo uhlathulula imisebenzi ngaphakathi kweengaba zikarhulumende ezintathu malungana neendaba zamanzi eemayini.
tgt_text: Khwiniso idzi dzo shandukiswaho ndi dzine dza bvisela khagala maṅwe maipfi kha Mulayo khwaṱhisa muhanga wa zwa milayo ya mutakalo na tsireledzo khathihi na ita uri elane na maitele khwinesa ḽifhasini ane elana na zwa tsireledzo migodini..     Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Ndayotewa ya Vhufumimalo wa ṅwaha wa 2022  .

src_text: Amatjhuguluko enziwako la azakurarulula imiraro ekhona njenganje ngokukhalima abasilaphazi, enze kube lula ukusebenzisa ikambiso yokuthi umsilaphazi akhalinywe ngokuhlawuliswa.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza anḓadzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Ndayotewa ya Vhufumimalo ya ṅwaha wa 2022 hu tshi itelwa vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi nahone Minisṱa wa Vhulamukanyi na Tshumelo dza Vhululamisi, Vho Ronald Lamola, vha nga ṋetshedza nḓivhadzo ine ya vha na zwidodombedzwa zwa khwiniso iyo ine ya khou dzinginywa kha Ndayotewa.

src_text: Umthethokambiso usebenza ngokukhambisana nomthetho wezaManzi wee-1998 (umThetho Nomboro 36 womNyaka we-1998).

tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu khou khwinisa Khethekanyo 6(1) ya Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa 1996, ine ya sumbedza uri nyambo dza 11 dza tshiofisi dza fhano Afrika Tshipembe, ndi Tshibeli, Tshisuthu, Tshitswana, Tshiswati, Tshivenḓa, Tshitsonga, Tshivhuru, Luisimane, Tshindevhele, Tshithoza na Tshizulu..     Khwiniso iyi ndi ine ya ḓo ita uri hu vhe na ṱanganedzwa ha Luambo lwa Tswayo dza Zwanḓa lwa Afrika Tshipembe (SASL) sa luambo lwa tshiofisi lwa vhufumimbili (12) nahone ḓo dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedza ṱanganedzea ha mvelele ya luambo lwonolwo khathihi na khwaṱhisa pfanelo dzi linganaho kha vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha Afrika Tshipembe, hu sa sedzwi uri vha na vhuholefhali.

src_text: Umbiko WomTlamo WokuHlela NgeeNdaba ZobuLili, Ukwabiwa KweeMali, UkuTjheja NokuLinganisa Kunye NokuHlolwa KweeNcwadi .
tgt_text: Muhasho wa Pfunzo dza Mutheo wo no ḓi ṱanganedza SASL sa luambo lwa hayani     Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithole umbiko wendima yomsebenzi ngokuphunyeleliswa komTlamo wokuHlela ngeeNdaba zobuLili, ukwAbiwa kweeMali, ukuTjheja nokuLinganisa kunye nokuHlolwa kweeNcwadi.
tgt_text: Vhege ya Tsireledzo ya Vhana.

Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo fhululedza Vhege ya Tsiredzo ya Vhana bva nga ḽa 29 Shundunthule swika ḽa 4 Shundunthule 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Kha ri Tsireledze Vhana nga tshino tshifhinga tsha dwadze ḽa COVID-19 na nga Murahu”..     Kha yeneyo vhege, hu ḓo lavheleswa nga maanḓa kha mafhungo kwamaho shango ḽoṱhe, ane vha vhifha muvhilini ha vhaswa, lwe ha wanala hu tshi vha na engedzea vhukuma ha tshivhalo tsha vhaswa vhe vha vha na vhana nga tshifhinga tshenetsho tsha musi dwadze ḽa COVID-19 ḽo ḓiṋea maanḓa nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyithokozele indima ekulu esele yenziwe minyango yaborhulumende embadlwana ekuphumeleliseni umtlamo owavunywa ngomnyaka wee-2019 kobanyana sewungasetjenziswa.

tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo ya uri hu vhe na ndingedzo dzo khwaṱhaho vhukati ha vhabebi, vhadzulapo, zwigwada zwa vhurereli khathihi na zwitshavha nga angaredza dza itela thusa shandukisa izwo zwa engedzea ha tshivhalo tsha vhaswa vhane vha khou vhifha mivhilini..     Muṱangano wa Ikonomi wa Ḽifhasi (WEF).

src_text: Minengi eminye iminyango esele ijamise amaqalontanzi womthethokambiso kobanyana azokukhanyisa indlela yamahlelo aqakathekileko aqothele abantu abasikazi, ilutjha kunye nabantu abanokukhubazeka.
tgt_text: Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽi khou shela mulenzhe kha WEF ine ya khou ḓo farelwa fhaḽa Davos-Klosters, kha ḽa Switzerland bva nga ḽa 22 swika 26 Shundunthule 2022, nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U shumisana vhuedzedza Fulufhelo”.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombele ukuthi kubekwe ilihlo elibukhali bekubikwe ngokutjheja, khulukhulu keminye yeminyango engakabukubika.

tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi dzhiela nṱha tshikhala tsha vha tshipiḓa tsha thandululo nahone ḽi kovhana nḓivho ine ḽa vha nayo kha muṱangano uyu wa ḽifhasi vha hone ha shango ḽashu kha muṱangano uyu wa WEF na zwone ndi zwa ndeme kha bveledza phanḓa dzina ḽa shango ḽashu sa hone fhethu havhuḓisa ha ita zwa vhubindudzi kovhana na ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe nga ha bono ḽa vhumatshelo hashu khathihi na bvisela khagala dziṅwe mveledziso dzine dza khou itea ngomu kha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Ilanga Lelutjha Lokukhulumisana Ngo-Nelson Mandela (i-NMYD).
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele i-Nelson Mandela Youth Dialogue ukuthi yenzeke qobe mnyaka, ukusukela emnyakeni wee-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mbekanyamushumo ya Ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa ya ṅwaha wa 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U ṱuṱuwedza nḓila dza ḓitshidza ngadzo dzine dza nga vha dza tshifhinga tshilapfu khathihi na konḓelela ha vhaswa hu tshi itelwa vhumatshelo ha khwine”.

src_text: I-NMYD yokuthoma izokubanjwa ukusukela ngomhla we-7 ukuyokufika nakama-20 kuVelabahlinze wee-.
tgt_text: Ḓuvha ḽa Vhaswa ḽa tshiofisi ḽi ḓo pembelelwa ngei kha vunḓu ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha.

src_text: Leli-ke lihlelo likaMengameli lokuvulela ilutjha enarhakazini ye-Afrika ikundla yokubamba imikhulumiswano eyakhako yeendaba ezithinta lona.

tgt_text: Houno ndi ṅwaha wa vhufuiṋarathi (46) wa pembelelwa ha ḓuvha ḽa mvutshelano ya matshudeni ye ya vha hone nga ḓuvha ḽa 16 Fulwi 1976 fhaḽa kha ḽa Soweto he vhaswa vha vha vha tshi khou gwalabela zwa kombetshedzwa guda nga luambo lwa Tshivhuru nga muvhuso wa khethululo nga lukanda..     Nga muya wonoyo muthihi fanaho na uḽa wa ṅwedzi wa Fulwi 1976, Khabinethe khou ita khuwelelo kha vhaswa vha shango ḽashu ya uri vha lwe na khaedu ine ya khou engedzea ya shayea ha mishumo kha vhaswa nga shela mulenzhe kha mbekanyamushumo dza mveledziso dzi fanaho na mbekanyamushumo dza vhugudisamishumo khathihi na dza ṋea vhagudi tshenzhemo.

src_text: Imikhulumiswano le – enzinziswe kusaziwako wamazwengamazwe onguMengameli walokhuya wekhethu u-Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela – izakuvula amacoco wokutjala nokurhatjha ifundiso yoburholi bemikghwa emihle e-Afrika.

tgt_text: Muvhuso wo bveledza mbekanyamushumo dza tikedza zwa tholiwa ha vhaswa khathihi na sikwa ha mishumo ya tshifhinga tshipfufhi.

src_text: Imikhulumiswano le izakuvulela ilutjha ithuba lokwabelana ngamagugu wesiko lalo elinothileko.
tgt_text: Mabindu na one khou ṱuṱuwedzwa uri kunge vhaswa nga vhunzhi kha zwa mishumo nga sika zwikhala zwinzhi zwa vhaswa..     Mbekanyamushumo ya vhaswa ya ṅwedzi woṱhe wa Fulwi katela vhuṱambo ho fhambanaho bva kha zwa rwelwa ṱari ha fulo ḽa zwa vhurangaphanḓa ha vhaswa rwela ṱari Mbekanyamushumo ya Vhaambasada vha Pfungavhuṋe ya NYDA khathihi na vhuṅwe vhuṱambo vhunzhi ha Tshumelo dza Vhaswa dza Lushaka mona na shango ḽoṱhe.

src_text: Lelihlelo lizakubuye liqinise ubudlelwano babantu hlangana nabantu abatjha belizwekazi le-Afrika.
UmNyango wezaboMma, zeLutjha nabaNtu abanokuKhubazeka uzakumemezela imininingwana yehlelo lalombuthano ngokukhamba kwesikhathi.
tgt_text: Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Vhafumakadzi, Vhaswa na Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali Ofinisini ya Phresidennde hu si kale vha ḓo bvisela khagala mbekanyamushumo iyi nga vhuḓalo.
Vhuṱambo hoṱhe ha vhaswa vhu ḓo lavhelelwa uri vhu tevhedze milayo ya zwa mutakalo ya COVID-.

src_text: Umbiko Waqobe Mnyaka Wee-2021/22  Wokutjheja Indima Yokuhlonyiswa Kwabantu Abasikazi Nokulinganiswa Kobulili, Ukuthuthukiswa Kwelutjha Kunye Nokukhuthazwa Kwamalungelo Wabantu Abanokukhubazeka  .
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa Vhuṋe ha Mavu ha Tshitshavha.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithole umbiko waqobe mnyaka otjheja izinga lokusebenza womnyaka wama-2021/2022 ngokuhlonyiswa kwabantu abasikazi, ilutjha nabantu abanokukhubazeka.
tgt_text: Muvhuso tshi khou shumisana na vha Nnḓu ya Vhurangaphanḓa ha Sialala ya Lushaka ḓo vhidza Muṱangano wa Vhuṋe ha Mavu ha Tshitshavha nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 27 na Mugivhela wa ḽa 28 Shundunthule 2022 itela amba nga ha mafhungo elanaho na vhuṋe ha mavu.

src_text: Umbiko lo ulandelela iinkomba eziqakathekileko ekuphakanyisweni kwehlelo lokulinganiseka, izinga lokuqatjhwa nelobunikazi, nendima yaleziinqhema emisebenzini yeminyango neenjamiso ezingaphasi kombuso.

tgt_text: Hezwi zwi katela mushumo wa ṋetshedzwa ha mavu tshitshavha bva kha Muvhuso tshi ya kha vhathu vha re na pfanelo dza vhuṋe ho teaho, zwine hezwi zwa vha zwa ndeme kha maanḓafhadza zwitshavha zwa vhupo ha mahayani.

src_text: Umbiko lo uhlanganiswe ngokusekelwa ngokuhlelelwa kweendaba zokwabiwa kweemali ngokuqalelela zobulili, ukutjheja, ukulinganisa kunye nokuhlolwa kweencwadi okwamukelwa yiKhabinethi ngomnyaka wee-     Imithethomlingwa.
tgt_text: Zwa shayea ha vhuṋe ha mavu vhu re mulayoni kha vhupo ha tshitshavha zwi tou fhungudza fhedzi pfanelo dza vhathu dza vha vhaṋe vha mavu ane vha dzula khao, fhedzi zwi dovha hafhu zwa fhungudza khonadzeo yavho ya nga shumisa kha khwinifhadza matshilo avho khathihi na tshiimo tshavho tsha zwa masheleni     Milaedza fhululedza Khabinethe yo rumela maipfi u fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha:  Mufumakadzi Vho Leanne Manas, muhashi wa SABC Morning Live, vhe vha ṋewa tshiga tsha khuliso tsha Knight of the French National Order Merit nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 17 Shundunthule 2022, kha shela havho mulenzhe kha zwa vhoramafhungo, nyanḓadzamafhungo khathihi na miṅwe mishumo ya ndeme yo fhambanaho ya thuso ya zwa vhuthu..     Ndiliso Khabinethe yo rumela maipfi ndiliso kha vha muṱa na dzikhonani dza:  Vho Mpho Moerane (52), vhe vha vha vhe Ṋeḓorobo Muhulwane wa Ḓorobo khulwane ya Johannesburg, rapolotiki we vha mulwelambofholowo vhutshilo hawe hoṱhe khathihi na vha mushumeli wa vhathu vha fhaḽa Johannesburg.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa Otjhugulula UmThetho WezePilo NezokuPhepha EeMayini   .
tgt_text: Phanḓa ha musi vha sa athu tholwa sa Ṋeḓorobo Muhulwane, vho shuma sa Muraḓo wa Komiti ya Ṋeḓorobo hweswaho vhuḓifhinduleli ha Tshumelo dza zwa Mupo na Themamveledziso.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukumenyezelwa komThethomlingwa oTjhugulula umThetho wezePilo nezokuPhepha eeMayini kobanyana umphakathi uzokuphefumula ngawo.
tgt_text: Dokotela Vho Deborah Fraser (56), muimbi wa muzika wa zwa vhurereli ane dovha vha muwini wa pfufho nnzhi dza zwa muzika vhane vha kha ḓi tou bva huliswa zwenezwino nga avhelwa digirii ya Doctor of Philosophy in Sacred Music nga vha tshiimiswa tsha Christian Leadership Academy.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo unqophe ukwenza ubungcono ngepilo nangokuphepha kwabasebenzi beemayini; kilokhu-ke kubalwa nebhoduluko lapho umsebenzi wemayini wenzelwa khona.
tgt_text: Dokotela Vho Namane Magau (70), vhane vha vha radzipfunzo ṱhonifheaho khathihi na vha muraḓo huliseaho wa Bodo ya Vhafarandaka vha Khoro ya Lushaka ya AIDS ya Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo utjhugulula umThetho wezePilo nezokuPhepha eeMayini, we-1996 (umThetho 29 we-1996).
tgt_text: Vho Mike Schüssler (60), raikonomi wa fhano Afrika Tshipembe ḓivheaho we vha muraḓo fulufhedzeaho kha nḓowetshumo iyi nahone we ṋetshedza mihumbulo pfalaho nga ha tshiimo tsha ikonomi ya Afrika Tshipembe.

Vho Jamie Bartlett (56), mutambi wa matambwa theḽevisheni na tshiteidzhini wa fhano Afrika Tshipembe ane wina pfufho nnzhi, we vha tshi ḓivhea nga maanḓa sa Mike O'Reilly kha Isidingo na David Genaro kha Rhythm City.

src_text: Amatjhuguluko abuyekeziweko la ahlathulula eminye yemiqondo yomThetho lo, aqinise nomtlamo olawula zepilo nezokuphepha abe athomanise lokhu nekambiso ehle yokwenza izinto ephasini, hlangana nokhunye, malungana nokuphepha eemayini.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu khathihi na Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa ya rumela maipfi ayo ndiliso kha muvhuso na vhathu vha fhaḽa United Arab Emirates (UAE) nga murahu ha lovha ha Muḓivhalea Muṱahabvu Vho Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan (73), vhe vha vha vhe Phresidennde wa UAE  tholwaU tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa lwa tshoṱhe nga murahu ha senguluswa ha ndalukano khathihi na ṱanzwa madzina ho teaho.

Vho Bongani Sinenhlanhla Dladla sa Muofisi Mulanguli Muhulwane wa Bodo ya Mveledziso ya Nḓowetshumo ya zwa fhaṱa..     Vho Shabeer Hamid Khan sa Muḓivhambalelano Muhulwane kha Muhasho wa Vhufaragwama ha Lushaka..     Mufumakadzi Vho Mendoe Ntswahlana sa Muofisiri Muhulwane wa zwa renga Thundu na Tshumelo kha Muhasho wa Vhufaragwama ha Lushaka..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya tendelana na zwa tholwa ha vhathu vha tevhelaho uri vha ḓadze zwikhala zwine zwa vha hone kha Bodo ya Vhalangi vha Tshikwama tsha Vhukati tsha zwa Fulufulu     Vho Mosimaneotsile Jim Besnaar; (ii)    Mufumakadzia Vho Unati Nombakuse-Figlan.

src_text: Zomnotho .
tgt_text: Ikonomi.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele ituthuko ekarisako yamhlapha yokungenelela kwesizwe  ekuhloswe ngakho ukuqinisa ukukhula komnotho.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mveledziso dza zwezwino dzi vhuedzaho shango dzo tetshelwaho khwaṱhisa nyaluwo ya ikonomi ya nga figara dza vhushayamishumo dza zwezwino dzi bvaho kha Tshitatisitiki Afrika Tshipembe, vhushayamishumo ho tselafhasi bva kha.

src_text: Ukuya ngokweembalobalo ezikhutjhwe mhlapha mayelana nokutlhayela kwemisebenzi liZiko leemBalobalo leSewula Afrika (i-StatsSA), ukuphela kwemisebenzi kwehla ukusukela kumaphesende ama-.
tgt_text: 3 phesenthe kha kotara ya vhuṋa ya 2021 ya kha.

src_text: 3 ekoteni yesine yomnyaka wee-2021 ukuya kama-.
tgt_text: 5 phesenthe kha kotara ya thoma ya.

src_text: 5 ekoteni yokuthoma yomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Tshikalo tsha vhushayamishumo tshe tsha vha tsho gonyelanṱha tsho tselafhasi kha kotara ya vhuvhili nga tevhekanya.

src_text: Izinga elinabileko lokutlhayela kwemisebenzi lehlile emakoteni amabili ngokulandelana.
tgt_text: Mbuyelo khulwane ya mishumo yo vha kha tshitshavha na tshumelo dza matshilisano, mveledziso na mbambadzo..     Zwibveledzwaguṱe zwapo kha kotara ya thoma ya 2022 zwo engedzea nga.

src_text: Inzuzo ekulu ngemisebenzi kube semikhakheni yemisebenzi yomphakathi neyezehlalakuhle, yokukhiqiza neyerhwebo.
tgt_text: 9% zwa isa muelo wa ikonomi yashu kha tshiimo tsha musi hu saathu vha na dwadze ḽa Corona.

Kha kotara, sekhithara ya zwa mveledziso yo vha yone no khou shuma zwavhuḓi kha ikonomi nga gonyelanṱha ha zwibveledzwa zwa pheṱhiroḽiamu na dzikhemikhaḽa, zwiḽiwa na zwinwiwa, khathihi na metaḽa zwa mitshini..     Mbuelo hei yo gonyelaho nṱha nyana sumbedza uri ikonomi yashu tshe yo khwaṱha nahone shela mulenzhe ha Pulane ya Mvusuluso na Mbuyedzedzo ya Ikonomi zwi kho shuma zwavhuḓi.

src_text: IPahla ePheleleko yangeKhaya (i-GDP) ekoteni yokuthoma yomnyaka wee-2022 ikhule nge-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe kho ita khuwelelo kha vhathu vhoṱhe uri vha tikedze mabindu po na nḓowetshupo nga renga zwibveledzwa na tshumelo dzapo.

src_text: 9% okubuyisela umnotho welizwe lekhethu esigeni sangaphambi kokwehla kukamabhubhisa oyi-corona.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza tsheo ya zhendedzi ḽa vhupimi ḽa S&P Global kha vusulusa mbonalo ya vhupimi ha tshikolodo Afrika Tshipembe - bva kha tshiimo tsha vhukati ya kha tshiomo tshi fulufhedzisaho.

src_text: Kilekota, umkhakha wokukhiqiza ngiwo oqinise umnotho khulu ngokukhula ekukhiqizweni kweembaseli namakhemikhali, ukugoma neenselo, amamethali nemitjhini.
tgt_text: Zhendedzi ḽa vhupimi ḽo dovha hafhu ḽa khwaṱhisedza vhupimi ha zwikolodo ha tshifhinga tshilapfu kha kharentsi yapo na ya mashango nnḓa kha BB minas na BB respectively.
Tshiimo tsha kutshilele .

src_text: Lokhukuhluma okulingeneko kutjengisa ukuthi umnotho welizwe lekhethu usesenamandla nokobana amano wokufaka isandla njengeHlelo lokwAkha kabuTjha nokuVuselela umNotho (i-ERRP)  kungezeleleka amandla.
tgt_text: Dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19) khathihi na nndwa dza ḽifhasi dzi no khou endelela zwo kwama tshiimo tsha kutshilele nga nḓila si yavhuḓi ḽifhasiḽoṱhe.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombela woke umuntu ukusekela amabhizinisi namabubulo wangekhaya ngokuthenga imikhizo eyenziwe ekhayapha.
tgt_text: Vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe na vhone vha khou farea zwavhuḓi nga gonya ha mitengo ya zwivhaswa, zwiḽiwa na zwishumiswa zwa vhuṱhogwa..     Roṱhe ri fanela shumisana, na thusana itela vhulunga zwiko zwashu kha tshifhinga tshino tshi konḓaho.

Muvhuso khou lwa nga nḓila dzoṱhe tshi ṋetshedza muṅwe na muṅwe masheleni ndiliso, nga maanḓa vha shayaho..     Bannga ya Vhukati ya Afrika Tshipembe yo ḓiimisaho nga yoṱhe, yo khwaṱhaho nahone no khou shuma zwavhuḓi khou thusa nga pilela lushaka kha tshanduko ya mitengo si yavhuḓi nga ita uri vhe kha tshiimo tsho tendelwaho; ho sedzwa zwine maṅwe mashango khou ṱangana nazwo..     Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza tsheo yo dzhiwaho nga vha Vhufaragwama ha Lushaka tendelana na zwa fhungudzwa ha Mbadelo dza Zwivhaswa(GFL).

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele godu isiqunto sesikhungo sokulinganisa i-S&P Global sokubuyekeza izinga lobujamo beemali zeSewula Afrika – ukusukela kobunzinzileko ukuya kobukarisako.
tgt_text: GFL yo fhungudzwa nga  50 kha litha bva vhukati ha Lambamai na Shundunthule ḓo dovha hafhu ya gonyelanṱha bva nga ḽa 1 Fulwi swika ḽa 6 Fulwana.

src_text: Isikhungo sokulinganisa sivumelene namazinga wesikolodo semali yangaphandle neyangaphakathi ezingeni le-BB minus nele-BB ngokulandelana..     Iindleko Zokuphila   .
Umabhubhisa wesiFo seNgogwana i-Corona (i-COVID-19) nenturhu eragako ephasini zibe nomthelela omkhulu eendlekweni zokuphila ephasini zombelele.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza tsheo ya Khomishini ya zwa Miṱaṱisano lavhelesa tshoṱhe mitengo ya zwiḽiwa zwa vhuṱhogwa, nga maanḓa ṋetshedzo ya uri mabindu tea imelela zwa gonyisa ha mitengo..     Foramu ya vhubindudzi ya Afrika Tshipembe na Japan.

src_text: AmaSewula Afrika nawo akhulelwe yihloko ngokukhula kweentengo zeembaseli, ukugoma neensetjenziswa eziqakathekileko.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mvelelo dza zwezwino dza Foramu ya Vhubindudzi ya Afrika Tshipembe na Japan, he ha tendelanwa kha mbekanyamushumo dzi shumisanaho zwavhuḓi kha nḓowetshumo dzo vusuludzwaho, thekhinoḽodzhi dza zwiendedzi zwi shumisaho muḓagasi na gesemaḓi yo vusuludzwaho..     Foramu yo tendelana kha ita maṱano nga shumisa vhudavhidzani ha muyani hu nḓila ya sumbedza zwikhala zwi re Afrika Tshipembe kha mabindu manzhi Japan, mveledziso dza vhukoni kha nḓowetshumo dza zwa sikwa ha mimoḓoro yapo, zwikhala zwa mveledziso dzi bveledzaho mishumo khathini na fhana tshenzhemo dza zwa thekhinikhaḽa.

Japan ndi ḽinwe ḽa mashango vhashumisani kha zwa mbambadzo nahone ndi ḽone ḽi re phanḓa kha zwa vhubindudzi kha sekithara dzi re na tshivhalo Afrika Tshipembe bva kha zwa mimoḓoro ya kha zwa mitshini ya migodini yo khwiniswaho, na bva kha vhubindudzi ha zwa vhulimi ya kha tshumelo dza zwa masheleni..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza thomiwa ha Nethiweke ya Zwivhambadzelwannḓa ya Vharema yo thomiwaho nga Muhasho wa Mbambadzo, Nḓowetshumo na Muṱaṱisano, hu itela ṱanganya mamaga ndangwa nga vharema ane zwa zwino khou vhambadzelannḓa zwibveledzwa zwapo kha zwiṅwe zwipiḓa zwa ḽifhasi.

src_text: Sidinga ukubambisana soke, sisizane songe iinsetjenziswa zethu kilesisikhathi esibudisi.
tgt_text: Nethiweke iyi ḓo bveledza khovhano ya mafhungo, tshenzhemo na nḓivho ya vhukoni, nahone bveledzea nga vhukoni ha Mbekanyamushumo ya vha nḓowetshumo dza Vharema..     Fulufulu tsireledzwa ha fulufulu lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu zwo maanḓafhadzwa vhukuma nga murahu ha ṋetshedzwa ha Yunithi 4 ya zwa vhubindudzi ngei Tshiṱitshini tsha Muḓagasi tsha Kusile vunḓuni ḽa Mpumalanga ṋetshedzwa uhu ho sumbedza swikelelwa ha tshipikwa tsha ndeme kha ndingedzo dza Eskom dza lingedza kwiṋisa sisiṱemu ya fulufulu nahone ḓo engedza maanḓa muḓagasi nga 800 megawadzi (MW) kha giridi ya fulufulu..     Khabinethe yo dzhiela nzhele uri fhaṱiwa ha yunithi nṋa kha dza rathi dzi khou fanelaho khunyeledzwa kha thandela ya Tshiṱitshi tsha Muḓagasi tsha Kusile..     Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza engedzwa ha dzhenerasheni ntswa kha giridi, zwo itwaho uri zwi swikelelwe nga murahu ha ṱanganedza tsheo ya tendela vhabveledzi vha fulufulu vho ḓiimisaho nga vhoṱhe uri na vhone vha bveledzise muḓagasi.

src_text: Urhulumende wenza ngakho koke okusemandlenakhe ukwethula woke umuntu umthwalo, khulukhulu labo abanganabuyo.
tgt_text: Muvhuso wo saina ḽińwalo ḽa thendelano ya ḓo renga 150 MW ya khaphasithi ya fulufulu bva kha vharengisi vha fulufulu ḽi konaho vusuludzwa nga huswa, vha Scatec ASA.

src_text: IBhanga yethu eKulu esebenza kuhle nenamandla isiza ukuvikela umphakathi ekurhayilweni yi-infleyitjhini ngokuthi ihlale ezingeni eliqothelweko; ngaphasi khulu kunelamanye amazwe.
tgt_text: Khoro ya Vhutsivhudzi ya Broad-Based Economic Empowerment (B-BBEE).
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Khoro ya Vhutsivhudzi ya B-BBEE ntswa kha ḽino shango yo khethwaho nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yamukele isiqunto seZiko leeMali zeliZwe ukwelula isikhathi sokwehlisa umThelo weemBaseli  (i-GFL).
tgt_text: Khoro iyi yo vhumbwa nga zwigwada zwo fhambanaho zwa vhathu vha bvaho kha zwa vhubindudzi, yunioni dza mbambadzo, madzangano ḓitikaho nga lushaka khathihi na vha zwa pfunzo, Itsho tshigwada tshi ḓovha na vhuḓifhinduleli ha tsivhudza muvhuso kha maga u shandukisa ikonomi.

src_text: I-GFL yehliswe nge-R. 50 ilitha eenyangeni  uSihlabantangana noMrhayili, godu isikhatheso sizokwelulwa  ukuya phambili ukusukela ngomhla wo-1  kuMgwengweni ukufikela  ngomhla we-6 kuVelabahlinze wee-.
tgt_text: Naho honovha na tshanduko khulwane kha shandukiswa ha maitele muvhuso wa tshiṱalula kha Ikonomi, hu tshe na zwinzhi zwine zwa khou fanela itwa siani ḽa zwa ndangulo khwinisa zwikili khathihi na vula zwiṅwe zwikhala zwa vhoramabindu vha mafumakadzi na vhaswa.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele godu isiqunto seKomitjhini yePhaliswano sokuqalisisa iintengo zokugoma okuphilwa ngakho, khulukhulu isiqalelelo esisekela amabhizinisi nakakhuphula iintengo.
tgt_text: Miḓalo.
Masheleni bvaho kha muvhuso u thusa kha mavunḓu kwameaho nga tshiwo tsha miḓalo khou thusa nga nḓila yavhudi.

src_text: Ikundla Yezamabhizinisi Hlangana KweSewula Afrika NeJapan.
tgt_text: Muvhuso wo kona ṋetshedza tshumelo ya nḓisedzo ya zwiḽiwa, maḓi kunaho na madzulo kha vhathu vho xelelwaho nga mahaya khathihi na lugisa themamveledziso dzo vhaisalaho.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele  umphumela weKundla yezamaBhizinisi weSewula Afrika neweJapan ebeyibanjwe mhlapha, evumelene ngehlelo lomsebenzi  oncamileko elifaka hlangana ukusebenzisana  ngokuvula amabubulo akhandela ukusilaphazeka kwebhoduluko, itheknoloji yeenkoloyi zegezi nehayidrojini ehlwengileko.
tgt_text: Mushumo muhulwane nḓilani wa vhuedzedza tshumelo dza fhasisa sa nḓisedzo ya maḓi, muḓagasi, mabunga khathihi na kulumaga mashika.

Masheleni swikalo R189, 217 miḽioni khou shumiswa kha khwiṋisa Mbekanyamushumo ya Madzulo songo Tendelwaho zwi tshi khou itelwa khwiṋisa nzulelo dza vhadzulapo vha fhethu hu songo tendelwaho..     Masheleni mańwe hafhu swikaho R733, 086 miḽioni ṋetshedzwa nga vha Ndiliso ya Madzulo Vhathu hu itela thusa kha fhaṱiwa fhethu huswa ho tendelwaho dzula vhathu.

src_text: Ikundla le ivumelene godu  ‘ngomkhangiso’  wethungelelwano levidiyo ukuveza amathuba weSewula Afrika  nakabanye abosomabhizinisi be-Japan, ukuthuthukiswa kwamakghonofundwa emabubulweni weenkoloyi walapha ekhethu,  imikhakha yezemisebenzi ekukhiqizeni nokwabelana ngelemuko lezecwephetjhe.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza na livhuwa thikhedzo bvaho kha Shango ḽa Qatar zwine zwa vha zwiḽiwa, zwiambaro, dzidzhenereitha, zwikunakisi zwa maḓi, madennde khathihi na nḓisedzo ya mishonga ya alafha.
Ndambedzo iyi ḓo thusa vhadzulapo vha swikaho 4 000 vhane zwa zwino vhana madzulo vha khou dzula sentharani dza muvhuso.

src_text: I-Japan ingomunye wabarhwebelani bethu abaqakathekileko nabasisimali abakhamba phambili emikhakheni yeSewula Afrika, ukuthoma ngeenkoloyi, imitjhinini yeemayini yezinga eliphezulu, zokulima nezeemali.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza thuso ya zwa vhuthusavhathu bva kha shango ḽa United Arab Emirates (UAE) zwine zwa vha zwiḽiwa khathihi na maḓi kunaho zwi ḓo newa avho vho welwaho nga tshiwo tsha miḓalo Rwelwa ṱari ha Tshikwama tsha Mveledziso dza zwa Matshilisano.

1    Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Rwelwa ṱari ha Tshikwama tsha Mishumo ya Matshilisano tsho ṋetshedzwaho nga vha Tshumisano ya Mveledziso dza Nḓowetshumo (IDC) vho ṱangana na ofisi ya Presidennde khathihi na vha dtic.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele godu  ukusungulwa kweThungelelwano labaThengiseli bangaPhandle babaNtu abaNzima (i-Black Exporters Network) elisungulwe mNyango wezeRhwebo, amaBubulo nePhaliswano (i-dtic), ukuhlanganisa amabubulo wabantu abanzima njenganje abathumela imikhiqizo yabo yangekhaya kamanye amazwe.
tgt_text: Thikhedzo iyi ḓo bveledzisa zwikhala zwa mishumo kha vhaswa vha swikaho 50 000 hune vha ḓovha vha khou shumela zwitshavhani zwa mahayani.. 2    Thikhedzo iyi ḓo ṋetshedza thusa ya ndondola mutakalo kha zwitshavha, zwiḽiwa na dzikhishi dzi ṋetshedzaho sobo dza pfushi ṱuṱuwedza zwa ńwala na vhala ṋetshedza dzi mbekanyamushumo dzi tsivhudzaho vhathu nga ha tsireledza mupo khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza vhaswa.

src_text: Ithungelelwaneli lizokukghonakalisa ukwabelana ngelwazi, ilemuko namakghono, lakhela godu phezu kwepumelelo yeHlelo laboSomabubulo abaNzima.
tgt_text: Tshikwama tsho tshi ḓo tikedza zwitshavha zwi swikaho 26 honeha hu si na ndavhelelo ya mbuyelo ya masheleni.

src_text: Zamandla.
tgt_text: Zwa Vhugevhenga na Tshanḓanguvhoni.

src_text: Amano wethu wokufumana amandla isikhathi eside asekeleke khulu ngemva  kokudluliselwa ephikweni lezerhwebo kwe-Unit 4 yePhawa iKusile  eseMpumalanga.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wa fariwa ha vhathu vha tshivhalo vha khou ṱumanywaho na zwa tswa wanala na masheleni hombokiwaho khathihi na maitele tshanḓanguvhoni.

src_text: Lokhukudluliswa kungelinye iliqhasilinganiso emizameni ye-Eskom yokunzinzisa ihlelo lokuphehlwa kwegezi, kanti lizokungezelela ama-800 wama-megawatt (MW) ethungelelwaneni lokuphehlwa kwegezi.
tgt_text: Hu tshi katelwa na vhashumi vhakale vha muvhuso vhe vha vha vha kha vhuimo ha nṱha, vhańwe vha hone vho livhana na mulayo nga mulandu wa kandekanya Mulayo wa Vhulanguli ha Masheleni Lushaka, wa 1999 (Act 1 of 1999).

Kha farwa ho hu katelwa na farwa ha mushumi wa Muhasho wa zwa Muno ngei sentharani ya dzula vhafhalali ya Desmond Tutu wanalaho Pitori nga murahu ha hweswa mulandu wa ṱanganedza masheleni tshanḓanguvhoni bva kha muṅwe wa vhabvannḓa - izwo zwi tou vha tsumbo ya uri huna muthu ane avha nṱha ha mulayo nahone huna tshikhala tsha vhashumi vha sa fulufhedzei kha ofisi dza muvhuso..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza muvhigo wa farwa ha vhanna vhavhili ri vha vhuye ngeno kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe vha divhiwaho sa MaGupta, madzina avho ndi Rajesh na Atul.

src_text: Ikhabinethi itjheje ukuthi ukwakhiwa kwamayunithi amane aphehla igezi kasithandathu sele kuphelile kilephrojekthi yePhawa  iKusile.
tgt_text: Izwi ndi nga murahu ha muvhigo wa zwezwino wo ṱahiswaho wa uri vho fariwa ngei Dubai kha ḽa UAE he zwa ḓivhadzwa nga Dzangano ḽa Mapholisa kha Vhugevhenga ḽa Dzitshaka (Interpol).
