Avho murathu na mukomana vha khou ṱodiwa kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe nga murahu ha ṱumanywa na vhugevhenga ha dzhia ndaulo ya muvhuso, vhufhura khathihi na vha na masheleni tshandanguvhoni.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele ukungezelelwa okutjha kwamandla kilelithungelelwano lokuphehla igezi, okuphunyeleliswe siqunto sokuvumela abaphehli begezi abazijameleko ukuthi baphehle igezi.
tgt_text: Nyambedzano vhukati ha mazhendezi mihasho mulayo vhukati ha shango ḽa UAE na ḽa Afrika Tshipembe dzi khou bvelaphanḓa farwa havho hu sumbedza vhuḓiimiseli ha muvhuso kha ulwa na vhugevhenga khathihi na tshanḓanguvhoni hu si na nyofho kana tshiḓivhano farwa ha avho vhanna zwi sumbedza ri nḓila dza kutshimbidzele kwa zwithu dzi khou shuma zwavhuḓi kha vhona ri vhakandekanyaho mulayo vha khou livhanyiswa na wo nahone huna muthu re nṱha ha mulayo..     Khabinethe yo sasaladza maitele mavhi u nyadza ikonomi na shango ḽashu nga murahu ha zwiito zwa tshinyadzwa ha thambo dza muḓagasi ngei kha Yunithi 1 ya Tshiṱitshi tsha Muḓagasi tsha Eskom vunḓuni ḽa Mpumalanga.

src_text: Urhulumende usandukutlikitla isivumelwano sokuthenga ama-MW ali-150  kumphehli wegezi ozijameleko, i-Scatec ASA.
tgt_text: Ndi lwa vhuṋa izwo zwiito zwa tshinyadzwa ha zwiṱitshi zwa muḓagasi zwi tshi khou bvelela nga murahu ha musi hu tshi khou tou bva vhigwa zwiṅwe zwiraru zwe zwa tshinyadzwa vhegeni dzo fhiraho.

src_text: UmKhandlu Oweluleka Ngokuhlonyiswa Kwabantu Abanzima Ngamandla Womnotho (i-B-BBEE).
tgt_text: Mbalombalo dza zwiito zwa vhugevhenga dza zwezwino dzi tou vha tsumbo ya ri hu tshe na mushumo muhulwane une lushaka lwa fanela ita ri lushaka lu kone tsireledzea.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele  ukubeka kwakaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa umKhandlu omutjha oLuleka nge-B-BBEE elizweni lekhethu.
tgt_text: Zwiito zwa vhugevhenga zwi khou bvelelaho zwi ri sumbedza ri nḓila ya fhungudza vhugevhenga ndi vhuḓifhinduleli hashu roṱhe sa lushaka - ri tshi katela mapholisa, vharangaphanḓa vha madzangano poḽotiki, vhorambindu, vhashumi khathihi na vhadzulapo - roṱhe nga tou angaredza ri fanela ulwa na zwiito zwa vhugevhenga..     Khabinethe khou fulufhela ri gwama ḽe ḽa ṋetshedzwa vha Minisiṱiri wa Mapholisa itela thusa zwiṱitshi zwa mapholisa zwine zwa vha na tshivhalo tsha nṱha kha milandu ingaho mabulayo tshipiwa khathihi na mińwe milandu zwi ḓo thusa ri zwitshavha zwa vhathu zwi tsireledzee.
Maswamaswa nga ha dwadze ḽa COVID-.

src_text: Umkhandlu lo wakhiwe babantu abahlukileko ngokwamabhizinisi, iinhlangano zabasebenzi, iinhlangano ezinzinze emphakathini nabosolwazi bezefundo, abazokuthwala umsebenzi wokubonisa  urhulumende ngokutjhugululwa komnotho.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo humbudza lushaka zwauri dwadze ḽa COVID-19 ḽi tshe hone nahone ri fanela isa phanḓa na maitele oṱhe u ḓitsireledza na tsireledza vhańwe.

Maitele u ḓitsireledza katela ṱamba zwanḓa kana sanithaiza zwanḓa misi yoṱhe dzulela ambara masiki ri dzi pherani dzulela sia tshikhala tsho teaho vhukati ha muthu na muṅwe vula mafasiṱere ri hu dzhene muya khathihi na hayeliwa..     Guvhangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Afrika (AU).

src_text: Nanyana ibonakala nje indima esele yenziwe ukubuyisela emva ukudungwa komnotho njengoba wadungwa mbuso webandlululo (i-apartheid) nje, kodwana usesemnengi umsebenzi ekusafanele wenziwe ukwandisa isandla sokulawula sabantu abanzima, nokuphakamisa amakghonofundwa kunye nokunabisa ihlelo lokuthengwa kwepahla kobanyana abantu abasikazi babantu abanzima nelutjha bazokuvulekelwa mathuba.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱangadzedza mulevho, muani na vhuḓikumedzeli zwo dzhiwaho kha Guvhangano ḽi lwaho na maitele zwa Vhuravhele na Dzitshandukiso dzi si ho Mulayoni kha dzhango ḽa Afrika wo farelwaho Malabo, kha Riphabuḽiki ya Equatorial Guinea, nga Mugivhela wa ḽa 28 Shundunthule.

Vharangaphanḓa vha mashango ḽa Afrika vho lavhelesa zwiwo zwa shushedza, vha sedza nḓila ya khwine ya kufhindulele kha ayo maitele khathihi na ḓiimisela tsireledza mashango ane avha miraḓo ya dzangano ane khou ṱangana na khaedu dza zwa vhuravhele na maitele u vhaiswa..     Vhulwadze ha Monkeypox.

src_text: Iinkhukhula.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ḓivhadza vhadzulapo vha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe zwa ri vha zwa ndondolo ya mutakolo vho ḓiimisela tshothe kha lavhelesana na thivhela vhulwadze ha Monkeypox, zwi tshi tevhela dzhena haho kha mashango vhalaho songo ḓoweleaho kha zwa tshoṱelwa nga malwadze.

src_text: Inendima ebonakalako imizamo karhulumende esaragako yokubethula umthwalo abantu abacaphazelekileko eemfundeni lapho kusandukusahlela khona iinkhukhula.
tgt_text: Ngeno kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe hu saathu vha na muthu na muthihi no ṱolwaho kana kavhiwaho nga uvho vhulwadze, vha zwa ndondolo ya mutakalo kha ḽi no shango vha kati tshoṱhe na lavhelesana na uvho vhulwadze     Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: Urhulumende ukwenze kwaba liqaloqangi ukunikela ngokudla, amanzi nobusithelo kilabo abasele banganabuyo nokulungiswa komthangalasisekelo owonakeleko.
tgt_text: Vhukwamani na Lushaka nga ha Maga ane nga Dzhiwa kha Ulwa na Zwiito zwi si ho Mulayoni zwa Rengisa Tsimbi dza Kale.

src_text: Sewuthomile umsebenzi omkhulu wokulungisa nokuvuselela ukutholakala kweensetjenziswa ekuphilwa ngazo, njengamanzi, igezi kunye nokukhanjiswa/nokulahlwa kweenzibi.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo tendelana na zwa ri huvhe na nyambedzano dzi katelaho lushaka nga ha khumbelo dzo ṱahisiwaho dza thivhela zwiito zwa rengiswa ha tsimbi dza kale na dza zwino.

Zwa tswiwa ha tsimbi dza kale na thambo dza khopha kha themamveledziso dza muvhuso zwi kwama nyaluwo ya ikonomi nga nḓila si yavhuḓi..     Khaedu dzine dza vha hone dzi katela kwamea ha nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi na tshumelo dza zwidimela nga murahu ha tshinyadzwa ha zwiporo.

src_text: Imali epheze ibe ziingidi ezi-R189, 217 isetjenziselwa iHlelo lokuVuselela iiNdawo zokuHlaliswa kwabaNtu ngazo okuzokwenziwa ngcono ipilo yabantu abahlala emikhukhwini.
tgt_text: Izwi zwi kwama vhaṋameli nga vha engedzela thaidzo ya masheleni u tshimbila nga murahu ha tshinyadzwa ha zwidimela.

Thambo dza muḓagasi dzo ṱhukhukanywaho dzi vhea lushaka kha tshiimo tsha khombo, nga maanḓa vhana vhaṱuku..     Khabinet yo ṋea maanḓa vha Muhasho wa dtic ri vha tshimbidze iyo miṱangano nga tshifhinga tshe vha ṋewa tshone, nahone vha fanela vhudzisa lushaka uri hu fanela itwa mini ri muvhuso kone fhelisa maitele mavhi u tshinyadzwa ha themamveledziso dza vhuṱhogwa kha khwaṱhisa ikonomi.

src_text: Singezelelwe ngeengidi ezima-R733, 086 isiBonelelo sokuThuthukisa ukuHlaliswa kwabantu nokusiza  ekwakhiweni kweendawo zabantu ezihlalekako.
tgt_text: Zwezwo nga murahu, Khabinethe ḓo kona ṱahisa maga khethwaho kha ulwa na yo maitele     Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.
Tshumisano ya Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UN) kha zwa Thekhinoḽodzhi na Peacekeeping International Symposium (PTPS).

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele isizo lemBusweni we-Qatar elikukudla, izambatho, amajenereyitha, iinhlanzekisi zamanzi, imitjhini yokuphefumula, amatende nemitjhoga.
tgt_text: Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo dovha hafhu ḽa fara muṱangano wa vhurathi wa zwa PTPS na vha Khoro ya Sainthifiki na Thoḓisiso ya Nḓowetshumo ngei Piṱori bva nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 24 Fulwi.

src_text: Lomnikelo uzokusiza izakhamuzi ezingaphezu kwee-4 000 ezisaje zifihliswe ihloko eendaweni zokutjheja umphakathi.
tgt_text: Muṱangano uyo khou lavhelelwa dzhenelwa nga vharangaphanḓa vha swikaho 300 vha bvaho kha mashango ane vha miraḓo swikaho.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yamukele godu isizo lezehlalakuhle elibuya elizweni i-United Arab Emirates (UAE) ngokunikela ngokugoma namanzi ukusiza abongazimbi beenkhukhula zamhlapha.

tgt_text: Muṱangano uyo ḓo dzhenelwa nga maswole, mapholisa, na vhathu vha bvaho kha mashango ane vha miraḓo ya UN vha tshiitela pfumbudzana nga ha thekhinoḽodzhi ya tshizwino, yo khwinifhadzwaho na mbekanyamaitele dza vhurangeli kha puḽane dza UN.

src_text: Ukuvulwa Kwesikhwama Sokuthuthukisa Umphakathi  .
tgt_text: Muṱangano uyo ḓo shumiswa sa fhethu ha ṱahisa mafhungo fhambanaho khathihi na fha zwikhala miraḓo ya UN vhane vha vha tshipiḓa tsha zwa ḓisa mulalo hu tshi khou shumiswa thekhinoḽodzhi ya puḽane dza ḓisa mulalo.

src_text: 1    IKhabinethi yamukele ukuvulwa kwesiKhwama sokuBonelela umPhakathi ongaSebenziko yiHlangano eThuthukisa amaBubulo (i-IDC) ngokutjhebisana ne-Ofisi kaMengameli kunye ne-dtic.
tgt_text: Muṱatisano wa Lushaka no Fariwa Ṅwaha Muṅwe na Muṅwe wa Vhuṋa wa ḽa Afrika Tshipembe wa nga ha Zwikili zwa Ḽifhasi (WSZA).

src_text: Lelisekelo lizokuvulela abantu abatjha abapheze babe zii-50 000 amathuba wokuvala iinkhala emsebenzini olisizo emphakathini weendawo ngeendawo.
tgt_text: Muṱaṱisano wa lushaka farwaho ṅwaha muṅwe na muṅwe  4th  WSZA khou farelwa ngei Inkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre kha ḽa KwaZulu-Natal bva nga ḽa 7 swika 10 Fulwi 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ya: “Ratcheting up the Production of 21st Century Artisans”..     Tshipikwa tsha farwa ha uyo muṱangano ndi ṱuṱuwedza zwikili zwa athizene sa izwi ḽi buḓo ḽi shumaho zwavhuḓi khathihi na vula zwikhala zwa vhushumisani kha iḽo buḓo dovha hafhu wa shumiswa sedzuluse zwikalo zwa vhane vho lugelwa nga guda khathihi na kona vhona uri ndi vhafhio vhane vha nga khwinifhadza nga kha tshikhala tsha ṱanganedza vhagudi vhane vha khou ṱoda dzhia athizene sa buḓo ḽavho     MilaedzaNdiliso Khabinethe yo tevhedza Phresindennde Vho Ramaphosa kha rumela ndiliso kha vha muṱa wa Vhuhosini na lushaka lwa vha amaMpondo Kingdom zwi tshi tevhela ri sia shango ha KhosiKhulu Vho Zanozuko Tyelovuyo Sigcau  tholwaU tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa lwa tshoṱhe nga murahu ha senguluswa ha ndalukano khathihi na ṱanzwa madzina ho teaho.1)    Vho Jacob Ganny Mbele sa Muofisiri Mulanguli Muhulwane (DG) wa Muhasho wa Zwiko zwa Mineraḽa na Fulufulu2)    Mufumakadzi Vho Pumeza Nwabisa Nodada sa Tshanḓa tsha Muofisiri Mulanguli kha Muhasho wa zwa Mupo Vhusimamiri na Vhureakhovhe3)    Mufumakadzi Vho Susan Mafanedza Masapu sa Mutsivhudzi kha Mulayo Muhulwane kha Muhasho wa Vhulamukanyi na Mveledziso ya Mulayotewa.

4)    Mufumakadzi Vho Doris Tshepe sa Mukhomishinari wa Khomishini ya zwa Vhuṱaṱisani.5)    Dokotela Vho Alex Mahapa sa Mueletshedzi wa tshifhinga tshoṱhe kha Minisiṱa Farelaho kha Muhasho wa Tshumelo ya Tshitshavha na Ndaulo.6)    Muimeleli Vho Rams Ramashia sa Mueletshedzi nga zwifhinga kha Minisiṱa Farelaho kha Muhasho wa Tshumelo ya Tshitshavha na Ndaulo.

src_text: Ukutjhuguluka Kwetlayimethi.
tgt_text: Tshanduko ya Kilima.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukuvakatjhela eSewula Afrika kukaNom.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza madalo kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe Vho Alok Sharma, Phresidennde wa Muṱangano wa nga ha Tshanduko ya Kilima wa Dzangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UN) wa vhu 26 bva nga ḽa 19 swika ḽa 21 Fulwi 2022 khathihi na tsenguluso yavho ya uri Afrika Tshipembe ḽo sumbedza vhuḓikumedzeli vhu re khagala kha zwa shandukela kha fulufulu ḽo kunaho.

src_text: Alok Sharma, onguMengameli wehlandla lama-26 lomHlangano weenKhulu zeHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko (i-UN) ngokuTjhuguluka kweTlayimethi, ukusukela ngomhla we-19 ukuyokufika kumhla wama-21 kuMgwengweni wee-2022, yathokozela nokulinganisa kwakhe ukuthi iSewula Afrika izibophelele ngokubonakalako  ngokweyamela ehlelweni leembaseli ezingasilaphaziko.
tgt_text: Nga ṅwaha wa 2021, Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa vho vha tshipiḓa tsha vhaṅwe vharangaphanḓa musi vha tshi ḓivhadza tshumisano ya ḓivhazwakale vhukati ha shango ḽashu na mivhuso ya mashango fanaho na ḽa France, Germany, United Kingdom, United States, hu tshi katelwa na European Union ya tikedza tshanduko pfadzaho ya ya kha ikonomi ine ya vha na muhasaladzo wa khaboni ya fhasi khathihi na tshitshavha tshi konḓelelaho tshanduko ya kilima.

Afrika Tshipembe ḽo shuma vhukuma kha ita ndugiselo dza shandukela kha fulufulu ḽo kunaho khathihi na ya kha zwiko zwa fulufulu ḽo kunaho zwine zwa fana na haiḓirodzheni yo kunaho, bayomasi, fulufulu ḽi bvaho kha muya, fulufulu ḽa masana ḓuvha na fulufulu ḽi bvaho kha maḓi, na zwiṅwe zwinzhi zwi vusuludzeaho.

src_text: Ngomnyaka wee-2021, uMengameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa wahlanganyela nabanye abarholi ekumemezeleni ukusebenzisana okwakhe umlando bokubambisana naborhulumende bamazwe naka alandelako: i-France, iJarimani, i-United Kingdom ne-United States kunye ne-European Union ukusekela ihlelo elilungileko lokweyamela emnothweni womthamo ophasi wekhabhoni kunye nomphakathi okwazi ukujamelana nokutjhuguluka kwetlayimethi.
tgt_text: Izwo zwine zwa ḓivhiwa sa fulufulu ḽo vanganaho ndi zwone zwine zwa ita uri hu vhe na ndinganyiso vhukati ha zwiko zwa fulufulu hu tshi itelwa khwaṱhisedza nḓisedzo ya fulufulu ḽi fulufhedzeaho uri hu kone swikelwa ṱhoḓea dza fulufulu dzine dza khou engedzea nga luvhilo fhano shangoni shumiswa ha khaelo dza Dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19).

Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza tsela fhasi zwihulwane ha zwiwo zwa kavhiwa nga COVID-19 zwe zwa rekhodiwa kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe kha vhege dzi si gathi dzo fhiraho nahone khou ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhoṱhe vho teaho uri vha bvele phanḓa na haelwa, zwine hezwi zwa ḓo thusa kha thivhela lwala lwo kalulaho valelwa vhuongeloni na lufu.

src_text: ISewula Afrika seyinesikhathi isebenza ngokukhuthala, isebenzela ukulungiselela ukweyamela ehlelweni leembaseli ezingasilaphaziko, ilungiselela nokuthoma ukusebenzisa imithombo yamandla weembaseli ehlwengileko, enjengehayidrojini ehlwengileko, i-biomas, umtjhiso wommoya, umtjhiso welanga, kunye negezi ephehlwa ngamanzi,  hlangana nezinye zeembaseli ezivuselelekako.
tgt_text: Hafu ya vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha vhaaluwa vha Afrika Tshipembe vho no wana phimamushonga ya khaelo nthihi ya COVID-19 swika zwino.

src_text: Lokhu okuthiwa ziimbaseli ezimvango kunzinzisa imithombo yamandla ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kunegezi eyaneleko ezakugcina iindingo zegezi ezisolo zisanda elizweni lekhethweli.
tgt_text: Muvhuso khou dzudzanya shumisa masheleni khadzimiso ya nzwalelo dza fhasi ane kha ḓi tou bva tendelwa nga vha Bannga ya Ḽifhasi kha renga dziṅwe phimamushonga dza khaelo ya COVID-19 dza ḓadzisa khathihi na vhona uri lushaka lwo tsireledzwa nga nḓila yo teaho kha kavhiwa hune ha nga vha hone.

Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya dzhiela nṱha zwine zwa khou bvelela kha zwa ndangulo ya dwadze ḽa COVID-19, nga maanḓa mvelaphanḓa ine ya khou itwa musi ho sedzwa zwa vhuyela tshoṱhe kha maitele ḓoweleaho zwa ikonomi na matshilisano.

src_text: Ikarekelo Yomjovo Wesifo Sengogwana I-Corona (i-COVID-19)   .
tgt_text: Minisiṱa wa zwa Mutakalo, Dokotela Vho Joe Phaahla, vha ḓo netshedza zwiṅwe zwidodombedzwa zwa ḓadzisa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukwehla khulu kwenani labantu abangenwe sisifo se-COVID-19 eSewula Afrika eemvekaneni ezidlulileko, yabe yakhuthaza boke abantu abalungele ukuhlaba ukuthi baragele phambili basihlabele lesisifo, njengoba lokhu kulisizo nje ekuphephiseni abantu ukuthi bangangenwa magulo amambi, bangalaliswa esibhedlela namkha bagule bebabhubhe.
tgt_text: Ḓuvha ḽa Vhaswa ḽa Lushaka.

Khabinethe yo livhuwa vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha Afrika Tshipembe nge vha dzhenela vhuṱambo ha tshihumbudzi tsha Ḓuvha ḽa Vhaswa ḽa Lushaka nga Ḽavhuṋa, 16 Fulwi 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U bveledza mishumo ya tshifhinga tshilapfu khathihi na konḓelela ha vhaswa hu tshi itelwa vhumatshelo havhuḓi.” Muya wa mafulufulu na konḓelela we wa sumbedzwa nga vhaswa mona na shango ḽashu, nangoho ndi zwithu zwine zwa tea fhululedzwa na dzhiiwa sa fulufhelo ḽa vhumatshelo ha khwine.

src_text: Isiquntu sabo boke abantu abakhulu beSewula Afrika bekube nje, ubuncani bakhona sebakhe bahlaba kanye bahlabela i-COVID-.
tgt_text: Musi ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa wa Lushaka tshi khou swika magumoni, kha ri khwaṱhise nungo dzashu itela uri vhaswa vha kone swikela vhunzhi ha mbekanyamushumo dza thikhedzo dzine dza netshedzwa nga muvhuso khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza zwa dzhenela havho kha ikonomi nga nḓila yo fhelelaho..   Muvhuso, sa wone mutholi muhulwane, wo dzhenelela kha khaedu iyi nga ita uri matshudeni vho phasaho digirii dzavho vhane vha sa shume vha wane tshenzhemo nga kha Mbekanyamushumo dza Ngudo na Vhugudelamushumo dza Muvhuso dzo livhiswaho kha Vhagudiswa vho fhedzaho Digirii dzavho.

src_text: Urhulumende unqophe ukusebenzisa imali asandukubolekwa yona mhlapha evunyelwe yiBhanga yePhasi, enamakonyana aphasi, ukungezelela imithamo yomjovo we-COVID-19, kuzokuqinisekiseka ukuthi isitjhaba sivikeleke ngokwaneleko engozini yokutheleleka ngalesisifo..  IKhabinethi ibuye yaqala neendaba eziphathelene nokulawulwa kwesifo esikhe sarhagalesi, i-COVID-19, khulukhulu malungana nendima esele yenziwe nokubuyela ngokupheleleko emisebenzini ejayelekileko kezomnotho.
tgt_text: Muvhuso khou dovha hafhu wa shumisa Tshikwama Tsha sika Mishumo ya zwa Matshilisano (SEF) khathihi na vusuludza maga u sika mishumo vha tshiimiswa tsha Tshumelo ya Vhaswa ya Lushaka (NYS) lune tshiṅwe na tshiṅwe tsha zwiimiswa izwi tsha ḓo kunga vhaswa vha swikaho 50 000 kha ikonomi.

src_text: UNgqongqotjhe wezePilo uDorh.
tgt_text: Haya maga ha nga ḓo tou ṋetshedza fhedzi tshenzhemo ya mushumo ine ya ṱoḓea ngaurali, fhedzi ḓo dovha hafhu khwaṱhisedza ndeme ya vha vhadzulapo vha re na ṱhogomelo.

src_text: Joe Phaahla usezasinikela eminye imininingwana malungana nalokhu.
tgt_text: Vha SEF vha shumisana na madzangano ane si vhe muvhuso (dzi NGO) ngeno vha NYS vha tshi shumisa vhaswa kha tshumelo dzi vhuedzaho tshitshavha mona na shango.
Vhuendi.

src_text: ILanga LeLutjha LeliZweloke.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Puḽane ya Shuma ya Nṱha dza 11 yo livhiswaho kha fhelisa thaidzo dza thivhiwa ha dzibada khathihi na tholwa ha vhadzulapo vha mashango nnḓa sa vhareili vha maṱiraka.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokoze woke amaSewula Afrika ngokuhlanganyela esikhumbuzweni seLanga leLutjha leliZweloke ngeLesine, ngomhla we-16 kuMgwengweni wee-2022 ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Sikhuthazela Ingomuso Elingcono Lendlela Yokuziphilisa Ebambelelako Nekhambisana Nobujamo Bezinto Elutjheni.” Ummoya wamandla wetjisakalo newokujamelana nobujamo bezinto otjengiswa lilutjha elizweni lekhethu loke umthombo wokuhlalela ethembeni nokuthokozela ingomuso elingcono.
tgt_text: Puḽane iyi ye ya bveledzwa nga Komiti ya Vhukati ha Dziminisiṱa ya nga ha Vhuendi ha Badani na Vhuendedzathundu (IMC) vha tshi shumisana na vha nḓowetshumo ya zwa vhuendi ha badani na vhuendedzathundu ṱuṱuwedza zwa khwaṱhiswa ha ṱhoḓea dza visa khathihi na tevhedzwa ha milayo ya zwa vhashumi.
IMC yo vhumbwa hu tshi itelwa tandulula thaidzo dza thivhiwa ha dzibada khathihi na migwalabo ya vhareili vha maṱiraka vha Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Njengoba iNyanga YeLutjha seyiya ngekupheleni nje, asiqiniseni imizamo yethu yokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abatjha bayawathola amahlelo amanengi avulwe ngurhulumende wabe wakghonakalisa nokuthi baba nelitho abalenzako emnothweni.
tgt_text: Migwalabo na thivhiwa ha dzibada zwi kwama matshimbilele vhathu na thundu nga nḓila ine ya si vhe yavhuḓi, zwa tshuwisa vhabindudzi vha mashango nnḓa nahone zwa ndemesa, zwa kwama ikonomi na nḓila dza nḓisedzo dza thundu na tshumelo dza ndeme dzine dza shumisa magondo eneo kwameaho.
Ṱhahelelo ya maḓi kha Masipala Muhulwane wa Nelson Mandela Bay (NMB).

src_text: IKoro yemBusweni, njengoba imqatjhi omkhulu kinabo boke nje, isisikimele lesisitjhijilo ngokuvulela iimfundiswa ezineziqu kodwana ezingasebenziko ukuthi zithole ilimuko lokwazi umsebenzi ngehlelo lokuFundisa iimFundiswa ezineziQu umsebenzi emBusweni.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza maga vha Muhasho wa Maḓi na Vhuthathazwitzhili (DWS) fhaḽa kha Masipala Muhulwane wa NMB kha ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha u thivhela Ḓuvha ḽa sa vha na Shotha na Ḽithihi ḽa Maḓi sa izwi vunḓu ḽi tshi khou livhana na ṱhahelelo khulwane ya maḓi ye ya thoma bva nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Urhulumende godu uphumelelisa isiKhwama sokuVulela umPhakathi imiSebenzi (i-SEF) ngehlelo leLutjha eliVuselelwe ngobuTjha (i-NYS) lokuvula imisebenzi, elizakuvulela abantu abatjha amasango wokungena emnothweni; ihlelo ngalinye kilawa lizakuvulela abantu abatjha abama-50 000 amasango wokungena emnothweni.
tgt_text: Vha DWS vha khou shumisana na vunḓu kha thoma shumisa maga tshifhinga tshipfufhi, tsha vhukati na tshilapfu itela tandulula na fhungudza thaidzo ya masiandaitwa gomelelo ane nga vha hone.

Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya kwengweledza vhadzulapo vha NMB uri vha tevhedze milayo yo vhewaho ya fhungudzwa ha maḓi nga masipala wapo itela vhona uri hu khou dzulela vha na nḓisedzo yo teaho ya maḓi.

src_text: Amagadango lawa-ke angeze agcine ngokunikela ilimuko lokwazi umsebenzi elidingeke khulu, kodwana lizakuqinisa namandla wokuthi abantu abatjha babe zizakhamuzi ezinelizwi eendabeni zelizwe.
tgt_text: Nga angaredza, kushumiselwe kwa maḓi ku tea fhungudzwa ya kha ḽithara dza 50 miḽioni nga ḓuvha bva kha tshikalo tsha zwino tsha ḽithara dza 280 miḽioni nga ḓuvha.

src_text: I-SEF isebenzisana neenhlangano ezingasizombuso (ama-NGO) bese kuthi i-NYS isebenzise abantu abatjha emisebenzini ebuyisela umphakathi elizweni lokeli.
tgt_text: Vhugevhenga na zwiito zwa vhuaḓa.
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza farwa ha zwenezwino ha muofisiri wa Muhasho wa Muno ane shuma fhaḽa kha ofisi ya Benoni nge wanala ṋetshedza phasipoto ya vhufhura kha mudzulapo wa shango ḽa Bangladesh.

src_text: Zokuthutha  .
tgt_text: Muofisiri, Mufumakadzi Vho Sibongile Simelane, vho ṋewa beiḽi ya masheleni linganaho R5 000 ngei Khothe ya Madzhisiṱiraṱa ya Benoni nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 21 Fulwi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokozele iHlelo lomSebenzi lamaPhuzu ali-11 elizakusebenza ngomraro wokuvalwa kweendlela nokuqatjhwa kwabatjhayeli bamathraga abamaphandle.
tgt_text: Mudzulapo wa Bangladesh, Vho Fahim Kazi, vho farwa musi vha tshi khou lingedza ṱuwa kha ḽino nga ḽa 12 Shundunthule 2022 vha tshi khou shumisa dzina ḽa, ‘Lebogang Ndlovu’.

src_text: Ihlelweli, elitlanywe yiKomidi eHlanganyelwe miNyango yaboNgqongqotjhe (i-IMC) eqalene nezeeNdlela nokuThutha ngokusebenzisana nababelani bezeendlela nezokuthutha, likhuthaza ukuthotjelwa kwemithetho yeencwadi zokukhamba (ama-visa) ikhuthaze nokuthotjelwa kwemithetho yezemisebenzi nezabasebenzi, hlangana nokhunye.
tgt_text: Muhasho wa zwa Muno (DHA) kha ḓi tou bva humisela murahu shangoni ḽawe mutambi wa matambwa bvaho kha ḽa Lithuania, Mufumakadzi Vho Ieva Andrejevaite vhe vha lingedza shumisa milayo nga nḓila ine ya si vhe yone ya ndangulo ya zwa vhufhalali ya shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe musi vha tshi luka mafhungo mazwifhi uri vha khou ṱoḓa ita khumbelo ya ṋewa vhudzumbamo nga mulandu wa “nndwa ine ya khou bvela phanḓa ngei kha ḽa Ukraine”.
Khabinethe yo fhululedza mushumo une wa khou itwa nga vha Yunithi ya lwa na Zwiito zwa Vhuaḓa ya DHA.

src_text: I-IMC yasungulelwa ukulungisa ukuvalwa kweendlela okuthuweleleko nokutjhagala kwabatjhayeli bamathraga beSewula Afrika abanghonghoyilako.
tgt_text: Yo khoḓa na ṱuṱuwedza vhadzulapo zwavho vha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe uri vha bvele phanḓa na vhiga zwiito zwenezwo zwa vhugevhenga.

src_text: Imitjhagalo nokuvalwa kweendlela kuliya ukukhambeka kweendlela, kwethusa abasisi bangaphandle, kanti ngaphezu kwakho koke, kuthela umnotho namarherho aqakathekileko wokukhambisa ipahla ngamacaphazela amambi, njengoba amarherho lawa asebenzisa leziindlela lapho kukhamba khona amathraga ekubangwa umsebenzi wawo nje.
tgt_text: Zwiito zwi siho mulayoni zwa vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe vhane vha rengisa ṱhalusavhuṋe dzavho zwi na masiandaitwa vhavhaho vhukuma kha tsireledzo ya shango na tshiimo tshaḽo tsha zwa ikonomi na matshilisano.

Muvhuso ḓo bvela phanḓa na lwa nga nḓila yo fhelelaho na muthu muṅwe na muṅwe ane ḓidzhenisa kha zwiito zwi siho mulayoni zwine zwa fhedza zwi tshi nyadzisa milayo yashu ya zwa vhupfuluwi, hu si na nyofho kana dzhia sia.

src_text: Ukutlhayela Kwamanzi Kumasipaladi Wedorobha i-Nelson Mandela Bay (i-NMB)          .
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza wanwa mulandu na gwevhiwa ha zwenezwino ha mudededzi wa fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Durban Mufumakadzi Vho Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37), vhe vha gwevhiwa miṅwaha miraru vhe nga fhasi ha vhulavhelesi ha vhululamisi na miṅwaha miṋa vho valelwa dzhele, tshigwevho itshi tshoṱhe tshi tshi ḓo fhahewa lwa miṅwaha miraru, ngei Khothe ya Dzingu ya Umlazi kha ḽa KwaZulu-Natal nga mulandu wa pfuka Mulayo wa Khetho dza Masipala wa Muvhuso Wapo, wa ṅwaha wa 2000 (Mulayo 27 wa 2000).

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokozela igadango elithethwe mNyango wezaManzi nokuHlwengisa (i-DWS) kuMasipaladi we-NMB ePumalanga Kapa ukuphepha iLanga lokuPhela kweziYela (elaziwa nge-Day Zero) njengoba lesisifunda sitlhayelelwa mamanzi kangaka nje solo kwangomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Sa mudededzi kha tshikolo tshe tsha vha tshi khou shumiswa sa tshiṱitshi tsha vhukhethelo nga tshifhinga tsha Khetho dza Masipala nga ṅwedzi wa Tshimedzi 2021, Mufumakadzi Vho Gabuza vho ḓivhona mulandu wa vhufhura ha khetha lwa tshivhalo tshi linganaho 24 kha Khetho dza Masipala ngeno huṅwe khetha ha tshiṅwe tshivhalo tshi linganaho 12 vho hu ita kha Khetho dza Wadi.

src_text: I-DWS isebenzisana nesifunda ukuphumelelisa amagadango wesikhatjhana, newesikhathi esilingeneko kunye newesikhathi eside wokuthundubaza ubukhali besomiso kilesisiphande.
tgt_text: Uhu wanwa mulandu na gwevhiwa hu nyadzisa vhuḓikumedzeli ha Khomishini ya zwa Khetho ya Afrika Tshipembe ha dzhenelela nga tshifhinga khathihi na shumisa maitele ndangulo ya masiandaitwa.

Hezwi zwi dovha hafhu zwa vha khwaṱhisedzo khulwane ya sisiṱeme dza khetho, dzine bva zwenezwo dzo no mbo ḓi khwaṱhisedzwa nga ḓivhadzwa ha Tshishumiswa zwa Ndangulo ya Vhakhethi tshine tsha kona thivhela zwa voutha luvhili.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuye yakhwezelela izakhamuzi ze-NMB ukuthi zibabalele amanzi ngokuthobela imibandela yesilinganiso sokusetjenziswa kwamanzi esibekwe ngumasipaladi wendawo.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza uri khetho ndi dzone thikho ya dimokirasi yashu nahone dzi tea tsireledzwa nga nungo dzoṱhe.

src_text: Kubekwe isilinganiso esithi ukusetjenziswa kwamanzi kufanele siphungulwe ngama-50 weengidi zamalitha ngelanga, ukusuka ema-280 weengidi zamalitha ngelanga njenganje, ukuyokufika ema-230 weengidi zamalitha ngelanga.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa Dziminisṱa wa vhu 12 (MC12) wa Dzangano ḽa Mbambadzo ḽa Ḽifhasi (WTO).

Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mvelelo dza WTO MC12 ye ya farelwa fhaḽa Geneva, kha ḽa Switzerland bva nga ḽa 12 swika ḽa 17 Fulwi 2022, nga maanḓa tsheo ya uri mashango teaho nga fhelisa ṱhanziela dza khaelo ya Covid-19 swika nga ṅwaha.

src_text: Ubulelesi Nobukhohlakali.
tgt_text: Tsheo nga ha uri hone izwi zwi nga vha zwo tea pfukiselwa kha dzilafho na vhuṱhaṱhuvhi ha COVID-19 yo humiselwa murahu lwa tshifhinga tsha miṅwedzi ya rathi.

src_text: IKhabinethi izithokozele iindaba zokubotjhwa kwesiphathimandla somNyango wezaNgekhaya esisebenzela e-ofisini le-Benoni, esibotjhelwe ukwenzela isakhamuzi se-Bangladesh ipaspoti yomgunyathi, mhlapha.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo vha ḽone ḽe ḽa ranga phanḓa khuwelelo ya uri vha WTO vha fhelise zwa pfanelo dza ndaka dza vhubveledzi dzine dza vha hone kha khaelo dza COVID-19 lune hezwi zwa ḓo ita uri hu vhe na swikela khaelo nga nḓila linganaho khathihi na ita uri mashango re na vhukoni ha bveledza khaelo dzenedzi ite ngauralo.

src_text: Isiphathimandleso, uMma uSibongile Simelane, uvulelwe ngebheyili yee-R5000 eKhotho kaMarhistrada we-Benoni ngeLesibili womhla wama-21 kuMgwengweni wee-.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wo dovha hafhu wa ḓikumedzela kha zwa maitele re khagala nahone katelaho vhoṱhe itela shandukisa mishumo yawo yoṱhe khathihi na tendelana kha nyanḓano dza zwa mbambadzelano hu tshi itelwa tandulula thaidzo dzi fanaho na dza mutakalo ta phimo ya sabusidi ya zwa vhureakhovhe imiswa ha mbambadzo ya zwa makwevho inthanethe na nḓisedzo ya zwiḽiwa  Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: Isakhamuzi se-Bangladesh esenzelwe ipaspoti yomgunyathi, uNom.
tgt_text: Mvelaphanḓa kha Mbekanyamushumo ya Mupfuluwo wa ya kha Khasho ya Didzhithala (BDM).

src_text: Fahim Kazi, ubotjhwe alinga ukubaleka ekhethwapha ngomhla we-12 kuMrhayili wee-2022, ngegama lika-‘Lebogang Ndlovu.’         .
tgt_text: Khabinethe kha ḓi tou bva wana maswamaswa nga ha Mbekanyamushumo ya BDM nahone yo dzhiela nṱha mvelaphanḓa yo no itwaho kha dzheniswa ha dzi- set-top box sa tshipiḓa tsha mupfuluwo wa bva kha anaḽogo ya kha khasho ya didzhithala.

src_text: UmNyango wezaNgekhaya (i-DHA), mhlapha usandukududula umlingisi omsikazi we-Lithuania uMma u-Ieva Andrejevaite, wambuyisela ekhabo, nabekalinga ukukhwabanisela ihlelo leSewula Afrika lokubhadwa ngekhwapha kwabantu abaphalalele ekhethwapha, ngokuleya amala nakalinga ukwenza isibawo sokubhaciswa asithi batjho ubaleke “ipi elwa e-Ukraine.”                 .
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya khwaṱhisedza nḓila ine izwi zwa khunyeledzwa ha BDM zwa vha zwa tshihaḓu ngayo itela vhofholola sipekithiramu tshine tsha ṱoḓea kha zwa vhudavhizani ha ṱhingokhwalwa khathihi na kha miṅwe mishumo elanaho na zwa thekhinoḽodzhi dza mafhungo na vhudavhidzani..  Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Vhudavhidzani na Thekhinoḽodzhi dza Didzhithala Vho Khumbudzo Ntshavheni vha ḓo vha na muṱangano na vhoramafhungo matshelo nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 24 Fulwana itela ṋetshedza zwidodombedzwa nga vhuḓalo.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyawubuka umsebenzi owenziwa liPhiko le-DHA eliLwa nobuKhohlakali.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa Ṅwaha nga Ṅwaha wa nga ha Tshiimo tsha Pfanelo dza Vhana wa Lushaka.

src_text: Ithokoza beyikhuthaza amaSewula Afrika ukuthi aragele phambili ngokuhlaba umkhosi ngezenzo zobulelesi ezinjengalezi.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muvhigo wa Ṅwaha nga Ṅwaha wa nga ha Tshiimo tsha Pfanelo dza Vhana wa Lushaka wa vhuvhili uri anḓadzwe.

src_text: Ukwephula kwamaSewula Afrika umthetho ngokuthengisa abomazisi bawo kunemiphumela emimbi kumbi ekuphepheni nebujameni behlalakuhle yomnotho yelizwe lekhethu.
tgt_text: Muvhigo ṋetshedza maswamaswa nga ha thoma shumiswa ha Puḽane ya Mashumele ya Lushaka ya Vhana kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha ya bva 2019 swika.

src_text: Urhulumende uzakusolo abathathela amagadango abukhali nanganasirhawu, ngaphandle kwevalo, abantu abanesandla ezenzweni eziphambana nomthetho ezinyefisa imithetho elawula ukungena kwamaphandle lapha ekhethu.
tgt_text: Muvhigo bvisela khagala mvelaphanḓa yo rekhodiwaho kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha ya bva 2020 swika dovha hafhu wa bvisela khagala masia ane kha ḓi vha na khaedu, ane ha katelwa tsireledzo ya vhana khathihi na tshayandingano ine ya khou endelela vhukati ha vhashai na vhapfumi kha vhenevha vhana.

Muvhigo dovha hafhu wa sumbedzisa nga ha uri dwadze ḽa COVID-19 ḽo kwama hani vhana nga tshenetsho tshifhinga..  Maga u dzhenelela ane khou thoma shumiswa nga muvhuso livhiswa kha bveledza pfanelo dza vhana sa zwe dza sumbedziswa zwone kha Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele nokulahlwa ngecala abe ethweswe nesigwebo utitjhere weThekwini uMma uNomusa Precious Gabuza (oneminyaka ema-37) – ogwetjwe iminyaka emithathu yokusebenzela umphakathi, namine yokudosa ejele, elengiswe iminyaka emithathu eKhotho yesiPhande e-Umlazi KwaZulu-Natala – ngokwephula umThetho wezeKhetho laboRhulumende beeNdawo zemaKhaya womNyaka wee-2000 (umThetho Nomboro 27 wee-2000).
tgt_text: Maga aya dovha tikedza vhuḓifhinduleli ha shango kha Thendelano dza nga ha Pfanelo dza Ṅwana dza Dzangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UNCRC) khathihi na Thendelanomviswa ya Afrika ya nga ha Pfanelo na Mutakalo wa Ṅwana (ACRWC).

src_text: UGabuza, ongutitjhere wesikolo esasisetjenziswa njengesiteyitjhi sokuvowuda ngeKhetho laboMasipala ngoSewula wee-2021, ulivumile icala lokuvowuda ngomgunyathi amahlandla ama-24 ekhethweneli; amahlandla ali-12 eKhethweni likaMasipala wabuye wavowuda amahlandla ali-12 eKhethwni lamaWadi.
tgt_text: Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽo saina thendelano idzi dza UNCRC na ACRWC vhuvhili hadzo..  Muvhigo wo dzudzanywa nga murahu ha vha na vhukwamani na mihasho ya muvhuso khathihi na vhunzhi ha vhashumisani vho teaho bva kha vhuimo ha lushaka ya kha ha mavundu.
Muvhigo wo fhelelaho ḓo anḓadzwa kha webusaithi ya Muhasho wa Mveledziso ya Matshilisano ine ya vha: www.dsd.gov.za.

src_text: Ukulahlwa kwakhe licala nokwethweswa kwakhe isigwebo kuphakamisa ukuzibophelela kweKomitjhini yezeKhetho eziJameleko yeSewula Afrika ekuthatheni amagadango wamsinyana wokukhalima izephulamthetho.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wo Ṱanganywaho wa vhuraru swika kha wa vhurathi wa Afrika Tshipembe wa Misi nga Misi wo livhiswaho kha UNCRC.

src_text: Lokhu godu kubuye kube nanga bufakazi bamandla wamahlelo wezekhetho, esele aqiniswa solo kwathoma ukusetjenziswa kwesiSetjenziswa sokuLawula abaVowudi (i-Voter Management Device) esikhandela ukuvowuda kabili namkha ngokubuyelela kanengi.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Muvhigo wa Misi nga misi wa vhuraru swika kha wa vhurathi kha vha UNCRC.

Muvhigo uyu khou vha hone nga murahu ha Muvhigo wa Misi nga misi wa vhuvhili we wa ṋetshedzwa kha vha UNCRC nga ṅwaha wa..  Muvhigo wo dzudzanywa ya nga Tshiteṅwa tsha vhu 44 tsha UNCRC nahone katela mawanwa na themendelo dze dza itwa bva kha muvhigo wa fhedzisela.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyavuma ukuthi amakhetho ayisika yehlelo lethu lentando yenengi, begodu kufuze avikelwe ngazo zoke iindlela.
tgt_text: Vha UNCRC vho rumela mawanwa na themendelo dzavho vha tshi itela shango nga ṅwaha wa..  Nzudzanyo ya muvhigo uyu yo itwa nga murahu ha vhukwamani na mihasho yoṱhe khathihi na vhashumisani vho teaho mona na shango.
Muvhigo wo fhelelaho ḓo anḓadzwa musi wo no ranga ṋetshedzwa kha vha UNCRC.

src_text: IKhonfrensi YaboNgqongqotjhe Yehlandla le-12 (MC12) YeHlangano YezeRhwebo YePhasi (i-WTO) .
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa lushaka nga ha thoma shumiswa ha Adzhena Ntswa ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni.

src_text: IKhabinethi iwuthokozele umphumela we-WTO MC12 ebeyibanjelwe e-Geneva, e-Switzerland, ukusukela ngomhla we-12 ukuyokufika kumhla we-17 kuMgwengweni wee-2022, ithokozele khulukhulu isiqunto sokuthi amazwe afaneleko angawacitha amalungelo wobunikazimjovo bemijovo ye-COVID-19 bekube mnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha muvhigo wa thoma wa lushaka wa Afrika Tshipembe wa nga ha thoma shumiswa ha Adzhenda Ntswa ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni kha vha khetheanyo ya Mbekanyamushumo ya zwa Vhudzulo ha Vhathu ya UN (UN-Habitat).

src_text: Siriyadiswe ngeenyanga ezintandathu isiqunto sokuthi lokhu kungadluliselwa na nemahlelweni wokulawula nokuthola ukuthi umuntu uphethwe yi-COVID-19, nemitjhogeni yokwelapha i-COVID-.
tgt_text: UN-Habitat yo ṱanganedza Adzhenda yayo Ntswa ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni kha Muṱangano wayo wa nga ha Dzinnḓu na Mveledziso ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni ha Tshifhinga Tshilapfu nga ṅwedzi wa Tshimedzi.
Mashango ane vha miraḓo vha khou lavhelelwa ṋetshedza mivhigo ya nga ha mvelaphanḓa nga one aṋe nga tou funa hao.

src_text: ISewula Afrika soke isikhathesi beyidosa phambili esibaweni sokuthi i-WTO ayisuse amalungelo wobunikazingqondo akhambisana nemijovo ye-COVID-19 okuzakwenza ukuthi boke abantu bakghone ukuthola umjovo ngokufanako nangokulinganako, kube kwenze nokuthi amazwe akghona ukukhiqiza imijovo enze njalo.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo tikedza zwa ṱanganedzwa ha Adzhenda Ntswa ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni ḽa dovha hafhu nga tshenetsho tshifhinga ḽa thoma i shumisa nga kha mbekanyamushumo ya Muhanga wa Mveledziso ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni wo Ṱanganelaho (IUDF) wa shango ḽashu.

Heyi mbekanyamushumo ya IUDF ndi ine yo livhiswa kha tshimbidza mveledziso ya vhudzulo ha vhupo ha dziḓoroboni vhu katelaho vhoṱhe ha tshifhinga tshilapfu nahone vhune ha dzulea..  Uyu muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa wo dzudzanywa nga murahu ha musi ho ranga vha na vhukwamani kha masia muvhuso wa lushaka, wa mavundu na muvhuso wapo hu tshi katelwa na dziNGO dzo teaho.

src_text: Ikhonfrensi le ibuye yazibophelela nehlelweni elivulekileko neliqalelela umuntu woke lokuhlela ngobutjha yoke imisebenzi yayo, yabe yavumela nebuthelelo leemvumelwano zokurhwebelana emakorweni anjengezepilo, nekubekweni kweenlinganiso eemalini eziphungula iindleko ekuthiyweni kweenhlambi, ukujanyiswa kwesikhatjhana kokurhweba ngethungelelwano le-inthanethi kunye nelokutholakala kokudla   Iinqunto ZeKhabinethi   .
tgt_text: Puḽane ya Mveledziso ya Vhaswa yo Ṱanganelaho (IYDS).

src_text: Indima Ngokudlulela Ehlelweni Lokurhatjha Budijithali (i-BDM) .
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa thoma shumiswa ha IYDS.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithole umbiko ngendima esele yenziwe ngeHlelo le-BDM, yayibona indima esele yenziwe ngokufakelwa kwama-Set-Top Box njengengcenye yokufuduka ehlelweni lokurhatjha nge-analogu kuyiwe ehlelweni lokurhatjha budijithali.
tgt_text: Heyi ndi yone puḽane yo itaho uri hu vhe na Mbekanyamaitele ya Vhaswa ya Lushaka ya miṅwaha ya vhukati ha 2020 swika bvisela khagala mishumo, thandela ya mbekanyamushumo dzine dza tea itwa nga vhoṱhe vha kwameaho nga fhambana havho bva kha madzangano vhaswa dovha hafhu ya sedza kha zwa fhungudza dovhololwa hu sa fheli ha maga u dzhenelela ha muvhuso khathihi na tsivhudza nga ha nḓila ine tshitshvha na sekhithara dza phuraivethe vha nga tikedza ngayo vhaswa kha uri vha kone swikela zwikhala zwine zwa vha hone.
Nzudzanyo puḽane iyi ndi ine ya katela mihumbulo yo fhambanaho ine ya bva kha sekhithara dza tshitshavha dzo fhambanaho.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuyelele yagandelela ukurhabeka kokuqedelelwa kwe-BDM kobanyana kuzokuvuleka ikundla yokurhatjha efunekako ebanzi, ekhambisekako nekhambisa amaza wokurhatjha ngebelo elikhulu, kunye nethekhnoloji yelwazi nezokuthintana.
tgt_text: Mvetamveto ya Nḓivhadzamulayotibe wa nga ha Ndondolo ya mupo na Kushumisele kwa Tshifhinga Tshilapfu kwa Zwithu zwi Tshilaho nga Fhambana hazwo zwa fhano Afrika Tshipembe.

Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mvetamveto ya Nḓivhadzamulayotibe wa nga ha Ndondolo ya mupo na Kushumisele kwa Tshifhinga Tshilapfu kwa Zwithu zwi Tshilaho nga Fhambana hazwo zwa fhano Afrika Tshipembe hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi.

src_text: UNgqongqotjhe wezokuThintana nezeTheknoloji yeDijithali u-Khumbudzo Ntshavheni uzokubamba umhlangano weendaba kusasa (ngeLesihlanu, 24 kuMgwengweni) lapho azakunaba khona ngemininingwana.
tgt_text: Zwithu zwi tshilaho zwa fhano Afrika Tshipembe zwi ṋetshedza mutheo wa ndeme wa nyaluwo na mveledziso ya ikonomi nahone ndi zwa ndeme kha matshilo vhathu..   Heyi Nḓivhadzamulayotibe bveledza themendelo dzo itwaho nga Phanele ya Vhaḓivhi vha Maimo Nṱha ye ya tholwa nga ṅwaha wa 2019 itela sengulusa mbekanyamaitele dzashu dzine dza vha hone zwazwino, milayo na maitele nga ha mafhungo elanaho na tshaka dza zwithu zwi tshilaho nga fhambana hazwo..   Muvhigo wo themendela uri hu bveledzwe mbekanyamaitelenyangaredzi ya nga ha ndondolo ya mupo na kushumisele kwa tshifhinga tshilapfu kwa zwithu zwi tshilaho zwa ḽino shango.
Mbekanyamaitele ḓo thoma shumiswa kha masia oṱhe muvhuso.

src_text: Umbiko WaQobemnyaka NgobuJamo BamaLungelo WabaNtwana EliZweniloke.
tgt_text: Ndondolo ya mupo ndi ya ndeme kha fulo ḽa shango ḽa ita hu vhe na nyaluwo ya ikonomi khathihi na sikwa ha mishumo nga ṱavhanya.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukumenyezelwa komBiko waQobemnyaka wobuJamo bamaLungelo wabaNtwana ongowehlandla lesibili.
tgt_text: Puḽane dza nga ha Ṋama ya Phukha.

src_text: Umbiko lo uphethe zamva nje ngokuphunyeleliswa kweHlelo lemiSebenzi eyenzelwa abaNtwana esikhathini see-2019-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza anḓadzwa ha mvetamveto ya Puḽane dza nga ha Ṋama ya Phukha hu tshi itelwa vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi.
Puḽane idzi ndi dze dza livhiswa kha ṱoḓa lingedza shandukisa na ita uri nḓowetshumo ya ṋama ya phukha vhe yo dzudzanyeaho.

src_text: Umbiko lo uphakamisa ipumelelo eyenzeke ngesikhathi see-2020-.
tgt_text: Dzi dovha hafhu dza lingedza shela mulenzhe kha mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa nga nḓila ine ya nga vha ya tshifhinga tshilapfu.

src_text: Ubuya godu uveza neendawo ezisafuna itjhejo, ekubalwa hlangana nazo nokuphepha kwabantwana kunye nokutjhiyana ngendima okusolo kuthuwelele kuya phambili hlangana kwabanothileko nabanganalitho.
tgt_text: Nḓowetshumo ya ṋama ya phukha kanzhi ndi nḓowetshumo ine yo ngo dzudzanyea nahone shuma nga nḓila ya zwipiḓapiḓa.

src_text: Umbiko lo godu uveza nokuthi isifo esikhe sarhagala kokapha, i-COVID-19, sibacaphazele njani abantwana ngalesisikhathi.
tgt_text: Puḽane iyi ine ya khou dzinginywa ṋetshedza nḓila dza uri thome shumiswa dzine dza vha dzone dzine dza ḓo ita uri vhe yo dzudzanyeaho khathihi na khwaṱhisa sekhithara sa yone muṋetshedzi wa mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa khathihi na vha sekhithara ya nyaluwo ya ikonomi ine ya nga thusa kha sika zwikhala zwa mishumo  Milayotibe.
Mulayotibe wa Khwiṋiso nga angaredza ya Mafhungo Sialala wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Amagadango athathwa ngurhulumende anqophe ukuphumelelisa amalungelo wabantwana, njengoba kusitjho umThethosisekelo weRiphabhligi yeSewula Afrika we-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiṋiso nga angaredza wa Mafhungo Sialala wa ṅwaha wa 2022 kha Phalamennde itela uri hu haseledzwe nga hawo.

src_text: Asekela neembopho zelizwe lekhethu eemVumelwaneni ze-UN ngamaLungelo wabaNtwana (i-UNCRC) nomTlolo we-Afrika ngamaLungelo neHlalakuhle yomNtwana (i-ACRWC).
tgt_text: Khwiṋiso idzi dzo livhiswa kha shandukisa Mulayo wa zwa Sialala na Vhurangaphanḓa ha MaKhoi-San, wa ṅwaha wa 2019 (Mulayo wa vhu3 wa 2019), we wa thoma shuma bva nga ḽa 1 Lambamai.

src_text: ISewula Afrika yayitlikitlela yomibili imitlolo yeemvumelwano i-UNCRC ne-ACRWC.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa khwiṋiso ya Tsireledzo ya Dimokirasi kha Zwiito zwa Vhutherorisi na zwiṅwe zwi Elanaho Nazwo wa.

Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiṋiso ya Tsireledzo ya Dimokirasi kha Zwiito zwa Vhutherorisi na zwiṅwe zwi Elanaho Nazwo wa ṅwaha wa 2022 kha Phalamenndeni itela uri hu haseledzwe nga hawo.

src_text: Umbiko lo uhlanganiswe ngokubonisana neminyango karhulumende nabanye ababelani abafaneleko abambadlwana belizweloke neemfundeni ngeemfunda.
tgt_text: Musi wo no ṱanganedzwa, Mulayotibe ḓo shandukisa Mulayo wa Tsireledzo ya Dimokirasi ya Ndayotewa Kha Vhuthororisi na Zwi elanao nadzo, 2002 (Mulayo wa vhu 22 wa 2004).

src_text: Umbiko opheleleko uzakumenyezelwa kubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezokuThuthukiswa komPhakathi, ku-www.dsd.gov.za.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu wo fhira nga fhasi ha maitele vhukwamani na tshitshavha angalalaho nga murahu ha musi wo ṱanganedzwa nga khabinethe nga ḽa 1 Lambamai.
Tshanduko idzi ndi dzine dza khou ḓo lingedza ita uri hu vhe na elana vhukati ha zwishumiswa zwa fhano hayani zwa lwa na zwiito zwa vhutherorisi na maga ḽifhasi a vhetshelwa lwa na zwiito zwenezwo.

src_text: Umbiko WeSewula Afrika Ohlanganisiweko Wesithathu Ukuyokufika Kowesithandathu  Onande Uthunyelwa I-UNCRC              .
tgt_text: Tshanduko idzi dzo dovha hafhu dza sedza kha zwiteṅwa zwe zwa wanala zwi sa elani na ndayotewa nga Khothe ya Ndayotewa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa komBiko wesithathu ukuyokufika kowesithandathu onande wethulelwa i-UNCRC.
tgt_text: Sa ḽiṅwe ḽa mashango sainaho thendelano dza Khoro ya Tsireledzo ya UN, Afrika Tshipembe ḽi kombetshedzea shumisa milayo ya mashangoḓavha ine ya lingedza khwaṱhisa maga u fhelisa vhutherorisi ha ḽifhasi nga angaredza   Vhuṱambo vhu ḓaho.

src_text: Lombiko ulandela wesibili umBiko oNande uthunyelwa i-UNCRC, owagcina ukwethulwa ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa vhu14 wa mashango Brazili, Russia, India, China na Afrika Tshipembe (BRICS).

Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha ḓo ranga phanḓa shela mulenzhe ha Afrika Tshipembe kha Muṱangano wa Vharaphanḓa vha mashango BRICS wa vhu14 une wa ḓo farwa nga vidio ye ya tshimbidzwa nga vha muvhuso wa vhathu wa Riphabuḽiki ya China bva nga Ḽavhuṋa, ḽa 23 swika nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 24 Fulwi.

src_text: Umbiko lo uhlanganiswe ngokweNdinyana 44 ye-UNCRC, begodu umumethe nokwatjhejwako nokwaphakanyiswako embikweni wokugcina.
I-UNCRC ithumele ekutjhejileko nekuphakamisileko ngelizwe leSewula Afrika ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Zwa vha hashu muraḓo wa BRICS zwi khou bvela phanḓa na vhuedza shango ḽashu.
Ṅwaha wo fhelaho 17% ya thundu dzi vhambadzelwaho nnḓa dza Afrika Tshipembe dzo livhiswa kha mashango BRICS, ngeno 29% ya zwiṱunḓwa zwashu nga angaredza zwo vha zwi tshi bva kha mashango aya.

src_text: Umbiko lo uhlanganiswe ngokubonisana nayo yoke iminyango nababelani abafaneleko elizweni lokeli.
tgt_text: Ndeme ya mbambadzo iyi khou bvela phanḓa na engedzea lwe thanganyelo ya mbambadzo yoṱhe ya ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na maṅwe mashango BRICS ya swika henefha kha R702 biḽioni nga ṅwaha wa 2021, zwine zwa vha engedzea bva kha R487 biḽioni ya ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Umbiko lo uzakumenyezelwa ungethulwa ku-UNCRC.

tgt_text: Tshumisano vhukati ha mashango ane vha miraḓo ya BRICS kha masia fhambanaho fana na mutakalo na khathihi na mbambadzo yo engedzeaho yo ita uri hu vhe na nyaluwo kha nḓowetshumo yashu yapo ya dovha ya ita uri hu vhe na vhuelwa kha miraḓo yoṱhe ya BRICS.

src_text: Umbiko Welizwe Ngokuphunyeleliswa Kwe-Ajenda Etja Yemadrobheni   .
tgt_text: Vhubindudzi hashu kha thandela dza mveledziso ya themamveledziso khathihi na nungo dzashu dza fhungudza vhukonḓi ha musi hu tshi itwa zwa mabindu ndi zwithu zwo livhiswaho kha lingedza engedza mbambadzelannḓa ya kha vhashumisani na riṋe vha BRICS.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa eHlelweni le-UN lokuHlaliswa kwabaNtu (i-UN-Habitat) kombiko wokuthoma weSewula Afrika ngokuphunyeleliswa kwe-Ajenda eTja yemaDrobheni.
tgt_text: Tshikolo tsha Ndangulo ya zwa Ikonomi tsha Vhuriha.

src_text: I-UN Habitat yavumelana ngokusebenzisa i-Ajenda eTja yemaDrobheni eKhonfrensini yokwAkhiwa kweziNdlu nokuThuthukiswa kweeNdawo ezimaDrobha okubambelelako ngoSewula wee-.
tgt_text: Tshikolo tsha zwa Mavhusele tsha Lushaka (NSG) tshi ḓo vha na vhuṱambo ha vhuraru ha Mbekanyamushumo ya Tshikolo tsha Ndangulo ya zwa Ikonomi hu tshi itela Vharangaphanḓa vha zwa Polotiki ngei Johannesburg bva nga ḽa 27 Fulwi swika nga ḽa 1 Fulwana.

src_text: Kwavunyelanwa ngokuthi amazwe amalunga azakuthumela imibiko yayo yendima ngokuzithandela.
tgt_text: Vhuṱambo uho vhu ḓo dzhenelwa nga Dziminisṱa bva kha mashango ngaho Côte d'Ivoire, South Sudan na Afrika Tshipembe; hu tshi katelwa na vhalangivhahulu vha bvaho ngei Lesotho, Zambia, Riphabuḽiki ya Congo (DRC), Tanzania na Ghana.

Vhoṋeḓorobo vha Afrika Tshipembe, khathihi na miraḓo ya komiti dza vhoṋeḓorobo na khorotshitumbe dza hone, na vhone vha ḓo dzhenela vhuṱambo uvhu..  Vharangaphanḓa vha zwa politiki bva kha mashango fhambanaho na vhone vha khou lavhelelwa uri vha ḓo kovhana mihumbulo na ngudo dzi bvaho kha nyimele dzo fhambanaho dze vha ṱangana nadzo kha mishumo yavho ya ḓuvha na ḓuvha.

src_text: ISewula Afrika yakusekela ukwamukelwa kwe-Ajenda eTja yemaDrobheni, yalandelisa ngokuyiphumelelisa ngomTlamo oLungelelweko wokuThuthukiswa kweeNdawo zemaDrobheni (i-IUDF).
tgt_text: NSG yo dzudzanya mbekanyamushumo ya ṅwaha hu tshi itelwa miraḓo ya khorotshitumbe nga ṅwaha wa 2020, sa tshipiḓa tsha thikhedzo yayo kha zwa vhuḓikumedzeli ha muvhuso ha fhaṱa shango ḽine ḽa khou shumaho zwavhuḓi dovha hafhu ya lingedza shomedza miraḓo ya khorotshitumbe kha masia mararu muvhuso nga vhurangaphanḓa ho khwaṱhaho na vhukoni ha zwa vhulavhelesi itela uri vha kone ṱola hafhu khaedu dza zwa mavhusele dzine dza khakhisa maitele zwa katelwa ha vhathu vhoṱhe khathihi na nyaluwo ya ikonomi ine ya vha ya tshifhinga tshilapfu.

src_text: I-IUDF inqophe ukwakha nokuthuthukisa iindawo zemadrobheni eziqalelela umuntu woke, ezibambelelako nezihlalekako.
tgt_text: Ḓuvha ḽa Dzitshaka ḽa Vho Nelson Mandela.

Ḓuvha ḽa Dzitshaka ḽa Vho Nelson Mandela ḽa houno ṅwaha ḽine ḽa ḓo vha nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 18 Fulwana 2022 ḽi ḓo pembelelwa nga fhasi ha thero ya ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe ine ya ri: “Kha vha ite zwine vha nga kona nga zwine vha vha nazwo, henefho hune vha vha hone” tou vha khuwelelo re khagala ya uri vhathu vha tikedze khathihi na shela mulenzhe kha fulo iḽi nga ṋetshedza maga u dzhenelela tshifhinga tshilapfu ane ḓo fhedza nga vha na zwivhuya zwi sa gumi.

src_text: Umbiko wendima lo uhlanganiswe ngokubonisana norhulumende welizwe loke, naborhulumende beemfunda kunye nabeendawo, nama-NGO afaneleko.
tgt_text: Maṅwe maga u dzhenelela ane nga vha tshifhinga tshilapfu ndi Mbekanyamushumo ya Nyambedzano dza Vhaswa ya Vho Nelson Mandela na Vhurangaphanḓa vhu re na Mikhwa ine yo sedzesa kha zwiteṅwa zwa ndeme zwi kwamaho vhaswa kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na mona na ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe.
Khalaṅwaha ya Muthelo.

src_text: IHlelo EliLungelelweko LokuThuthukisa ILutjha (i-IYDS)  .
tgt_text: Khalaṅwaha ya rumela muthelo ya ṅwaha wa 2022 ḓo vula bva nga ḽa 1 Fulwana swika 24 Tshimedzi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukuphunyeleliswa kwe-IYDS.
tgt_text: Vhatheli vha khou ṱuṱuwedzwa rumela maṅwalo avho zwa mithelo kha eFiling (www.sarsefiling.co.za) kana kha MobiApp ya vha Tshumelo dza Mbuelo dza Afrika Tshipembe (SARS..   Uno ṅwaha SARS ḓo bvela phanḓa na tsenguluso dza zwa muthelo dzine dza tou dzula dzo itwa nga khomphiyutha dza mutheli muṅwe na muṅwe, hedzi ndi fomo dza muthelo wa mbuelo dzine dza dzula dzo ḓadziwa itela leludza maitele u rumela fomo dza muthelo.

src_text: IHlelweli lisekela beliqinisa umThethokambiso weLutjha wee-2020-.
tgt_text: Nga ṅwaha wa 2021 vhatheli vha fhiraho miḽioni tharu vho swika he vha senguluswa nga nḓila yeneyi ine fomo dzavho dza dzula dzo ḓadzwa nga khomphiyutha.

src_text: Lendlala amagadango, amaphrojekthi namahlelo ekufanele enziwe babelani abahlukahlukileko bemibuthano yelutjha.
tgt_text: Zwa rumela fomo dza muthelo wa mbuelo nga tshifhinga nahone dzo dzudzanyea nga nḓila yo teaho zwi tou ita fhedzi uri mutheli wanale tshi khou tevhedza milayo yo teaho ya zwa muthelo, zwi dovha hafhu zwa thusa muvhuso kha ṋetshedza tshumelo kha vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe vhane vha dzi ṱoḓesa  Milaedza fhululedzaKhabinethe khou rumela milaedza ya fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha: Muhaṱuli Vho Owen Lloyd Rogers nga murahu ha tholwa havho sa Muhaṱuli wa Khothe ya Ndayotewa ya Afrika Tshipembe.Khabinethe khathihi na Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa khou rumela mulaedza wa tamela Phresidennde wa kale Vho Thabo Mbeki Ḓuvha Ḽavhuḓi ḽa Mabebo musi vha tshi khou fara miṅwaha ya 80, ḽe vha ḽi pembelela nga ḽa 18 Fulwana.

Vho Mbeki vho vha na bono ḽa vhumatshelo havhuḓi nahone ha mvelaphanḓa kha vhathu vhoṱhe vha Afrika Tshipembe  tholwaU tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa nga murahu ha khwaṱhisedzwa ha ndalukano na ṱanzwa madzina ho teaho.

src_text: Liqalene godu nanokuphungula ukuzibuyelela kwamagadango wokusiza athathwa ngurhulumende, belikhanyise nendlela yokuthi umphakathi nekoro yangeqadi ungabasekela njani abantu abatjha ukuthi bathole amathuba.
tgt_text: Vhalangi vhane vha si vhe miraḓo ya khorotshitumbe vha Bodo ya Maanḓalanga Ndangulo ya zwa Vhufhufhi ha Muyani ya AfrikaTshipembe:Vho Ernest Khosa;Mufumakadzi Vho Bulelwa Koyana;Vho Surendra Sooklal; naMufumakadzi Vho Rejoice Edith Phewa..  Miraḓo ya Ofisi ya bula Zwikolodo zwa DzinnḓuMufumakadzi Vho Kenosi Pearl Louisa Selane (Mudzulatshidulo);Mufumakadzi Vho Catharina Maria Van der Sandt;Vho Errol Vincent Magerman;Muimeleli Vho Mandla Dludlu;Vho Matsobane Gabriel Mello;Mufumakadzi Vho Palesa Mawasha;Mufumakadzi Vho Penelope Anne Beck-Paxton;Mufumakadzi Vho Sphiwe Dorris Mayinga;Vho Tshifhiwa Victor Mphigalale; andVho Zuko Ncemane.

src_text: Zamvanje Ngesifo Sengogwana I-corona (i-COVID-19)   .
tgt_text: Maswa nga ha Dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19).

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuke boke abantu eSewula Afrika abakhethe ukuhlaba nokuthobela yoke imilayelo ye-COVID-19, okubangele ukuthi ilizwe lekhethu libalekele ukukhutjhukelwa linani labantu abangenwa sisifesi nasehla kwehlandla lesihlanu.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo fhululedza vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha Afrika Tshipembe vhe vha nanga haelwa khathihi na tevhedza milayo yoṱhe ya nga ha dwadze ḽa COVID-19 nga nḓila ye zwa fhedza zwi tshi khou ita uri shango ḽi kone fhelisa zwa engedzea ha tshivhalo tsha zwiwo zwiswa zwa kavhiwa nga tshifhinga tsha luṱa lwa vhuṱanu lwa dwadze iḽi.

src_text: Nanyana kunjalo, kodwana nokho akukafaneli sizigedle ngoba i-COVID-19 isesekhona.
tgt_text: Naho zwo ralo ri tei ḓikanganyisa sa izwi dwadze ḽa COVID-19 ḽi tshi kha ḓi tou vha hone tshoṱhe henefha vhukati hashu.

src_text: Nanyana ilizwe lekhethu mhlapha libulele umlayelo okatelela abantu ukuthi bembathe imaski nabahlangana nabantu, kodwana abantu abanezinye izifo abaphila nazo nalabo abagulako bakhuthazwa ukuthi bahlale bawembethe amamaski nabahlangana nabantu.
tgt_text: Naho hu na uri shango ḽi kha ḓi tou bva fhelisa zwa ambara maski nga khombekhombe musi muthu fhethu ha nnyi na nnyi, vhathu vhane vha vha na maṅwe malawadze nga thungo hu tshi katelwa na avho vhane vha khou lwala, vha khou ṱuṱuwedzwa uri vha bvele phanḓa na ambara maski yavho.

src_text: Ukudlula lapho, kusamele bona sisolo sihlala ngokunande sihlamba izandla namkha sizihlikihle ngesihlanzekisi, sihlale siqalangene, besihlale siseendaweni ezibetha ummoya ngokwaneleko.
tgt_text: Ri tea dovha hafhu ra bvela phanḓa na ṱamba kana sanithaiza zwanḓa zwashu sia tshikhala tsho teaho vhukati hashu na vhaṅwe vhathu khathihi na vhona uri fhethu hune ra vha hone hu khou dzhena muya nga nḓila yo teaho.

src_text: Ukuhlaba solo kuyindlela yesayensi ehle khulu yokuzivikela esifeni se-COVID-19, ngalokho-ke neKhabinethi nayo ikhuthaza boke abantu abangakahlabi ukuthi bahlabe khona nje, bangasariyada ukuya phambili, ikhuthaza nabantu abahlabileko ukuthi bayokuhlaba umjovo wokuqinisa amasotja womzimba eendaweni zokuhlaba eziseduze nabo, simahla.
tgt_text: Muhaelo kha ḓi vha wone philelo yo khwaṱhisedzwaho nga vhorasaintsi ya dwadze ḽa COVID-19 nahone Khabinethe khou ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhoṱhe vhane vha athu haelwa uri vha ye vha haelwe hu si na tshilengo khathihi na uri vhathu vho haelwaho vha tea wana dziṅwe khaelo dzavho dza khwaṱhisedza henefho kha vhupo ha muhaelo vhu re tsinisa navho nga mahala.

src_text: Ipokisi Yeemfene.
tgt_text: Maruḓa ṱhoho.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibikelwe ngezamvanje zokurhatjheka kwesifo sePokisi yeemFene elizweni lekhethweli, ngemva kobana sekuqinisekiswe ukuthi sebabili abantu ababanjwe yipokisi yeemfene ekhethwapha.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṋetshedzwa zwidodombedzwa zwiswa nga ha zwine zwa khou bvelela kha phanḓalala ha vhulwadze ha Maruḓa ṱhoho fhano shangoni nga murahu ha khwaṱhisedzwa ha zwenezwino ha tshiwo tsha vhuvhili tsha vhulwadze uvhu fhano shangoni.

src_text: Lababantu esele kuqinisekiswe ukuthi babanjwe yipokisi yeemfene bakhethelwe ngahlanye emakhaya lapho bahlala khona, kanti-ke sekuthonyiwe ukulandelela abantu ekungenzeka ukuthi bakhe baba seduze nalaba abangenwe sisifesi, kobanyana bazokuhlolwa ukuthi abakatheleleki na.
tgt_text: Vhathu vho kavhiwaho nga vhulwadze uvhu vha khou khethelwa thungo na vhaṅwe vhathu henefho mahayani avho nahone hu khou dovha hafhu ha ṱoḓuluswa na avho vhe vha vha na vhukwamani navho itela wanulusa vhaṅwe vhane na vhone vha nga vha vho swika he vha pfukelwa nga vhulwadze uvhu..     Vha Muhasho wa Mutakalo na vha Tshiimiswa tsha Malwadze Phirela tsha Lushaka vha khou vha na tshumisano na vha Dzangano ḽa Mutakalo ḽa Ḽifhasi itela ita ṱhoḓisiso nga ha khombo ya pfukiselwa ha vhulwadze uvhu fhano hayani hu tshi tevhedzwa Milayo ya zwa Mutakalo ya Dzitshaka.

Vairasi ya maruḓa ṱhoho i tou phaḓalala nga tou ralo nahone kanzhi pfukela nga murahu ha musi ho vha na vhukwamani ha tsinisa vhukati ha vhathu vhavhili fana na mamana kuvhatedzana kana farafara zwipiḓa zwa muvhili zwine zwa vha na dzintho dza vhulwadze ha maruḓa ṱhoho.

src_text: UmNyango wezePilo neZiko leziFo eziThelelanako (i-NICD) usebenzisana neHlangano yezePilo yePhasi ukuhlola ubungozi bokuthelelana ngesifesi ekhethwapha, ngokukhambisana nemiThetjhwanalawulo yezePilo yamaZwengamazwe.
tgt_text: Vhathu vhane vha si vhe na tsumbadwadze dza vhulwadze ha maruḓa ṱhoho vha nga si swike hune vha nga phaḓaladza vairasi yeneyo kha vhaṅwe vhathu..     Khabinethe yo eletshedza vhathu vhane vha vha na tsumbadwadze dzi fanaho na mutetemelo, tsumbo dzi fanaho na mukhushwane nga angaredza dzine dza tevhelwa nga munyavhili une wa fana na mapone uri vha ḓivhonadze kha tshiimiswa tsha ndondolamutakalo tshi re tsinisa na ha havho itela uri vha kone ṱolwa khathihi na ilafhwa.

src_text: Ingogwana yepokisi yeemfene ayirhatjheki lula, begodu ivamise ukudlulela komunye umuntu ngemva kokutjhidelana nomunye umuntu, njengalokhuya abantu nabamanganako, nabanganako/nabagonanako nofana nabathinta izitho zomzimba ezineenlonda namkha ezinamanceba wepokisi yeemfene.
tgt_text: Tshiwo tsha makhaulambilu tshe tsha bvelela thaveni ya fhaḽa East London.

src_text: Abantu abanganamatshayo wepokisi yeemfene angeze badlulisela ingogwana yesifesi kabanye abantu.
tgt_text: Tshiwo tsha makhaulambilu shushaho vhukuma tshe tsha bvelela Thaveni ya Enyobeni ine ya vha fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya East London vunḓuni ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha nga Swondaha, ya ḽa 26 Fulwi 2022 he khatsho ha lovha vhaswa vha swikaho 21, tsho shusha shango ḽoṱhe.

Zwi konḓa vhukuma lingedza humbula nga ha vhuṱungu vhune vha miṱa ye ya ṱutshelwa nga vhana nga nḓila yeneyi ya makhaulambilu ngaurali vha khou vhu pfa..     Khabinethe yo livhisa maipfi ayo ndiliso kha vha miṱa ye ya ṱutshelwa nga vhafunwa vhayo ya dovha hafhu ya livhuwa vhathu vhoṱhe kha thikhedzo yavho ya zwa vhuthu ye vha ṋetshedza kha miṱa iyi ine ya khou lila nga tshifhinga tshenetshi tshi konḓaho ngaurali zwi pfasesei zwavhuḓi uri ndi ngani fhethu afho ho vha ho tendelwa na vhana vhaṱuku vhukuma vhane vha vha na miṅwaha ya 13 uri vha dzhene vha nwe mahalwa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ilemukise abantu abanamatshayo wefiva, womgomani ojayelekileko, nabanamathuthuva anamanzi ukuthi baye emaziko wezepilo aseduze nabo kobanyana bayokuthola isizo lokuhlolwa nokwelatjhwa kusese nesikhathi.
tgt_text: Ri khou ita khuwelelo kha zwitshavha zwoṱhe ya uri zwi shele mulenzhe kha ṱhogomela vhana vhashu uri vha dzule vho tsireledzea misi yoṱhe.

src_text: Ibangamatlhuwo Eyehle Ethaveni YeMonti.
tgt_text: Vhana vha miṅwaha re fhasi ha 18 vho ngo tendelwa dzhena ngomu dzithaveni, zwipotoni, phabuni na mavhengeleni u rengisa mahalwa.

src_text: Ibangamatlhuwo eyenzeke Enyobeni Tavern eseMonti ePumalanga Kapa ngoSondo nakama-26 kuMgwengweni wee-2022 kwabhubhela kiyo abantu abatjha abama-21, ilethuse loke ilizwe lekhethu.
tgt_text: Vharengisi vha mahalwa vhane vha ḓo wanala vha tshi khou pfuka muṅwe wa iyo milayo vha tea farelwa mulandu wa vhugevhenga nahone ha dovha ha dzhiwa na ṱhanziela dzavho dza rengisa.

src_text: Kubudisi ukulinga ukucabanga isizi abakilo bemakhabo labantwana ababhubhe ngesihluku esingaka.

tgt_text: Mvelelo dza Muṱangano wa Vharangaphanḓa vha Tshigwada tsha Mashango Sumbe (G7).

src_text: IKhabinethi ibalilele imbiko bemakhabo labantwana abasitjhiyileko, yathokoza woke umuntu ngesekelo lakhe lobuntu ngokusekela imindeni ehluphekileko ngalesisikhathi sobudisi.
tgt_text: Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa vho shela mulenzhe kha Muṱangano wa Vharangaphanḓa vha Tshigwada tsha Mashango Sumbe (G7) we wa farelwa fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Bavaria, kha ḽa Germany nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 27 Fulwi.

Phresidennde – vhe vha shela mulenzhe kha madzulo u shuma he khaho ha vha hu tshi khou ambiwa nga mafhungo kwamaho kilima, fulufulu, mutakalo, vhubveledzi ha zwiḽiwa ḽifhasini ḽoṱhe nga angaredza khathihi na mafhungo zwa ndinganyiso ya mbeu, vho vha vho rambiwa nga murangaphanḓa wa shango ḽe vhuṱambo uvhu ha vha ho farelwa khaḽo, Mutshantseḽara Vho Olaf Scholz..     Muṱangano uyu wa G7 ndi foramu ya zwa polotiki ya vhukati ha mashango ngaho Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, United Kingdom na ḽa United States     Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: Kuzwisa ubuhlungu obukhulu ukuthi abantwana abancani beminyaka eli-13 kwaphela bavunyelwe ukungena endaweni yokusela bayokusela utjwala.
tgt_text: Khoudu ya Mvetamveto ya Sekhithara ya zwa Mulayo (Draft LSC).

src_text: Sikhombela woke umphakathi ukuthi ulime indimawo ngokugcina abantwabethu baphephile soke isikhathi.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza anḓadzwa ha Khoudu ya Mvetamveto ya Sekhithara ya zwa Mulayo (Draft LSC) hu tshi itelwa uri hu kone vha na vhupfiwa ha tshitshavha.
Zwipikwa zwa idzi khoudu ndi ṱuṱuwedza tshanduko ya sekhithara ya zwa mulayo itela swikela zwa imelelwa ha vhathu vhoṱhe ya nga mirafho ya vhathu vha ḽino shango.

src_text: Abantwana abangaphasi kweminyaka eli-18 abakavunyelwa ukungena emathaveni, esipotini, eendaweni zokuditjha ngotjwala kunye neentolo ezithengisa utjwala.
tgt_text: Khoudu iyi ḓo dovha hafhu ya ita uri hu vhe na mveledziso ya tshiimiswa tshine tsha ḓo bveledza vhaṋetshedzi vha tshumelo dza zwa mulayo vho pfumbudzwaho nga nḓila yavhuḓi nahone vha re na vhukoni.

src_text: Abathengisi botjwala abazakutholakala bephula imithetho le kufuze babotjhelwe ukwenza ubulelesi, bemukwe namalayisensabo wokuthengisa nokusebenza ngotjwala.

tgt_text: Zwa bveledzwa ha Mvetamveto ya Khoudu ya Sekhithara ya zwa Mulayo (Draft LSC) zwo vha zwo rangwa phanḓa nga vha Khoro ya Maitele zwa Mulayo, ine ya vha tshiimiswa tsha zwa mulayo tshe tsha vhumbwa hu tshi tevhedzwa Khethekanyo 4 ya Mulayo wa Maitele zwa Mulayo, wa 2014 (Mulayo 28 wa 2014) ya dovha ya ṱuṱuwedzwa nga Mulayo wa Maanḓafhadzwa ha Vharema ho Angalalaho kha zwa Ikonimi (B-BBEE), wa 2013 (Mulayo 46 wa 2013).

src_text: Umphumela Womhlangano Weenkhulu Wabarholi Besiqhema Samazwe We-G.      UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ube yingcenye yomHlangano weenKhulu wabaRholi be-G7 ebewubanjelwe e-Bavaria, eJarimani ngoMvulo nakama-27 kuMgwengweni wee-.
tgt_text: Mulayo wa B-BBEE wa 2013 na mbetshelwa ya uri Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Mbambadzo, Nḓowetshumo na Muṱaṱisano vha kone ṋetshedza khoudu dza maitele avhuḓi dza nga ha maanḓafhadzwa ha vharema kha zwa ikonomi kha sekhithara dzo teaho.

src_text: UMengameli – ohlanganyele nabanye eenqhenyaneni zokubonisana ngetlayimethi, iimbaseli, zepilo, ukutholakala nokuvikeleka kokugoma ephasini kunye neendaba zokulinganiseka kobulili – umenywe msingathi womhlangano lo, u-Chancellor Olaf Scholz.
tgt_text: Miraḓo ya buḓo ḽa zwa mulayo swika zwino vha athu vha na khoudu ya sekhithara ine ya vha yone ine ya vha eletshedza kha zwa tandulula thaidzo dza sa eḓana na tshayandingano kha buḓo ḽa zwa mulayo.

src_text: I-G7 yikundla yezepolitiki ehlanganyelwe borhulumende be-Canada, ne-France, neJarimani, neTariyana, neJapan, ne-United Kingdom kunye ne-United States     Iinqunto Zekhabinethi .
tgt_text: Heyi Mvetamveto ya Khoudu ya Sekhithara ya zwa Mulayo (Draft LSC) ḓo anḓadzwa kha Gurannḓa ya Muvhuso lwa maḓuvha 60 itela uri hu kone vha na vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi..     Muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa ya mashumele ṅwaha nga ṅwaha.

src_text: Umtlamo Wehlelo Lekoro Yezomthetho (umtlamo we-LSC).
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa ya ṅwaha nga ṅwaha ya tshifhinga tsha vhukati ha ṅwedzi wa Tshimedzi 2021 swika Shundunthule.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukumenyezelwa emphakathini komTlamo we-LSC kobanyana umphakathi uzokuphefumula ngawo.
tgt_text: Mivhigo iyi vhumba tshipiḓa tsha Muhanga wa Puḽane dza Tshifhinga tsha Vhukati ha Ṅwaha (MTSF) wa bva nga ṅwaha wa 2019 swika nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Iminqopho yamahlelo la kukghonakalisa ukuhlelwa ngobutjha kwekoro yezomthetho kobanyana izokujameleka ngobunjalo besakheko sesitjhaba sabantu beSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: MTSF dza tshifhinga tsha bva nga ṅwaha wa 2019 swika nga ṅwaha wa 2024 ndi dzone puḽane dza shuma khathihi na muhanga wa vhulavhelesi hu tshi itelwa swikela Puḽane ya mveledziso ya Lushaka: Zwipikwa zwa Bono ḽa 2030 zwa ndangulo ya muvhuso wa vhurathi.

src_text: Ihlelweli lizakubuye godu liqinisekise ukuthi kwakhiwa isijamiso esizakuveza abosomthetho abanelwazi nelwazi elihle lomthetho.
tgt_text: Mivhigo yo lavhelesa nga maanḓa kha zwipikwa zwa sumbe zwa muvhuso, zwine zwa vha (1) Tshanduko ya Ikonomi na sikwa ha mishumo; (2) Pfunzo, zwikili na mutakalo; (3) khwaṱhisa muholo wa zwa matshilisano nga shumisa tshumelo dza fhasisa dzine dza vha dza maimo nṱha nahone dzi fulufhedzeaho; (4) ṱanganywa ha fhethu, vhudzulo ha vhathu na muvhuso wapo; (5) Vhuthihi ha vhadzulapo na zwitshavha zwo tsireledzeaho; (6) shango ḽine ḽa vha na vhukoni, maitele mikhwa yavhuḓi na mvelaphanḓa; khathihi na (7) Afrika ḽa khwinesa hu tshi katelwa na ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe khathihi na dzhenelela ho teaho ha ndangulo ya muvhuso ya vhurathi..     Khabinethe yo dovha ya ṱanganedza mvelaphanḓa ye ya swikelwa kha zwipikwa zwo tiwaho zwa tshifhinga tshine tsha vha nga fhasi ha tsenguluso.
Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya dzhiela nṱha na afho hune ha kha ḓi vha na ṱhoḓea ya dzhenelela hu tshi itelwa tandulula thaidzo ya tshilengo tshe tsha vha hone nga mulandu wa ṱaha ha dwadze ḽa COVID-.

src_text: Ukwakhiwa komTlamo we-LSC bekwenganyelwe mKhandlu womSebenzi wobuGcwetha (i-Legal Practice Council), okusijamiso somthetho esasungulwa ngokwesiGaba sesi-4 somThetho womNyaka wee-2014 womSebenzi wobuGcwetha (umThetho Nomboro 28 womNyaka wee-2014), salayelwa indlela mThetho oHlomisa abaNtu abaNzima ngaMandla womNotho (i-B-BBEE), womNyaka wee-2013 (umThetho Nomboro 46 wee-2013).

tgt_text: Dziminisṱa vha ḓo fara miṱangano na vhoramafhungo kha vhege dzi si gathi dzi ḓaho itela bvisela khagala mivhigo yavho nga fhambana hayo khathihi na ṋetshedza zwidodombedzwa zwi elanaho na afho hune ha vha hu tshi khou tea khwaṱhiswa mashumele     Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.

src_text: UmThetho we-B-BBEE wee-2013 unikela uNgqongqotjhe wezeRhwebo, zamaBubulo nezePhaliswano amandla wamahlelo wekambiso ehle nelungileko wokuhlonyiswa kwabantu abanzima ngomnotho emakorweni athileko.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa Vhoranḓowetshumo khathihi na Vhavhambadzelannḓa vha Vharema (BIEC).

src_text: Amalunga womsebenzi wobugcwetha njenganje akanahlelo eliyikombandlela angayilandela nakalungisa ukutjhigama nokutjhiyana ngendima emsebenzini wobugcwetha.
tgt_text: BIEC ya tou thoma ḓo farelwa fhaḽa Sentharani ya Miṱangano ya Dzitshaka ine ya vha fhaḽa Sandton, ḓoroboni ya Johannesburg nga Ḽavhuraru, ḽa 20 Fulwana.

src_text: UmTlamo we-LSC uzokumenyezelwa eGazedeni yomBuso isikhathi esima-60 wamalanga kobanyana umphakathi uphefumule ngawo.
tgt_text: Hoyu ndi muṱangano une wa khou vha hone nga murahu ha rwelwa ṱari mathomoni uno ṅwaha ha Netiweke ya Zwivhambadzwaseli zwa Vhoranḓowetshumo vha Vharema nga muvhuso, ine ya tikedza vhoranḓowetshumo vha vharema uri vha kone dzhenelela kha maraga miswa khathihi na swikela masheleni zwivhambadzwaseli hu tshi katelwa na fhethu ha mimaraga     Milaedza fhululedzaKhabinethe khou rumela maipfi ayo u fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha: thimu ya Springboks, kha gundo ḽavho ḽi nyanyulaho vhukuma ḽe ḽa ḓa nga murahu ha musi ho tou sala tshifhinga tshiṱukuṱuku uri mutambo swike magumoni musi vha tshi khou tamba na thimu ya Wales kha mutambo wavho wa thoma wa mitambo miraru yo dzudzanyelwaho ḓo tambelwa fhaḽa Tshiṱediamu tsha Loftus Versveld kha ḽa Pretoria nga Mugivhela, wa ḽa 2 Fulwana.

thimu ya bola ya milenzhe ya vhafumakadzi, ine ya ḓivhiwa sa Banyana Banyana, kha gundo ḽavho ḽe vha kunda thimu ya shango ḽa Nigeria nga zwikoro zwivhili (2) kha tshithihi (1) nga tshifhinga tsha mutambo wavho wa thoma wa Tshipuga tsha Dzitshaka dza Afrika tsha Mutambo wa Bola ya Milenzhe ya Vhafumakadzi, we wa farelwa kha shango ḽa Morocco, nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 4 Fulwana  tholwaU tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa nga murahu ha musi ho rangwa ṱolwa na khwaṱhisedzwa ha ndalukano khathihi na ṱanzwa madzina ho teaho.

src_text: Imibiko Yendima Yomsebenzi Eza Kabili Ngomnyaka.
tgt_text: Dokotela Vho Nyameko Barney Pityana sa Mudzulatshidulo wa Khomishini ya Ḽothari ya Lushaka..     Muambeli Vho Rory Voller sa Mukhomishinari wa Khomishini ya zwa Dzikhamphani na Ndaka dza Vhubveledzi.

src_text: Zegezi.
tgt_text: Fulufulu.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yemukele amagadango wokungena hlangana kombuso ekurarululeni umraro omkhulukazi wokutlhayela kwegezi.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza maga a ḓivhadzwa nga muvhuso u tandulula thaidzo dza fulufulu dzine shango ḽa khou ṱangana nadzo.

src_text: Amagadango angeneleleko la avula indlela yokwehlisa izinga lokucinywa kwegezi kwenzelwa ukuyonga, kutjhugululwe indlela yokusebenza kilomkhakha wegezi khona kuzakufikelelwa ubujamo bokufumaneka kwegezi ngendlela enzinzileko.Ukusekela isiphehligezi nokusiza ilizwe lekhethu ekufunyaneni igezi kabudisi, sidinga ukunciphisa izinga lokusetjenziswa kwegezi okuzii-6000 zamamegawathi eenyangeni ezintathu ezizako..  Izakhamuzi zingafaka isandla ekongeni igezi ngokuhlala bacima amalampa angasetjenziswako neesetjenziswa ezisebenzisa igezi enengi ngeenkhathi lapho igezi isetjenziswa khulu khona.
tgt_text: Maga aya angalalaho ngaurali ndi one ane ḓo vula nḓila dza fhungudza zwa khauwa ha muḓagasi shandukisa sekithara ya muḓagasi khathihi na swikela zwa nḓisedzo ya fulufulu lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu.

src_text: Amabhizinisi ayakhuthazwa ukwamukela ithekhnoloji eyonga igezi nawo azibandakanye ekuphumeleliseni amano wokwehlisa isidingo esiphezulu segezi..  I-Operation Vulindlela  .

Ikhabinethi yemukele iragelophambili eyenziweko ngaphasi kwejima le-Operation Vulindlela ukususa iinqabo emikhakheni yezamandla, umthangalasisekelo wezokuthintana nemikhakha yezamanzi nezevakatjhobukela ngomnqopho wokuvuselela umnotho.
tgt_text: Sa ndingedzo dzashu dza tikedza netiweke ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi khathihi na thusa shango ḽashu kha vhuleme vhune ḽa khou ṱangana naho kha zwa nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi, ri tea fhungudza tshivhalo tsha muḓagasi une shango ḽashu ḽa shumisa nga megawati dza 600 kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwedzi miraru ḓaho..   Miṱa nga shela mulenzhe kha vhulunga fulufulu nga dzima zwishumiswa zwoṱhe zwo fungwaho zwine zwa si vhe zwa ndeme khathihi na izwo zwi shumisesaho fulufulu nga zwifhinga zwa musi hu na ṱhoḓea khulwane ya muḓagasi.

src_text: Sele kufikelelwe ngepumelelo ematjhugulukweni alithoba kama-26, kanti ali-11 wawo amatjhuguluko la akhamba kuhle.

Ipumelelo ifaka hlangana ukukhuliswa komthamo wokunikelwa kwamalayisensi wokusatjalalaliswa kweensetjenziswa zegezi, ukwakhiwa kabutjha kweBandla le-Transnet leenTetjhi zemiKhumbi leliZweloke, ukutjhatjhululwa kwerhelo lamakgonofundwa aqakathekileko nokusetjenziswa kwehlelo le-e-Visa emazweni ali-14’ kufaka hlangana amazwe amakhulu amatjha kezevakatjhobukelo anjenge-China, i-India, i-Kenya ne-Nigeria..  INturhu Eqothele Bobulili Obuthileko Nokubulawa Kwabasikazi (i-GBVF).
tgt_text: Fulo ḽa Vulindlela.

src_text: Ikhabinethi iveze ukusilingeka kwayo ngesehlakalo samhlapha sokugagadlhelwa kwabantu bengubo ababunane e-Krugersdorp, e-Gauteng.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mvelaphanḓa yo swikelwaho nga fhasi ha Fulo ḽa Vulindlela ḽo livhiswaho kha fhelisa vhukonḓi vhune ha vha hone kha sekhithara dza zwa fulufulu, vhudavhidzani ha ṱhingo, maḓi na zwa vhuendelamashango hu tshi itelwa vusulusa ikonomi.

src_text: Izenzwezi zelunya nokuhlukunyezwa kwabomma ziqalela phasi ifundiso yethu yokuziphatha emphakathini.
tgt_text: Ho no swikelwa tshandukiso dza zwa milayo dza ṱahe kha dza 26, hune dziṅwe tshandukiso dza milayo dzi swikaho 11 dza khou vhonala hu tshi khou vha na mvelaphanḓa yavhuḓi khadzo.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ibuke godu iButho lamaPholisa weSewula Afrika ngokubopha msinyana abasolwa abathinteka ezenzwezi zelunyezi..  Ikhabinethi ikhombele imiphakathi ukusebenzisana nabathobelisimthetho ngokuthi babelane ngelwazi elidingekako ukubika izenzo ezisolisako.
tgt_text: Magundo no swikelwaho ndi ane katela zwa engedzwa ha vhuhulwane ha ḽaisentsi dza bveledza muḓagasi une wa ḓo dzheniswa kha netiweke khulwane ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi, zwa shandukiswa ha khamphani ya muvhuso ya Maanḓalanga Vhuimangalavha ha Lushaka ya Transnet ya kha vha khamphani ya zwa makwevho yo ḓiimisaho nga yoṱhe phaḓaladzwa ha mutevhe wo shandukiswaho wa zwikili zwa ndeme khathihi na thoma shumiswa ha sisteme ya e-Visa kha mashango 14, hu tshi katelwa na mimaraga miswa mihulwane ya zwa vhuendelamashango sa shango ḽa China, India, Kenya na Nigeria..   Khakhathi dzo ḓitikaho nga mbeu na Mabulayo Vhafumakadzi (GBVF).

src_text: Ngokubambisana, singenzela abomma nabentwana imiphakathi ephephileko..  Woke amaSewula Afrika anesibopho sokuphikisana nezenzo zabaphehlinturhu ngokulandela umthetho.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo sumbedza vhaiswa nga zwiito zwa tshiṱuhu zwa tshipiwa ha vhafumakadzi vha malo zwine zwa kha ḓi tou bva itea ngei Krugersdorp kha ḽa Gauteng.

src_text: Bika ngezehlakalo ze-GBVF esitetjhini samapholisa sangekhenu namkha udosele inomboro yokuBika ngobuLelesi yasimahla ku-0860 01 0111, iSentha eLwisana nobuLelesi be-GBVF ku-0800 428 428 namkha udosele umTato weSizo ngokuPhelisa iNturhu ku-0800 150. .
tgt_text: Hezwi zwiito zwivhi ngaurali khathihi na tambudzwa ha vhafumakadzi ndi zwine zwa khakhisa vhudziki na vhuthihi vhune ha vha hone zwitshavhani zwashu.

src_text: INyanga yaboMma.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya fhululedza vha Tshumelo ya Mapholisa ya Afrika Tshipembe nge vha fara nga ṱavhanya vhunzhi ha vhahumbulelwa kha vhugevhenga uvhu ha tshiṱuhu ngaurali..   Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha zwitshavha ya uri zwi shumisane na vha mazhendedzi zwa mulayo nga kovhana navho mafhungo maṅwe na maṅwe kana vhiga zwiito zwi soliseaho.

src_text: NgeNyanga yaboMma egidingwa qobe mnyaka ngoRhoboyi kuhlonitjhwa abomma abazibandakanya emzabalazweni wetjhaphuluko nabo boke abomma abenza umehluko emiphakathini yekhethu..  INyanga yaboMma yanonyaka igidingwa ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “AmaLungelo waboMma wezeHlalakuhle newezomNotho nokubaThuthukisa: Ukwakhela aboMma kabuTjha nokuQinisa Ukusimelela Kwabo” – Women’s Socio-Economic Rights and Empowerment: Building Back Better for Women’s Improved Resilience”..  Bangaphezu kwee-20 000 abomma abamatjhela e-Union Buildings ePitori mhlana ali-9 kuRhoboyi we-1956 bafaka isandla ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi ukulingana ngokobulili nokunikelwa kwaboMma amandla kezomnotho kuhlala kuliqalontangi eSewula Afrika ebuswa ngokwentando yenengi.
tgt_text: Nga tshumisano, ri nga ita uri zwitshavha zwashu zwi vhe fhethu ho tsireledzeaho kha vhana na vhafumakadzi..   Mudzulapo muṅwe na muṅwe wa Afrika Tshipembe na vhuḓifhinduleli ha lwa na vhaiti vha zwiito zwa dzikhakhathi nga fhasi ha mulayo.

src_text: Izenzo zabo zesibindi zakhuthaza abomma ukuthatha isikhundla sabo epalamende, kurhulumende neenhlanganweni zomphakathi begodu sakhela kilepumelelo selokhu safumana itjhaphuluko ngomnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Kha vha vhige zwiwo zwoṱhe zwine zwa elana na GBVF kha tshiṱitshi tsha mapholisa tshi re tsini navho kana vha tou founela kha nomboro ya mahala ya Fhelisa Zwiito zwa Vhugevhenga ya: 0860 01 0111, Senthara ya Ndangulo ya Zwiito zwa GBVF ya Lushaka kha: 0800 428 428 kana kha Nomboro ya Luṱingo ya Thuso ya Fhelisa Khakhathi dza zwa Mbeu ya: 0800 150. .

src_text: Isikhumbuzo Sebangamatlhuwo ye-Marikana.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhafumakadzi.

src_text: NgeLesibili, mhlana ali-16 kuRhoboyi wee-2022, urhulumende wahlanganyela nelizwe loke ekukhumbuleni ibangamatlhuwo eyenzeka e-Marikana eseTlhagwini Tjingalanga ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhafumakadzi une wa pembelelwa ṅwaha muṅwe na muṅwe nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhangule ndi une khawo ha fhululedzwa vhafumakadzi vhe vha shela mulenzhe kha nndwa ya mbofholowo khathihi na vhaṅwe vhafumakadzi vhoṱhe zwitshavhani zwashu.

src_text: Ubuhlungu babasebenzi, imindenabo nesitjhaba soke buzakuhlala buyingcenye yomlando welizwe lekhethu..  Ihlelo lokuVuselela i-Marikana sele lihlonyiwe ukwakha kabutjha nokwenza ubujamo obamukelekako ukuthuthukisa ihlalakuhle yomphakathi we-Marikana.
Ngomnyaka ophelileko urhulumende walilisa imindeni yabongazimbi ngemali eziingidi ezili-R176 begodu imilandu esaleleko esatjhutjhiswako kulindeleke bona iqedelelwe ekupheleni kwakaRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhafumakadzi wa ṋaṅwaha ndi une wa khou fhululedzwa nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Pfanelo dza Vhafumakadzi kha zwa Matshilisano na Ikonomi khathihi na Maanḓafhadzwa Fhaṱa hafhu nga nḓila ya Khwine hu tshi itelwa Konḓelela ho Khwinifhadzeaho ha Vhafumakadzi”..   Vhafumakadzi vha fhiraho 20 000 vhe vha gwalaba vho livha ngei Union Buildings, ḓoroboni ya Pretoria nga ḽa 9 Ṱhangule 1956 vho shela mulenzhe kha ita uri zwa ndinganyiselo nga mbeu na maanḓafhadzwa ha vhafumakadzi zwi dzulele vha tshone tshipikwa tshihulwane tsha muvhuso wa demokirasi wa Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Isibalo esithileko seenkumba ezivuselelweko namkha eziqeda ukuthengwa zinikelwe abahlolokazi be-Marikana kanti ezinye zizokuphela ukwakhiwa nonyaka.
tgt_text: Maga aya vhuhali vhafumakadzi avha vha dzhia ṱuṱuwedza vhunzhi ha vhaṅwe vhafumakadzi nga angaredza uri na vhone vha ḓiwane vha tshi khou dzhia maimo nṱha Phaḽamenndeni, kha muvhuso na ngomu kha zwitshavha zwa havho nahone rikhou bvela phanḓa na khwaṱhisa mvelaphanḓa iyi tou bva tshe ra wana mbofholowo nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Iphrojekthi yokwakha izindlu ebiza iingidi ezima-R700 izokwenza abasebenzi beemayini banikelwa iinkumba ezithe tjha.
tgt_text: Vhuṱambo ha tshihumbudzo tsha Marikana.

src_text: Umthangalasisekelo oqakathekileko wezehlalakuhle uyanikelwa ukuthuthukisa ubujamo bokuhlala kwemiphakathi eyakhele iimayini..  Imbizo kaMengameli Emayelana neHlelo lokuThuthukisa Iiyingi (i-DDM) e-Gauteng.
tgt_text: Nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 16 Ṱhangule 2022, muvhuso khathihi na shango ḽoṱhe nga angaredza wo vha na ḓuvha ḽa humbula nga ha tshiwo tsha makhaulambilu tshe tsha bvelela fhaḽa Marikana kha ḽa North West nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Ngemva kokubanjwa ngepumelelo kweeMbizo zikaMengameli ezethula i-DDM amahlandla amathathu eTlhagwini Tjingalanga, eFreyistata neMpumalanga ngokulandelana, uMasipala wesiYingi se-Sedibeng ubambe Imbizo yesine NgeLesihlanu, nakali-12 kuRhoboyi wee-..  Ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Ungatjhiyi Namunye Ngemva”, UMengameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa wadosa phambili isiqhema sabajameli abaziimphathimandla zikarhulumende welizwe, beemfunda nebeendawo zemakhaya.
tgt_text: Vhuṱungu he vhashumi vha vhu pfa, miṱa yavho khathihi na lushaka nga angaredza vhu ḓo dzulela vha tshipiḓa tsha ḓivhazwakale yashu swikela zwenezwo.

src_text: AmaSewula Afrika ngokuhlukahlukana kwamakoro wawo akhuthazwa ukubambisana ekulwisaneni namazinga akhulako womtlhago nokudobha phasi ukungabi nobuyo okubangelwa bujamo bezomnotho obubudisi..  IsiYingi se-Sedibeng sesibe neragelo phambili ekusebenziseni ngokomthetho iinZinda zomNotho eziKhethekileko (ama-SEZ) zomlambo i-Vaal, ekungizo ezinekghono lokuvuselela amabubulo werijini, isifunda newelizwe.

I-SEZ yomLambo i-Vaal ihlala ikukwamukela imikhakha eqakathekileko elandelako: IDrobha eHle (i-Vaal River Smart City); isiKhungo esiTjheja iKghono leBhoduluko; isikhungo semikhiqizo yebange; iinsetjenziswa zezokulima; idrobha emagega nedoyelo leemphaphamtjhini; isiqetjhana sokudoya kwaboflayi abancani; imithwalo ekhamba ngesiphaphamtjhini nomkhakha ovuselelweko wesimbi.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamushumo ya Mvusuluso ya Marikana yo no thoma shuma itela fhaṱa hafhu nga huswa khathihi na bveledza nyimele yavhuḓi itela khwinisa matshilo zwitshavha zwa fhaḽa Marikana.

Ṅwaha wo fhelaho, muvhuso wo badela masheleni ndiliso linganaho R176 miḽioni kha miṱa ya zwipondwa ngeno hu na uri milandu yo salaho ine ya kha ḓi vha khothe tshi khou lavhelelwa khunyeledzwa mafheloni ṅwedzi wa Ṱhangule.

src_text: UmButhano kaMengameli womKhakha wezeHlalakuhle.

Umbuthano kaMengameli womKhakha wezeHlalakuhle owabanjelwa Ekurhuleni, e-Gauteng ukusuka  nakama-4 ukuya nakama-5 kuRhoboyi wee-2022 ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Ukukhuthaza ukubuyisana ngokuPhumelelisa ukuzibandakanya kwemiPhakathi ngezeHlalakuhle nezoMnotho”, wahlanganisa abalimindima beenkhungo ezihlukileko ukusebenzisana norhulumende ukutjheja iintjhijilo zezehlalakuhle nezomnotho nokufumanela imiphakathi iinsetjenziswa, hlangana neminye iminqopho..  Umhlangano lo watjheja imibiko yemikhulumiswano yeemfunda zolithoba mayelana neentjhijilo zazo, ezifaka hlangana ukufikeleleka kwesizo leemali, iindaba zokulawula, ukutjhugululwa komkhakha wezehlalakuhle ngomnqopho wokukhuthaza itjhebiswano lombuso nomphakathi ukuqalana nemiraro yomtlhago, ukungalingani nokutlhayela kwemisebenzi..
