Ikhabinethi ikhombele iinhlangano zomphakathi nezakhamuzi ukulima indima eqinileko ekwakheni ikusasa elingcono, njengombana lokho kusehlelweni lomTlamo wokuThuthukiswa kweliZweloke: ngeNembombono yomNyaka wee-  IinQunto zeKhabinethi.
tgt_text: Ho vha na nnḓu dza tshivhalo ntswa kana dze dza tou vusuluswa dze dza ṋetshedzwa kha tshilikadzi dza fhaḽa Marikana ngeno hu na dziṅwe dzine dza ḓo fhela fhaṱwa uno ṅwaha.

src_text: ITlhatlha lamaBubulo wezamaSiko, zobuKghwari nezobuGwali.
tgt_text: Thandela ya zwa dzinnḓu ya masheleni linganaho R700 miḽioni ḓo ita uri vhashumi vha migodini vha kone ṋetshedzwa madzulo khwine.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukusetjenziswa kwetlhatlha lamaBubulo wezamaSiko nezobuGwali.
tgt_text: Hu khou ṋetshedzwa hafhu na themamveledziso ya zwa matshilisano ya ndeme ine ya ḓo thusa kha khwinifhadza nyimele dza kutshilele kwa zwitshavha zwa vhupo vhune ha vha na zwa migodi.

src_text: Itlhatlheli litjheja ubukghwari obubukelwako, imisebenzi elukwako, yemigwalo neyeembikiindaba; okubukelwako nokuthintana ngeensetjenziswa; ukugwala nobukghwari; imidlalo nokugidinga, kufaka hlangana umbhino, ukugadangiswa kwemitlolo..  Lelitlhatlha lizokungenelela kilemikhakha mayelana nokwakha umkhakha wobukghwari obutjhugululiweko obuzokwamukelwa godu bube sezingeni lephasiloke ehlangothinelo.

Lizokusiza ibubulo lezobugwali nezobukghwari leSewula Afrika lifikelele amamakethe wangekhaya newangaphetjheya..  UmThethomtlamo Obuyekeziweko wokuBolekwa kweeMali nguMasipala neeMali Zobujamo Oburhabako.
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya nga ha Ḽiedza ḽa Mveledziso ya Tshiṱiriki (DDM) kha ḽa Gauteng.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele iinkhibelelo zomthethomtlamo wamva nje wokuBolekwa kweeMali nguMasipala neeMali zobuJamo obuRhabako.
tgt_text: Nga murahu ha tshimbila zwavhuḓi ha Imbizo dza Phresidennde dza nga ha DDM tharu dzo fhiraho dze dza farelwa fhaḽa North West, Free State na Mpumalanga nga fhambana hadzo, Masipala wa Tshiṱiriki tsha Sedibeng re kha ḽa Gauteng wone wo fara imbizo yawo nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 12 Ṱhangule..   Nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “A huna tsaleli”, Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa vho ranga phanḓa vhurumelwa ha vhaofisiri vhahulwane vha bvaho kha mivhuso yapo, wa vunḓu na wa lushaka.

src_text: Iinkhibelelwezi zinqophene khulu nengcenye yokubolekwa kweemali.
tgt_text: Vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe bva kha zwiimiswa na sekhithara dzavho dzo fhambanaho, vho swika he vha kuvhangana vha tshi itela uri vha kone lwa na engedzea ha tshikalo tsha vhushai khathihi na vhuheḓana vhune ha khou vhangwa nga nyimele dzine dza si vhe dzavhuḓi dza ikonomi.

src_text: Hlangana neenkhibelelo ezihlongozwako ngokwethula isikhathi sokuboleka eseluliweko ukukhambisana nesikhathi sokusebenza kwepahla esekelwe ngeemali.
Iinkhibelelwezi godu zihlathulula indima yamaziko asiza ngeemali kezokubolekisa ngeemali kibomasipala.
tgt_text: Tshiṱiriki tsha Sedibeng tsho vha na mvelaphanḓa khulwane ya ita uri Vhupo ha Ikonomi yo Khetheaho ha Vaal River (SEZ) vhu kone shuma, vhune ha vha vhupo vhu re na khonadzeo khulwane ya ita uri dzingu iḽi, vunḓu kana shango ḽi dovhe hafhu vha fhethu hune khaho ha nga itwa zwa nḓowetshumo.

src_text: IsiGaba sama-230 somThethosisekelo weRiphabhliki yeSewula Afrika womnyaka we-1996 unikela abomasipala igunya lokuboleka iimali zokuqalana neeNdleko zabo.
tgt_text: SEZ ya fhaḽa Vaal River khou dzudzanya uri hu vhe hone fhethu hune ha ḓo vha na sekhithara dza ndeme dzi tevhelaho: Vaal River Smart City ntswa; Green Hydrogen Innovation Hub; cannabis hub; agro-logistics; aerotropolis; aerodrome; air freight khathihi na sekhithara yo vusuluswaho ya bveledza tsimbi.

src_text: Umtlamo wokuthoma wavunyelwa yiKhabinethi ngomnyaka wee-2000 ukuhlahla isiGaba sesiThandathu nese-13 somThetho wokuphathwa kweeMali zikaMasipala wee-2003 (UmThetho Nomboro 56 womNyaka wee-2003).
Iinkhibelelo ezivunyelweko zinqophe ukuthokoza ababolekisi kumakethe yabomasipala kodwana kuragwe ukulandela imigomo ekhambisana nokuboleka iimali kwabomasipala.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa Sekhithara ya zwa Matshilisano wa Phresidennde.

1   Muṱangano wa Sekhithara ya zwa Matshilisano wa Phresidennde we wa farelwa fhaḽa Ekurhuleni, kha ḽa Gauteng bva nga ḽa 4 swikela ḽa 5 Ṱhangule 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U Ṱuṱuwedza Vhuthihi ha zwa Matshilisano hu tshi Itelwa Shela Mulenzhe kha zwa Matshilisano na Ikonomi nga Zwitshavha”, wo ṱanganya vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho bva kha masia fhambanaho itela uri vha shumisane na muvhuso muhumbulo muhulwane wa tandulula khaedu dza zwa matshilisano na ikonomi khathihi na kuvhanganya zwishumiswa zwo teaho hu tshi itelwa miraḓo ya zwitshavha..    Muṱangano wo dzhiela nṱha mivhigo ya nyambedzano bva kha mavunḓu ṱahe ine ya amba nga ha khaedu dzine vha vha nadzo, dzi katelaho swikela masheleni, mafhungo zwa milayo, tshandukiso ya sekhithara ya zwa matshilisano muhumbulo wa ṱuṱuwedza vhushaka ha tshumisano vhukati ha muvhuso na vhadzulapo hu tshi itelwa tandulula khaedu dzi elanaho na vhushai, tshayandingano na shayea ha mishumo.

src_text: Ukukhutjhwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi  kweembalobalo zobulelesi ezikhutjhwa ngekota zomnyaka weemali wee-2022/.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha madzangano vhadzulapo khathihi na vhadzulapo ya uri vha shele mulenzhe nga nḓila yo fhelelaho kha ita uri ri kone fhaṱa vhumatshelo ha khwine, sa zwine zwa khou lavhelelwa kha Puḽane ya Mveledziso ya Lushaka: Bono ḽa   Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ivumele ukukhutjhwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi kweembalobalo zobulelesi ezikhutjhwa qobe ngekota zomnyaka weemali wee-2022/.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamushumo ya Nḓowetshumo ya zwa Mvelele na Vhusiki.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ivumele ukukhutjhwa kweembalobalo zobulelesi ezikhutjhwa qobe ngekota.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mbekanyamushumo ya Nḓowetshumo ya zwa Mvelele na Vhusiki uri thome shumiswa.

src_text: Lokhu kunqotjhwe ngakho ukutjhugulula ikambiso yokukhutjhelwa kwelizwe iimbalobalo zobulelesi ezikhutjhwa qobe mnyaka.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamushumo iyi yo sedzesa kha zwa vhutsila ha vhona nga maṱo, vhuvhaḓi na nyolo, ha vhona nga maṱo na thetshelesa nga nḓevhe khathihi na nyanḓadzamafhungo dza vhukati ha vhavhili; nyolo na tshumelo dza zwa vhusiki, mabepha na minyanya hu tshi katelwa na muzika, nyanḓadzamafhungo dza nyanḓadzo na khanḓiso.

src_text: Ukukhutjhwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi kweembalobalo zobulelesi okutjhukunyiswako kulethwe kuRhoboyi wee-2022 ekoteni yokuthoma kwathi kwekota yesibili kwasiwa kuSinyikhaba wee-.
Iimbalobalo zobulelesi zekota yesithathu zizokukhutjhwa ngoMhlolanja wee-2023 kuthi zekota yesine ngoMrhayili wee-.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamushumo iyi ḓo dzhenelela kha sekhithara dzenedzi ho livhiwa kha fhaṱa sekhithara ya zwa vhusiki yo shandukiswaho ine ya dzhielwa nṱha ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe nahone ya dovha ya vha ya maimo nṱha ḽifhasini ḓo dovha hafhu ya shuma yo livha kha ita uri nḓowetshumo ya zwa vhusiki ya Afrika Tshipembe kone swikela mimaraga yapo na ya dzitshaka.

src_text: UkuPheliswa Kwesikhathi Sobujamo Behlekelele yeliZweloke (i-NSoD).
tgt_text: Muhanga wa Mbekanyamaitele yo Dzudzanyululwaho ya Khadzimiso dza ha Masipala na zwa Masheleni Shishi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukuqedwa kwesikhathi sobuJamo beHlekelele yeliZweloke (i-NSoD) esamenyezelwa ngemva kweenkhulula ePumalanga Kapa naKwaZulu-Natala..  I-NSoD yaphelelwa sikhathi mhla ali-18 kuRhoboyi wee-2022 ngemva kokwelulwa kwayo kusukela mhla ali-18 kuVelabahlinze wee-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza khwinifhadzwa ha Muhanga wa Mbekanyamaitele ya Khadzimiso dza ha Masipala na zwa Masheleni Shishi.

src_text: Ukwelulwa kwesikhathi sehlekelele kwenziwa kuyelelwe isidingo sokuraga nokuqinisa amagadango wanje athethwe maphiko wombuso ukuqalana nomthelela wobujamo bezulu obumbi eemfundeni ezithintekileko..  IKhabinethi ivumile ukuthi ubujamo banje abusavumelani namagadango aqinileko njengamaphiko wombuso, amakhampani wangeqadi neenhlangano zomphakathi ezizokuraga ngawo ukufumana isizo, ukuvuselelwa kwepahla nokwakha kabutjha  ImiThethomlingwa.
tgt_text: Khwinifhadzo idzi kanzhi ndi dze dza itwa kha khethekanyo ya zwa khadzimiso ya uno muhanga.

src_text: IsiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wokuTloliswa kwePahla.
tgt_text: Dziṅwe dza khwinifhadzo dzine dza khou dzinginywa ndi ḓivhadzwa ha tshifhinga tsha khadzimiso dza masheleni dza tshifhinga tshilapfu tshine tsha ḓo elana na tshifhinga tsha shumisea ha dziṅwe dza ndaka dzenedzo dzine dza khou avhelwa masheleni ayo.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende kwesiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wokuTloliswa kwepahla wee-.
tgt_text: Khwinifhadzo idzi dzi dovha hafhu dza bvisela khagala vhuḓifhinduleli ha zwiimiswa zwa masheleni mveledziso kha sia ḽa zwa khadzimiso dza masheleni dza mimasipala..   Khethekanyo 230 ya Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa 1996 maanḓafhadza mimasipala uri ite khadzimiso dza masheleni hu tshi itelwa uri kone engedza masheleni ayo ane ya shumisa kha londa ndaka dzayo kana ane shumiswa kha mbadelo dza ḓuvha na ḓuvha.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukukhutjhelwa emphakathini komthethomlingwa lo ngoMgwengweni wee-..  Iinkhibelelo ezitjhukunyiswako zizokuphumelelisa ubunikazi benarha okusemthethweni kusiGaba sama-25(6) womThethosisekelo weRiphabhliki yeSewula Afrika we-.
tgt_text: Muhanga wa thoma wo tendelwa nga Khabinethe nga ṅwaha wa 2000 hu tshi itelwa ṋea ṱhalutshedzo kha Ndima ya 6 na ya 13 ya Mulayo wa zwa Masheleni ha Masipala, wa 2003 (Mulayo 56 wa 2003).

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo uqalelela ukubuthelelwa kweembalobalo mayelana nombala, ubulili, ubakhamuzi babanikazi bamalungelo wenarha eSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Hedzi khwinifhadzo dzo tendelwaho ndi dzine dza ḓo vhuedza vhahadzimisi vhanzhi vhane vha hadzimisa mimasipala masheleni fhedzi dzi ḓo ḓi bvela phanḓa na tevhedza maitele ndeme ane langa khadzimiso dza ha masipala.

src_text: Isiqalelelwesi sizokusiza  lokha nakutjhuguluwa ubunikazi benarha..  UmThethomlingwa we-Ejensi yemiThombo nomThangalasisekelo waManzi  (i-NWRIA) wee-.
IKhabinethi ivumele ukukhutjhelwa emphakathini komThethomlingwa i-NWRIA womnyaka wee-2022 isikhathi esingaba malanga amatjhumi alithoba (90) ukobana kuvezwe imibono ngawo.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa rangela anḓadzwa ha mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga dze dza rekhodiwa nga kotara ya ṅwaha wa muvhalelano wa 2022/.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo utjhukumisa ukuhlonywa kwe-NWRIA ezokuqalana nokuhlela, isekelo leemali nokuthuthukiswa komthangalasisekelo welizwe.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ḓivhadzwa ha ṅwedzi wa rangela anḓadzwa ha mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga dza ṅwaha wa muvhalelano wa 2022/.

src_text: Izokuqalana godu nokutjhejwa komthangalasisekelo wamanzi.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza bviswa ha mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga dza kotara.

src_text: I-ejensi izokuqinisekisa ukufumaneka okuragako nokunzinzileko kwamanzi ngokukhambisana neembopho zomthethosisekelo zokufumaneka kwamanzi nebhoduluko elinepilo.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwo vha itela shandukisa maitele kale mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga fhano shangoni dza vha dzi tshi bviswa nga ṅwaha.

src_text: I-ejensi le izokuhlonywa ibe liZiko lomBuso ngaphasi kweShejuli yesiBili yomThetho wokuPhathwa kweeMali zomBuso we-1999 (umThetho Nomboro 1 ka-1999).
tgt_text: oyu ṅwedzi une wa ḓo rangela bviswa ha mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga une wa khou dzinginywa ndi wa Ṱhangule 2022 hu tshi itelwa kotara ya thoma na ṅwedzi wa Ḽara 2022 hu tshi itelwa kotara ya vhuvhili.

src_text: I-ejensi le izokuthatha ilawulo lemisebenzi eyenziwa njenganje yi-Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority..  IsiKhibelelo Somthethomlingwa Wamagunya NemiSebenzi YaboMasipala wee-.
tgt_text: Mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga dza kotara ya vhuraru na kotara ya vhuṋa dzi ḓo bviswa nga ṅwedzi wa Luhuhi na wa Shundunthule 2023 nga fhambana hazwo fhelelwa nga tshifhinga ha Tshiimo tsha Tshiwo tsha Lushaka (NSoD).

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende kwesiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wamaGunya nemiSebenzi yaboMasipala wee-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza fhelelwa nga tshifhinga ha Tshiimo tsha Tshiwo tsha Lushaka (NSoD) tshe tsha vha tsho ḓivhadzwa nga murahu ha miḓalo tshinyadzaho ye ya vha hone ngei vunḓuni ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha na ḽa KwaZulu-Natal..   Tshiimo tsha Tshiwo tsha Lushaka (NSoD) tsho fhelelwa nga tshifhinga nga ḽa 18 Ṱhangule 2022 nga murahu ha musi tsho swika he tsha engedzwa nga ḽa 18 Fulwi.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo ukhibelela umThetho wamaGunya nemiSebenzi yaboMasipala womNyaka wee-2007 (umThetho Nomboro 12 wee-2007).
tgt_text: Uhu engedzwa ha tshifhinga ho vha hone nga murahu ha musi ho ranga dzhielwa nṱha ṱhoḓea ya bvela phanḓa na engedza maga tshiimo tsha shishi ane vha hone zwazwino ane khou dzhiiwa nga zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso itela fhelisa na tandulula masiandaitwa mutsho wo kalulaho kha mavunḓu kwameaho.

src_text: Iinkhibelelwezi zilawula amagunya wabomasipala ekuthuthukisweni kwehlelo lokubhadelwa kweemali mayelana nokwenziwa kweembawo ezithunyelwa kibomasipala.
Iinkhibelelwezi zizokuqinisekisa ukuthi abomasipala bahlawulisa ngefanelo, tjhatjhalazi nangokulungileko.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo tenda zwauri nyimele ine ya vha hone zwazwino i tsha ṱoḓa uri hu vhe na maga songo ḓowelelaho sa izwi zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso, sekhithara dza phuraivethe na vhadzulapo zwi tshi ḓo bvela phanḓa na ita uri hu vhe na ṱhaḓulo ine ya khou bvela phanḓa, mbuedzedzo na phaṱhululo    ilayotibe.

src_text: IKhabinethi yavumela ukukhutjhelwa emphakathini komThethomlingwa lo ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Redzhisiṱara ya zwa Vhuṋe ha mavu wa ṅwaha wa.
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Redzhisiṱara ya zwa Vhuṋe ha mavu wa ṅwaha wa 2020 ngei Phaḽamenndeni itela uri sedzuluswe hafhu.

src_text: IsiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wezeeMali womNyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza uyu Mulayotibe nga ṅwedzi wa Fulwi 2020 hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na vhuṅwe vhukwamani hafhu na tshitshavha khwinifhadzwa uhu hune ha khou dzinginywa hu ḓo ita uri hu kone swikelwa zwa vhuṋe ha mavu ho tsireledzeaho ya nga mulayo kha Khethekanyo 25(6) ya Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende kwesiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wezeeMali womNyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu dovha hafhu wa vha na mbetshelwa dza kuvhanganywa ha mbalombalo ya nga murafho, mbeu, lushaka na vhudzulapo ha muthu onoyo ane vha na pfanelo dza zwa mavu fhano Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo utjhukumisa ukukhitjelelwa kwemiThetho elikhomba, elandelako (1) i-Associated Institutions Pension Fund Act ka-1963 (umThetho Nomboro 41 wee-1963); (2) umThetho womHlalaphasi wamaJoni (i-Military Pension Act)  womNyaka we-1976 (umthetho Nomboro 84  we-1976); (3) UmThetho wezomHlalaphasi wabaSebenzi bakaRhulumende we-1996; (4) UmThetho wezeeMali neweKomitjhini eLuleka ngeeMali (i-Financial and Fiscal Commission Act) we-1997 (umthetho Nomboro 99 we-1997); (5) UmThetho wokuThuthukiswa kweBhanga yezokuLima neNarha wee-2002 (umThetho Nomboro 15 wee-2002); (6) UmThetho wokuLawula abaHloliincwadi (i-Audit Profession Act) wee-2005 (umthetho Nomboro 26 wee-2005);  (7) nesiKhibelelo somThetho oLawula abaHloliincwadi wee-2021 (umThetho Nomboro 5 wee-2021)..  Iinkhibelelo ezihlongozwako zifaka hlangana, ngaphasi komThetho woMhlalaphasi wamaJoni womnyaka we-1996, ukufakwa kwabalingani abangakathathani babe bazuzi ukuthoma emva mhla ama-27 kuSihlabantangana womnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Hedzi mbetshelwa dzi ḓo ita uri hu vhe na mivhigo ya muvhalelano wa zwa mavu ine ya vha ya vhukuma khathihi na ṱhoḓisiso dza tshifhinga tshi ḓaho dzine dza elana na zwa shandukiswa ha vhuṋe ha mavu.

src_text: Iinkhibelelo zomthetho womhlalaphasi zizokusiza abalingani ukufumana inzuzo khonokho nakutjhatjalaliswa umtjhado.
Ngaphezu kokuhlathulula indima kaNgqongqotjhe wezeeMali nekuhlolweni kweencwadi, iinkhibelelwezi zihlalisa kuhle igunya lekomiti lapho umhloliincwadi avuma khona umlandu.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa Zhendedzi ḽa Themamveledziso ya Zwiko zwa Maḓi ḽa Lushaka (NWRIA) wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo wakhutjhelwa emphakathini ngoMhlolanja wee-2022 ukobana kuvezwe imibono.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa anḓadzwa ha Mulayotibe wa NWRIA wa ṅwaha wa 2022 hu tshi itelwa vhupfiwa ha tshitshavha lwa tshifhinga tsha maḓuvha fuṱahe (90).

Mulayotibe uyu khou dzinginya uri hu vhumbiwe NWRIA ine ya ḓo vha na vhuḓifhinduleli ha vhupuḽani, zwa masheleni khathihi na mveledziso ya themamveledziso ya zwa maḓi ya shango ḓo dovha hafhu ya vha na vhuḓifhinduleli ha ṱhogomela themamveledziso ya zwa maḓi ine ya vha hone zwazwino.

src_text: IsiKhibelelo semiThetho eVamileko (Ukulwisana nokuKhukhuthiswa kweeMali nokuKhandela ukuSekela  amaVukelambuso ngeeMali) wee-.
tgt_text: Zhendedzi iḽi ḽi ḓo vhona uri hu khou vha na nḓisedzo ya maḓi ine ya nga bvela phanḓa lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu, yo linganaho nahone ine ya fulufhedzea zwi tshi elana na ṱhoḓea ya ndayotewa ya kona swikela wana maḓi khathihi na vhupo ho tsireledzeaho nahone vhu re na mutakalo.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende kwesiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wemiThetho eVamileko (UkuLwisana nokuKhukhuthiswa kweeMali nokuKhandela ukuSekela amaVukelambuso ngeeMali).
tgt_text: Zhendedzi ḽi ḓo vhumbiwa sa Tshiimiswa tsha Muvhuso nga fhasi ha Sheduḽu ya 2 ya Mulayo wa Ndangulo ya zwa Masheleni Muvhuso, wa 1999 (Mulayo 1 wa 1999).

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo ungomumethe eminye imiThethomlingwa nokhibelela imithetho yanje ebizwa  umThetho weSentha yobuHloli bezeeMali wee-2001 (umThetho Nomboro 38 wee-2001); (ii) UmThetho weenHlangano eziNgasebenzeli  iNzuzo we-1997 (umThetho Nomboro 71 wee-1997); (iii) UmThetho oLawula iPahla eHlanganyelweko (i-Trust Property Control Act) we-1988 (umThetho Nomboro 57 we-1988) (iv) UmThetho wamaKhampani wee-2008 (umThetho Nomboro 71 wee-2008) no  umThetho oLawula amaZiko wezeeMali (i-Financial Sector Regulations Act) wee-2017 (umThetho Nomboro 9 wee-2017).
tgt_text: Zhendedzi ḽi ḓo dzhia mishumo ine zwazwino ya itwa nga vha Maanḓalanga  Thaneḽe ya Trans-Caledon..   Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Maanḓa na Vhuḓifhinduleli ha Masipala kha zwa Masheleni wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Iinkhibelelo ziphendula ukutlhayelelwa okutshwaywe lokha nakuhlolwa ikghono lamazwe alinganako siQhema sokuSetjenziswa kweeMali (i-FATF).
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa Phaḽamenndeni ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Maanḓa na Vhuḓifhinduleli ha Masipala kha zwa Masheleni wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Umbiko wokuhlolwa ngokuzinikela uveze iintjhukumiso ezima-40 ezizokusiza ukuthi iSewula Afrika ikhambisane namazinga wamazwe ngamazwe wokulwisana nokukhukhuthiswa kweemali nokusekela iinhlangano zamavukelambuso..  ISewula Afrika yafunyanwa itlhayelelwa khulu emikhakheni ema-.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu ndi une wa khwinisa Mulayo wa Maanḓa na Vhuḓifhinduleli ha Masipala kha zwa Masheleni, wa 2007 (Mulayo 12 wa 2007)..   Khwiniso iyi ndi ine ya ḓo langa maanḓa mimasipala musi tshi ta mithelo ya mveledziso musi zwi tshi ḓa kha khumbelo dza mveledziso ya mavu dze dza rumelwa kha mimasipala.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo utjheja imikhakha eli-14 kekhonjiweko.
tgt_text: Hedzi khwiniso dzi ḓo ita uri mimasipala thome badelisa mithelo iyi nga nḓila pfalaho re khagala nahone yo fhelelaho.

src_text: ISewula Afrika solo yathoma ukuba lilunga le-FATF ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mulayotibe uyu nga ṅwaha wa 2020 hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na vhukwamani na tshitshavha..   Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mafhungo zwa Masheleni wa ṅwaha wa.
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mafhungo zwa Masheleni, wa ṅwaha wa 2022 ngei Phaḽamenndeni.

src_text: IsiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa Olwisana Nokukhukhuthiswa Kweendakamizwa wee-.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu dzinginya uri hu vhe na khwiniso ya Milayo ya sumbe, ine ya vha (1) Mulayo wa Tshikwama tsha Phentsheni ya Zwiimiswa zwi Elanaho, wa 1963 (Mulayo 41 wa 1963); (2) Mulayo wa Phentsheni dza Miraḓo ya Mmbi, wa 1976 (Mulayo 84 wa 1976); (3) Mulayo wa Phentsheni dza Vhashumeli vha Muvhuso wa 1996; (4) Mulayo wa Khomishini ya zwa Masheleni na Gwama, wa 1997 (Mulayo 99 wa 1997); (5) Mulayo wa Bannga ya Mveledziso ya Mavu na Vhulimi, wa 2002 (Mulayo 15 wa 2002); (6) Mulayo wa Mishumo ya zwa Muvhalelano, wa 2005 (Mulayo 26 wa 2005) na (7) Mulayo wa Khwiniso ya Mishumo ya Muvhalelano wa 2021 (Mulayo 5 wa 2021).

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ngePalamende kwesiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa olwisana nokuKhukhuthiswa kweenDakamizwa wee-2022 kobana uhlaliswe kuhle.
tgt_text: Uhu khwiniswa hune ha khou dzinginywa hu katela, nga fhasi ha Mulayo wa Phentsheni dza Miraḓo ya Mmbi, wa 1996 katelwa ha muthu ane wa dzula nae lwa tshoṱhe kha mbuelo dza bva murahu nga ḽa 27 Lambamai.

src_text: UmThetho olwisana neenDakamizwa nokuKhukuthiswa kwazo wee-1992 (umthetho Nomboro 140 we-1992) wenza kube kukwephula umthetho ukukhiqiza nokusabalalisa namkha ngiwuphi umkhiqizo obalwe kuTjhejuli yokuThoma nakuTjhejuli yesiBili yomThetho.
tgt_text: Khwiniso dza milayo ya phentsheni dzi ḓo ita uri vhafarisi vha kone swikela mbuelo dzavho dza phentsheni na zwenezwo nga murahu ha musi mbingano yo no fhaladzwa ḓadzisa kha zwa bvisela khagala vhuḓifhinduleli ha Minisṱa wa Gwama na kha zwa muvhalelano, khwiniso idzi dzi dovha hafhu dza shandukisa maanḓa komiti ya khombetshedzo afho hune muṱolambalelano ṱanganedza uri ita vhukhakhi.

src_text: Iinkhibelelwezi ziqalana nokungasebenzi kwesiGaba sama-63, esafunyanwa sitjhayisana nomthethosisekelo mayelana nokunikelwa kukaNgqongqotjhe amalungelo wokukhibelela amatjhejuli ngaphandle kokulandela ikambiso yokutlanywa komthetho.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wo phaḓaladzwa hu tshi itelwa vhupfiwa ha tshitshavha nga ṅwedzi wa Luhuhi.

src_text: Ngomnyaka wee-2020, iKhotho yomThethosisekelo yamemezele ukuthi isiGaba sama-63 somThetho olwisana nokuKhukhuthiswa kweenDakamizwa womnyaka we-1992 utjhayisana nomthethosisekelo godu wajanyiswa ekusebenzeni ukufikela nakali-17 kuNobayeni wee-2022 ukunikela iPalamende ithuba lokulungisa ubutjhaphobo  Umnyanya Ozako.
Iphaliswano lePhasiloke likaMakhakhulararhwe (i-Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022).
tgt_text: Milayo nga Angaredza (Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Lwa na Zwiito zwa Dzumbetshedza Masheleni ane si vhe Mulayoni na Fhelisa zwa Thuso ya Masheleni kha Zwiito zwa Vhutherorisi), wa.

src_text: ISewula Afrika izokusingatha iphaliswano lephasiloke likamakhakhularahwe (i-Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022) eKapa mhla ali-9 namhla ali-11 kuKhukhulamungu wee-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Milayo nga Angaredza (Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Lwa na Zwiito zwa Dzumbetshedza Masheleni ane si vhe Mulayoni na Fhelisa zwa Thuso ya Masheleni kha Zwiito zwa Vhutherorisi), wa 2022 ngei Phaḽamenndeni itela uri dzudzanyiwe hafhu.

src_text: Imbedla yemidlalo le izokubanjwa kokuthoma kukhonthinenthi ye-Afrika begodu iinqhema zabaduna ezima-24 nezabasikazi ezili-16 ezivela ephasini jikelele zizabe ziphalisana  Imilayezo.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu ndi Mulayotibe une wa vha na zwipiḓa zwinzhi une wa khou khwinisa Milayo ya zwino ine ya vha  Mulayo wa Senthara ya Vhusevhi ha zwa Masheleni, wa 2001 (Mulayo 38 wa 2001); (ii) Mulayo wa Madzangano sa Shumeli Malamba, wa 1997 (Mulayo 71 wa 1997); (iii) Mulayo wa Ndangulo ya Ndaka ya Vhufarandaka, wa 1988 (Mulayo 57 wa 1988); (iv) Mulayo wa Dzikhamphani, wa 2008 (Mulayo 71 wa 2008) na  Mulayo wa Milayo ya Sekhithara ya zwa Masheleni, wa 2017 ( Mulayo 9  2017).

src_text: Siyabathokozisa Ikhabinethi ithokozise beyadlulisela neemfiselabuhle zayo kabalandelako: Isiqhema seBholo eRarhwako i-Banyana, ngokwenza umlando ngokuthumba iphaliswano le-Afrika lokuthoma labomma i-Women's Africa Cup of Nations (i-2022 WAFCON), ephaliswaneni egade libanjwe e-Rabat, e-Morocco ngoMgqibelo, nakama-23 kuVelabahlinze wee-.
tgt_text: hwiniso idzi ndi dzine dza khou fhindula kha vhuṱudzeṱudze he ha bviselwa khagala nga tshifhinga tsha tsenguluso ya shango musi ḽi tshi vhambedzwa na maṅwe ye ya itwa nga vha Tshigwada tsha Shuma tsha Mishumo ya zwa Masheleni (FATF).

src_text: Ngokufanako bebaphumelela ukungenela iPhaliswano leBholo yaboMma lePhasiloke (i-FIFA Women’s World Cup) ezokusingathwa ngokuhlanganyela kwe-Australia ne-New Zealand ukuthoma nakama-20 kuVelabahlinze ukuya nakama-20 kuRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa tsenguluso iyi ya vhoṱhe wo ita themendelo dza 40 dzine dza ḓo thusa kha ita uri Afrika Tshipembe ḽi shume nga nḓila ine ḽa khou tevhedza maga ḽifhasi u fhelisa zwiito zwa dzumbetshedzwa ha masheleni khathihi na ṋetshedza thuso ya zwa masheleni kha zwiito zwa vhutherorisi..   Afrika Tshipembe ḽo wanala ḽi tshe ḽo salela murahu kha masia   Hoyu Mulayotibe amba nga ha masia 14 kha ayo a bviselwa khagala.

src_text: IsiQhema seSewula Afrika (i-Team South Africa), ngokuthumba iimendlela ezima-27 emikhakheni ehlukahlukileko emidlalweni i-2022 Commonwealth Games ebanjelwe e-Birmingham, e-England ethome mhlana ama-28 kuVelabahlinze ukufikela nakabu-8 kuRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo vha muraḓo wa FATF bva nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Baqede iphaliswaneli basebujameni bethoba bafumene iimendlela zerhawuda ezilikhomba, ezilithoba ngezesiliva kanti ezili-11 ngezethusi.Isiqhema saboMma sikaMakhakhulararhwe (i-Springbok Women), ngokubetha i-Spain emdlalweni wabo wokuthoma kuthungelelwano lemidlalo yokulinga emibili i-Winter Test Series, edlalelwa e-Emirates Airline Park ngeJwanisbhege.IKosazana u-Ndavi Nokeri (oneminyaka ema-23), ngokuthumba iphaliswano likaNomhlekhabo weSewula Afrika womNyaka wee-2022 (u-Miss South Afrika 2022).IKosazana Ashleigh Buhai, ngokuthumba i-2022 AIG Women’s Open nokuba mSewula Afrika wesithathu ongumma ukuthumba iphaliswano elingelikhulu likanongorwana werhawuda.

Sibalilela Imbiko Ikhabinethi idlulise amezwi wayo wokutjhiriya emndenini nebanganini baka: ● Tokollo “Magesh” Tshabalala (obekaneminyaka ema-46), umbhini, umkhaleli nomtloli wombhino owaduma lokha yena nabangani bakhe ababili batlama Isiqhema sombhino we-Kwaito ngomnyaka we-1996 esibizwa i-TKZee.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Zwidzidzivhadzi na Vhambadzwa ha Zwidzidzivhadzi nga nḓila ine zwa si vhe Mulayoni wa ṅwaha wa.

Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Zwidzidzivhadzi na Vhambadzwa ha Zwidzidzivhadzi nga nḓila ine ya si vhe Mulayoni wa ṅwaha wa 2022 ngei Phaḽamenndeni hu tshi itelwa uri kone dzudzanywa hafhu.

src_text: Ukuqatjha.
tgt_text: Mulayo uyu wa Zwidzidzivhadzi na Vhambadzwa ha Zwidzidzivhadzi zwi siho Mulayoni, wa 1992 (Mulayo 140 wa 1992) ita uri magwa na phaḓaladzwa ha zwithu zwiṅwe na zwiṅwe zwe zwa bulwa nga fhasi ha Sheduḽu 1 na Sheduḽu 2 ya uno Mulayo zwi vhe vhugevhenga..   Khwiniso idzo dzi lavhelesa na kha sa tea ha Khethekanyo 63, ye ya wanala sa tshimbilelani na ndayotewa kha ḽa uri Minisṱa ṋewe pfanelo dza khwinisa sheduḽu hu songo vha na kwama maitele zwa mulayo.

src_text: Koke ukuqatjhwa kulawulwa kufakazeleka kweencwadi zefundo kunye nokuhlanjululwa kwebizo lomuntu okufaneleko.
tgt_text: Nga ṅwaha wa 2020, Khothe ya Ndayotewa yo ḓivhadza uri Khethekanyo 63 ya Mulayo wa Zwidzidzivhadzi na Vhambadzwa ha Zwidzidzivhadzi wa 1992 u khou tshimbilelana na ndayotewa ya fhedza nga imisa zwa sa tea hawo swika nga ḽa 17 Nyendavhusiku 2022 itela ṋetshela Phaḽamennde tshikhala tsha khakhulula vhuṱudzeṱudze uho    Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.

src_text: UMm.
tgt_text: Mitambo ya ḽifhasi ya Rugby World Cup Sevens.

src_text: uZenkosi Dumile Mhlongo esikhundleni sokuba liSekela lomNqophisi Zombelele (i-DDG): ZokuRhubulula ngomThethokambiso nezokuLawula emNyangweni wezemiSebenzi kaRhulumende nezomThangalasisekelo (i-DPWI).
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo fara mitambo ya ḽifhasi ya Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022 ngei Ḓoroboni ya Kapa vhukati ha ḽa 9 na ḽa 11 Khubvumedzi.

Vhuṱambo uvhu ha misumbedzo vhu khou ḓo farelwa fhano kha dzhango ḽa Afrika lwa tou thoma nahone hu ḓo vha na thimu dza vhanna dza 24 na dza vhafumakadzi dza 16 bva ḽifhasini nga angaredza dzine dza ḓo vha dzi tshi khou ṱaṱisana kha vhuṱambo uvhu   Milaedza fhululedzaKhabinethe yo rumela mulaedza wayo wa fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha: ●  Thimu ya bola ya milenzhe ya vhafumakadzi, Banyana, nge vha ita ḓivhazwakale khathihi na fhenya kha muṱaṱisano wa tou thoma wa Afrika Tshipembe wa Tshiphuga tsha Afrika tsha Vhafumakadzi (WAFCON), kha mutambo wa bola ya milenzhe kha makhaulatshele WAFCON ya 2022 ye ya farelwa fhaḽa Rabat, kha ḽa Morocco nga Mugivhela, wa ḽa 23 Fulwi.

src_text: UDorh.
tgt_text: Nga tshenetsho tshifhinga tshithihi, vho dovha hafhu vha kona swikela dzhenela mitambo ya Tshiphuga tsha Ḽifhasi tsha ṅwaha ḓaho tsha bola ya milenzhe ya vhafumakadzi tsha FIFA ine ya ḓo farwa khathihi nga shango ḽa Australia na ḽa New Zealand bva nga ḽa 20 Fulwi swika 20 Ṱhangule.

src_text: Bongani Elias Sithole esikhundleni sokuba ngu-DDG: iSentha yokuPhathwa kweHlekelele emNyangweni wezokuBusa ngokuHlanganyela..  UNom.
tgt_text: ●  Vha Thimu ya Afrika Tshipembe, nge vha thuba mendele ya 27 kha mitambo yo fhambanaho musi vha tshi khou shela mulenzhe kha Mitambo ya Commonwealth ya ṅwaha wa 2022 ye ya farelwa fhaḽa Birmingham, England bva nga ḽa 28 Fulwana swika ḽa 8 Ṱhangule.

src_text: Adam Mthombeni esikhundleni sokuba ngu-DDG: Zetjhebiswano laboRhulumende kwa-DPWI.
tgt_text: Vho fhedza vho wana vhuimo ha vhuṱahe nga angaredza, vhe na mendele ya musuku ya sumbe, ya ṱahe ya siḽivhere na ya fumithihi ya burontsi.●  Thimu ya Vhafumakadzi ya Springbok, nge vha kunda thimu ya Spain kha mutambo wavho wa thoma kha wa ndingo mbili dza Women’s Winter Series fhaḽa Emirates Airline Park kha ḽa Johannesburg.●  Mufumakadzi Vho Ndavi Nokeri (23), nge vha ambadzwa khare ya vha Ralunako wa Afrika Tshipembe muswa wa ṅwaha wa.
●  Mufumakadzi Vho Ashleigh Buhai, nge vha fhenya 2022 AIG Women’s Open khathihi na vha mufumakadzi wa vhuraru wa fhano Afrika Tshipembe kha fhenya kha mutambo muhulwane wa vhugweṋa ha musuku.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ivumelene ngokuqatjhwa kwabalandelako:.
tgt_text: NdilisoKhabinethe yo rumela maipfi ndiliso kha vha muṱa na dzikhonani dza: ●   Vho Tokollo “Magesh” Tshabalala (46), ramuzika, muimbi na muṅwali wa nyimbo dza muzika vhe vha takuwa vha ḓivhea vhukuma musi vha tshi vhumba tshigwada tsha zwa muzika na khonani dzavho mbili nga ṅwaha wa 1996 tshe tsha vha tshi tshi ḓivhea sa TKZee tholwa tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa nga murahu ha senguluswa ha ndalukano khathihi na ṱanzwiwa madzina ho teaho.

src_text: UDorh.
tgt_text: Mufumakadzi Vho Zenkosi Dumile Mhlongo sa Muthusa Mulangi (DDG): Ṱhoḓisiso dza Mbekanyamaitele na Milayo kha Muhasho wa Mishumo ya Muvhuso na Themamveledziso (DPWI).

src_text: Zwanani Titus Mathe esikhundleni sokuba mPhathi oyiHloko weZiko lokuThuthukisa zeGezi leliZweloke.
Amalunga wesikhatjhana weBandla eliLawula zeGezi leSewula Afrika  UNom Thembani Bukula (USihlalo)  UMm.
tgt_text: Dokotela Vho Bongani Elias Sithole sa DDG: Senthara ya Ndangulo ya Zwiwo ya Lushaka kha Muhasho wa Tshumisano ya Mavhusele..   Vho Adam Mthombeni sa DDG: Vhushaka ha Vhukati ha Mihasho kha Muhasho wa DPWI.

tgt_text: Dokotela Vho Zwanani Titus Mathe sa Muofisiri Mutshimbidzi Muhulwane wa Tshiimiswa tsha Lushaka tsha Mveledziso ya Fulufulu tsha Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: u-Cladie Thamo Hloniphile Mzobe uqatjhelwe esikhundleni sokuba mPhathi oyiHloko weRijini (Regional Executive Manager) we-Ejensi yeeMbonelelo zeSondlo noMhlalaphasi kaRhulumende yeSewula Afrika (i-SASSA), KwaZulu-Natala.
tgt_text: Phrof Vho Lwazi Ngubevana..     Mufumakadzi Vho Cladie Thamo Hloniphile Mzobe sa Mulangi Muhulwane wa Dzingu wa Zhendedzi ḽa Nḓisedzo ya Thikhedzo ya zwa Matshilisano ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ngei kha ḽa KwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Zomnotho .
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza tsela fhasi zwiṱuku ha phimo ya vhushayamushumo ha shango, yo tsaho nga.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukuphunguka kancani kwenani labantu abangasebenziko, abaphunguke nge-.
tgt_text: 6% bva kha.

src_text: 6%, ukusukela ku-.
tgt_text: 5% kha kotara ya thoma ya kha.

src_text: 5 ekoteni yokuthoma yomnyaka bayokuba yi-.
tgt_text: 9% kha kotara ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa.

src_text: 9% ekoteni yesibili yomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Tshivhalo tsho ganḓiswaho kha Tsedzuluso ya zwa Vhashumi ya Kotara iṅwe na iṅwe bva kha vha Mbalombalo ya Afrika Tshipembe sumbedza uri mishumo minzhisa yo rekhodiwa kha Tshumelo dza Matshilisano na Tshitshavha (276 000), Mbambadzo (169 000), Masheleni (128 000) na zwa fhaṱa (104 000).

src_text: Iimbalobalo ezimenyezelwe liZiko leemBalobalo (i-StatsSA) zitjengisa ukuthi lapho imisebenzi ivuleke khona ngobunengi ukudlula kezinye iindawo kube seKorweni yemiSebenzi yomPhakathi (276 000), kezeRhwebo (169 000), kezeeMali (128 000) nemaGontrageni (104 000).
tgt_text: Tshivhaloguṱe tsha vhathu vha shumaho tsho ima kha 15, 6 miḽioni kha kotara ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa 2022, ngeno tsha vhathu vha sa shumiho tsho gonya nga 132 000 swika kha 8, 0 miḽioni kha kotara ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa 2022 musi zwi tshi vhambedzwa na kotara yo fhiraho dzika uhu naho hu na mbuelo dzi takadzaho hu sumbedza uri vhuḓidini ho khwaṱhaho nga muvhuso na sekhithara dzoṱhe dzi shumisanaho na muvhuso alusa ikonomi na sika mishumo minzhisa ine ya khou ṱoḓea vhukuma vhu khou thoma aṋwa mitshelo.
Hezwi ndi ṱhanzielo ya uri arali ri tshi shumisana roṱhe nga khwaṱhisa nungo dzashu dzoṱhe, ri nga kunda khaedu dzo livhanaho na ikonomi yashu.

src_text: Inani elipheleleko labantu abasebenzako belijame eengidini ezili-15,6 ngekota yesibili yee-2022, kwathi inani labantu abangasebenziko lakhuphuka ngee-132 000 layokuba zii-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe pfesesa dinalea ha Maafrika Tshipembe musi vha tshi khou kundelwa wana zwa ḓitshidza ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe nga vhanga ḽa ḓura ha zwithu na phimo ya vhushayamushumo re nṱha vhukuma.

src_text: 0 yeengidi ngekota yesibili yee-2022, nakulinganiswa nekota yaphambilini.
tgt_text: Sa muvhuso ṱhogomelaho, ri dzula ro ḓiimisela na ḓikumedzela kha shumisana na sekhithara dzoṱhe dzi shumisanaho na muvhuso itela fhaṱa vhumatshelo ha khwine ha muthu muṅwe na muṅwe.
Muvhuso dzula wo ḓikumedzela tikedza mabindu apo nga renga na shumisa thundu na tshumelo dzapo.

src_text: Ukukhuphuka kancazana kodwana okukarisako kwaleziimbalobalo, kutjengisa ukuthi ithoma ukuthela iinthelo imizamo karhulumende nabasebenzisani bakhe bomphakathi yokuhlumisa umnotho bekwakhiwe nemisebenzi edingeke khulu.
tgt_text: Themamveledziso ya Muvhuso.
Khabinethe yo sasaladza tshinyadzwa ha themamveledziso nga vhadzuli vha Togaat ngei KwaZulu-Natal nga tshifhinga tsha migwalabo ya khaedu ya ṱhahelelo ya  maḓi.

src_text: Lobu-ke bufakazi bokuthi nasisebenzisana ngokubambisana soke ngokuhlanganisa amandlethu wokusebenza, singazinqoba iintjhijilo esiqalene nazo emnothweni welizwe lekhethu.
tgt_text: Khabinethe ita khuwelelo ya vhudziki na vhukonḓeleli sa zwi mushumo kati wa vhuedzedza Tongaat Water Treatment Works..  Khabinethe khou pfesesa dinalela ha vhadzuli vhe vha ḓo tea shumisa mathannge maḓi lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu bva tshe ha vha na tshiwo tsha miḓalo mathomo uno ṅwaha.
Honeha, dzikhakhathi na zwiito zwi siho mulayoni zwi fhelisi thaidzo, nahone tshinyadza themamveledzido ya lushaka zwi kwamesa zwitshavha zwa tsinisa.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyawuzwisisa umraro wokujanyelwa ziinhloko kwamaSewula Afrika lokhuya nakalinga ukuphila ipilwawo yangamalanga, ngenca yokudura kwezinto nokukhuphuka kwenani labantu abangasebenziko.
tgt_text: Mulayo wa Khwiniso ya Sisiṱeme dza Masipala wa Muvhuso Wapo wa.

src_text: Njengorhulumende otjhejako, solo sisazibophelele ngokusebenzisana neenhlangano zomphakathi ukwakha ingomuso elingcono kiwo woke umuntu.
tgt_text: Khabinethe ṱanganedza sainwa vha mulayo ha Mulayo wa Khwiniso ya Sisiṱeme dza Masipala wa Muvhuso Wapo, wa 2022 (Mulayo 3 wa 2022) nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa.

src_text: Urhulumende solo uzibophelele ngokusekela amabhizinisi welizwe lekhethu ngokuthenga ipahla nezenzelwa ezenziwe khona lapha eSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Mulayo ṱoḓa khwinisa khaphasithi na phimo ya maitelendavhelelwa muvhuso wapo.

Mulayo vhumba tshipiḓa tsha ndingedzo dza muvhuso ita uri Tshumelo ya Tshitshavha shume nga vhukoni na khwaṱhisedza ṋetshedzo dzo khwaṱhaho dza tshumelo kha vhathu, sa pfanelo ya mutheo yo ṅwalwaho kha Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya..  Mulayo ṱalusa maitele ane tea tevhelwa musi hu tshi tholwa vhathu kha poswo khulwane.

src_text: Umthangalasisekelo Womphakathi .
tgt_text: Zwa zwino thivhela vhaofisiri vha tshitshavha vhahulwane uri vha vhe na vhuimo kha zwa poḽotiki kha mahoro zwa poḽotiki.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikusolile ukugirizwa komthangalasisekelo ogirizwe zizakhamuzi zeThongathi KwaZulu-Natala lokhuya nazitjhagalela ukuthola amanzi.
tgt_text: Nga Mulayo uyu hafhu, poswo dza mulanguli wa masipala dzi lavhelelwa kungedzelwa kha lushaka lwoṱhe itela kunga vhunzhi ha vhonkhetheni vho teaho..  Khabinethe na fulufhelo uri tshanduko idzi dzi ḓo khwaṱhisedza uri avho vhane vha tholwa kana khethwa kha maimo aneo vha ḓo kona bveledza zwe vha fulufhedzisa itela uri ri swikelele ṋetshedzo ya vhutshilo ha khwine kha vhathu vhoṱhe.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombele izakhamuzi ukuthi zizincenge, zehlise ummoya, njengoba phela nakhu sewuthomile umsebenzi wokulungisa ubuTsengelo baManzi beThongathi.
tgt_text: Vhugevhenga.

Khabinethe yo khoḓa vhashumi vha thelisaho zwiṱunḓwa vha Tshumelo ya Muthelo ya Afrika Tshipembe nge vha wana  785 kg ya zwidzidzivhadzi zwa crystal meth zwi linganaho R236 miḽioni ya thengiso siho mulayoni ngei OR Tambo International Airport nga Swondaha ya ḽa 28 Ṱhangule ṅwaha wa dzumbululwa ha zwidzidzivhadzi izwi zwo ḓo rumela mulaedza wa khaidzo kha zwigwada zwa vhugevhenga ho dzudzanywaho wa uri vhuimangalavha ha dzhena na bva ho tsireledzwa vhukuma nahone vhaofisiri vhashu vha khou shuma nga maanḓa fhelisa zwiito zwa vhugevhenga vhuṅwe na vhuṅwe  Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyakuzwisisa ukujanyelwa ziinhloko kwezakhamuzi ezikateleleke ukuthi zisebenzise iinlori ezithutha amanzi isikhathi eside, solo kwasahlela iinkhukhula phambilini nonyaka.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa Khoro nga ha Ṱhoḓisiso ya Pfunzo ya Nṱha (CHE)  kha Miholo ya Ṱhoho dza zwa Pfunzo na Ndaulo Dziyunivesithi (Vice Chancellors) na Vhalanguli vha Vhahulwane Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Nokho-ke nanyana kunjalo, inturhu nokudungeka kwezinto akusizinto ezingaba sisombululo, kanti nokugirizwa komthangalasisekelo womphakathi kunomthelela omumbi phezu kwabantu bendawo le kwaphela.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo nyeṱulelwa nga ha mvelelo dza ṱhoḓisiso ya CHE ye ya tiwa nga ṅwaha wa 2020 nga Minisṱa wa Pfunzo ya Nṱha, Saintsi na Vhutumbuli, Dokotela Vho Blade Nzimande ṱola ḽeveḽe dza muholo na maitele fanaho zwa khorondangi dza yunivesithi kha miṅwaha fhiraho 15 bva nga ṅwaha wa 2005 swika wa..  Ṱhoḓisiso yo vha ya wana nḓila yo khwaṱhaho konadzeaho na mveledziso ya dziyunivesithi kana sekhithara ya pfunzo ya nṱha kha shango.
Muvhigo uyu sumbedzisa mawanwa mahulwane khathihi na themendelo  dza ndulamiso dzo dzinginywaho.

src_text: UmThetho Wee-2022 WamaTjhuguluko Wamahlelo WaboMasipala BeeNdawo  zemaKhaya   .
tgt_text: Themendelo dzi ṋetshedza, vhukati ha dziṅwe, maitele miholo khwaṱhaho nahone ane vha khagala thomiwa ha tshiimiswa tsha vhulavhelesi tsho imaho nga tshoṱhe tsha nga nnḓa ingamela maitele u dzhia tsheo dza miholo dovha ya ṋetshedza khwaṱhiswa ha sisiṱeme dza ela kushumele kha zwiimiswa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukutlikitlelwa emthethweni nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ukutjhugululwa komThetho wee-2022 wamaHlelo waboMasipala (umThetho 3 wee-2022).
tgt_text: Ngudo yo dovha ya dzhiela nṱha vhuhulu ho fhambanaho ya zwiimiswa izwi na dovha ita ndinganyiso na maitele dzitshaka.

src_text: UmThetho lo unqophe ukwenza ngcono amandla wokusebenza newokuziphatha kwaborhulumende beendawo.
tgt_text: Minisṱa wa Pfunzo ya Nṱha, Saintsi na Vhutumbuli vha khou lavhelelwa haseledza nga ha muvhigo uyu na vhurangaphanḓa ha yunivesithi sa ḽiga ḽa khwaṱhisa zwiimiswa zwa pfunzo izwi.

src_text: Umthetho lo uyingcenye yemizamo karhulumende yokwenza  iKoro yabaSebenzi bemBusweni irage umsebenzi wayo ngekambiso yamakghonofundwa ibe iqinisekise ukuthi abantu bahlala benzelwa izenzelwa ekufanele benzelwe zona, njengelungelo elisisekelo elimumethwe mThethosisekelo weRiphabhligi yeSewula Afrika we-.
tgt_text: Muvhigo ḓo anḓadzwa nga murahu kha webusaithi ya Muhasho wa Pfunzo ya Nṱha na Vhutumbuli: www.dhet.gov.za.
Tshanduko Ṱavhanyedzaho ya Khaphasithi ya Ṱhoḓisiso na Pfunzo  kha Sekhithara ya Pfunzo ya Nṱha.

src_text: UmThetho lo uhlathulula ikambiso ekumele ilandelwe nakuqatjhelwa iinkhundla eziphakemeko.
tgt_text: Khabinethe tikedza themendelo ya risetshe mbili dzo itwaho eletshedza nga ha maga ane fanela dzhiwa itela ṱavhanyisa tshanduko ya risetshe na khaphasithi ya funza kha zwiimiswa zwa ngudo dza nṱha.

src_text: Nje awusavumi ukuthi iimphathimandla zembusweni zeenkhundla eziphakemeko ziphathe neenkhundla eziphakemeko eenqhemeni zepolitiki.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa thoma wo itwa nga Tshigwada tsha Mushumo tsha Dziminisṱa ṱoḓisisa zwithivheli zwi thivhelaho mushumo wa thola fara vhashumi na mvelaphanḓa ya  vhorapfunzo vha vharema Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Okhunye, njengoba sekusebenza lomThetho nje, iinkhundla ezivulekileko zabaphathi babomasipala  kulindeleke ukuthi zikhangiswe elizweni loke kobanyana zizokudosa abafakiimbawo abafaneleko babe banengi ngokungakghonakalako.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa vhuvhili – wo itwa nga Muhasho wa Saintsi na Vhutumbuli na Tshiimiswa tsha Ṱhoḓisiso tsha Lushaka – wo itwa nga Yunivesithi dza Afrika Tshipembe, vhuimeli ha tshiimiswa ho angaredzaho ha yunivesithi dza muvhuso dza 26 kha shango.

Mivhigo heyi yoṱhe dzinginya zwiṱirathedzhi zwa thusedzo ṱavhanyisa tshanduko kha masia maṱanu ṱanḓavhuwaho, ane vha kha postgraduate pineline; vhudzheneli nga vhashumi; mvelele ya tshiimiswa na maitele; mbekanyamushumo na tshiṱirathedzhi, na zwiko zwi si zwinzhi.

src_text: IKhabinethi inesiqiniseko sokuthi amatjhuguluko la azakuqinisekisa ukuthi labo abazakuqatjhelwa iinkhundlezi bazakukghona ukugcina iinthembiso zabo kobanyana woke umuntu azokuphila ipilo engcono.
tgt_text: Pfano ya Dzitshaka nga ha Zwiko zwa Dzhenetiki zwa Zwimela zwa Zwiḽiwa na Vhulimi (Pfano).
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Pfano Phalamenndeni uri sainwe sa thendelano.

src_text: Ubulelesi .
tgt_text: Hezwi zwi ḓo ita uri Afrika Tshipembe ḽi vhe tshipiḓa tsha madzangano a Pfano, ine ya eletshedza mashango ane vha muraḓo ambedzana na vhona uri hu na tshumiso yo khwaṱhaho ya zwiko zwa dzhenetiki zwa zwimela zwa zwiḽiwa na vhulimi saina Pfano iyi zwi ḓo dovha zwa khwaṱhisa vhuḓikumedzeli ha shango kha ndondolo na kushumisele ko khwaṱhaho kwa zwiko zwa dzhenetiki zwa zwimela, na ṋetshedza thikhedzo kha zwitshavha zwa mahayani.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuke iimphathimandla zeZiko eliButhelela umThelo leSewula Afrika (i-SARS) eziqalene nezomthelo wepahla ekuthengiselanwa ngayo namazwe wangaphandle ngokubamba isidakamizwa i-crystal meth ema-785 kg ebeyingathengiswa ngemali eziingidi ezima-R236, edoyelweni laboflayi i-OR Tambo International ngoSondo nakama-28 kuRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Muhanga wa Tshanduko ya Ikonomi Katelaho vhoṱhe (Just Transition) ya Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Ukubanjwa kwalesisidakamizwa kuzakuthumela umlayezo ozwakala kuhle eenqhemeni zehlanganyela yeenlelesi ukuthi siqinile isandla sevikeleko emasangweni wokungena nokuphuma elizweni lekhethu, nokuthi iimphathimandla zelizwe lekhethu zisebenza ngokukhuthala ukucitha nanyana kungaba ngebamhlobobani ubulelesi      Iinqunto Zekhabinethi.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muhanga wa Tshanduko ya Ikonomi Katelaho vhoṱhe uri thome shumiswa.

src_text: Umbiko Wephenyo Womkhandlu Wezefundo Ephakemeko (i-CHE) Ngomrholo Wama-Vice Chancellor Kunye Neenkhulu Eziphethe Iinkhundla Eziphakemeko ESewula Afrika                                                                                                                                .
tgt_text: Muhanga ṋetshedza bono ḽi fanaho ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽi linganaho na ḽi konḓelelaho kilima ṱalutshedza masia milayo na mbekanyamaitele zwa swikelela izwi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibikelwe ngomphumela wephenyo le-CHE elatlanywa nguNgqongqotjhe wezeFundo ePhakemeko, zeSayensi nezaMandla wokuSungula uDorh.
tgt_text: Muhanga wa tshanduko ḓo kwama muthu muṅwe na muṅwe Afrika Tshipembe, na ṋetshedza tshikhala tsha tandulula vhushayandingano ha tshifhinga tsho fhiraho khathihi na sika ikonomi vhuedzaho vhoṱhe.

src_text: Blade Nzimande ngomnyaka wee-2020, kobanyana kuphenywe ngezinga lemirholo yeenkhulu eziphethe amayunivesithi esikhathini seminyaka eli-15 ukusukela ngomnyaka wee-2005 ukuyokufika kowee-.
tgt_text: Khomishini ya Kilima ya Phresidennde yo tshimbidza maitele vhukwamani vhuhulwane na vhashumisani vha wana thikhedzo yo ṱanḓavhuwaho ya muhanga.

Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza uri tsudzuluwo ya kha ikonomi sa shumisi khaboni nga ṅwaha wa 2050 fanela tikedza dzangalelo ḽa lushaka, hu tshi katela na mishumo ya khwine ya vhoṱhe,  khwiniso ya vhudzheneli ha tshitshavhani na pheliso ya vhushai.

src_text: Umnqopho wephenyweli kuthola ukuthi amayunivesithi namkha ikoro yefundo ephakemeko elizweni lekhethu anobubambelelo obungangani, akghona kangangani ukwenza izinto ekufanele azenze nokuthi athuthuka kangangani.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha vhashumisani na muvhuso tikedza na ṱanganedza muhanga uyu.

src_text: Umbiko lo uveza amaphuzu aqakathekileko walokho okutholwe nabekuphenywa, okuphekelelwa ziimphakamiso zokuthi kungenziwani ukulungisa lapho kunetlhayelo khona.
tgt_text: Pulane yo dodombedzwaho ya thoma shumisa muhanga ḓo bveledzwa, nahone ḓo dzheniswa kha vhupulani ha muvhuso na maitele mugaganyagwama.
Garaṱa dza Ḽaisentsi ya reila Ntswa dza Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Hlangana nokhunye okuphakanyiswako, kuphakanyiswa nokuthi kuqiniswe iindlela zokurhola, nehlelo lemirholo libe yinto eyenzelwa emkhanyweni.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ḓo thoma shumiswa ha Garaṱa ya Ḽaisentsi ya reila ntswa ine ya vha na zwidodombedzwa zwa tsireledzo zwa khwine fhira ine ya vha hone zwino.

src_text: Ukusungulwa kwesijamiso sangaphandle esizijameleko esizakwengamela ihlelo lokuthathwa kweenqunto zemirholo.
tgt_text: Sisiṱeme ya zwino yo shumiswa bva kha ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Kuphakanyiswa godu nokuqiniswa kwamahlelo wokuhlunga amazinga wokusebenza kilamaziko wezefundo ephakemeko.
tgt_text: Thekhinoḽodzhi bva zwenezwo yo no shanduka nahone zwi vho ḓura ṱhogomela themamveledziso ya ḽaisentsi dzine ndi kale ri khou shumisa dzone kha tshifhinga tsha zwino.

src_text: Iphenyweli godu liqalelele nobukhulu obuhlukahlukako bamaziko wezefundo la, godu  lalinganisa nangamazinga wamazwe ngamazwe.
tgt_text: Garaṱa ntswa yo dzinginywaho ḓo ita uri ḽaisentsi ya reila kone shuma na International Information Technology Personal Identification Compliant Driving Licence (ISO18013).
Mbekanyamaitele ya Mbekanyamushumo dza Mishumo ya Tshitshavha dzo Engedzwaho (EPWP).

src_text: UNgqongqotjhe wezeFundo ePhakemeko, zeSayensi nezaMandla wokuSungula kulindeleke bona abonisane nabarholi bamayunivesithi njengegadango lokuqinisa leziinjamiso zefundo.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ḓivhadzwa kha  gazethe mvetomveto ya Mbekanyamaitele ya EPWP itela vhukwamani na tshitshavha.

src_text: Ngalokho-ke umbiko lo uzakumenyezelwa kubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeFundo nokuThwasisa: www.dhet.gov.za.
tgt_text: EPWP ndi iṅwe ya mbekanyamushumo khulwane dza muvhuso yo livhiswaho kha ṋetshedza ṱhaḓulo ya muholo na kha vhushai nga sika zwikhala zwa mushumo wa tshifhinga nyana, nga maanḓa kha vhaswa na vhafumakadzi.

Mvetomveto ya mbekanyamaitele ntswa khwaṱhisa mbekanyamushumo na ṋea ṱhaluso kha masia fanaho na zwa miholo, modele wa ndambedzo na tsireledzo ya matshilisano, na livhanyisa EPWP na maitele zwa mushumo ano maḓuvha ṱuṱuwedza vhushumisani vhukati ha muvhuso na sekhithara ya phuraivethe kha khwaṱhisedza uri  EPWP shela mulenzhe zwihulwane vhukuma kha tsiko ya mishumo yavhuḓi na fhungudza vhushai.

src_text: ITjhuguluko Elikhanjiswa Msinyana Lephenyo Nekghono Lokufundisa Ekorweni Yezefundo Ephakemeko     .
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele iyi ḓo ṱuṱuwedza vhutumbuli kha mathomo mbekanyamushumo ya mishumo ya tshitshavha mona na shango.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyazisekela iimphakamiso zamaphenyo amabili la athunywe ukuphakamisa amagadango angasetjenziswa kobanyana azokukhambisa msinyana umsebenzi wokwenza amatjhuguluko werhubhululo namandla wokufundisa emaziko wefundo ephakemeko.
tgt_text: Khwiniso kha Tshigwada tsha Vhuṋa tsha Khoini ya Tshifumi ya Afrika Tshipembe.
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muelo, dizaini na bveledzwa ha Tshigwada tsha Vhuṋa tsha Khoini ya Tshifumi ya ṅwaha wa 2023 ya Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Umbiko wokuthoma uhlanganiswe siQhema somSebenzi saboNgqongqotjhe ebesiphenya ngezinto ebeziliya ukuqatjhwa, nokuhlala kunye nokuthuthuka kweemfundiswa zabantu abanzima eSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: (Fourth Decimal Coin Series).

src_text: Umbiko wesibili ¬–   olayelwe mNyango wezeSayensi nezaMandla wokuSungula kunye nehlangano yezerhubhululo i-National Research Foundation – uhlanganiswe yiYunivesithi yeSewula Afrika (i-UNISA), eyona yengamele nejamele  amayunivesithi womphakathi ama-26 welizwe lekhethu.
tgt_text: Yo ṱanganedza sisiṱeme ya sielisana nga ṅwaha nga ṅwaha shumisa nyambo dza tshiofisi kha tshigwada tsha vhuṋa tsha khoini ya tshifumi.
Ipfi ‘Afrika Tshipembe’ ḽi ḓo dzheniswa kha lurumbu luthihi lwa dzikhoini khathihi na ganḓiswa nga nyambo dza tshiofisi dzoṱhe.

src_text: Yomibili imibiko le iphakamisa iindlela ezingasetjenziswa ukukhambisa amatjhuguluko msinyana emakorweni amahlanu angamakhulu, weemfundo ezitholakala ngemva kweziqu zokuthoma zeyunivesithi; ukuhlanganyela kwabasebenzi bemayunivesithi; isiko nejayelo yamaziko wezefundo;  umthethokambiso namahlelo wokwenza izinto, kunye nemithombo yamandla elinganiselweko nofana eyimbijana.
tgt_text: Nyambo tharu dzi ḓo shumiswa kha khoini ya R5; nyambo mbili kha dzikhoini dza R2; 50c, 20c na 10c, R1 ḓo vha nga luambo luthihi.
Nyambo dzoṱhe hedzi dzi ḓo shumiswa nga sielisana nga ṅwaha nga ṅwaha  kha miṅwaha ya 10 ḓaho.

src_text: Isivumelwano Samazwe Ngamazwe Ngemithombo Yamandla Yeentjalo Zendabuko Ekugomeni Nakezokulima (isiVumelwano).
tgt_text: Mvetomveto ya Mbekanyamitele yo Ṱanganelaho ya Ndangulo ya Khwaḽithi ya Maḓi (IWQM)  ya ṅwaha wa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa kwesiVumelwano ePalamende kobanyana iyosiqinisa.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza anḓadzwa kha gazethe ha Mvetomveto ya Mbekanyamaitele ya IWQM itela vhukwamani na tshitshavha.

src_text: Lokhu-ke kuzakwenza iSewula Afrika ibe yingcenye yeenqhema zalesisiVumelwano, sona esibonisa amazwe amalunga ngokulondwa nokuqinisekiswa kokubabalelwa kokusetjenziswa kwemithombo yamandla yeentjalo zendabuko ekugomeni nakezokulima.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele yo dzinginywaho ḓo dzhena vhudzuloni ha Mbekanyamaitele ya WQM yo thomiwaho nga ṅwaha wa 1991 ine zwazwino yo fhelelwaho nga tshifhinga na tshiṱirathedzhi tshayo tshe tsha thoma shuma nga ṅwaha wa..  Mbekanyamaitele iyi sumbedzisa zwigwada zwa milayo zwine zwa ḓo vhumba mutheo wa ndangulo ya khwaḽithi ya maḓi ṋetshedza ndivhanyiso kha milayo yoṱhe elanaho na zwa maḓi khathihi na vhuḓikumedzeli ha ḽino shango kha khaedu ya ḽifhasi kha zwa ṋetshedzo na ndondolo ya maḓi sa tshiko tshi shaeaho.
Mvetomveto ya Mbekanyamaitele ya Sipekiṱiramu tsha Firikhwentsi ya Radio tsha Murafho tevhelaho.

src_text: Ukuqiniswa kwalesisiVumelwano kuzakubuye kuqinise namandla welizwe lekhethu wokuzibophelela ekulondeni nekubabaleleni ukusetjenziswa kwemithombo yamandla yeentjalo zemvelo, kusekelwe nabantu beendawo zemakhaya.
tgt_text: (Draft Next Generation Radio Frequency Spectrum Policy).
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza khanḓiso ya Mbekanyamaitele ya Sipekiṱiramu tsha Firikhwensti ya Radio tsha Murafho tevhelaho itela wana mahumbulwa nga tshitshavha.

src_text: Umtlamo Olungileko Wokweyamela Ematjhugulukweni ESewula Afrika    .
tgt_text: Tshipekiṱiramu tsha firikhwentsi ya Radio ndi tshiko tsha mupo tshi sa vusuledzwi tshine tsha vha tsha vhuṱhogwa kha nyaluwo ya ikonomi ya didzhithala na themamveledziso ya zwa vhudavhidzani.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukuphunyeleliswa komTlamo oLungileko wokweYamela emaTjhugulukweni.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele iyi yo dzinginywaho yo itelwa tikedza khovhelo ya sipekiṱiramu na ṋea ḽaisentsi ya ṱhingothendeleki dzi shumaho nga netiweke, khasho; ngudo ya saintsi ya zwa vhufhufhi na zwa maḓini; ṱhoḓisiso na mveledziso; tswikelelo ya tshitshavha, na dziṅwe nḓowetshumo dzi elanaho na zwenezwi.

src_text: Umtlamo lo uza nenembombono ekuvunyelanwa ngayo, elungileko, yeSewula Afrika elungele ukujamelana nanyana yitlayimethi enjani.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele iyi dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedza khovhelo linganaho na ndi nganyiso kha vhushelamulenzhe kha tshanduko ya sekhithara na tswikelelo ya ṱhumo ya didzhithala na kha zwipiḓa zwa nnḓa zwa shango.

src_text: Uhlathulula ikambisolawulo nomthethokambiso wokuphumelelisa lokhu.
tgt_text: Fulo ḽa nanga Nkhetheni wa Afrika Tshipembe wa Khoro ya Dzitshaka ya Mbumbano ya Vhudavhidzani ha kule (ITU)  na Bodo ya Milayo ya Radio.

src_text: Umtlamo wokweyamela ematjhugulukweni lo uzakuthinta woke umuntu eSewula Afrika, kanti unjalo nje godu uvula nethuba lokulungisa okwakungakalungi kusukela eminyakeni eyadlulako, ube wakhe nomnotho ozakuhlomulisa boke abantu.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza nkhetheni nangiwaho wa Afrika Tshipembe Vho Mandla Samuel Mchunu kha Bodo ya Milayo ya Radio ya ITU (Region .
Vho Mchunu zwa zwino vha khou shuma sa muraḓo wa bodo.

src_text: IKomitjhini yobeNgameli ngezeTlayimethi ikhe yaphuma ijima elinabileko lokubonisana nababelani, yathola isekelo elikhulu ngomtlamo lo.
tgt_text: Ho khou dzingingwa ḽa uri vha dovhe vha khethiwe kha Khoro ya ITU kha themu ya ṅwaha wa 2023 swika..  Khetho dzi ḓo vha hone nga tshifhinga tsha Khonferentsi ya Vhuimeli ha mashango (Plenipotentiary) ha ITU ine ya ḓo farelwa ngei Bucharest, kha shango ḽa Romania bva nga ḽa 26 Khubvumedzi swika nga ḽa 14 Tshimedzi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ifakazele ukuthi ukweyamela ehlelweni elizakwenza ukuthi ilizwe lekhethu libe selinganammoya osilaphazekileko ngomnyaka wee-2050, kufuze kusekele iinrhuluphelo zetuthuko yelizwe loke, sekubalwa nemisebenzi ehloniphekileko kibo boke abantu, ukuqalelelwa kwabantu boke kunye nokurarhwa kobuchaka nomtlhago wabo.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi dzula ḽo ḓikumedzela kha zwipikwa na ndivho ya ITU ya vala mukano wa zwa didzhithala na ṱumanya vhathu vhoṱhe vha ḽifhasi  Vhuṱambo vhu khou ḓaho.
Ṅwedzi wa Vhufa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombele boke ababelani bomphakathi ukuthi basingathe bebasekele umtlamo lo.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhufa nga Khubvumedzi uno ṅwaha ḓo pembelelwa nga fhasi ha thero: “U pembelela Ifa ḽa Vho Solomon Linda na Muzika wa Mvelele wa Afrika Tshipembe”.

src_text: Kuzokuhlanganiswa ihlelo eliphelele ngemininingwana lokuphumelelisa umtlamo lo, kanti-ke lizakuthi lingatlanywa bese lihlanganiswa nehlelo likarhulumende lokulungiselela izinto nokuhlelela iimali..     Ikarada Lelayisense Yokutjhayela Elitjha ESewula Afrika   .
tgt_text: Khabinethe ṱuṱuwedza Maafrika Tshipembe vhoṱhe pembelela vhufa ha mvelele yashu ho pfumaho na phambano zwine zwa vha na maanḓa u ri ṱanganya sa lushaka.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuvumele ukujanyiselelwa kweKarada leLayisense yokuTjhayela esetjenziswa njenganje, ijanyiselelwe ngekarda eliphephe ngcono.
tgt_text: Ri fanela ḓikumedzela roṱhe kha shumisana itela fhelisa phambano na vhushayavhulamukanyi zwa tshifhinga tsho fhiraho khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza vhuḓipfi ha muhumbulo wa ḓihudza nga vha Muafrika Tshipembe  Milaedza fhululedzaKhabinethe yo rumela maipfi u fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha:Vhathu vhoṱhe vho winaho, vho thubaho mimedala na vhaṱaṱisani vhe vha dzhenela kha 95th Comrades Marathon, une wa ḓivheswa nga pfi “Ultimate Human Race”, nga Swondaha, ya ḽa 28 Ṱhangule.

Mbambe ya vhanna yo winwa nga Tete Dijana (awara dza 5, minetse ya 30, na mithethe ya 38) ane bva Mahikeng ngei Vhukovhela ha Devhula ngeno mugidimi wa shango ḽa Russia Alexandra Morozova (awara dza 6, minetse ya 17, na mithethe ya 47) wina mbambe ya vhafumakadzi.

src_text: Ihlelo ekusebenza ngalo ilayisense yekarada yanje solo lathoma ukusebenza ngomnyaka we-.

Ikarada elitjha ekuphakanyiswa ukuthi kujanyiselelwe ngalweli lizakwenza ilayisense yokutjhayela yekhethwapha ikhambisane nechwephetjhe lethekhnoloji yamazwe ngamazwe, i-International Information Technology Personal Identification Compliant Driving Licence (i-ISO18013).
tgt_text: NdilisoKhabinethe yo rumela maipfi ndiliso kha vha muṱa na dzikhonani dza:Mama Vho Rita Alice Ndzanga (88), Mulwelambofholowo wa kale na mutshimbidzi wa dzangano ḽa vhashumi vhe vha dovha vha vha muṱanganedzi wa National Order of Luthuli nga ṅwaha wa 2004 kha “vhushelamulenzhe ha vhutshilo havho hoṱhe kha nndwa ya lwela pfanelo dza vhashumi na swikelelwa ha Afrika Tshipembe ḽa demokirasi ḽi sa khethululi nga muvhala, nga mbeu nahone ḽo vhofholowaho ”.Vhaofisiri vha Tshumelo ya Mapholisa ya Afrika Tshipembe (SAPS)  vhe vha vha vhe vhaṋameli kha bupo ḽa SAPS ḽe ḽa wa ngei Rand Airport, Germiston nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 30 Ṱhangule.
Vha SAPS vha khou ita ṱhoḓisiso ya tshivhangi tsha wa ha bupo iḽo.

src_text: Umthethokambiso Wehlelo Elinabileko Lemisebenzi Yomphakathi (i-EPWP).
tgt_text: Khabinethe tamela mashudu mutshimbidzabupo huvhalesaho uri fhola nga ṱavhanya  tholwa tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa nga murahu ha senguluswa ha ndalukano khathihi na ṱanzwiwa madzina ho teahoa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukugazedwa komtlamo womThethokambiso we-EPWP kobanyana kuyokubonisanwa ngawo nomphakathi.
tgt_text: Mufumakadzi Vho Gugulethu Abigail Thimane sa Muthusa Mulangi (DDG): Vhuvheaiṱo kha Sekhithara ya Muvhuso na Mveledziso ya Khaphasithi kha Muhasho wa Vhupulani, Vhuvheaiṱo na ela  Mufumakadzi Vho Kwena Komape sa DDG: Mveledziso ya zwa Ikonomi, Mbambadzo na Vhuvhambadzi kha Muhasho wa Vhulimi, Mvusuludzo ya Mavu na Mveledziso ya Mahayani  Dokotela Vho Bongani Elias Sithole sa DDG: Senthara ya Ndangulo ya Tshiwo tsha Lushaka kha Muhasho wa Vhuvhusi ha Tshumisano.

src_text: Zamandla.
tgt_text: Fulufulu.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ibikelwe nguNgqongqotjhe womNyango wezamaBubulo kaRhulumende u- Pravin Gordhan ngekghono le-Eskom lokukhandela ukucinywa-cinywa kwegezi kwenzelwa ukuyonga begodu ifumene umbiko weKomidi eTjheja ubuJamo obuQokamileko beGezi eliZweniloke.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ḓivhadzwa nga ha vhukoni ha Eskom ha fhungudza zwa khauwa ha muḓagasi zwine zwa khou dzulela itea tshifhinga tshoṱhe nga Minisṱa wa Mabindu Muvhuso khathihi na ṱanganedza muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa yo no itwaho swika zwino bva kha Komiti ya zwa Thekiniki ine ya vha nga fhasi ha Komiti ya Lushaka ya nga ha Thaidzo dza Fulufulu.

src_text: Ezinye iimmemezelo zikokwethulwa ngemva kokubanjwa kwemikhulumiswano engeneneleko yokuqalisisa imibiko le.
tgt_text: Hu ḓo dovha hafhu ha vha na dziṅwe nḓivhadzo dzine dza ḓo itwa nga murahu ha khunyeledzwa ha nyambedzano dzo khwaṱhaho dza nga ha mivhigo iyi.

src_text: Ikhabinethi iveze ukudana kwayo ngokuphazamiseka nokugugunywa kucinywa cinywa kwegezi okuthikameza amabhizinisi namakhaya, khulukhulu ukucinywokhu nakwenzeka lokha urhulumende nakalukana namano wokungenelela amenyezelwa nguMengameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa ngoVelabahlinze wee-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱahisa vhaisala hayo nga thithisea na kanganyisea hune ha khou vhangwa nga khauwa ha muḓagasi kha vhoramabindu na ngomu miṱani, nga maanḓa musi zwi tshi khou bvelela nga tshifhinga tshine muvhuso wa khou ḓidzhenisa kha maga u tandulula thaidzo iyi a ḓivhadzwa nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa nga ṅwedzi wa Fulwana.
Vhubindudzi.

src_text: Zamasiso .
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rwelwa ṱari ha Ḽimaga ḽiswa ḽa zwa Vhumagi ḽa Sandvik Khomanani, fhaḽa Kempton Park, ḽe ḽa vha tshipiḓa tsha pfulufhedziso dza zwa vhubindudzi ha masheleni linganaho R350-miḽioni dze dza itwa nga tshifhinga tsha Muṱangano wa zwa Vhubindudzi wa Afrika Tshipembe (SAIC) we wa farelwa fhaḽa Sentharani ya Miṱangano ya Sandton, ḓoroboni ya Johannesburg nga ḽa 24 Ṱhafamuhwe..     Tshifhaṱo itshi tshiswa tsha muelo linganaho 62 000 square-metre ndi tshine tsha ṱanganyisa fhethu huthihi mishumo ye kale ya vha tshi itwa kha mamaga maṱanu fhambanaho nahone tshi na vhashumi vha swikaho.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yemukele ukuhlonywa kwesiKhungo sokuKhiqiza i-Sandvik Khomanani e-Kempton Park esingesitjha esaba yingcenye yesithembiso samasiso aziinGidi ezima-R350 esenziwa kuKhomferensi yesiNe yamaSiso yeSewula Afrika (i-SAIC) egade ibanjelwe e-Sandton Convention Centre eJwanasbhege mhla ama- 24 kuNtaka wee-..     Isikhungo esitjhesi esiziinkwere zamamitha azii-62 000 sihlanganisa imisebenzi egade ngaphambilini ebeyenziwa eendaweni ezihlanu ezihlukeneko begodu simumethe abasebenzi ababalelwa ema-.
tgt_text: Ndi ḽiṅwe ḽa mamaga ha Sandvik mahulwanesa nahone musalauno ḽifhasini ḽoṱhe ḽine ḽa vha na vhukoni ha bveledza magandakanda u shuma migodini hu tshi shumiswa 60% ya zwibveledzwa zwa fhano Afrika Tshipembe..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza madalo zwa vhulavhelesi nga Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa ngei KwaZulu-Natal nga tshifhinga tsha musi hu tshi rwelwa ṱari tshiimiswa tsha zwa vhumagi tsha Hesto Harnesses fhaḽa Stanger, hune ha vha KwaDukuza nga ḽa 13 Khubvumedzi.

src_text: Lesi singesinye seenkhungo zakwa-Sandvik ezikulu nezithuthuke khulu ephasini zombelele begodu sikghona ukukhiqiza imitjhini/abomakalanyana bokulayitjha emathunjini wephasi abakhandwe ngeengcenye zeensimbi ezenza ama-60% zeSewula Afrika..     IKhabinethi ilemukele nevakatjho likaMengameli u-Ramaphosa lokuyokuHlola KwaZulu-Natala nagade kuhlonywa isikhungo sokukhiqiza i-Hesto Harnessese e-Stanger, KwaDukuza mhla ali-13 kuKhukhulamungu wee-.
tgt_text: Hetshi tshiimiswa ndi tshiṅwe tsha thandela ṱhanu khulwane dzine dza vha tshipiḓa tsha pfulufhedziso dzi linganaho  4-biḽioni dze dza itwa nga vha ha Metair Investments Limited itela tikedza zwa engedzwa na fhaṱwa ha mimoḓoro miswa ya Ford Ranger fhano hayani.

src_text: Isikhungwesi sihlangana nezinye ezihlanu zamaphrojekthi ayingcenye wokusisa ayingcenye yesithembiso samaBhiliyoni ali-R. 4 esenziwe yikhampani i-Metair Investments Limited ukusekela umsebenzi wokunatjiswa nokukhuliswa komkhiqizo womhlobo omutjha we-Ford Ranger elizweni lekhethu.
tgt_text: Phresidennde vho dovha hafhu vha dzhenela vhuṱambo ha vulwa ha thandela ya vusuluswa na engedzwa ha ḽimaga ḽa Sappi Saiccor Mill ḽine ḽa ḓura masheleni linganaho R7,7 biḽioni fhaḽa Umkomaas, zwine hezwi zwo livhiswa kha engedza vhukoni khathihi na vhea khamphani iyi kha maimo nṱhesa ḽifhasini ngeno nga thungo hu tshi khou sikwa zwikhala zwa mishumo ya tshifhinga tshipfufhi na ya tshifhinga tshilapfu.

src_text: UMengameli ubuye wahlangela  ukuvulwa kwephrojekthi evuselelweko nenatjisiweko  i-Sappi Saiccor Mill ebize  amaBhiliyoni ali-R7,7 eMkhomazi, ekunqotjhwe ngayo ukwandisa ikghono lekhampani lokuphalisana ephasiniloke ngokunjalo kuvuleke namathuba womsebenzi wesikhatjhana newesikhathi eside..     Amasiso la ayingcenye yeenthembiso ezenziwa bosomabubulo kukhomferensi ye- SAIC.
tgt_text: Hovhu vhubindudzi vhu vhumba tshipiḓa tsha pfulufhedziso dze dza itwa nga vhoranḓowetshumo nga tshifhinga tsha muṱangano wa SAIC.

src_text: Amasiso amatjha ngelizweni lekhethu asiza ekwakhiweni kabutjha nekuvuseleleni umnotho weKhethu godu amasiso la abeka iSewula Afrika ebujameni bokukarekelwa ngamanye amazwe ayibone ililizwe lapho kungasiswa khona.
tgt_text: Vhubindudzi vhuṅwe na vhuṅwe vhuswa kha shango ḽashu vhu thusa kha vusuluswa na vhuedzedzwa ha ikonomi yashu khathihi na vhea shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe sa fhethu havhuḓi ha zwa vhubindudzi..     Mveledziso ya themamveledziso.

src_text: Ukuthuthukiswa Komthangalasisekelo.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza vulwa ha tshipiḓa tshiswa tsha bada ya Musina Ring Road ngei Limpopo ine ya ḓo leludzela vhathu uri vha kone enda zwavhuḓi mona na ḓorobo ya Musina khathihi na ita uri hu vhe na engedzea ha mbambadzo na miṅwe mishumo ya zwa ikonomi vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe khathihi na maṅwe mashango Tshitshavha tsha Mveledziso tsha Tshipembe ha Afrika.

src_text: IKhabinethi yemukele ukuvulwa kwengcenye etja yendlela i-Musina Ring Road e-Limpopo ezokwenza kukhambeke lula ngaphakathi kwedrobha ye-Musina begodu ngokuvumela ukwanda kwerhwebo nokwabelana ngezomnotho hlangana neSewula Afrika neHlangano eThuthukisa amaZwe angeSewula ye-Afrika.
tgt_text: Thandela ya masheleni swikaho R640-miḽioni yo sika mishumo ya tshoṱhe linganaho 275 hu tshi itelwa vhadzulapo vha vhupo honoho khathihi na ṋetshedza zwikhala kha zwitshavha zwapo hu tshi katelwa na mabindu maṱuku vhukati na mahulwane (SMMEs)..     Uhu fhaṱwa ha bada ya Musina Ring Road ndi tshipiḓa tsha muvhuso tsha mbekanyamushumo ya themamveledziso ya muvhuso, hu tshi shumiswa ERRP ine muhumbulo wayo muhulwane wa vha bveledza nyaluwo katelaho vhoṱhe khathihi na zwikhala zwa mishumo kha sekhithara dzoṱhe dzo fhambanaho na zwitshavha nga angaredza..     Tshiwo tsha fhaḽa Jagersfontein.

src_text: Iphrojekthi le ebize iinGidi ezima-R640 ivulele abantu bekhethu imisebenzi yasafuthi engaphezulu kwama-275 yanikela nangamathuba emiphakathini yendawo le kunye namabhizinisi asakhasako (ama-SMME)..     Ukwakhiwa kwendlela i-Musina Ring Road kuyingcenye yehlelo likarhulumende lokuthuthukisa umthangalasisekelo, ngokusebenzisa iHlelo lokwAkha nokuVuselela umNotho (i-ERRP), kunqotjhwe ukukhulisa umnotho ohlanganyelweko namathuba wemisebenzi emikhakheni yoke nemiphakathini ehlukahlukeneko.
Ihlekelele ye-Jagersfontein.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṋetshedza mapifi ayo ndiliso kha vha miṱa ya avho vhe vha lovha  musi masalela mugodi wo ṱutshelwaho henefho kha vhupo honoho ha Jagersfontein vhu re vunḓuni ḽa Gauteng tshi swika hune pwashea, ha fhedza ho vha na lurofhe lwa khombo lwe lwa elela henefho musi ḓuvha ḽi tshi thoma bva nga matsheloni Swondaha, ya ḽa 11 Khubvumedzi.

src_text: 1     Ikhabinethi ibalilela imbiko beyiyaduduza emindenini yalabo abahlongakele ngemva kokugirika kwamaboda wedamu lekhucukhucu yemikhiqizo yemayini ese-Jagersfontein eFreyistata lapha kwadaleka iinkhukhula zedaka ezadala umonakalo ngokuphuma kwelanga ngoSondo nakali-11 kuKhukhulamungu wee-.
tgt_text: Tshiwo itsho tsho dovha hafhu tsha sia themamveledziso ya kha vhupo honoho, ndaka dza vhathu zwavho fana na zwiendedzi khathihi na miṱa minzhi zwo tshinyadzwa vhukuma.

src_text: Ihlekelele le yone khulu umthangalasisekelo, ipahla yabantu eziinkoloyi neenkumba ezithileko.. 2     Ngesikhathi nakavakatjhele indawo yehlekelele ngoMvulo, mhla ali-12 kuKhukhulamungu wee-2022, uMengameli u-Ramaphosa uthokoze imizamo eyenziweko ukuhlenga ipilo nokufunyanwa kwabongazimbi endaweni leya.
Wathembisa ukuthi urhulumende uzokunikela abahlali abathintekileko be-Jagersfontein ngesekelo elifaneleko.
Ikhabinethi ikhuthazekile ngokuthi abanikazi bemayini bathe bajame ngomumo ekunikeleni ngesizo lecwephetjhe nokusekela lokha nakungenzeka umKhandlu wezeNjiwa weSewula Afrika ubakhombele.
tgt_text: Nga tshifhinga tsha madalo avho henefho kha vhupo he tshiwo itshi tsha bvelela hone nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 12 Khubvumedzi 2022, Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vho sumbedza takalela mushumo wa phuluso na mbuedzedzo une wa khou itwa henefho kha vhupo honoho.

src_text: 3    Ibubulo lezeemayini lihlala limfakisandla oqakathekileko emnothweni ngemisebenzi enqophileko nengakanqophi, inzuzo ethunyelwa ngaphandle kwemikhawulo, namasiso wamazwe wangaphandle anqophileko godu lilima indima eqakathekileko ekwenzeni ngcono ipilo yemiphakathi emagega neemayini.
tgt_text: Vho dovha hafhu vha ṋea pfulufhedziso ya uri muvhuso ḓo ṋetshedza thikhedzo yo teaho kha vhadzulapo vha Jagersfontein vho kwameaho.

src_text: 4    Urhulumende neenhlangano ezingasebenzeli ukwenza inzuzo zingenelele msinyana ngokunikela iindawo zokufihla ihloko kwesikhatjhana, ukwelulekwa ngokomkhumbulo neendingoqangi eziziingubo, abomatrasi neemphuthelwana zokugoma.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedzea vhukuma nga fhungo ḽa uri vhaṋe vha mugodi uyu vho amba uri vho ḓiimisela ṋetshedza thuso na thikhedzo ya zwa thekiniki kha muvhuso arali hu tshi nga vha na khumbelo yo raloho nga vha Khoro ya zwa Minerala ya Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Ukuphakelwa kwamanzi nokusatjalaliswa kwegezi sekubuyiselwe esigeni.
5    Nasele kuhlwengiswe icabazi lehlekelele, abosonjiniyera balindeleke bona bayokuhlola umonakalo owenzekileko nokuphepha kweenkumba.
tgt_text: Nḓowetshumo ya zwa migodi kha ḓi vha yone shelaho mulenzhe zwihulwane kha ikonomi nga kha mishumo yo tou livhanaho nayo na miṅwe ya nga thungo, mbuelo dzi bvaho kha thundu dzi rengiselwaho nnḓa khathihi na vhubindudzi ho tou livhaho bva mashangoni nnḓa nahone dzi shela mulenzhe muhulwane kha khwinifhadza matshilo vhathu vha re kha zwitshavha zwine migodi yeneyo ya wanala khazwo.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokoze besizo elirhabako, iinhlangano zomphakathi namalunga womphakathi ngeminikelo nesizo labo.
Zomnotho .
tgt_text: Muvhuso khathihi na maṅwe madzangano ane si vhe muvhuso wo dzhenelela nga ṱavhanya nga ṋetshedza vhudzulo ha shishi, thuso ya muhumbulo musi ho vha na tshiwo tsha ḽikhaulambilu khathihi na tshomedzo dza ndeme dzi fanaho na mabai, maṱirasi na zwiputo zwa zwiḽiwa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhulumisene ngobujamo bomnotho welizwe ngemva kweembalobalo zamhlapha ezikhutjhwe LiZiko leemBalobalo leSewula Afrika (i-Stats SA)   ezitjengisa ukuthi iNgeniso yangeKhaya ePheleleko (i-GDP) kukota yesibili emnyakeni wee-2022 yehle nge-0,7%.
tgt_text: Nḓisedzo ya maḓi na muḓagasi kha vhupo uho yo vhuyelela ngonani swika zwino.

src_text: Abonobangela bokwehlokhu bafaka hlangana ukucinywacinywa kwegezi kwenzelelwa ukuyonga, ipi ehlangana kwe-Russia ne-Ukraine nezinga lepilo elikhuphukileko kunye nentengotjhuguluko.
Amagadango athethweko ngaphasi kwe-ERRP adambise umthelela omumbi obewulethwa miraro yomnotho yamazwe wangaphetjheya, avikela godu imisebenzi neendlela zokuziphilisa zabantu.

Ukungenelela kukarhulumende kuthoma ukuba nemiphumela emihle njengokutjho kwemiphumela yeHlolo yezomSebenzi yaQobe Kota ekhutjhwe yi-StatsSA etjengise ukuthi kwavulwa imisebezi engaphezu kweenkulungwana ezima-648 hlangana kwekota yokuthoma neyesibili yomnyaka wee-     IinQunto zeKhabinethi.
tgt_text: Musi vhupo uho he tshiwo itshi tsha bvelela khaho ho no fhela kunakiswa hafhu, vhorathekiniki vha khou lavhelelwa uri vha ite tsenguluso ya zwifhaṱo zwa dzinnḓu.

src_text: Umtlamo wokuTjheja nokuHlunga (i-M&E) umThethomgomo weLutjha weliZweloke (i-NYP).
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo livhuwa tshumelo dza shishi, madzangano vhadzulapo khathihi na miraḓo ya tshitshavha kha thuso yavho khathihi na mpho dze vha dzi ṋetshedza..     Ikonomi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele umtlamo we-M&E ozokghonakalisa ukutjhejisisa nokuhlola umthelela weensika ze-NYP ka-2020-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ambedzana nga ha tshiimo tsha ikonomi kha shango ḽashu nga murahu ha musi mbalombalo dza zwenezwino dza vha tshiimiswa tsha zwa Mbalombalo dza Afrika Tshipembe (Stats SA) dzo sumbedzisa uri zwibveledzwa zwoṱhe zwa shango (GDP) kha tshifhinga tsha kotara ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa 2022 zwo tsela fhasi nga 0,7%.

src_text: Umtlamo lo unikela ngamatshwayo amahlanu akhambisana neensika ze-NYP.
tgt_text: Zwiitisi zwe zwa ṱuṱuwedza uhu tsela fhasi ndi zwi fanaho na khauwa ha muḓagasi, khakhathi dza vhukati ha shango ḽa Russia na ḽa Ukraine hu tshi katelwa na ḓura ha zwirengwa khathihi na tshanduko ya mitengo.

src_text: Amatshwayo la atlanywa nababambisani abanqophileko abanetjisakalo ekuthuthukisweni kwelutjha ngelizweni.
tgt_text: Maga a dzhiiwa nga Pulane ya Mvusuludzo na Mbuedzedzo ya Ikonomi (ERRP) thusa shango vhukuma kha thaidzo dza ikonomi dze dza vha dzi tshi khou bvelela kha ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe dovha hafhu tsireledza mishumo khathihi na nḓila dza ḓitshidza ngadzo.

src_text: Ukubuthelelwa kwemininingwana kuzokuhlukaniswa ukuya ngokweminyaka, ubulili, ukukhubazeka, ubutjhaba nobujamo bendawo ngamano la wokungenelela..     Ukuhlunga kuzokwenziwa kiyo yoke imikhakha karhulumende, amabubulo nemakhapanini wangeqadi..     ITlhatlha lomThethomgomo weHlelo eliHlanganyelweko.
tgt_text: Maga muvhuso khwaṱhaho zwa ikonomi khou thoma aṋwa mitshelo sa zwe zwa vhonala kha mvelelo dza zwenezwino dza Ṱhoḓisiso dza zwa Vhashumi dza nga Kotara dza vha tshiimiswa tsha Mbalombalo tsha Afrika Tshipembe (Stats SA) dze dza sumbedzisa uri ho vha na mishumo miswa swikaho 648 000 ye ya sikwa vhukati ha kotara ya thoma na ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa     Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ivumele iTlhatlha lomThethomgomo weHlelo eliHlanganyelweko kurhulumende, elinqophe ukuqalana neenkhala ezikhona kumthethomgomo wokuhlela ehlelweni lokuhlela lagadesi.
tgt_text: Muhanga wa Vhulavhelesi na Vhusengulusi (M&E) wa Mbekanyamaitele ya Vhaswa ya Lushaka (NYP).

src_text: Amano wokungenelela ahlongozwako azokuqalana nokutlhayela kokulinganiswa kokuhlela nemikhakha yomithathu karhulumende.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muhanga wa M&E une wa ḓo thusa kha ita uri hu vhe na vhulavhelesi ho khwaṱhaho khathihi na tsenguluso ya masiandaitwa thikho dza NYP ya ṅwaha wa 2020-.

src_text: Ukungenelela lokhu kuzokwethula ihlelo lokuhlunga elifakazelekako.
tgt_text: Muhanga uyu ṋetshedza zwilinganyi zwiṱanu zwa maimo nṱha zwine zwa elana na thikho dza NYP.

src_text: Itlhatlheli lomthethomgomo lethula godu ihlelo elibonakala lula ngokuhlela emikhakheni karhulumende isikhathi eside ukuya kesiphakathi nesifitjhani.
tgt_text: Zwilinganyi izwi zwo bveledzwa nga tshumisano na vhashumisani vho teaho vhane vha vha na dzangalelo kha zwa mveledziso na maanḓafhadzwa ha vhaswa fhano shangoni.

src_text: Lizokusebenzela ukwethula amatjhuguluko wezomthetho ukuThuthukisa ukukhambelana nomphumela olindelekileko ekuhleleni kukarhulumende nekuhlungeni..     Ukwamukelwa kwesiVumelwano sokuTlanywa kwe-Ejensi yemiTjhoga ye-Afrika (i-AMA).
tgt_text: Zwa kuvhanganywa ha zwidodombedzwa zwi ḓo khethekanywa hu tshi tevhelwa miṅwaha, mbeu, vhuholefhali, tshigwada tsha murafho na vhupo vhune maga aya khou itwa khaho.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukutlikitlwa kwesiVumelwano sokuTlanywa kwesiVumelwano i-AMA nokwethulwa kwaso ePalamende.
Lokhu kuzokuphumelelisa isivumelwano esasayinwa siGungu seHlangano yobuNye bamaZwe we-Afrika ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Zwa vhulavhelesi zwi ḓo itwa kha masia oṱhe muvhuso, zwiimiswa na kha sekhithara ya phuraivethe.

src_text: Isivumelwanesi sethulela ikhonthinenti i-AMA ngokusemthethweni.
tgt_text: Mivhigo ḓo bveledzwa nga kotara nahone ya anḓadzwa luvhili nga ṅwaha..     Muhanga wa Mbekanyamaitele ya Vhupulani ho Ṱanganelaho.

src_text: I-ejensi le izokulawula imikhiqizo yezokwelapha godu ithuthukise ukuphepha kufikelelwe imiphumela enqotjhiweko ngemikhiqizo yokwelapha kukhonthinenti.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muhanga wa Mbekanyamaitele ya Vhupulani ho Ṱanganelaho kha muvhuso, une wa khou lingedza tandulula thaidzo dzo ṱaluswaho dza zwa vhupulani ha mbekanyamaitele kha sisteme ya zwa vhupulani ya zwino.

src_text: Ukutlikitlwa nokuvunyelwa kwesivumelwanesi kuzokuthuthukisa ukuzibophelela kweSewula Afrika ephasini nakukhothinenti mayelana nokuqinisa ihlelo lokulawula imikhiqizo yezepilo..     Umbiko ngokuSebenza kweHlelo leKuthazomthelo kezokuRhubhulula nokuThuthukisa  (i-R&D)  – yomnyaka wee-2019/20 newee-2020/.
tgt_text: Maga ane khou dzinginywa ḓo dovha hafhu sedzesa kha zwa sa elana ha vhupulani kha masia mararu muvhuso.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende kweHlelo leKuthazomthelo kezokuRhubhulula nokuThuthukisa (i-R&D) leminyaka emibili edlulileko (Umnyaka wee-2019/20 newee-2020/21).
tgt_text: Maga aya ḓo thoma shumisa maitele zwa vhulavhelesi ḓitikaho nga vhuṱanzi.

src_text: Lokhu kukhambisana nesigaba se-11D (17) somThetho weButhelelo lomThelo we-1962 (umThetho Nomboro 58 we-1962), odinga bona imibiko le yethulwe ePalamende.
tgt_text: Muhanga wa mbekanyamaitele dovha hafhu wa thoma shumisa nḓila yo leluwaho ya khumbulelo ine ya vha na vhupulani ha tshifhinga tshilapfu ya kha tsha vhukati na ha tshifhinga tshipfufhi kha mihasho ḓo dovha hafhu wa shuma wo livha kha bveledza maga u shandukisa milayo hu tshi itelwa khwinifhadza zwa elana na humbulela kha zwa vhupulani na vhulavhelesi ha muvhuso.

src_text: Ihlelo leKuthazomthelo linqophe ukukhuthaza amakhampani wangeqadi ukusisa ku-R&D kobana kunzinziswe ukukhula kwamasiso.
tgt_text: Khwaṱhisedzo ya Thendelano ya Thomiwa ha Zhendedzi ḽa zwa Mishonga ḽa Afrika (AMA).

src_text: Likghonakalisa ukuthuthukiswa kwesayensi nekghono lokusungula imikhiqizo emitjha ngehloso yokukhulisa umnotho begodu kukhuthaza nokuphalisana.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza sainwa ha Thendelano ya thomiwa ha AMA khathihi na ṋetshedzwa hayo kha Phalamennde uri kone khwaṱhisedzwa.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ithabile ukuthi umbiko utjengisa ukuthi amakhampani amatjha enze isibawo sesibonelelo somthelo.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwi ḓo ita uri thendelano dze dza ṱanganezwa nga Guvhangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Afrika nga ṅwaha wa 2019 dzi thome shuma.

src_text: Ukhuthaza amanye amakhampani ukufikelela iskimu lesi njengengcenye yokukhulisa amasiso wawo nokusimamisa ukukhula komnotho.
tgt_text: Thendelano idzi ndi dzine dza ḓo ita uri hu mbo ḓi thoma vhumbwa AMA ya dzhango ḽa Afrika lwa tshiofisi.

src_text: Amakhampani aphezulu amane ekungiwo afumana isibonelelo somthelo asemkhiqizweni wezokulima, zeemayini, amakhemikhali; ubunikazi beemayini; amakhemikhali, zokuziphotjhonga, imikhakha yeenhlahla yobuqharhaqharha bethekniki nelwazi lamakhompyutha evunyelwe yiKhabinethi njengemikhakha emaqaloqangi eHlelweni lokuThuthukisa amaBubulo.
tgt_text: Zhendedzi iḽi ḽi ḓo langa zwibveledzwa zwa mishonga khathihi na khwinifhadza tsireledzea na shuma zwavhuḓi ha zwibveledzwa zwa mishonga kha dzhango.

src_text: Umbiko ozeleko uyafumaneka kubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeSayensi nobuKghwari ku-www.dst.gov.za..     IForamu Yokukhuliswa Komnotho namaThuba e-Afrika (i-AGOA) Yomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Uhu sainwa na khwaṱhisedzwa ha thendelano idzi hu ḓo engedza vhuḓiimiseli ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽifhasini na kha dzhango ḽa Afrika ho livhiswaho kha khwaṱhisa sisteme ya zwa milayo ya dzhango kha zwibveledzwa zwaḽo zwa mishonga..     Muvhigo nga ha Mashumele Mbekanyamushumo ya Magavhelo Muthelo wa zwa Ṱhoḓisiso na Mveledziso (R&D) – wa 2019/20 na 2020/.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukuhlonywa kweForamu i-AGOA ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa ṋetshedzwa ngei Phalamenndeni ha Mbekanyamushumo ya Magavhelo Muthelo wa miṅwaha mivhili yo fhelaho (2019/20 na 2020/21).

src_text: I-AGOA yenziwa yabamthetho yi-United States of America (i-USA) ngomnyaka wee-2000 ukunikela ukuzikhethela ngezerhwebo emazweni amanengi we-Afrika engeSewula nemamakethe we-USA.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwi khou elana na khethekanyo 11D (17) ya Mulayo wa Muthelo wa Mbuelo, wa 1962 (Mulayo 58 wa 1962), une wa lavhelela uri hu ṋetshedzwe mivhigo iyi ngomu Phalamenndeni.

src_text: Imikhiqizo yeSewula Afrika ngaphasi kwe-AGOA ifaka hlangana iinthelo ezigonywako, amantongomani, iinkoloyi, iinsimbi zeenkoloyi, i-ayoni, isimbi nemikhiqizo yekhemikhali.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamushumo ya magavhelo muthelo ndi ine ya khou lingedza ṱuṱuwedza khamphani dza phuraivethe uri dzi ite zwa vhubindudzi kha R&D hu itela ṱuṱuwedza nyaluwo ya vhubindudzi dovha hafhu ya ita uri hu vhe na mvelaphanḓa ya zwa saintsi na vhukoni yo livhiswaho kha nyaluwo ya ikonomi khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza mashumele maimo nṱha.

src_text: Kusazokumenyezelwa ilanga nendawo ekuzokubanjelwa kiyo iforamu le.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo takadzwa nga fhungo ḽa uri muvhigo sumbedza uri khamphani ntswa dzo ita khumbelo dza magavhelo muthelo khou dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedza uri khamphani dzi swikele tshikimu itshi nga vhunzhi sa tshipiḓa tsha engedza vhubindudzi nga fhambana hadzo khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza nyaluwo ya ikonomi.
