src_text: UmButhano waboNgqongqotjhe wesiQhema esiThunywe ukuButhelela iLwazijikelele ngePhasi (i-GEO) womnyaka wee-.
IKhabinethi ivumele iSewula Afrika ukubamba umButhano waboNgqongqotjhe we- GEO eKapa ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Khamphani nṋa khulwane dze dza swikela aya magavhelo muthelo ndi dzine dza vha kha sekhithara ya dzudzanya zwibveledzwa zwa vhulimi; ya shandukisa zwibveledzwa zwa migodini; ya dzikhemikhaḽa; ya lunako; ya mishonga na ya shumisa muḓagasi kha zwa thekhinoḽodzhi khathihi na sekhithara dza Thekhinoḽodzhi ya Mafhungo dze khabinethe ya dzi khwaṱhisedza sa dza ndeme kha Pulane ya Shuma ya Mbekanyamaitele ya zwa Nḓowetshumo.

src_text: I-GEO iyihlangano yaborhulumende eyahlonywa ngomnyaka we-2003 ngemva komButhano wePhasiloke weTuthuko eNzinzileko.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wo fhelelaho nga kona swikelwa nga kha webusaithi ya Muhasho wa Saintsi na Vhukoni ine ya vha: www.dst.gov.za..     Foramu ya Mulayo wa Nyaluwo na Zwikhala wa Afrika (AGOA) –.

src_text: Umbuthano lo usebenza njengekundla emikhakhaminengi lapho amazwe azinikela ngokufaka isandla emnqopheni ofanako wokwakha amahlelo we-GEO.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa ḓo farwa ha Foramu ya AGOA nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: I-GEO njenganje inaborhulumende bamazwe abangaphezu kwe-113, abama-30 babo ngebe-Afrika kanti iinhlangano ezizibandakanyako ezili-140, ezili-11 zazo ngeze-Afrika.
tgt_text: AGOA yo phasiswa nga shango ḽa Amerika (USA) nga ṅwaha wa 2000 hu tshi itelwa ṋetshedza tswikelo kha mbambadzo ine wa tou funa nga iwe muṋe kha vhunzhi ha mashango tshipembe ha soga ḽa Sahara khathihi na maraga wa ngomu ha shango ḽa USA.

src_text: ISewula Afrika kade ililunga leKomidi yesiGungu esiPhezulu ukusukela ngomnyaka wee-2005 begodu njenganje abososayeni belizwe lekhethu bayazibandakanya emahlelweni wezerhubhululo adoswa phambili yi-GEO.
tgt_text: Zwibveledzwa zwa Afrika Tshipembe zwine zwa rengiselwa kha mashango nnḓa nga fhasi ha AGOA ndi zwine zwa katela mitshelo, nḓuhu, dzigoloi, zwipiḓa zwa dzigoloi, tsimbi khathihi na zwibveledzwa zwa khemikhaḽa.

src_text: USewula yiNyanga yeenThuthi (i-OTM) –.
tgt_text: Datumu ya fhedzisela na fhethu hune foramu ya ḓo farelwa hone kha ḓi ḓo ḓivhadzwa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukuhlonywa kwejima le-OTM ngoMgqibelo nali-1 kuSewula wee-2022 ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Sishov’ingolovane: sisoke sakha umthangalasisekelo weenthuthi owakha nonzinzisa iindlela zokuziphilisa”.
tgt_text: Tshigwada tsha nga ha Vhulavhelesi ha Ḽifhasi (GEO) Muṱangano wa Dziminisṱa –.

src_text: I-OTM yaqobe mnyaka iyelelisa ngeenthuthi njengenye yamatshwayo aqakathekileko ekukhuleni komnotho nokuthuthuka okusabaleleko.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwauri Afrika Tshipembe ḽi vhe hone fhethu hune ha ḓo farelwa Muṱangano wa Dziminisṱa wa GEO fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Cape Town nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Kunezinto ezizokwenziwa ukukhangisa imikhakha ehlukileko yomthangalasisekelo weenthuthi kezemmoyeni, zemanzini, iinthuthi zomphakathi neendlela.
tgt_text: GEO ndi tshiimiswa tsha vhukati ha mivhuso tshe tsha vhumbwa nga ṅwaha wa 2003 nga murahu ha Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi wa nga ha Mveledziso ya Tshifhinga Tshilapfu wa ṅwaha wa shuma sa yone nḓila ya masia manzhi ine khayo mashango shela mulenzhe nga tou funa ho livhiwa kha swikela tshipikwa tshithihi tsha bveledza sisteme dza GEO.

src_text: Okhunye okuzokwenziwa kuzokuba kuyelelisa mayelana nokuphepha ngaphakathi kweenthuthi nokuvikeleka emkhakheni weenthuthi.
tgt_text: GEO zwazwino na mashango ane vha miraḓo linganaho 113, hune khao 30 ndi fhano Afrika khathihi na madzangano ane khou shela mulenzhe linganaho 140, hune 11 hone bva fhano kha ḽa Afrika.

src_text: Urhulumende uhlala azibophelele ekuthuthukiseni umthangalasisekelo wezeenthuthi, eendaweni zemakhaya nezedrobheni, ukuze kuphunyeleliswe ukuthuthwa kwepahla nabantu..     UmHlangano weHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko (i-UN) weHlelo lezokuHlaliswa kwabaNtu (i-UN-HABITAT).
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo ḓi dzulela vha muraḓo wa Khorotshitumbe fhelelaho bva tsha ṅwaha wa 2005 nahone vhorasaintsi vhashu zwazwino vha khou shela mulenzhe kha mishumo minzhi ya zwa ṱhoḓisiso ine ya khou rangwa phanḓa nga GEO.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukubanjwa komhlangano wamalunga we-UN-HABITAT eJwanisbhege mhla ali- 16 ukufikela nakali-17 kuSewula wee-.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa zwa Vhuendi wa Tshimedzi (OTM) –.

Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rwelwa ṱari ha fulo ḽa OTM nga Mugivhela, wa ḽa 1 Tshimedzi 2022, nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Sishov’ingolovane fhaṱisana themamveledziso ya zwa vhuendi ine ya fhaṱa na bveledza nḓila dza ḓitshidza ngadzo dza tshifhinga tshilapfu”.

src_text: UmNyango wezokuHlaliswa kwabaNtu uzokuhlela umhlangano lo wamalanga amabili ozokukhanjelwa badosiphambili bezepolitiki, izazi ezibasebenzi kilomkhakha nabarhubhululi, kufaka hlangana amalunga aqakathekileko weKomidi yabaJameli basaFuthi be-UN-HABITAT abanzinze e-Nairobi, e-Kenya.
tgt_text: OTM ya ṅwaha nga ṅwaha shumiswa kha tsivhudza vhathu nga ha vhuendi sa tshiṅwe tsha zwiteṅwa zwa ndeme tsha nyaluwo ya ikonomi na mveledziso ya fhethu.

src_text: Amaphuzu aqakathekileko azokufaka hlangana ukungenelela kwamatjhuguluko eendaweni zemitlhatlhana nalezo eziminyeneko..     Imiphumela yemikhulumiswano le izokufikela esitlhorini sokuhlonywa kweTlhatlha leHlelo lokuSebenza lePhasiloke, elizokwethulwa emKhandlwini we-UN-HABITAT ngomnyaka wee-     ImiThethomlingwa.
tgt_text: Hu ḓo vha na mishumo minzhi ine ya ḓo itwa itela ṱana zwithu zwo fhambanaho zwa themamveledziso ya vhuendi, zwa kha vhuendi ha muyani, ha lwanzheni, vhuendi ha nnyi na nnyi na dzibada.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa womKhandlu weliZweloke wezeNturhu eQothele bobuLili obuThileko nokuBulawa kwabaNtu abaSikazi (i-GBVF) womnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Mishumo iyi ḓo dovha hafhu ya ṋea tsivhudzo nga ha tsireledzo na vhutsireledzi ha zwishumiswa zwa vhuendi.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende komThethomlingwa womKhandlu weliZweloke we-GBVF womnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Nyambedzano na vhoṱhe vha kwameaho na dzone dzi ḓo vha hone itela davhidzana nga ha khaedu dzo fhambanaho dzine dza vha hone kha sekhithara ya zwa vhuendi.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo uqalelela itlhatlha lomthetho lokuhlonywa kwehlangano ezokusiza ngokungenelela ekuruthuleni ngomrabhu i-GBVF.
tgt_text: Muvhuso kha ḓi vha wo ḓiimisela khwinifhadza themamveledziso ya zwa vhuendi ya shango ḽashu, kha vhupo hoṱhe, ha mahayani na ha dziḓoroboni itela uri hu kone vha na enda ha vhathu na thundu nga nḓila yo leluwaho.

src_text: Uqalelela godu ukuhlonywa kweBhodi yomKhandlu ezokusiza nokutjheja ukwethulwa kweQhinga lokulwisana ne-GBVF leliZweloke, elavunyelwa yiKhabinethi ngoSewula wee-.
Ibhodi le izokuba nobujameli beenhlangano zomphakathi obuma-51% nama-49% wembusweni.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa nga ha Mbekanyamushumo ya Vhudzulo ha Vhathu (UN-HABITAT) ya Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Dzitshaka (UN).

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo sele udlule esigabeni sokulalelwa mphakathi bewuveze amazizo ngawo..     UmThethomlingwa Wokulawulwa Kwemikhiqizo yeGwayi  neGwayi Elibhenywa Ngeensetjenziswa ezibuLekthroniki wee-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa farwa ha muṱangano wa miraḓo ya UN-HABITAT fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Johannesburg nga ḽa 16 na 17 Tshimedzi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende komThethomlingwa wemiKhiqizo yeGwayi neGwayi Elibhenywa Ngeensetjenziswa ezibu-Lekhthroniki wee-2018, onqophe ukwesula umThetho we-1993 (umThetho Nomboro 83 womNyaka we-1993)  wokuLawula imikhiqizo yeGwayi, njengombana ukhitjelelwe.
UmThethomlingwa lo unqophe ukuqinisa amagadango wezamaphilo womphakathi ngomnqopho wowuwukhambelanisa nesiVumelwano seKoro yeHlangano yezePilo ePhasiniloke eQalelela ukuLawula ukuBhenywa kweGwayi.
tgt_text: Muhasho wa Vhudzulo ha Vhathu ḓo vha wone une wa ḓo tshimbidza hoyu muṱangano wa maḓuvha mavhili une wa ḓo dzhenelwa nga mazhakanḓila zwa polotiki, vhaḓivhi na vhaṱoḓisisi, hu tshi katelwa na miraḓo mihulwane ya Komiti ya Vhaimeleli vha Tshoṱhe vha tshiimiswa tsha UN-HABITAT tshine tsha vha fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Nairobi, kha ḽa Kenya.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo utjhukumisa hlangana nokhunye, iindawo ezingaphakathi nezingaphandle kwemakhiwo ekungakafaneli nakancani ukukhokhelwa igwayi ngakizo; ukupheliswa kokuthengwa kwegwayi emitjhinini, uqinise nokupakwa kwegwayi netshwayo eliyelelisako.
tgt_text: Mafhungo ndeme ane ḓo ambiwa nga hao ḓo katela wana maga tshandukiso ya vhudzulo ha mikhukhuni na mishasha.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo sele udlulile esigabeni esingeneleleko sokukhulumisana nababelani, kufaka hlangana ibubulo legwayi, iinhlangano zomphakathi neminyango karhulumende ethintekako     Iminyanya Ezako.
UmButhano wama-77 weBandla Jikelele le-UN (i-UNGA77).
tgt_text: Mvelelo dza nyambedzano idzi ndi dzone dzine dza ḓo itisa uri hu vhe na rwelwa ṱari ha Muhanga wa Pulane ya Mashumele ya Ḽifhasi, ine ya ḓo ḓivhadzwa kha muṱangano wa Guvhangano ḽa UN-HABITAT hu tshi itelwa uri dzi khwaṱhisedzwe nga ṅwaha wa     Milayotibe.

src_text: ISewula Afrika iyingcenge ye-UNGA77 ebanjwe e-Ofisi eliKhulu le-UN e-New York City e-USA ukuthoma mhlana ama-20 ukufikela nakama-27 kuSewula wee-2022 ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Isikhathi Somlando: Ukutherhula ipengu ezokuletha amatjhuguluko emirarweni ehlobanako”.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa nga ha Khakhathi dzo Ḓitikaho nga Mbeu khathihi na Mabulayo Vhathu vha Tshifumakadzi wa Khoro ya Lushaka (GBVF) wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Emazweni angeSewula, umthelela kezomnotho nakezehlalakuhle wehlekelele yobuLwele beNgogwana i-Corona (i-COVID-19) awulingani mayelana nokuvuselelwa emazweni athuthukileko ngeTlhagwini godu lokhu kubiza ukubambisana kizo zoke iintjhaba ukuqinisekisa kobana akunalizwe elisalelako..     Ukwandulela iKulumopikiswano ye-UN, uNobhala Zombelele we-UN, uNom.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Mulayotibe wa GBVF wa Khoro ya Lushaka wa ṅwaha wa 2021 ngei Phalamenndeni itela uri kone dzudzanywa.

src_text: António Guterres, uzokubiza umhlangano omayelana “Nokuletha Amatjhuguluko kezeFundo” abambe nomhlangano wezinga eliphezulu omayelana nemiNqopho yokuThuthukisa ukuNzinza (ama-SDG).
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu ṋetshedza muhanga wa zwa milayo ya vhumbiwa ha tshiimiswa tsha mulayo hu tshi itelwa maga u dzhenelela nga nḓila yo khwaṱhaho kha nndwa ya lwa na zwiito zwa GBVF dovha hafhu wa vha na mbetshelwa dza vhumbiwa ha Bodo ya Khoro ine ya ḓo ṋetshedza vhurangaphanḓa ha ndeme khathihi na vhona uri hu khou thoma shumiswa Maga Khwaṱhaho Lushaka u Lwa na Zwiito zwa GBVF a ṱanganedzwa nga Khabinethe nga ṅwedzi wa Tshimedzi 2020 hu tshi itelwa uri thome shumiswa.

src_text: Kulindelwe ukuthi umhlangano omayelana nama-SDG utjheje iindlela ekungavuselelwa ngazo ikuthalo begodu kurhatjiswe nokusungulwa kwama-SDG.
tgt_text: Bodo ḓo vha na vhuimeleli ha 51% bva kha vhadzulapo ngeno ha 49% vhu tshi ḓo bva kha muvhuso.

src_text: Ilanga LamaGugu.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wo no ḓi fhira nga fhasi ha maitele vhukwamani na vhadzulapo..     Zwibveledzwa zwa Mafola na Mulayotibe wa Ndangulo ya Sisteme dza Nḓisedzo ya Eḽekhiṱhironiki wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: UMengameli u-Ramaphosa uzokwethula ikulumo eqakathekileko emnyanyeni wokugidinga iLanga lamaGugu womnyaka wee-2022 e-Union Buildings ngoMgqibelo, mhla ama-24 kuKhukhulamungu wee-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Zwibveledzwa zwa Mafola na Ndangulo ya Sisteme ya Nḓisedzo ya Eḽekhiṱhironiki wa ṅwaha wa 2018 kha Phalamennde, une wa vha wone une wa khou ḓo phumula Mulayo wa Ndangulo ya Zwibveledzwa zwa Mafola, wa 1993 (Mulayo 83 wa 1993) une wa vha hone zwazwino ya nga he wa khwinifhadzwa ngaho.

src_text: Umnyanya lo uzokubanjwa ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Ukugidinga Ilifa lika-Solomon Linda noMbhino Wesintu weSewula Afrika”..     INyanga yamaGugu yanonyaka itjheja umvumo wesintu weSewula Afrika khulukhulu umbhino wengomabusuku (Isicathamiya) nendima yawo ekulu kezemidlalo, ubukghwari, ubugwali, zamasiko namagugu.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe khou dovha hafhu wa ṱoḓa khwaṱhisa maga zwa mutakalo wa tshitshavha shango khathihi na ita uri elane na Thendelano dza Muhanga wa Dzangano ḽa Mutakalo ḽa Ḽifhasi kha zwa Ndangulo ya Mafola.

src_text: Ummongondaba lo wethulela ingwani umnyaka wama-60 wokudlula ephasini kombhini nomtlami weengoma u-Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962), obekaziwa godu ngelika-Solomon Ntsele, owaziwa khulu njengomtlalmi wengoma ethi, “Mbube”.
tgt_text: Zwiṅwe zwa zwine mulayotibe uyu wa khou dzinginya zwone, ndi vhupo ha nga nnḓa kana ha nga ngomu ha zwifhaṱo vhune khaho ha sa tendelwe zwa daha mafola nga nḓila yo fhelelaho;  nyiledzo kha zwa rengiswa ha sigareṱe hu tshi shumiswa mitshini ine ya vha yone ṋetshedzaho sigareṱe dzenedzo khathihi na khwaṱhisa zwa tswayo dza tsivhudzo kha phakhethe dza sigareṱe.

src_text: UmNyanya Ozokwenzeka Ngesikhathi Sinye Welanga Lephasiloke Leenthuthi Zelwandle wee-2022 .
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wo pfukha nga fhasi ha maitele khwaṱhaho zwa vhukwamani na vhoṱhe vha kwameaho nga fhambana havho, hu tshi katelwa na vha nḓowetshumo ya mafola, madzangano vhadzulapo khathihi na mihasho ya muvhuso kwameaho     Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.

src_text: ISewula Afrika izokubamba Umnyanya Ozokwenzeka Ngesikhathi Sinye Welanga Lephasiloke Leenthuthi Zelwandle wee-2022 e-Durban ukusukela mhla ali-12 ukufikela nakali-14 kuSewula wee-.
tgt_text: Dzulo ḽa vhu77 ḽa Guvhangano ḽa Nnyi na Nnyi ḽa Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Dzitshaka (UNGA77).

src_text: Umnyanya lo uzokubanjwa ngesikhathi sinye ne-OTM, begodu uzokuba yingcenye yokuyelelisa ngomkhakha weenthuthi zelwandle.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi khou shela mulenzhe kha dzulo ḽa UNGA77 ḽine ḽa khou farelwa fhaḽa musanda wa UN une wa vha Ḓoroboni ya New York kha ḽa Amerika bva nga ḽa 20 swika ḽa 27 Khubvumedzi 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Tshikhala tsha ndeme vulela thandululo dza ḓisa tshanduko dza valela khaedu”.

src_text: Umnyanya lo uzokuletha abajameli bemazweni ahlukileko abazokubona ibubulo leenthuthi zelwandle zeSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Kha sia ḽa Tshipembe ha ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe, masiandaitwa kha zwa ikonomi na kha ikonomi na matshilisano ḓiswaho nga Dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19) ḓi wanala sa lingani musi ho sedzwa luvhilo lwa mbuedzedzo musi tshi vhambedzwa na re kha sia ḽo bvelelaho ḽa Devhula nahone hezwi zwi ṱoḓa uri hu vhe na farisana vhukati ha tshaka dzoṱhe itela uri hu si vhe na ane salela murahu.

src_text: ISewula Afrika ibe lilunga leHlangano Yamazwe Ngamazwe yeenThuthi zeLwandle ukusukela ngomnyaka we-1995, ekumkhakha okhethekileko we-UN oqalene nokulawulwa komsebenzi wokuthutha ngeenkebhe.

tgt_text: Phanḓa ha Nyambedzano dza Nnyi na Nnyi dza UN, Muṅwaleli Muhulwane wa UN, Vho António Guterres, vha ḓo vhidza muṱangano wa nga ha “Tshandukiso ya Pfunzo” nahone vha ḓo dovha vha tshimbidza muṱangano wa vhurumelwa ha maimo nṱha une wa ḓo vha wo lavhelesa nga maanḓa kha Zwipikwa zwa Mveledziso ya Tshifhinga Tshilapfu (SDGs).

src_text: INyanga yezeVakatjhobukela.
tgt_text: Hoyu muṱangano wa SDG khou lavhelelwa uri ḓo sedzesa kha zwa wana hafhu nḓila dza vhuisa nungo khathihi na engedza luvhilo lwa ita uri tshanduko idzi dza pfunzo dzi thome shumiswa.

src_text: INyanga yezeVakatjhobukela kilomnyaka igidingwa ngaphasi kommongondaba weLanga lezokuVakatjha lePhasiloke (nakama-27 kuKhukhulamungu) othi “Sicabanga kabuTjha ngeVakatjhobukela”.
Zevakatjhobukela ngelizweni ziqakathekile ekuvuselelweni komkhakha wezokuvakatjha, osiza khulu ku-GDP yeSewula Afrika nokuvula imisebenzi.
tgt_text: Ḓuvha ḽa Vhufa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukubona umkhakha wezokuhlaliswa nokuphathwa kwabayeni ukhula ngokwesibalo sabantu abavakatjhako  ngemva kwesikhathi salokha nakwehle ingogwana i-COVID-.
tgt_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha ḓo ṋetshedza tshipitshi tshavho tshihulwane kha vhuṱambo ha pembelela Ḓuvha ḽa Vhufa ḽa Lushaka ḽa ṅwaha wa 2022 fhaḽa Union Buildings nga Mugivhela, wa ḽa 24 Khubvumedzi.

src_text: Amakhambo wangaphakathi kwelizwe abe ziingidi ezili-.
tgt_text: Vhuṱambo vhu ḓo farwa nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U pembelela Vhufa ha Vho Solomon Linda na Muzika Wapo wa Afrika Tshipembe”..     Ṅwedzi wa Vhufa wa uno ṅwaha wo sedzesa kha muzika wapo wa fhano Afrika Tshipembe, nga maanḓa ho lavheleseswa kha muzika wa Isicathamiya khathihi na nḓila ye wa shela ngayo mulenzhe kha mitambo yashu, vhutsila, mvelele na vhufa.

src_text: 2 engcenyeni yokuthoma yomnyaka wee-2022 anda nge-114% nakumadaniswa ngesikhathi esifanako somnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Thero iyi fhululedza miṅwaha ya 60 nga murahu ha lovha ha ramuzika, muimbi na muṅwali wa muzika Vho Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962), vhe vha vha vha tshi ḓivhiwa hafhu sa Vho Solomon Ntsele, vhane vha ḓivhea vhukuma sa ene muṅwali wa luimbo lu no pfi, “Mbube”.

src_text: Lokhu kutjengise ikukhula ekubonakalako ngesikhathi esifanako somnyaka wee-2019, lapha kwaba namakhambo wangaphakathi kwelizwe aziingidi ezi-.
tgt_text: Vhuṱambo ha nga Thungo ha Ḓuvha ḽa zwa Lwanzheni ḽa Ḽifhasi ha ṅwaha wa 2022  .

src_text: Njengengcenye yokugidinga iNyanga yezeVakatjhobukela, iKhabinethi ikhuthaza amaSewula Afrika ukuthatha amakhambo ‘we-Shotleft’ ukuya eemfundeni zelizwe lekhethu ezihlukahlukeneko.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo vha ḽi tshi khou fara Vhuṱambo ha nga Thungo ha Ḓuvha ḽa zwa Lwanzheni ḽa Ḽifhasi ha ṅwaha fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Durban bva nga ḽa 12 swika 14 Tshimedzi.

src_text: IKhabinethi yemukele ngokukhululeka isiqunto sekampani yaboflayi i-Air Belgium sokusungula umsebenzi wamakhambo waboflayi babo abeza eSewula Afrika ngeenkhathi ezithileko zonyaka, ukuthoma inyanga yona le (uKhukhulamungu), okuzokusiza khulu ikoro yezevakatjho bekuqinise nobujamo bethu bokuba lilizwe elingavakatjhelwa.
tgt_text: Vhuṱambo uvhu vhu ḓo farwa nga tshifhinga tsha OTM, ine na yone ya ḓo vha tshipiḓa tsha tsivhudza vhathu nga ha sekhithara ya zwa lwanzheni.

src_text: Lokhu kufaka hlangana amakhambo waqobe ngeveke wokuya eKapa neJwanisbhege     Imilayezo.
tgt_text: Vhuṱambo uvhu vhu ḓo kuvhanganya vhurumelwa bva kha mashango fhambanaho vhane vha ḓo vha na tshikhala tsha kona vhona nḓowetshumo ya zwa lwanzheni ya ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: SiyabathokozisaIkhabinethi ithokozise beyathumela iimfiselabuhle ku: UMengameli u-William Samoei Ruto weRiphabhliki ye-Kenya, obekwe esitulweni ngeLesibili, nakali-13 kuKhukhulamungu wee-2022, ngemva kwamakhetho welizweloke agade anokuthula abanjwa mhla ali-9 kuRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo vha muraḓo wa Dzangano ḽa zwa Lwanzheni ḽa Ḽifhasi bva tsha ṅwaha wa 1995, ḽine ḽa vha zhendedzi ḽo khetheaho ḽa UN ḽine mushumo waḽo wa vha langa matshimbilele zwikepe.

src_text: ISekela likaMengameli u-David Mabuza wakhambela umnyanya lowo ajamele uMengameli u-Ramaphosa, norhulumende nabantu beRiphabhliki yeSewula Afrika.
IHlangano kaMakhakhularahwe yeSewula Afrika kunye neDrobha leKapa ngokubamba ngepumelelo iphaliswano i-Rugby World Cup Sevens phakathi kwamhlana ali-9 namhlana ali-11 kuKhukhulamungu wee-.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa zwa Vhuendelamashango.

src_text: Bekungekokuthoma ukuthi umdlalo  omkhulukazi lo ubanjelwe elizweni le-Afrika kwathi iinkulungwana zabalandeli zazitika ngokubukela imidlalo kamakhakhulararhwe esezingeni eliphezulu bathabela nepatho ehle nefuthumeleko  yeSewula Afrika enikelwa abayeni.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa zwa Vhuendelamashango wa uno ṅwaha khou pembelelwa nga fhasi ha thero ya Ḓuvha ḽa zwa Vhuendelamashango ḽa Ḽifhasi (27 Khubvumedzi) ine ya ri “U humbula hafhu zwa Vhuendelamashango nga huswa”.

src_text: Amezwi Wokutjhiriya Ikhabinethi idlulise amezwi wokutjhiriya emindenini nabangani: Abentwana besikolo abali-18 nabantu abadala ababili abahlongakele engozini emasikizi ePongola, KwaZulu-Natala ngeLesihlanu mhla ali-16 kuKhukhulamungu wee-2022 ngemva kokuthi itrogo itjhayisane bunqopha neveni egade ilayitjhe abafundi     Ukuqatjhwa.
tgt_text: Vhuendelamashango ha fhano hayani ndi ha ndeme kha vusuluswa ha sekhithara ya zwa vhuendelamashango ine ya shela mulenzhe zwihulwane kha GDP ya Afrika Tshipembe khathihi na sika mishumo.

src_text: Koke ukuqatjhwa kulawulwa kufakazeleka kweencwadi zefundo ezikhambisana nomsebenzi umuntu aqatjhelwe wona kunye nokuhlanjululwa kwebizo lomuntu okufaneleko     UNom.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo takadzwa vhukuma nga fhungo ḽa uri sekhithara ya zwa vhuḓimvumvusi yo rekhoda nyaluwo kha tshivhalo tsha vhaeni kha tshifhinga tsha nga murahu ha dwadze ḽa COVID-.

src_text: Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale esikhundleni sokuba mNqophisi Zombelele (i-DG): UKomitjhinara womNyango wokuVuselelwa kwesiMilo weliZweloke     UDorh.
tgt_text: Nyendo dza ngomu shangoni dzi linganaho.

src_text: Malixole Percival Mahlati esikhundleni sokuba liSekela lika-DG: ImiSebenzi yezePilo nokuThuthukisa zokuQatjha emNyangweni wezePilo     UNom.
tgt_text: 2 miḽioni dze dza farwa kha tshifhinga tsha hafu ya thoma ya ṅwaha wa 2022 dzo sumbedza nyengedzedzo ya 114% musi dzi tshi vhambedzwa na tshifhinga tshenetsho tshithihi nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki esikhundleni sokuba mTlami oyiHloko Zombelele emNyangweni wezokuLima, ukuBuyekezwa kweeNdaba zeNarha nokuThuthukiswa kweeNdawo zemaKhaya     UNom.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwo sumbedza khwinifhadzea vhukuma kha idzo dza tshifhinga tshenetsho tshithihi nga ṅwaha wa 2019, he ha vha na nyendo dza ngomu hayani dzi linganaho.

src_text: Phaswa Phineas Mamogale esikhundleni sokuba mPhathi oyiHloko kezeeMali emNyangweni wezePilo..     Ikhabinethi ivumelene nokuqatjhwa kwabalandelako     UNom.
tgt_text: 6 miḽioni.

src_text: Tshediso Matona esikhundleni sokuba nguKomitjhinara weKomitjhini yokuThuthukiswa okuBanzi kwabaNzima ngokomNotho     Amalunga womKhandlu wokuziLilela weBhodi yezamaFilimu: UNom.
tgt_text: Sa tshipiḓa tsha pembelela Ṅwedzi wa zwa Vhuendelamashango, Khabinethe khou ṱuṱuwedza vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe uri vha fare nyendo dza ‘Shotleft’ ya kha mavunḓu fhambanaho.

src_text: Siyazi Tyamtyam (USihlalo); UMma.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza tsheo nga vha khamphani ya zwa Vhufhufhi ya Belgium (Air Belgium) ya ḓo vha na mabufho ane ḓo fhufha tshi ḓa fhano Afrika Tshipembe nga zwifhinga thoma kha uno ṅwedzi wa Khubvumedzi, zwine hezwi zwa ḓo khwaṱhisa vhukuma vhuendelamashango khathihi na dovha hafhu zwa khwaṱhisa tshiimo tshashu tsha vha fhethu havhuḓi ha zwa vhuendelamashango.

src_text: Sohani Natasha Chundhur;UMma.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwi ḓo katela mabufho ane ḓo enda vhukati ha ḓorobo ya Kapa na ya Johannesburg nga vhege     Milaedza fhululedza    Khabinethe yo ṱahisa milaedza yayo ya fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha: Phresidennde Vho William Samoei Ruto vha Riphabuḽiki ya Kenya, vhe vha vhewa tshiduloni nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 13 Khubvumedzi 2022, nga murahu ha vha na khetho dze dza tshimbila zwavhuḓi nga mulalo nga ḽa 9 Ṱhangule.

src_text: Sisanda Nkoala;UMm.
tgt_text: Muthusa Phresidennde Vho David Mabuza vho dzhenela vhuṱambo uvhu ha vhewa tshiduloni vho imela Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa khathihi na muvhuso na vhathu vha Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: u-Shandukani Mulaudzi;UMma.
tgt_text: Vha Mbumbano ya Ragibii ya Afrika Tshipembe na vha Ḓorobo khulwane ya Kapa nge vha kona tshimbidza thonamennde ya vhumalo ya mitambo ya Rugby World Cup Sevens nga nḓila yavhuḓi vhukati ha ḽa 9 na 11 Khubvumedzi.

src_text: uNomaswazi Rachel Shabangu-Mndawe;UDorh.
tgt_text: Holwu lwo vha lwa tou thoma musi vhuṱambo uvhu ha maimo nṱha ngaurali vhu tshi tsimbidzwa nga shango ḽa Afrika nahone vhunzhi ha vhaṱaleli vha zwigidi na zwigidi vhe vha dzhenela vhuṱambo uvhu vho ḓiphina nga mitambo yo fhambanaho ya ragibii khathihi na vhuthu ha shango ḽashu ḽa Afrika Tshipembe vhu ḓivheaho ḽifhasini..     Maipfi ndiliso      Khabinethe yo ṱahisa maipfi ayo ndiliso kha vha miṱa na dzikhonani dza: Vhana vha tshikolo vha linganaho 18 na vhaaluwa vhavhili vhe vha lovha kha khombo shushaho ngei Pongola, kha ḽa KwaZulu-Natal nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 16 Khubvumedzi 2022 nga murahu ha musi ṱhiraka ḽa dekudeku ḽi tshi thulana nga tsha phanḓa na kugoloi kwa luṱanḓala kwe kwa vha ku tshi khou endedza vhagudi  tholwa tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa nga murahu ha khwaṱhisedzwa ha ndalukano khathihi na ṱanzwa madzina ho teaho     Vho Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale sa Mulangi Muhulu (DG): Mukhomishinari wa Lushaka wa Muhasho wa Tshumelo dza Vhululamisi     Dokotela Vho Malixole Percival Mahlati sa Muthusa Mulangi Muhulu: Tshumelo dza Zwibadela na Mutakalo wa Nṱha na Mveledziso ya Vhashumi kha Muhasho wa Mutakalo     Vho Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki sa Musedzulusi Muhulwane kha Muhasho wa Vhulimi, Mbuedzedzo ya Mavu na Mveledziso ya Vhupo ha Mahayani     Vho Phaswa Phineas Mamogale sa Muofisiri Muhulwane wa zwa Masheleni kha Muhasho wa Mutakalo..     Khabinethe yo tendelana na tholwa ha vhathu vha tevhelaho     Vho Tshediso Matona sa Mukhomishinari wa Khomishini ya zwa Maanḓafhadzwa ho Angalalaho ha Vharema siani ḽa Ikonomi     Miraḓo ya Khoro ya Khaṱhululo ya Bodo ya Matambwa na Nyanḓadzo: Vho Siyazi Tyamtyam (Mudzulatshidulo)Mufumakadzi Vho Sohani Natasha Chundhur;Mufumakadzi Vho Sisanda Nkoala;Mufumakadzi Vho Shandukani Mulaudzi;Mufumakadzi Vho Nomaswazi Rachel Shabangu-Mndawe;Dokotela Vho Litheko Modisane;Vho Phuti Nehemia Phukubje; Vho James Shikwambana; naMufumakadzi Vho Manko Thalitha Bufffel (vhane vha khou tou dovha hafhu tholwa).

src_text: Ukutholakala Kwamanzi.
tgt_text: Nḓisedzo ya maḓi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokoze amaSewula Afrika ngokuhlonipha kwawo imibandela yokuqinteliswa kwamanzi ekhe yabekelwa iindawo ezithileko zangeJwanisbhege, e-Tshwane kunye ne-Ekurhuleni ngomnqopho wokunzinzisa umthamo wamanzi eenlulwini zamanzi kileziindawo.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo livhuwa vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe kha tevhedza havho nyiledzo dza kushumisele kwa maḓi dze dza vha hone kha vhuṅwe vhupo ha ḓorobo ya Johannesburg, Tshwane na Ekurhuleni itela dzikisa tshikalo tsha maḓi madamuni.

src_text: Amadamu neenlulu zamanzi zilokhu zingaphasi kwegandelelo e-Gauteng ngenca yomtjhiso osahleleko amalanga la, kanti-ke njengoba asolo afunwa ngobunengi nje amanzi, i-Rand Water ibe yakateleleka ukuthi ibanciphisele khulu amanzi abomasipala beendawezi.
tgt_text: Madamu na fhethu ha vhulungela hone maḓi zwi kha ḓi vha fhasi ha mutsiko nga mulandu wa thempheretsha dzi re nṱhesa kha vunḓu ḽa Gauteng ngeno ṱhoḓea ya maḓi ine ya khou dzulela engedzea yo kombetshedza uri vha ha Rand Water vha fhungudze vhukuma nḓisedzo ya maḓi kha mimasipala.

src_text: Ihlangano yamanzi le iphakela umthamo wamanzi abantu abangaphezulu kweengidi ezili-11 e-Gauteng, nakezinye iindawo zeMpumalanga, iFreyistata kunye neTlhagwini Tjingalanga.
tgt_text: Itshi tshiimiswa tsha zwa maḓi tshi ṋetshedza vhunzhi ha maḓi kunaho kha vhathu vha fhiraho 11 miḽioni vhane vha vha vhadzulapo vha vunḓu ḽa Gauteng, zwipiḓa zwa vunḓu ḽa Mpumalanga, Free State na ḽa Devhula Vhukovhela.
Hedzi nyiledzo dze dza vha dzi sa tinyei, dzo livhiswa kha ita uri hu vhe na nḓisedzo yavhuḓi ya maḓi nahone dzi ḓo bvela phanḓa vhuya swikela tshiimo tshi tshi khwinifhadzea.

src_text: Lokhu kuqinteliswa kwamanzi esingeze sakubalekela kunqophe ukuqinisekisa ukutholakala kwamanzi, kanti-ke azokusolo aqinteliswe njalo bekube mhlazana kuba nobungcono kilobubujamo bezinto.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha miraḓo ya tshitshavha uri vha bvele phanḓa na tevhedza nyiledzo dza maḓi khathihi na shela mulenzhe nga shumisa hetshi tshiko tshi konḓaho wanala ngaurali nga nḓila yavhuḓi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombele umphakathi ukuthi usolo ulandela imibandela yokuqinteliswa kwamanzi, ulime indimawo ngokubabalela amanzi njengoba ayindlala kangaka nje.
tgt_text: Tshiṱereke tsha fhaḽa Transnet.

src_text: Ukunghalwa Komsebenzi Kwa-Transnet.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza thendelano ya zwa miholo ya miṅwaha miraru ye ya swikelwa vhukati ha vha ha Transnet na vha Mbumbano ya Vhuthihi ha zwa Vhuendi ya Lushaka (UNTU), ḽine ḽa vha dzangano ḽa vhashumi, ine thendelano yeneyo ya ḓo thoma shuma vhukati ha tshifhinga tsha bva nga ḽa 1 Lambamai 2022 swika ḽa 31 Ṱhafamuhwe.

src_text: IKhabinethi isithokozele isivumelwano seminyaka emithathu esenziwe hlangana kwe-Transnet neyuniyoni yabasebenzi i-United National Transport Union (i-UNTU), esithoma ukusebenza ngomhla wo-01 kuSihlabantangana wee-2022 ukuyokufika nakama-31 kuNtaka wee-.
tgt_text: Vha Khomishini ya Vhupfumedzani, Vhuṋenḓila na Vhulamukanyi ndi vhone vho swikelaho vhupfumedzani ha miholo iyi, zwe zwa fhedza nga fhelisa tshiṱereke tshine tsha vha hone zwazwino tsha miraḓo ya UNTU nga ṱavhanya.

src_text: Imikhulumiswano yalesisivumelwano beyenganyelwe yiKomitjhini yokuThobelana, ukuColela nokuLamula, lesisivumelwano-ke siqede khonokho ukunghalwa komsebenzi malunga we-UNTU.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza tsheo nga vha Dzangano ḽa Vhashumi vha zwa Vhuendi na Sekhithara dzi Elanaho ḽa Afrika Tshipembe (SATAWU) ya fhelisa tshiṱereke.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuye yasithokozela nesiqunto seyuniyoni i-South African Transport and Allied Workers Union (i-SATAWU) sokuqeda ukunghalwa komsebenzi.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza vhuḓiimiseli ha vha Transnet ha sedzesa kha fhungudza mishumo yo salelaho murahu ye ya vha hone kha sisteme yoṱhe ya vhuimangalavha na zwiporo nga tshifhinga tshenetsho tsha tshiṱereke tshe tsha kwama ikonomi khathihi na dziṅwe sekhithara dzine dzo ḓitika kha tshumelo yayo nga nḓila ine ya si vhe yavhuḓi..   Khabinethe yo livhuwa thikhedzo na tshumisano ye ya ṋetshedzwa nga vha mabindu nga tshifhinga tshenetshi tsha tshiṱereke.

Yo dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedza vhushaka vhune ha khou bvela phanḓa vhukati ha vha ndangulo ya Transnet na madzangano vhashumi vhune ha ḓo vhuedza khamphani yeneyi ya Transnet khathihi na ikonomi ya shango.

src_text: IKhabinethi isithokozele isibopho se-Transnet sokuqalana nokuqeda ukusalela emva komsebenzi okwenzeke emadoyelweni wemikhumbi nesiporweni njengoba bekunghalwe umsebenzi nje, ngaleyindlela kwathikaziseka umnotho namakoro athembele kiwo.
tgt_text: Vhushaka vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽa Saudi Arabia.
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Madalo u Shuma a tshimbila zwavhuḓi nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa ngei kha shango ḽa Saudi Arabia nga ḽa 15 na ḽa 16 Tshimedzi.

src_text: IKhabinethi izwakalise ukuthokoza kwayo ngesekelo nebambiswano elinikelwe mabhizinisi njengoba bekunghalwe umsebenzi nje.
tgt_text: Nga tshifhinga tsha madalo aya, mashango aya vhuvhili hao saina Memorandamu dza Thendelano (MoUs) ya 17 kha masia fhambanaho fanaho na zwa vhulimi, vhufuwakhovhe, migodi, fulufulu ḽi vusuluseaho, vhutsireledzi, vhuendi na vhufuwivhulimi ha zwifuwo na zwimela zwa maḓini.

src_text: Ikhuthaza ubudlelwano obungapheliko hlangana kwabaphathi bakwa-Transnet nebamayuniyoni kobanyana kuzokusizakala ikhampani le nomnotho welizwe.
tgt_text: Dziṅwe MoU dze dza sainwa ndi dza thomiwa ha Khoro ya zwa Mabindu yo Ṱanganelaho, tshumisano kha sia ḽa nḓowetshumo dza zwa mmbi na zwa renga thundu na tshumelo khathihi na tshumisano kha sia ḽa ṱhoḓisiso dza zwa tshivhumbeo tsha shango.

src_text: Ubudlelwano BeSewula Afrika Ne-Saudi Arabia.
tgt_text: Phresidennde vho shumisa madalo avho kha ramba vhoramabindu vha shango ḽa Saudi Arabia uri vha dzhenele muṱangano wa zwa vhubindudzi wa vhuṱanu wa shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe une wa ḓo farwa nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ilithokozele iVakatjho lomSebenzi elibe yipumelelo likaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa lokuya emBusweni we-Saudi Arabia ngomhla we-15 ukufikela ngomhla we-16 kuSewula wee-.
tgt_text: Shango ḽa Saudi Arabia ndi muvhambadzelani na ḽa Afrika Tshipembe wa vhuvhili nga vhuhulwane kha mashango oṱhe Vhubvaḓuvhakati ḽa dovha hafhu ḽa vha ḽone tshiko tshihulwanesa tsha thundu dzi ṱunḓwaho kha dzingu ḽoṱhe.

src_text: Evakatjhwenelo, amazwe amabili lawa atlikitle iimVumelwano zokuZwana (ama-MoU) ezili-17 emakorweni ahlukahlukileko, njengeyezokulima, yokuthiya iinhlambi, yokumayina, yegezi evuselelwako, yezokuphepha, zokuthutha kunye nokufuywa kweenyamazana zamanzi nokulinywa kweentjalo zamanzi.
tgt_text: Vhushaka ha dzitshaka vhukati ha mashango aya mavhili ho itisa uri hu vhe na masiandaitwa avhuḓi kha maitele zwa mbambadzo na vhubindudzi.

src_text: Amanye ama-MoU atlikitliweko ngamalungana nokusungulwa komKhandlu wezamaBhizinisi oHlanganyelweko, ukusebenzisana kezamabubulo weenkhali nokuthengwa kweensetjenziswa zepi kunye nezokusebenzisana ngerhubhululo lebhoduluko.

tgt_text: Vhubindudzi kha zwa themamveledziso.

src_text: UMengameli usebenzise ivakatjhweli ukumema abosomabhizinisi be-Saudi Arabia ekhonferensini yamasiso yesihlanu yeSewula Afrika ezokubanjwa ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza thendelo ya thomiwa ha ḽimaga ḽa maimo nṱha ḽa bveledza puḽasitiki nga vhamagi vha puḽasitiki vha ḓivheaho ḽifhasini vha ḓivhiwaho sa ALPLA Group, fhaḽa Lanseria kha ḽa Gauteng.

src_text: I-Saudi Arabia ililizwe lesibili ngobukhulu emazweni we-Middle East arhwebelana neSewula Afrika, kanti-ke ngiyo emthombo omkhulu ukudlula yoke esiphandeni sekhabo kathengisela iSewula Afrika ipahla.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwo engedza vhuḓiimiseli ha Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa ha vhea zwa mveledziso ya themamveledziso sa tshone tshithu tshi ṱuṱuwedzaho ikonomi khathihi na engedza sikwa ha mishumo..   Uvhu vhubindudzi vhu linganaho US$50 miḽioni vhu ḓo shela mulenzhe zwihulwane kha pulane khulwane ya Lanseria Smart City ine ya ḓo ita uri zwithu zwi tshimbile nga nḓila yavhuḓi nahone lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu khathihi na vusulusa hafhu zwithu zwo no shumaho hu tshi katelwa na sika mishumo ya tshifhinga tshilapfu Iinganaho.

src_text: Ubudlelwano bamazwe ngamazwe hlangana kwamazwe amabili la, benze ukuthi kube nokurhwebelana nokusiselana okuhle.
tgt_text: Nga ngomu henefho ho katelwa na mbekanyamushumo ya vhugudisamishumo kha vhainzhiniere vha zwa thekiniki na lugisa vha linganaho 36 khathihi na vhorathekiniki vha zwa vusulusa hafhu zwithu zwo no shumaho ya mishumo ya vha khamphani ya ALPLA Group mona na mashango tshipembe ha Afrika.

src_text: Ukusisa Kumthangalasisekelo.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamushumo ya zwa vhugudisamushumo ḓo thoma nga ṅwaha wa 2023, hune vhagudi vha mishumo vha thoma vha Afrika Tshipembe vha linganaho 12 vha ḓo vha vha tshi bva kha zwitshavha zwapo..   Zwa migodi siho mulayoni.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukugunyazwa kokwakhiwa kwefemu eyenza iplastiki yezinga eliphezulu e-Lanseria, e-Gauteng, ezakwakhiwa yi-ALPLA Group emkhiqizi wamazwe ngamazwe.
tgt_text: Zwa migodo siho mulayoni zwi vhaisa zwitshavha khathihi na ikonomi, nahone zwi fhedza nga ita uri hu vhe na ndozwo ya mbuelo kha muvhuso khathihi na kha sekhithara ya zwa migodi..   Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa dzhiiwa ha muvhuli wa zwiṱhavhane khathihi na fariwa ha vhahumbulelwa vha swikaho 20 vhane vha ṱumanywa na zwiito zwa bwa migodi zwi siho mulayoni nga tshifhinga tsha fulo ḽe ḽa vha hone kha mulonga wa mugodi wa fhaḽa Stilfontein vunḓuni ḽa Devhula Vhukovhela.

Khabinethe khou ita khuwelelo kha vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe ya uri vha bvele phanḓa na shumisana na vha mazhendedzi zwa mulayo itela vhona uri hu vhe na mvelaphanḓa kha mafulo u lwa na zwiito zwa vhugevhenga ḓaho.

src_text: Lokhu-ke kuqinisa isibopho sikaMengameli Ramaphosa sokulungiselela ukuthuthukiswa komthangalasisekelo njengendlela yokukhuthaza ukuhluma komnotho nokwandiswa kwemisebenzi.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwi ḓo rumela mulaedza wo khwaṱhaho wa uri vhugevhenga nangoho vhu badeli, khathihi na uri zwigevhenga zwi ḓo farwa nahone zwa dovha zwa sengiswa hu si na nyofho kana dzhia sia..   Fulufulu.

Eskom kha ḓi tou bva saina thendelano dza ḽisi ya miṅwaha ya 30 na vhabindudzi vha mveledziso ya muḓagasi vho ḓiimisaho nga vhoṱhe vha swikaho vhaṋa dza fhaṱa fhethu huswa ha bveledza fulufulu ḽo kunaho fhaḽa kha tshiṱitshi tsha Majuba na tsha Tutuka tshi re fhaḽa Mpumalanga.

src_text: Amasiso weengidi ezima-US$50 aliliqha eliqakathekileko eplanini ye-Lanseria Smart City ezakusekela ukubambelela nokusetjenziswa kweensetjenziswa ngobutjha beyisize nokuvulwa nokulondwa kwemisebenzi ema-.
tgt_text: Hedzi ḽisi dza mavu dzi ḓo kunga vhubindudzi vhune ha khou humbulelwa ḓo swika henefha kha R40 biḽioni.

src_text: Hlanganapho kubalwe nehlelo lokuthwasisela abantu abama-36 umsebenzi wama-mechatronic nabosocwephetjhe bokusebenzisa iinsetjenziswa ngobutjha emisebenzini ye-ALPLA Group e-Afrika engeSewula.
tgt_text: Avha vhabindudzi vhaṋa, vhane vha vha vha ha HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Sola Group na Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa, vha ḓo engedza 2 000 megawatts kha sisteme ya muḓagasi ya lushaka.

src_text: Ihlelo lokufundiselwa umsebenzeli lizokuthoma ngomnyaka wee-2023, la kuzokuthonywa khona ngabantu abali-12 beSewula Afrika abavela eendaweni zakhona kilesisifunda.
tgt_text: Uvhu vhukoni vhuswa ha bveledza muḓagasi vhu khou lavhelelwa uri vhu ḓo ṱumanywa na sisteme ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi kha tshifhinga tsha vhukati ha miṅwedzi ya 24 ya kha ya 36 bva musi ho no tevhedzwa milayo yoṱhe ya zwa thendelano dza zwa masheleni khathihi na dziṅwe thendelano dza zwa milayo ya nga ha mupo, kukhethekanyelwe kwa mavu ya nga kushumisele kwao na miṅwe milayo yo teaho.

src_text: Ukumayina Ngokungasi Semthethweni.
Ukumayina ngokungasi semthethweni kulimaza umphakathi nomnotho welizwe lekhethu, bekubangele nokuthi urhulumende nekoro yeemayini balahlekelwe yimali.
tgt_text: Mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa.
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza farwa ha Guvhangano ḽa vha ha Agri SA ḽa ṅwaha wa 2022 ngei ḓoroboni ya Pretoria nga ḽa 13 na ḽa 14 Tshimedzi 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U lima fhano hayani”.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukufunyanwa kwetjathokazi leengidi nokubotjhwa kwabasolwa abama-20 abahlotjaniswa nokumayina ngokungasi semthethweni, ababotjhwe lokhuya abathobelisimthetho nabebahlola umgodi wemayini ye-Stilfontein eTlhagwini Tjingalanga.
tgt_text: Guvhangano iḽi ḽo amba nga ha mafhungo fanaho na ita uri pulane khulwane dza zwa vhulimi dzi thome shumela vhalimi vha fhano hayani; themamveledziso ya tshifhinga tshilapfu hu tshi itelwa zwiḽiwa zwo liṅwaho fhano hayani ita uri vhupo honoho ha fhethu afho vhu tsireledzee lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu hu tshi itelwa mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa yapo yo livhaho kha vhumatshelo khathihi na khwaṱhisa vhukoni ha vhabveledzi vha zwiḽiwa ha shandukisa zwibveledzwa zwa vhulimi zwo ṱavhiwaho fhano hayani..   Sa nḓila ya dovha hafhu dzhiela nṱha mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa, Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza thomiwa ha Senthara ya Mveledziso ya Zwibveledzwa zwa Vhulimi ya Lushaka nga kha Mbekanyamushumo ya Vhushaka ha Tshandukiso ya Zwibveledzwa zwa Vhulimi ya Muhasho wa Saentsi na Tshandukiso vha tshi shumisana na vha Yunivesithi ya Pretoria.

Senthara iyi ḓo tikedza zwa thivhelwa fhungudzwa na ndangulo ya malwadze zwiliṅwa na zwifuwo, zwine hezwi zwa ḓo shela mulenzhe kha engedzea ha mveledziso, vhubveledzi ha zwiḽiwa khathihi na mveledziso ya vhupo ha mahayani ine ya nga vha ya tshifhinga tshilapfu   Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombela amaSewula Afrika ukuthi aragele phambili asebenzisane nabathobelisimthetho ukuqinisekisa ipumelelo yamajima alwisana nobulelesi.
tgt_text: Tsaino ya Thendelanomviswa ya Phaḓaladzo ya Mbumbano ya Afrika (AU).

src_text: Lokhu-ke kuzakuthumela umlayezo onamandla othi ubulelesi abunamvuzo, nothi izelelesi zizakubotjhwa bezitjhutjhiswe ngaphandle kwevalo nokurhawukelwa.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa ṋetshedzwa kha Phaḽamennde ha Thendelanomviswa ya AU ya nga ha Milayo na Maitele Phaḓaladzo, Muvhuso Wapo na Mveledziso Yapo uri sainiwe.

src_text: Iindaba Zegezi.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo saina iyi thendelanomviswa nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhangule.

src_text: Mhlapha u-Eskom utlikitle iimvumelwano zama-30 weminyaka zokuthenga sakuqatjha nabaphehli begezi abazijameleko abane abazakwakha iimphehligezi ezitja ezingasilaphazi ummoya eMajuba neThuthuka, eMpumalanga.
Ukuqatjhiswa kwenarha kilelijima kuzakudosa amasiso alinganiselwa ema-R40 wamabhiliyoni.
tgt_text: Thendelanomviswa ya Phaḓaladzo ṋetshedza muhanga kha mashango oṱhe ane vha miraḓo une wa vha ḽiṅwalo ḽi sumbedzaho nḓila nga ha phaḓaladzwa ha maanḓa na mishumo bva kha mivhuso ya vhukati ya kha maṅwe masia muvhuso.

Iyi Thendelanomviswa ambesa nga maanḓa nga ha phaḓaladzwa ha maanḓa na vhuḓifhinduleli, muhanga wa mavhusele apo khathihi na mveledziso yapo..   Muṱangano wa vhu32 wa Khoro ya zwa Vhutsireledzi ha Zwiporo ya Dzitshaka (IRSC) wa ṅwaha nga ṅwaha.

src_text: Abasisaba begezi abane – i-HDF Energy South Africa, i-Red Rocket SA, i-Sola Group kunye ne-Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – ubuncani bakhona bazakungezelela igezi ezii-2000 zama-megawatt ethungelelwaneni legezi lelizwe.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza farwa ha Muṱangano wa vhu32 wa IRSC wa Ṅwaha nga Ṅwaha ngei Johannesburg bva nga ḽa 1 swika ḽa 6 Tshimedzi 2023 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U fhaṱa hafhu zwiporo nga huswa kha Ḽifhasi ḽi sa fulufhedzisi”.

IRSC ndi muṱangano wa dzitshaka une wa kuvhanganya vhaḓivhi vha zwa vhutsireledzi ha zwiporo bva kha ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe uri vha kovhane nḓivho hu tshi itelwa khwinifhadza vhutsireledzi kha zwiporo..   Sa muraḓo wa IRSC, vha Vhulangi ha Vhutsireledzi ha Zwiporo ha Afrika Tshipembe vho fara muṱangano uyu lwa fhedzisela nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Amandla amatjha wokuphehlwa kwegezi kulindeleke ukuthi athungelelwe ethungelelwaneni legezi kungakapheli iinyanga ezima-24 ukuya kezima-36 ukusukela esikhathini sokutlikitlwa kwemitlolo yesekelo leemali, kuye ngokuthi iindaba zebhoduluko, zokusikwa kwenarha nezinye ezifuna imvumo zizakusetjenzwa ziqedwe ngesikhathi esingangani.
tgt_text: Luṱa lwa 2 lwa Mvetamveto ya Pulane ya Themamveledziso ya Lushaka ya 2050 (NIP 2050).
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa ganḓiswa kha gurannḓa ya muvhuso ha mvetamveto ya Luṱa lwa 2 lwa NIP 2050 hu tshi itelwa zwa vhukwamani na miraḓo ya tshitshavha.

src_text: Ukutholakala Kokugoma Okwaneleko.
tgt_text: Pulane iyi sumbedzisa nḓila kha zwa khwaṱhiswa na engedzwa ha thandela dza muvhuso dzo ṱanganelaho nahone dza ndeme..   Lu dovha hafhu lwa ṱalusa thandela dza ndeme dza zwa vhudzulo ha vhathu; muḓagasi wa ha masipala; maḓi; mathukhwi omaho; vhuendi ha hwala vhaṋameli; themamveledziso ya pfunzo na mutakalo; themamveledziso ya didzhithala, vhugevhenga na zwiito zwa vhuaḓa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukusingathwa kweKhongresi yezokuLima yeSewula Afrika (i-Agri SA Congress 2022) ePitori ngomhla we-13 ukuya kumhla we-14 kuSewula wee-2022 ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Silimela Ekhaya.” Ikhongresi le ibonisene ngeendaba ezinjengokuthi amaplani wezokulima ngokuphelela kwawo awenziwe abe asebenzele abalimi bekhethu; umthangalasisekelo obambelelako wokugoma okulinywe ekhethwapha; ibhoduluko langekhethu alenziwe lihlale likulungele ukutjalela nokukhiqizela ingomuso lekhethu ukugoma, kuqiniswe namandla nekghono labalimi lokusebenza nokulungisa ukugoma okulinywe ekhethwapha.
tgt_text: Tshivhumbeo tsha pulane tshi ṋetshedza bono ḽa masia ane khou tea lavheleswa khao, tsha dovha hafhu tsha ṋetshedza tsenguluso ya tshiimo tsha zwino, tsha bvisela khagala nyimele dza ndeme dzine dza ḓo ita uri hu vhe na shuma zwavhuḓi khathihi na sumbedzisa zwine zwa tea itwa itela swikela bono ḽeneḽo.

Tshi dovha hafhu tsha dzinginya maitele u thoma shumiswa ha pulane iyi ane ḓo itwa nga vhukati ha tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha miraru ya pulane ya kushumele..   Muhanga wa shuma wa Lushaka ho livhiwa kha ita uri Tshumelo dza Muvhuso dzi vhe dza Mishumogudwa.

src_text: Ukuqalelela iqalontanzi lokutholakala kokugoma ukuya phambili, iKhabinethi ibuye yathokozela nokuvulwa kwe-National Biosecurity Hub evulwe liHlelo lokuSebenzisana i-Agricultural Bio-economy Innovation lomNyango wezeSayensi naMandla wokuSungula, ngokubambisana neYunivesithi yePitori (i-TUKS).
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muhanga wa thoma shuma ha Lushaka ho livhiwa kha ita uri Tshumelo dza Muvhuso dzi vhe dza Mishumogudwa.

src_text: IZikweli lizakusekela ukukhandelwa, ukuphungulwa nokulawulwa kwezifo zeentjalo nefuyo, khona-ke okuzakusiza ekuphakamiseni inani lomkhiqizo, ukutholakala nokuvikeleka kokugoma kunye nokuphakanyiswa komsebenzi wokuthuthukiswa kweendawo zemakhaya okubambelelako   Iinqunto Zekhabinethi.
tgt_text: Muhanga uyu wo anḓadzwa hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na vhukwamani nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Ukufakazelwa Kokusatjalaliswa Komtlolo Wesivumelwano SeHlanganisela YamaZwe WoBunye Be-Afrika (i-AU).

IKhabinethi ikuvumele ukudluliselwa ePalamende komTlolo wesiVumelwano samaGugu neKambisolawulo yokuSatjalaliswa, iLawuleko likaRhulumende weeNdawo zemaKhaya kunye nokuThuthukiswa kweeNdawo zemaKhaya kobanyana uyokufakazelwa.
tgt_text: Muhanga uyu dovha hafhu wa ṋetshedza thikho ṱhanu dza nga ha maga u ita uri Tshumelo dza Muvhuso dzi vhe dza mishumogudwa.

src_text: ISewula Afrika yatlikitla umtlolo wesivumelwano lo ngoRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Thikho idzi dzi katela maitele ane vha u ranga musi hu tshi ṱoḓa kungwa vhashumi khathihi na u nanga vhashumi vho teaho henefho kha Tshumelo dza Muvhuso pfumbudzwa na ṱanganyiswa na vhaṅwe vhashumi; ndangulo ya vhupulani na mashumele; vhugudi vhune ha khou bvela phanḓa, khathihi na mveledziso ya mishumogudwa hu tshi katelwa aluwa kha zwa mishumo khathihi na zwiwo zwa mishumo.
Tshanduko kha nyimele dza kutholelwe kwa Vhalangi Vhahulwane (DGs).

src_text: UmTlolo wokuSatjalaliswa lo unikela umtlamo oyikombandlela kiwo woke amazwe amalunga ngokusatjalaliswa kwamandla nemisebenzi ukusukela kurhulumende welizwe loke ukuya keminye imikhakha karhulumende.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo une wa khou dzinginya maga u khwaṱhisa vhukoni na zwikili zwa dziDG kha Tshumelo dza Muvhuso.

src_text: Umtlolo lo uqalene khulukhulu nokusatjalaliswa kwamandla nemisebenzi, umtlamo welawuleko likarhulumende kunye nokuthuthukiswa kweendawo zemakhaya.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wo ṋetshedza makumedzwa fhambanaho, hu tshi katelwa na themo ya shuma ya dziDG khathihi na ndangulo ya vhurumelwa nga vha Khorotshitumbe ya muvhuso kha vhaofisiri vho ṋewaho maanḓa..   Muvhigo uyu dovha hafhu wa dzinginya uri DG Ofisini ya Phresidennde ḓo ḓivhiwa sa Ṱhoho ya Ndangulo ya Muvhuso.

src_text: Umhlangano Wezokuphepha Weentimela Emazweni Ngamazwe (i-IRSC) Wehlandla Lama-32 Waqobemnyaka.
tgt_text: Kha mavunḓu, hoyu mushumo ḓo ṋetshedzwa kha dziDG kha ofisi dza Vhalangavunḓu.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukusingathwa koMhlangano we-IRSC wehlandla lama-32 waqobemnyaka ozakubanjelwa eJwanisbhege ukusukela mhlana li-01 ukuya nakasi-6 kuSewula wee-2023, ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Sivuselela Imizila Yeentimela Ebujameni Obunganatlha.”               .
tgt_text: Muvhigo wo dovha hafhu wa dzinginya maga u eletshedza mihasho nga ha kulangelwe kwa khonṱhiraka dza dziDG.

src_text: I-IRSC yikundla yamazwe ngamazwe ehlanganisa abosomakghonofundwa bezokuphepha kweentimela bephasi loke kobanyana bazokubonisana ngabakwaziko, ngomnqopho wokwenza bona imizila yeentimela iphephe ngcono.
tgt_text: Sisteme ya Ndangulo ya Mashumele dziDG yo senguluswaho khou dovha ya senguluswa hafhu nga huswa itela uri elane na tshanduko dzo tendelwaho.

Minisṱa vha Tshumelo dza Muvhuso na Ndangulo vho tou Farelaho, Vho Thulas Nxesi, vha ḓo vhidza muṱangano wa vhoramafhungo vhege ḓaho une khawo vha ḓo bvisela khagala Muhanga wa shuma wa Lushaka wo livhiswaho kha ita uri Tshumelo dza Muvhuso dzi vhe dza Mishumogudwa khathihi na bvisela khagala tshanduko dzo tendelwaho dza nga ha nyimele dza shuma dza dziDG.

src_text: Njengelunga le-IRSC, umLawuli wezokuPhepha kwemiZila yeenTimela eSewula Afrika ugcine ukusingatha lekundla ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa Vhuṱanu wa Mvelaphanḓa ya nga ha thoma shuma ha Nḓivhadzamulayotibe ya nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhathu vhane vha vha na Vhuholefhali (WPRPD) wa ṅwaha wa 2020-.

src_text: Umtlamo Womthangalasisekelo Welizweloke Wee-2050 (i-NIP 2050) Wesigaba sesi-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muvhigo wa Vhuṱanu wa Mvelaphanḓa ya nga ha thoma shuma ha WPRPD, ine ya vha yone ṋetshedzaho maswamaswa nga ha thoma shuma ha WPRPD.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuvumele ukugazedwa komtlamo we-NIP 2050 kobanyana kuyokubonisanwa ngawo nomphakathi.
tgt_text: Muvhigo katela na vhupfiwa bva kha mihasho ya muvhuso wa lushaka na wa mavunḓu dovha hafhu wa bvisela khagala zwiswa nga ha thoma shuma ha mbekanyamaitele ine ya katela mikovho ya migaganyagwama..   Muvhigo wa thoma wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa wa ṅwaha nga ṅwaha wo anḓadzwa nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Ihlelweli likhanyisa indlela ngokuqiniswa nokungezelelwa kwamaphrojekthi karhulumende aqakathekileko nalungelelweko.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa vhuṱanu wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa wo ṱanganedzwa uri ḓo ḓivhadzwa kha gurannḓa ya muvhuso nahone wa dovha wa anḓadzwa nga vha Muhasho wa Vhafumakadzi, Vhaswa na Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali..   Khwiniso ya Tshiteṅwa tsha 20(1) tsha Thendelano dza nga ha fheliswa ha Zwiito zwoṱhe zwa Khethululo Itelwaho Vhafumakadzi (CEDAW).
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ngomu Phalamenndeni ha khwiniso ya Tshiteṅwa tsha 20(1) tsha CEDAW itela uri sainiwe.

src_text: Umtlamo lo ukhomba amaphrojekthi aqakathekileko ekwakhelweni kwabantu iindawo zokuhlala; egezini kamasipala, emanzini; ekulahlweni kweenzibi; iinthuthi zomphakathi; umthangalasisekelo wezefundo newezepilo; umthangalasisekelo wehlelo ledijithali kunye nobulelesi nobukhohlakali.
tgt_text: Khwiniso idzi dzi ṋetshedza tshikhala tsho engedzwaho tsha miṱangano ya komiti ine ya shuma na mivhigo ya mashango ane vha miraḓo.

src_text: Isakheko sehlelweli siveza inembombono yomsebenzi ekufuze wenziwe, sicozulule ubujamo bezinto banje, sendlale ubujamo obuqakathekileko obuzakuphumelelisa izinto sibe sitjho nokuthi kufuze kwenziweni ukuphumelelisa inembombono.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo saina hedzi thendelano nga ṅwaha wa 1993 he ḽa dovha ḽa tendelana nadzo nga ṅwedzi wa Nyendavhusiku.

src_text: Siphakamisa ukuthi ihlelo lokuphumelelisa lokhu lenziwe ngeminyaka emithathu.
tgt_text: Uhu ṋetshedzwa hadzo Phalamenndeni ndi hune ha khou lingedza ṱumanya thendelano dze na dzone ha tendelanwa khadzo tshifhingani tsho fhelaho na khwiniso idzi dza Tshiteṅwa tsha 20(1) tsha thendelano.
Thendelano dza Ḽifhasi dza nga ha Ṱanganedzwa ha Ndalukano dza Pfunzo dza Nṱha .

src_text: Umtlamo Womthetho Welizwe Onqophe Ukwenza Ikoro Yezabasebenzi Bakarhulumende Isebenze Ngokukhanyiselwa Makghonofundwa.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ngomu Phalamenndeni ha Thendelano dza Ḽifhasi dza nga ha Ṱanganedzwa ha Ndalukano dza Pfunzo dza Nṱha itela uri hu vhe na tendelana.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele umTlamo wokuPhumelelisa weliZweloke onqophe ukwenza iKoro yezabaSebenzi bakaRhulumende isebenze ngobucwephetjhe.
tgt_text: Musi ho no vha na tendelana khadzo, dzi ḓo rumelwa kha vha Khethekanyo ya zwa Pfunzo, Saintsi na Mvelele ya vha Dzangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UN) khathihi na ḓo ita uri ngeno hayani dzi shume nga kha Mulayo wa Muhanga wa Ndalukano wa Lushaka, wa ṅwaha wa 2008 (Mulayo 67 wa 2008).

src_text: Umtlamo lo wamenyezelwa ngomnyaka wee-2021 kobanyana kubonisanwe ngawo nomphakathi.
tgt_text: Thendelano dza Ḽifhasi dzi bveledza milayo ya ḽifhasi ya ṱanganedzwa ha ndalukano dza pfunzo dza nṱha nga nḓila linganaho re khagala nahone si na khethululo.

Dzi dovha hafhu dza tendela hu tshi vha na ṱanganedzwa ha ndalukano dza mashango nnḓa kha mashango ane vha miraḓo ya UN swikaho humiselwa murahu ha khwiniso dza Tsumbamaitele dza Miraḓo ya Khabinethe.

src_text: Umtlamo lo uqalelela iingaba zeensika ezihlanu zokuphumelelisa umsebenzi wokwenza iKoro yezabaSebenzi bakaRhulumende iragwe ngobucwephetjhe.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza nḓivhadzo ye ya ḓo itwa nga Ofisi ya Phresidennde nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 17 Tshimedzi 2022 ya humisela murahu ha khwiniso dze dza itwa kha Tsumbamaitele ya Miraḓo ya Khabinethe, ine ya dovha hafhu ya ḓivhiwa sa Bugupfarwa ya Dziminisṱa, ya ṅwaha wa..   Khwiniso hedzi dze dza ḓo itwa nga ṅwedzi wa Lambamai 2022 dzi ṋetshedza tshikhala tsha engedza vhaṅwe vhashumi kha dziṅwe dza dziofisi dza Dziminisṱa vhane vha vha na vhuḓifhinduleli ha muhasho fhiraho muthihi.

src_text: Sigaba sokufuna abantu abasese ngaphandle kwekoro yabaSebenzi bakaRhulumende nokukhetha esele bangaphakathi; kujayezwa indawo nokulungelelwa nomsebenzi; ukulungiselela umsebenzi nokulawulwa kwendlela yokusebenza; ukufunda isiphelani nokuthuthuka ngobucwephetjhe, nokuthuthuka ngebizelo lomsebenzi nangezehlakalo zemsebenzini.
tgt_text: Dzi dovha hafhu dza lavhelela uri Muvhuso dzhie vhuḓifhinduleli ho fhelelaho ha zwa masheleni ane elana na ṋetshedzwa ha maḓi na muḓagasi kha madzulo tshiofisi ane avho miraḓo ya khabinethe vha dzula khao..     Khabinethe yo dzhiela nṱha sa farea zwavhuḓi ha vhadzulapo he ya fhedza nga dzhia tsheo ya dovha shandukisa hafhu iyo Tsumbamaitele ya Miraḓo ya Khabinethe.

src_text: Amatjhuguluko Wemibandela Yomsebenzi KubaNqophisi Zombelele (ama-DG).
tgt_text: Haya maitele ḓo tshimbidzwa nga tshiimiswa tsho imaho nga tshoṱhe nahone musi tshi tou khunyeledzwa, iyo tsumbamaitele ya hone vho ḓo wanala na kha webusaithi ya Muhasho wa Tshumelo dza Muvhuso na Ndangulo ine ya vha: www.dpsa.gov.za.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele umbiko ophakamisa amagadango wokuqinisa amandla nekghono labo-DG eKorweni yemBusweni.
tgt_text: Vhushaka ha Shandukela kha Fulufulu ḽi Pfadzaho (JETP) na Pulane ya Vhubindudzi kha JETP (JETP-IP).

src_text: Umbiko lo wenze iimphakamiso ezimbadlwana, hlangana nazo ekukhona nezikhuluma ngesikhathi ekumele sihlalwe bo-DG eenkhundleni zabo kunye nokulawulwa kwemisebenzi yokuphathiswa ziimPhathimandla eziPhetheko eemphathimandleni ezilawulako.
tgt_text: Nga murahu ha ṱanganedza makumedzwa nga ha JETP na JETP-IP, Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza JETP-IP ya dovha hafhu ya sumbedzisa takalela mushumo nga vhuḓalo we wa itwa hu tshi itelwa i bveledza..   JETP-IP bvisela khagala vhubindudzi vhune ha ṱoḓea itela swikela vhuḓikumedzeli ha fhelisa zwa muhasaladzo wa khaboni he ha itwa nga Muvhuso wa ḽa Afrika Tshipembe musi tshi khou ṱuṱuwedza mveledziso ya tshifhinga tshilapfu khathihi na vhona uri hu khou vha na tshanduko pfadzaho kha vhashumi na zwitshavha zwi kwameaho.

src_text: Umbiko lo godu uphakamise nokuthi u-DG e-Ofisini kaMengameli uzakubekwa esikhundleni sokuba yiHloko yokuLawula ukuSebenza emBusweni.
tgt_text: Komiti ya Vhukati ha Dziminisṱa ya nga ha Tshanduko ya Kilima ḓo fara muṱangano na vhoramafhungo hu si kale itela uri ṋetshedze zwidodombedzwa nga vhuḓalo   Milayotibe.

src_text: Eemfundeni, umsebenzi lo uzakunikelwa abo-DG ema-ofisini waboNdunakulu.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa Zwikepe zwa Vhavhambadzi wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Ukudlula lapho, umbiko lo uphakamise namagadango wokubonisa iminyango karhulumende ngokuphathwa nokulawulwa kwamakontraga womsebenzi wabo-DG.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Zwikepe zwa Vhavhambadzi wa ṅwaha wa 2022 ngei Phalamenndeni hu tshi itelwa uri kone davhidzaniwa nga hawo ya phanḓa.

Mulayotibe uyu vusulusa uyo muṅwe Mulayo wa Zwikepe zwa Vhavhambadzi, wa ṅwaha wa 1951 (Mulayo 57 wa 1951) une wa vha na miṅwaha ya..   Musi wo no phasiswa, Mulayotibe uyu ḓo ṋetshedza muhanga wa zwa milayo wa zwikepe zwa vhavhambadzi une wa ḓo shuma kha langa zwa engedza ndeme kha zwikepe ḓo dovha hafhu wa langa zwa olwa redzhisiṱara rinwa madzina na bviswa ha zwikepe nḓilani.

src_text: Ihlelo elibuyekeziweko lokuLawulwa kweNdlela yokuSebenza kwabo-DG lisabuyekezwa njenganje, kobanyana lizokukhambisana namatjhuguluko avunyiweko.
tgt_text: Hedzi tshanduko dzi ḓo shela mulenzhe kha vusuluswa ha sekhithara ya vhuendi ha zwa lwanzheni khathihi na ita uri hu vhe na elana kha kutshimbidzele kwa zwa lwanzheni vhukati ha shango ḽino na Thendelano dza Dzangano ḽa zwa Lwanzheni ḽa Dzitshaka.
Afrika Tshipembe ḽo saina thendelano idzi.

src_text: UmJaphethe kaNgqongqotjhe weKoro yezabaSebenzi bakaRhulumende nokuPhatha, uNom.

Thulas Nxesi, ngeveke ezako le uzokubiza umhlangano weendaba lapho ayokwethula khona umtlamo wokuPhumelelisa weliZweloke ngokwenza iKoro yabaSebenzi bakaRhulumende isebenze ngokuletha ubucwephetjhe, abuye ahlathulule namatjhuguluko avunyiweko emibandeleni yokusebenza yabo-DG.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya zwa Mbalombalo wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Umbiko Wesihlanu Ngokuphunyeleliswa Kombikomthethokambiso Ngamalungelo Wabantu Abanokukhubazeka (i-WPRPD) 2020-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ngomu Phalamenndeni ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya zwa Mbalombalo wa ṅwaha wa 2022 hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na davhidzaniwa nga hawo.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele umBiko weNdima weHlandla lesiHlanu ngokuphunyeleliswa kwe-WPRPD, enikela ubujamo bezinto bamva nje ngokuphunyeleliswa kwe-WPRPD.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu dzinginya uri hu vhe na khwiniso kha Mulayo wa zwa Mbalombalo, wa ṅwaha wa 1999 (Mulayo 6 wa 1999).

src_text: Umbiko lo uphethe imibono evela eminyangweni karhulumende welizwe loke neyeemfunda.
tgt_text: Khwiniso idzi dzi ṋetshedza tshikhala tsha bveledzwa na thoma shumiswa ha Sisteme ya zwa Mbalombalo ya Lushaka ine ya tikedza tsheo dzo ḓitikaho nga vhuṱanzi..   Dzi khwaṱhisa tshumisano ine ya vha hone zwazwino vhukati ha vha Mbalombalo dza Afrika Tshipembe na zwiṅwe zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso khathihi na engedza muhanga wa zwa milayo kha Mulayo   Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.

src_text: Uphethe zamva nje ngokuphunyeleliswa komthethokambiso ophethe nokwabiwa kwesabelo seemali.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa Lushaka wa Phresidennde wa nga ha Mabindu Maṱuku, Maṱukuṱuku na Vhukati (SMME) na Dzikoporasi.

Muhasho wa Mveledziso ya Mabindu Maṱuku, nga tshumisano na vhashumisani vha kha sekhithara ya phuraivethe ḓo fara Muṱangano wa Lushaka wa Phresidennde wa nga ha dziSMME na Dzikoporasi fhaḽa Bryanston, kha vunḓu ḽa Gauteng bva nga ḽa 13 swika ḽa 15 Lara..   Muṱangano uyu ḓo kuvhanganya fhethu huthihi vhashumisani kha sekhithara ya phuraivethe na ya muvhuso kha nḓowetshumo ya mabindu maṱuku uri vha ambe nga ha wana nḓila dza shumisana kha khwaṱhisa sekhithara iyi.

src_text: Umbiko wokuthoma waqobemnyaka wamenyezelwa ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Zwiimiswa zwine zwa khou lavhelelwa shela mulenzhe zwi katela madzangano zwa makwevho, vhashumi vha kha dziSMME, vhoradzipfunzo, vhaiti vha mbekanyamaitele na zwiimiswa zwa masheleni mveledziso.

src_text: Umbiko wendima wehlandla lesihlanu lo uvunyelwe ukugazedwa bewumenyezelwe mNyango wezaboMma, zeLutjha nezabaNtu abanokuKhubazeka.
tgt_text: Muṱangano uyu ḓo dovha hafhu wa amba nga ha Pulane khulwane ya Lushaka yo Ṱanganelaho ya nga ha Mveledziso ya Mabindu Maṱuku, ine ya ṋetshedza muhanga wa ndeme wa khwaṱhisa sekhithara ya SMME.

src_text: Ukutjhugululwa Kwendinyana 20(1) Yesivumelwano Sokuqedwa Kwazo Zoke Iindlela Zokubandlululwa Kwabantu Abasikazi (i-CEDAW).
tgt_text: Muṱangano uyu khou dovha hafhu wa lavhelelwa thoma na Pfufho dza Phresidennde dza nga ha dziSMME dza Lushaka dza Ṅwaha nga Ṅwaha farwa ha Muṱangano wa Phresidennde wa nga ha Khakhathi dzo Ḓitikaho nga Mbeu na Mabulayo Vhafumakadzi (GBVF) wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa ePalamende kwamatjhuguluko weNdinyana 20(1) ye-CEDAW kobanyana ayokufakazelwa.
tgt_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha ḓo fara Muṱangano wa Phresidennde wa nga ha zwiito zwa GBVF wa vhuvhili fhaḽa Gallagher Convention Centre kha ḽa Gauteng nga ḽa 1 na ḽa 2 Lara.

src_text: Amatjhuguluko la avula ithuba lokwelulwa kwesikhathi semihlangano yekomidi esebenza imibiko yemibuso emalunga.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa thoma we wa farwa nga ṅwaha wa 2018 wo shumiswa kha kumedza hafhu muvhuso na vhashumisani vha zwa matshilisano kha fhelisa zwiwo zwo andesaho zwa khakhathi dzi itelwaho vhafumakadzi kha ḽino shango.

src_text: ISewula Afrika yatlikitla isivumelwanesi ngomnyaka we-1993 yase ilandelisa ngokusiqinisa ngokusifakazela ngoNobayeni we-.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa vhuvhili ḓo shumiswa kha lavhelesa murahu kha mvelaphanḓa ye ya swikelwa kha zwa thoma shumiswa ha Pulane ya Ndeme ya Lushaka ya nga ha GBVF ḓo farwa nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Vhuḓifhinduleli ṱavhanyedza na ṱavha mukosi ZWINO”..   Muṱangano uyu ḓo dovha hafhu wa amba nga ha maṅwe mafhungo fanaho na wana nḓila dza ita uri zwoṱhe zwine zwa khou tea itwa zwi itwe nga tshihaḓu hu tshi katelwa na vhuḓifhinduleli bva kha mihasho ya ndeme khathihi na vhoṱhe vha kwameaho fana na madzangano zwitshavha, sekhithara dza phuraivethe na madzangano vhashumi.

src_text: Ukudluliselwa ePalamende kunqophe ukuthomanisa isivumelwano esasifakazelwe phambilini nesikhibelelo seNdinyana 20(1) yesivumelwanesi.
Isivumelwano Sephasi Loke Ngokwamukeleka Kweencwadi Zefundo Ephakemeko.
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya Vhuṱanu ngei Northern Cape.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa ePalamende kwesiVumelwano sePhasiloke ngokwaMukeleka kweeNcwadi zeFundo ePhakemeko kobanyana siqinisekiswe ngokufakazelwa.
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya Ḽiedza ḽa Mveledziso ya Tshiṱiriki ḽa Vhuṱanu (DDM) ngei Upington, kha vunḓu ḽa Northern Cape ḓo farwa nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 21 Tshimedzi 2022 fhaḽa Tshiṱediamu tshapo tsha Mxolisi Dicky Jacobs..    Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya nga ha DDM ḓo sengulusa mvelaphanḓa na khaedu kha zwa nḓisedzo ya tshumelo fhaḽa kha vunḓu ḽa Northern Cape khathihi na dzhenelela hu tshi itelwa dzi tandulula.

src_text: Sizakuthi singafakazelwa bese sifakwa ePhikweni lezeFundo nezeSayensi nezamaSiko leHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko (i-UNESCO), bese sinikelwa amandla wokusebenza ekhethwapha ngomthetho wee-2008 weeNcwadi zeFundo zeliZwe (umThetho 67 wee-2008).
tgt_text: DDM ḓo vhona uri vhupulani ha zwa nḓisedzo ya tshumelo, zwa thoma shuma na ita mugaganyagwama zwi khou ṱanganyiswa fhethu huthihi itela khwaṱhisa nḓisedzo ya tshumelo kha zwitshavha.

src_text: IsiVumelwano sePhasi lesi sivula ikambisolawulo eyembatha koke, ngokwamukelwa kweencwadi zefundo ephakemeko ngendlela elungileko, neyenzelwa emkhanyweni nengabandlululiko.
tgt_text: Musi tshifhinga tsha Imbizo tshi tshi khou sendela, Dziminisṱa, miraḓo ya khorotshitumbe na vhoṋeḓorobo vha ḓo thoma mafulo u kwamana na zwitshavha mona na vhupo ha Upington..   Tshitatamennde tsha Mbekanyamaitele ya Mugaganyagwama wa Vhukati ha Ṅwaha (MTBPS).

src_text: Ivumela ukwamukeleka kweencwadi zefundo zamazwe wangaphandle emazweni ali-193 amalunga weHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko (i-UN).
tgt_text: Khabinethe tenda kha ḽa uri MTBPS ya ṅwaha wa 2022 ine ya khou ḓo ṋetshedzwa nga Minisṱa wa Gwama Vho Enoch Godongwana nga Ḽavhuraru, ḽa 26 Tshimedzi 2022 ndi tshipiḓa tsha ndeme tsha maitele u dzudzanya mugaganyagwama nga nḓila re khagala nahone ya vhuḓifhinduleli kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe..   MTBPS ṋetshedza ṱhalutshedzo ya vhuḓiimiseli ha muvhuso kha zwa kushumisele kwa masheleni kune shango ḽa nga kona ku swikela dovha hafhu ya bvisela khagala nḓila ine muvhuso wa ḓo vala ngayo tshikhala vhukati ha mbuelo na kushumisele kwa masheleni khathihi na ita zwinzhi hu tshi shumiswa zwiko zwine zwa vha hone zwazwino.

src_text: Ukubuyiselwa Emva Kwamatjhuguluko Wekombandlela Yamalunga Wesigungu Esiphetheko   .

IKhabinethi ivumele isimemezelo esenziwe yi-Ofisi kaMengameli ngoMvulo womhla we-17 kuSewula wee-2022 sokuwabuyisela emva amatjhuguluko weKombandlela yamaLunga wesiGungu esiPhetheko, ebuye ibizwe nangokuthi yiNcwajana YaboNgqongqotjhe, yomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Milingo ya Maṱiriki.
Milingo ya Lushaka ya Maṱiriki ya ṅwaha wa 2022 khou ḓo thoma nga ḽa 31 Tshimedzi ya fhela nga ḽa 7 Nyendavhusiku.

src_text: Iinkhibelelo ezenziwa ngoSihlabantangana wee-2022 bezivumela ukungezelelwa kwabasebenzi neensetjenziswa kamanye ama-ofisi waboNgqongqotjhe abaphethe iinkhundla ezingaphezu kesisodwa.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou tamela mashudu vhagudi vha Kiḽasi ya ṅwaha wa 2022 zwenezwo musi vha tshi khou ḓo dzhena kha lwendo lwavho lwa fhedzisela lwa zwa tshikolo.

src_text: Bekafuna nokuthi umBuso uwugcine ngokupheleleko umthwalo weendleko zegezi namanzi ezindlini zombuso ezihlala amalunga wesigungu esiphethe umbuso.
tgt_text: Thikhedzo ine ya khou bvela phanḓa bva kha vhadededzi, vhabebi na vhaunḓi ḓo ita zwinzhi kha thusa vhagudi uri vha kone thoma milingo iyi yavho vho ḓala fulufhelo..   Khabinethe khou eletshedza vhabebi na vhaunḓi uri vha shele mulenzhe nga ṱuṱuwedza na sumbedza nḓila vhagudi khathihi na bveledza nyimele yavhuḓi ya uri vha kone guda mahayani.
Muṱangano wa nga ha Pulane ya Mveledziso ya Lushaka (NDP) na Vhukoni ha Shango.

src_text: IKhabinethi izitjhejile iinghonghoyilo ezizwakaliswe mphakathi yabe yaqunta ukuthi iyibuyekeze iKombandlela YamaLunga WesiGungu EsiPhetheko.
tgt_text: Muhasho wa Tshumelo dza Muvhuso na Ndangulo tshi khou shumisana na vha Khomishini ya zwa Vhupulani ya Lushaka khathihi na vha Tshikolo tsha Ngudo dza nga ha Mveledziso tsha Yunivesithi ya KwaZulu-Natal ḓo fara Muṱangano wa nga ha NDP na Vhukoni ha Shango bva nga ḽa 7 swika ḽa 9 Ḽara 2022 fhaḽa Khamphasini ya Gudedzi ḽa Howard, hune ha vha Yunivesithi ya KwaZulu-Natal..   Muṱangano uyu ḓo sedzesa kha vhukoni ha shango khathihi na mashumele muvhuso kha miṅwaha ya 10 ya thoma ya NDP nahone ḓo farwa nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U lavhelesa kha Vhukoni ha Shango na Mashumele Muvhuso nga kha miṅwaha ya fumi ya thoma ya NDP” ṋetshedzwa ha Ṱhanziela ya Ṱanganedzwa kha Khosikhulu Vho Misuzulu ka Zwelithini.

src_text: Lomsebenzi-ke uzakusetjenzwa sijamiso esithiyeleleko, esizakuthi singaqeda, bese ikomba le imenyezelwa emphakathini ngobunzinzolwazi bomNyango weKoro yabaSebenzi bakaRhulumende obuthi: www.dpsa.gov.za.
tgt_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha ḓo ṋetshedza Ṱhanziela ya Ṱanganedzwa kha Muhulisei Khosikhulu Vho Misuzulu KaZwelithini fhaḽa Tshiṱediamu tsha Moses Mabhida, ḓoroboni ya Durban nga Mugivhela, wa ḽa 29 Tshimedzi.

src_text: Ukusebenzisana Ngobulungiswa[okulungileko] Ngezeembaseli (i-JETP) Nehlelo Lamasiso Le-JETP  (i-JETP-IP).
1  Ngemva kokwamukela kwayo ukwethulwa kwe-JETP ne-JETP-IP, iKhabinethi iyivumile i-JETP-IP, yabe yezwakalisa nokuthokozela kwayo umsebenzi ongeneleleko esele uthonyiwe wokuyakha.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwi khou ḓo vha hone nga murahu ha vhuṱambo ha sialala ha vhea vhuhosi vhune ha ḓivhiwa sa “Ukungena eSibayeni” ha Muhulisei Khosikhulu he ha farwa nga ḽa 20 Ṱhangule 2022, vhune ha vha hone vhuṱambo he ha ita uri vha dzhene tshiduloni tsha vha Khosikhulu ya Lushaka lwa MaZulu   Milaedza fhululedzaKhabinethe yo livhisa maipfi ayo u fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha: Vho Sam Matekane, Minisṱa Muhulwane ane kha ḓi tou bva khethiwa wa shango ḽa Lesotho.

Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya vha luthihi na vha Vhurumelwa ha Vhulavhelesi ha zwa Dzikhetho ha vha dzangano ḽa AU musi tshi fhululedza Khetho dza Buthano ḽa Lushaka dza shango ḽa Lesotho dzo farwaho nga ḽa 7 Tshimedzi 2022 dze dza sumbedza aluwa ha vhathu vha shango iḽo siani ḽa zwa dzikhetho na polotiki nge vha tshimbidza khetho dzavho zwavhuḓi.

src_text: I-JETP-IP icozulula amasiso afunekako ukufika emnqopheni osibopho esenziwe ngurhulumende weSewula Afrika sokuqeda irhasi ikhabhoni-dayoksayidi, ukube ngahlanye ukhwezelela ituthuko ebambelelako, bekuqinisekiswa nokuthi abasebenzi abathintekako nomphakathi othintekako bakghone ukweyamela ehlelweni lamatjhuguluko nokuvikelwa kwebhoduluko.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi kha ḓi vha ḽo ḓiimisela kha khwaṱhisa na ṱanganya vhushaka ha mashango aya mavhili hu tshi katelwa na khwaṱhisa tshumisano kha mafhungo elanaho dzingu dzhango na ḽifhasi nga angaredza.

Maipfi Ndiliso Khabinethe yo rumela maipfi ndiliso kha vha muṱa na dzikhonani dza: Vhafunzi Vho Albert Nolan (88), vhe vha vha vhe Mufunzi wa Kereke ya Khatholiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ḓiimiselaho we itela khaedu kuhumbulele kwa zwa vhurereli kwe kwa vha ku tshi ṱoḓa khwaṱhisedza sisteme ya zwa khethululo nga lukanda.

src_text: IKomidi eyiHlanganisela yaboNgqongqotjhe ngezamaTjhuguluko weTlayimethi khona duze nje izokubamba umhlangano weembikiindaba lapho izakumemezela khona eminye imininingwana     Imithethomlingwa.
tgt_text: Nga ṅwaha wa 2003, Phresidennde wa kale Vho Thabo Mbeki vho vha ṋetshedza muṅene wa Order of Luthuli in Silver kha “u ḓiṋetshedzela vhutshilo havho hoṱhe kha nndwa ya lwela demokirasi, pfanelo dza vhuthu na vhulamukanyi khathihi na kha itela havho khaedu kuhumbulele kwa zwa vhurereli hu tshi katelwa na zwa tikedza khethululo nga lukanda hu tshi shumiswa vhurereli”  tholwa tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa nga murahu ha sengulusa ndalukano khathihi na ṱanzwa madzina ho teaho   Muambeli Vho James Mlawu – Mulangi Muhulu: Muhasho wa Vhuendi   Vho Shabeer Khan – Muṱolamuvhalelano Muhulwane: Vhufaragwama ha Lushaka.

src_text: Umthethomlingwa Wezerhwebo Lepahla Ekhanjiswa Ngemikhumbi Wee-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo tendelana na tholwa ha vhathu vha tevhelaho:.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa ePalamende komThethomlingwa wezeRhwebo lePahla eKhanjiswa ngemiKhumbi wee-2022 kobanyana iyowuqedelela.
tgt_text: Miraḓo ya Bodo ya zwa Vhuendelamashango ya Afrika Tshipembe   Dokotela Vho Nondumiso Maphazi (Mudzulatshidulo)   Dokotela Vho Aubrey Mhlongo (Muthusamudzulatshidulo)   Mufumakadzi Vho Pretty Ntombela   Mufumakadzi Vho Nomahlubi Mazwai   Vho Odwa Mtati   Vho Ravi Nadasen (Vho tou dovha tholwa hafhu)   Vho Enver Duminy (Vho tou dovha tholwa hafhu)   Mufumakadzi Vho Nandipha Mzileni Mbulawa   Vho Mduduzi Zakwe (Vho tou dovha tholwa hafhu)   Mufumakadzi Vho Rosemary Anderson   Mufumakadzi Vho Lehlohonolo Rapodile; nal.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo uvuselela bewulungisa umThethomlingwa we-1951 wezokuRhweba ngePahla eKhanjiswa ngemiKhumbi esele uneminyaka ema-70 (umThetho 57 we-1951).
tgt_text: Mufumakadzi Vho Nonkqubela Silulwane (Muimeli wa Muhasho).

Miraḓo ya Bodo ya Koporasi ya Ndangulo ya zwa Vhuendi ha Badani   Dokotela Vho Eddie Mogalefi Thebe (Vho tou dovha tholwa hafhu)   Mufumakadzi Vho Thandi Clara Thankge (Vho tou dovha tholwa hafhu)   Phrof Vho Maredi Mphahlele   Mufumakadzi Vho Nomusa Mufamadi (Mudzulatshidulo)   Muambeli Vho Xola Stemela   Mufumakadzi Vho Lerato Magalo   Phrof Vho Chitja Twala   Vho Nkumeleni John Kudzingana   Mufumakadzi Vho Jaxa (Muraḓo wa ḓadzisa); na   Mufumakadzi Vho HM Mbanyele-Ntshinga (Muraḓo wa ḓadzisa);.

src_text: Uzakuthi ungaphasiswa ube mthetho ozakulawula irherho lomlandelande wokusebenza kwemikhumbi.
tgt_text: Vho Tshepo Monaheng – Muofisiri Muhulwane (CEO): Khamphani ya zwa Maḓaka ya Afrika Tshipembe (Khonṱiraka yavho yo tou vusuluswa lwa miṅwaha miraru (3).

src_text: Uzakulawula ukutlanywa, ukutloliswa, ukuthiywa amabizo kunye nokukhutjhwa erhelweni lokusebenza kwemikhumbi.
tgt_text: Vho Reginald Lavhelesani Demana – CEO: Zhendedzi ḽa Dzibada dza Lushaka ḽa Afrika Tshipembe..   Mufumakadzi Vho Ditebogo Kgomo – CEO: Mulangi wa zwa Nyukilia ya Lushaka.
Vho Risenga Maluleka – Mutatistika Muhulwane (Khonṱhiraka yo tou vusuluswaho).

src_text: Issues in the environment.
tgt_text: Issues in the environment.

src_text: Presidential Summit on Gender-Based Violence and Femicide (GBVF).
tgt_text: Presidential Summit on Gender-Based Violence and Femicide (GBVF).

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the hosting of the second Presidential Summit on GBVF at the Gallagher Estate in Midrand, Gauteng on 1 and 2 November 2022 under the theme: “Accountability, Acceleration and Amplification, NOW!”.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the hosting of the second Presidential Summit on GBVF at the Gallagher Estate in Midrand, Gauteng on 1 and 2 November 2022 under the theme: “Accountability, Acceleration and Amplification, NOW!”.

src_text: The summit reflected on progress made in the implementation of declarations proposed during the 2018 Presidential Summit, which reaffirmed the country’s commitment to united, comprehensive and effective response to GBVF..
tgt_text: The summit reflected on progress made in the implementation of declarations proposed during the 2018 Presidential Summit, which reaffirmed the country’s commitment to united, comprehensive and effective response to GBVF..

src_text: Participants at the two-day summit accounted for work being done towards the implementation of the National Strategic Plan (NSP) on GBVF, which aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and country as whole..
tgt_text: Participants at the two-day summit accounted for work being done towards the implementation of the National Strategic Plan (NSP) on GBVF, which aims to provide multi-sectoral, coherent strategic policy and programming framework to strengthen coordinated national response to the crisis of GBVF by the government and country as whole..

src_text: The summit was the ideal platform to engage in honest and robust discussions around successes and challenges in the fight against GBVF.
tgt_text: The summit was the ideal platform to engage in honest and robust discussions around successes and challenges in the fight against GBVF.

src_text: It also showcased the need for collective action and how significant success can be achieved if adequate resources are provided and managed correctly.
tgt_text: It also showcased the need for collective action and how significant success can be achieved if adequate resources are provided and managed correctly.

src_text: The agreements reached at the summit have demonstrated the importance of the partnership that government has forged with civil society, business, development partners, the faith-based sector and other sectors to work together to deal with the scourge of GBVF..
tgt_text: The agreements reached at the summit have demonstrated the importance of the partnership that government has forged with civil society, business, development partners, the faith-based sector and other sectors to work together to deal with the scourge of GBVF..

src_text: Some of the interventions agreed upon included the need to allocate adequate funding to the NSP on GBVF, to implement consequence management mechanisms to ensure accountability, and to strengthen national, provincial and local accountability structures..
tgt_text: Some of the interventions agreed upon included the need to allocate adequate funding to the NSP on GBVF, to implement consequence management mechanisms to ensure accountability, and to strengthen national, provincial and local accountability structures..

src_text: Cabinet reiterated that all acts of violence and abuse will not be tolerated in our society.
tgt_text: Cabinet reiterated that all acts of violence and abuse will not be tolerated in our society.

src_text: Communities are urged to tackle the scourge of GBVF head-on by reporting perpetrators to law-enforcement agencies.
tgt_text: Communities are urged to tackle the scourge of GBVF head-on by reporting perpetrators to law-enforcement agencies.

src_text: Each sector of our society must play its part by creating conditions that make it difficult, if not impossible, for GBVF to thrive.
tgt_text: Each sector of our society must play its part by creating conditions that make it difficult, if not impossible, for GBVF to thrive.

src_text: Safety and security .
tgt_text: Safety and security .

src_text: Cabinet has reassured the public that the National Joint Operational and Intelligence Structure (NATJOINTS) – which comprises various government departments led by the State Security Agency, South African Police Service and South African National Defence Force – has an intelligence-driven capacity to deal with threats to our national security, including terrorism.
tgt_text: Cabinet has reassured the public that the National Joint Operational and Intelligence Structure (NATJOINTS) – which comprises various government departments led by the State Security Agency, South African Police Service and South African National Defence Force – has an intelligence-driven capacity to deal with threats to our national security, including terrorism.

src_text: Through NATJOINTS, the security of the country is assessed regularly for any possible security threat.
tgt_text: Through NATJOINTS, the security of the country is assessed regularly for any possible security threat.

src_text: As part of the cooperation agreements with other intelligence agencies from other countries, South Africa also benefits from the exchange of relevant intelligence information that can ensure the safety of the nation..
tgt_text: As part of the cooperation agreements with other intelligence agencies from other countries, South Africa also benefits from the exchange of relevant intelligence information that can ensure the safety of the nation..

src_text: Cabinet calls on the public to remain vigilant and to report any suspicious and illegal activities to law enforcement agencies.
tgt_text: Cabinet calls on the public to remain vigilant and to report any suspicious and illegal activities to law enforcement agencies.

src_text: Do not keep quiet; if you see something, say something – together we can keep the nation safe.
tgt_text: Do not keep quiet; if you see something, say something – together we can keep the nation safe.

src_text: 2022 Medium-Term Budget Policy Statement (MTBPS).
tgt_text: 2022 Medium-Term Budget Policy Statement (MTBPS).

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the bold measures introduced in the 2022 MTBPS to restore the health of our public finances, just as the world economy is taking dangerous turn for the worse..
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the bold measures introduced in the 2022 MTBPS to restore the health of our public finances, just as the world economy is taking dangerous turn for the worse..

src_text: The steps announced by Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana in Parliament, Cape Town on Wednesday, 26 October 2022, included narrowing our budget deficit greatly to improve our fiscal framework, support our economic standing and give South Africans every confidence in the future prospects of our economy.
tgt_text: The steps announced by Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana in Parliament, Cape Town on Wednesday, 26 October 2022, included narrowing our budget deficit greatly to improve our fiscal framework, support our economic standing and give South Africans every confidence in the future prospects of our economy.

src_text: The planned increase in contingency reserves allows us to deal with emergencies such as natural disasters.
tgt_text: The planned increase in contingency reserves allows us to deal with emergencies such as natural disasters.

src_text: The 2022 MTBPS further boosts our key priorities of infrastructure and service-delivery programmes, and provides additional relief to support the poor and vulnerable in our nation..
tgt_text: The 2022 MTBPS further boosts our key priorities of infrastructure and service-delivery programmes, and provides additional relief to support the poor and vulnerable in our nation..

src_text: Cabinet calls on all socio-economic sectors to partner with the government to uplift our economy to improve the lives of our citizens across the country.
tgt_text: Cabinet calls on all socio-economic sectors to partner with the government to uplift our economy to improve the lives of our citizens across the country.

src_text: South Africa – Spain relations.
tgt_text: South Africa – Spain relations.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the outcome of the Official Visit to South Africa by Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez Pérez-Castejón of Spain to solidify the already strong relations between the two countries.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the outcome of the Official Visit to South Africa by Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez Pérez-Castejón of Spain to solidify the already strong relations between the two countries.

src_text: The Prime Minister was accompanied by the Spanish Minister for Industry, Trade and Tourism, Ms Reyes Maroto, and business delegation.
tgt_text: The Prime Minister was accompanied by the Spanish Minister for Industry, Trade and Tourism, Ms Reyes Maroto, and business delegation.

src_text: The visit created opportunities for various South African sectors to meet with their Spanish counterparts and to deepen cooperation in trade and investment, science and innovation, arts and culture, sports and education.
